name: Miles O'Brien Chief of Operations

name: Nog Eager Cadet

name: Robin Lefler Mission Specialist

Name: Worf Strategic Operations Officer

name: Morn Barfly

Name: Vreenak Tal Shiar Chairman

name: A Living Death
Name: A Living Death
gametext: Place this dilemma on this mission. Each personnel on this planet who does not have Treachery is attributes -1. At the end of this turn, this dilemma is overcome.

name: Aggressive Behavior
Name: Aggressive Behavior
gametext: Unless you have 2 Anthropology or 2 Leadership and Weapons>8, randomly select a personnel to be killed, all your other personnel are stopped, and this dilemma is placed on your ship. Damage - This ship is attributes -2.

name: Alien Abduction
Name: Alien Abduction
gametext: Unless you have 2 Engineer and Physics or Medical and Transporters, randomly select three personnel to be stopped.

name: Antedean Assassins
Name: Antedean Assassins
gametext: Unless you have a personnel who has 2 Anthropology or a personnel who has 2 Telepathy, your opponent chooses an Anthropology or Telepathy personnel to be stopped. If your opponent cannot, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Armus Roulette
Name: Armus Roulette
gametext: Randomly select four personnel. Unless they have Cunning>22 or one of them has Cunning>7, your opponent chooses one of them to be killed, then the other three are stopped.

name: Assassin's Blade
Name: Assassin's Blade
gametext: Unless you have 2 Security or Cunning>26, your opponent chooses a personnel (except an Android or a Shape-shifter) to be killed, then all your other personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Assassination Attempt
Name: Assassination Attempt
gametext: Randomly select two personnel. Each of those personnel who does not have Treachery is killed.

name: Authenticate Artifacts
Name: Authenticate Artifacts
gametext: Unless you have a personnel who has 2 Anthropology or a personnel who has 2 Archaeology, your opponent chooses an Anthropology or Archaeology personnel to be stopped. If your opponent cannot, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Automated Weapons
Name: Automated Weapons
gametext: Unless you have 2 Security or a Hand Weapon, randomly select a personnel to be killed, then all your other personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Berserk Changeling
Name: Berserk Changeling
gametext: Unless you have 2 Exobiology and 2 Science or 3 Security or two Hand Weapons, randomly select a personnel (except a Changeling) to be killed, then all your other personnel are stopped.

name: Blended
Name: Blended
gametext: Unless you have Diplomacy or Telepathy, all your personnel are stopped. If you have two or more personnel who have Diplomacy or Telepathy, randomly select all but one of those personnel to be stopped.

name: Center of Attention
Name: Center of Attention
gametext: Unless you have 3 Security or a Hand Weapon and Cunning>28 or {Quark}, your opponent chooses a Treachery personnel to be killed, then all your other personnel are stopped.

name: Chula: Echoes
Name: Chula: Echoes
gametext: Randomly select three personnel. If the highest Cunning among those personnel is even, all three of them are stopped.

name: Chula: Pick One to Save Two
Name: Chula: Pick One to Save Two
gametext: Randomly select three personnel. Choose to return one of those personnel to its owner's hand or to have all three of them be stopped.

name: Command Decisions
Name: Command Decisions
gametext: Choose a personnel who has Leadership or Officer to be stopped. If you cannot, randomly select a personnel to be killed.

name: Console Overload
Name: Console Overload
gametext: Unless you have 2 Engineer or 2 Programming, choose a personnel who has Medical or Science to be stopped, then this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Contamination
Name: Contamination
gametext: Unless you have Engineer and Physics or 2 Exobiology, all your Medical personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Damaged Reputation
Name: Damaged Reputation
gametext: If you have Integrity>50, lose 5 points. Also, unless you have 2 Diplomacy or Intelligence and 2 Treachery or Strength>30, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Dangerous Liaisons
Name: Dangerous Liaisons
gametext: Unless you have 2 Science and 2 Security or 3 Treachery, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Debris Field
Name: Debris Field
gametext: Unless you have Astrometrics or Navigation, all your Engineer personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Drumhead
Name: Drumhead
gametext: Unless you have Law, randomly select a personnel who has Integrity<4 to be placed in its owner's discard pile. If you cannot, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Enemy Boarding Party
Name: Enemy Boarding Party
gametext: Randomly select three personnel. Each of those personnel who has Strength<6 is killed.

name: Equipment Malfunction
Name: Equipment Malfunction
gametext: Return all your equipment to their owner's hands.

name: Explosive Decompression
Name: Explosive Decompression
gametext: Randomly select a personnel to be killed. If you still have nine personnel remaining, randomly select a second personnel to be killed. If you still have ten personnel remaining, randomly select a third personnel to be killed.

name: Gravimetric Distortion
Name: Gravimetric Distortion
gametext: Unless you have 2 Astrometrics or 3 Engineer or a personnel who has 2 Navigation, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma is placed on your ship. Damage - This ship is attributes -2.

name: Graviton Ellipse
Name: Graviton Ellipse
gametext: Unless you have Astrometrics, Engineer, and Physics or Shields + unused Range this turn>13, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma is placed on your ship. Damage - This ship is attributes -2.

name: Hunter Gangs
Name: Hunter Gangs
gametext: Randomly select two personnel. Each of those personnel who has Cunning+Strength<11 is killed.

name: Impressive Trophies
Name: Impressive Trophies
gametext: Unless you have Cunning>32, your personnel who has the highest cost is placed in your opponent's brig, then all your other personnel are stopped.

name: Invidium Leak
Name: Invidium Leak
gametext: Unless you have Engineer and 2 Programming or 2 Medical, all your personnel are stopped.

name: Kelvan Show of Force
Name: Kelvan Show of Force
gametext: Your opponent chooses two personnel (except an Android or a Hologram). Randomly select one of those personnel to be killed.

name: Kolaran Raiders
Name: Kolaran Raiders
gametext: Choose a personnel who has Leadership or Security to be stopped. If you cannot, randomly select a personnel to be killed.

name: Limited Welcome
Name: Limited Welcome
gametext: Randomly select nine personnel. All your other personnel are stopped. Place this dilemma on this mission. When you attempt this mission again, after your opponent draws dilemmas, he or she may take this dilemma and add it to those drawn.

name: Maglock
Name: Maglock
gametext: Unless you have 3 Officer or 3 Programming, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Magnetic Field Disruptions
Name: Magnetic Field Disruptions
gametext: Choose a personnel who has Astrometrics or Navigation to be stopped. If you cannot, randomly select a personnel to be killed.

name: Microbrain
Name: Microbrain
gametext: Unless you have a personnel who has 2 Exobiology or a personnel who has 2 Geology, your opponent chooses an Exobiology or Geology personnel to be stopped. If your opponent cannot, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Misguided Activist
Name: Misguided Activist
gametext: Randomly select a [Cmd] personnel to be stopped. Unless you have Diplomacy and 2 Honor or 2 Security or {Miles O'Brien}, that personnel is killed instead.

name: Nanite Attack
Name: Nanite Attack
gametext: Unless you have 2 Diplomacy and 2 Engineer or 2 Security and a Hand Weapon, this dilemma is placed on your ship. Damage - At the end of each of your turns, randomly select a personnel aboard this ship to be killed.

name: None Shall Pass
Name: None Shall Pass
gametext: Unless you have 2 Anthropology or 3 Diplomacy or Strength>35, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Ornaran Threat
Name: Ornaran Threat
gametext: Randomly select a personnel to be stopped. Unless you have Diplomacy and Medical or 2 Security, that personnel is killed instead, then all your other personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Personal Duty
Name: Personal Duty
gametext: Unless you have Leadership or Officer, all your personnel are stopped. If you have two or more personnel who have Leadership or Officer, randomly select all but one of those personnel to be stopped.

name: Pinned Down
Name: Pinned Down
gametext: Randomly select a personnel to be stopped. If you still have nine personnel remaining, randomly select a second personnel to be stopped. If you still have ten personnel remaining, randomly select a third personnel to be stopped.

name: Planetary Survey
Name: Planetary Survey
gametext: Choose a personnel who has Geology or Programming to be stopped. If you cannot, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Primitive Culture
Name: Primitive Culture
gametext: Unless you have Anthropology and Leadership or 3 Diplomacy or 2 Intelligence or four personnel who each have Strength>6, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Pursuit Just Behind
Name: Pursuit Just Behind
gametext: Randomly select a personnel to be killed. If you still have nine personnel remaining, randomly select a second personnel to be killed. If you still have ten personnel remaining, randomly select a third personnel to be killed.

name: Quarren Labor Shortage
Name: Quarren Labor Shortage
gametext: Unless at least half your personnel are not [NA], all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Recurring Injury
Name: Recurring Injury
gametext: Unless you have a personnel who has 2 Biology or a personnel who has 2 Medical, your opponent chooses an Biology or Medical personnel to be stopped. If your opponent cannot, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Skullduggery
Name: Skullduggery
gametext: Randomly select a personnel. If that personnel has Acquisition or Treachery, he or she is stopped. Otherwise, he or she is killed.

name: Stellar Core Fragment
Name: Stellar Core Fragment
gametext: Unless you have a personnel who has 2 Physics or a personnel who has 2 Science, your opponent chooses an Physics or Science personnel to be stopped. If your opponent cannot, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Sympathetic Magic
Name: Sympathetic Magic
gametext: Unless you choose to place this dilemma on your ship at this mission, all your personnel are stopped. Damage - This ship is attributes-2.

name: Systems Diagnostic
Name: Systems Diagnostic
gametext: Choose a personnel who has Engineer or Programming to be stopped. If you cannot, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Temptation
Name: Temptation
gametext: Randomly select three personnel. Each of those personnel that does not have Honor or Treachery is stopped.

name: Tense Negotiations
Name: Tense Negotiations
gametext: Unless you have a personnel who has 2 Diplomacy or a personnel who has 2 Leadership, your opponent chooses an Diplomacy or Leadership personnel to be stopped. If your opponent cannot, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Trabe Grenade
Name: Trabe Grenade
gametext: Randomly select a personnel who has Leadership or Security. If that personnel has Cunning<7, he or she is killed.

name: Triage
Name: Triage
gametext: Choose a personnel who has Biology or Medical to be stopped. If you cannot, randomly select a personnel to be killed.

name: Unscientific Method
Name: Unscientific Method
gametext: The most Cunning Science personnel who does not have Treachery is killed. Unless you have Cunning>24 remaining, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Vastly Outnumbered
Name: Vastly Outnumbered
gametext: If you have Strength>55, lose 5 points. Also, unless you have Anthropology and 2 Honor or two Hand Weapons or Integrity>28, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Wavefront
Name: Wavefront
gametext: Unless you have a personnel who has 2 Astrometrics or a personnel who has 2 Navigation, your opponent chooses an Astrometrics or Navigation personnel to be stopped. If your opponent cannot, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Alien Gambling Device
Name: Alien Gambling Device
gametext: When a random selection is made at this mission, you may ignore its result and select again. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Bajoran Phaser Pistol
Name: Bajoran Phaser Pistol
gametext: While in combat, each of your [Baj] personnel present is Strength +1.

name: Cardassian Phaser Pistol
Name: Cardassian Phaser Pistol
gametext: While in combat, each of your [Car] personnel present is Strength +1.

name: Engineering Kit
Name: Engineering Kit
gametext: Each of your Engineer personnel present gains Physics.

name: Engineering PADD
Name: Engineering PADD
gametext: Each of your Engineer personnel present gains Astrometrics.

name: Klingon Disruptor Pistol
Name: Klingon Disruptor Pistol
gametext: While in combat, each of your [Kli] personnel present is Strength +1.

name: Medical Kit
Name: Medical Kit
gametext: Each of your Medical personnel present gains Biology.

name: Medical Tricorder
Name: Medical Tricorder
gametext: Each of your Medical personnel present gains Exobiology.

name: Romulan Disruptor Pistol
Name: Romulan Disruptor Pistol
gametext: While in combat, each of your [Rom] personnel present is Strength +1.

name: Science PADD
Name: Science PADD
gametext: Each of your Science personnel present gains Archaeology.

name: Starfleet Type-2 Phaser
Name: Starfleet Type-2 Phaser
gametext: While in combat, each of your [Fed] personnel present is Strength +1.

name: Tricorder
Name: Tricorder
gametext: Each of your Science personnel present gains Geology.

name: A Chance for Glory
Name: A Chance for Glory
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin combat or an engagement involving your [Kli] personnel. If you win, score 10 points.

name: A Treasure Beyond Comparison
Name: A Treasure Beyond Comparison
gametext: Plays in your core. When you place an opponent's personnel in your brig, you may draw a card.

name: Astrometrics Lab
Name: Astrometrics Lab
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Discard a card from hand to make your ship with your Astrometrics personnel aboard Range +2 until the end of this turn. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Awaiting Trial
Name: Awaiting Trial
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Car] personnel. Plays in your core. At the start of each of your turns, if you have a captive, you may draw a card.

name: Back-Flush Bussard Collectors
Name: Back-Flush Bussard Collectors
gametext: To play this event, you must command a [Fed] Engineer personnel. Discard a card from hand to draw two cards. Destroy this event.

name: BaH!
Name: BaH!
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin an engagement involving your [Kli] ship. That ship is Weapons +1. If you win, score 10 points.

name: Bajoran Gratitude Festival
Name: Bajoran Gratitude Festival
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Baj] personnel. Remove up to four cards in your discard pile from the game, then draw an equal number of cards. Destroy this event.

name: Battle Drills
Name: Battle Drills
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin an engagement involving your ship with your Gul aboard. That ship is Weapons +2. If you win, randomly kill an opponent's personnel involved.

name: Blind Spot
Name: Blind Spot
gametext: Plays on your ship. When an opponent's ship moves away from this mission, this ship may follow using its Range from your next turn.

name: Brutal Struggle
Name: Brutal Struggle
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin combat involving your Leadership personnel. If you win, randomly kill an opponent's personnel involved.

name: Cry "Havoc!"
Name: Cry "Havoc!"
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin an engagement involving your Leadership personnel. If you win, randomly kill an opponent's personnel involved.

name: Days of Atonement
Name: Days of Atonement
gametext: To play this event, you must command a [Baj] Anthropology personnel. Discard a card from hand to draw two cards. Destroy this event.

name: Diplomatic Overture
Name: Diplomatic Overture
gametext: Plays on a mission, if your [Fed] Diplomacy personnel is at that mission. While a Diplomacy personnel is at this mission, that personnel's owner must discard a card from hand to use his or her skills.

name: Engage Cloak
Name: Engage Cloak
gametext: Plays in your core. You may execute only one order using this event each turn. Order - If there is no ship on this event, place your staffed ship that has a Cloaking Device on this event (While a ship is here, this event cannot leave play.) Order - If a ship is on this event, place that ship at any mission. That ship's Range for this turn is used.

name: Feast on the Dying
Name: Feast on the Dying
gametext: Examine the top two cards of your deck. You may replace either or both of them with a card from your discard pile, then place them on top of your deck in any order. Remove this event from the game.

name: For All Our Sons
Name: For All Our Sons
gametext: Plays on {Cardassia Prime}. At the start of each of your turns, if your Gul or Legate is at a different mission, you may examine the top three cards of your deck. Take two of those cards into hand and discard the other.

name: How Would You Like a Trip to Romulus?
Name: How Would You Like a Trip to Romulus?
gametext: Choose one: download a Commander that corresponds with your ship; or download a ship that corresponds with your Commander. Destroy this event.

name: Inspiring Leader
Name: Inspiring Leader
gametext: Plays on your ship (limit one per ship). While you have this ship's Commander aboard, it is Range +2.

name: Just Like Old Times
Name: Just Like Old Times
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin combat involving your Bajoran Resistance personnel. If you win, score 15 points.

name: Labor Camp
Name: Labor Camp
gametext: Plays on your planet mission. At the start of each of your turns, if your [Car] personnel is on this planet and you have a captive, score 10 points.

name: Let Honor Guide You
Name: Let Honor Guide You
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin combat involving your [Kli] Honor personnel. If you win, randomly kill an opponent's personnel involved.

name: Line of Defense
Name: Line of Defense
gametext: Plays in your core. While your ship is at a mission that has a matching affiliation icon, it is Shields +2.

name: Nelvana Trap
Name: Nelvana Trap
gametext: Plays on an opponent's mission. When an opponent moves a ship to this mission, you may destroy this event to take each [Rom] ship from your copies of {Engage Cloak}, place them at this mission, and begin an engagement involving them. If you win, randomly kill an opponent's personnel involved.

name: No Love for the Spoon Heads
Name: No Love for the Spoon Heads
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin combat involving your [Baj] personnel. If you win, randomly kill an opponent's personnel involved and you may destroy an event.

name: No Peace in Our Time
Name: No Peace in Our Time
gametext: Plays in your core. Each of your [Kli] Treachery personnel is Cunning +2. Order - Destroy this event to begin an engagement involving your [Kli] Treachery personnel. If you win, randomly kill an opponent's personnel involved.

name: Nothing That Happens is Truly Random
Name: Nothing That Happens is Truly Random
gametext: To play this event, you must command a [Fed] Diplomacy personnel. Reveal the top three cards of your deck. An opponent chooses one of those cards to be discarded, then you take the other two into hand. Destroy this event.

name: "Observer" from the Obsidian Order
Name: "Observer" from the Obsidian Order
gametext: To play this event, you must command a [Car] personnel who has Leadership or Intelligence. Discard a card from hand to draw two cards. Destroy this event.

name: Peacemaker or Predator?
Name: Peacemaker or Predator?
gametext: Examine a number of cards from the top of an opponent's deck equal to the number of [Rom] Leadership personnel you command. Replace those cards in any order. Destroy this event.

name: Pierce Their Defenses
Name: Pierce Their Defenses
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Begin an engagement involving your ship with your Leadership personnel aboard. That ship is Weapons +2. If you win, place this event on an opponent's ship involved. Otherwise, destroy this event. Damage - This ship is Shields -2.

name: Point Blank Strike
Name: Point Blank Strike
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Begin an engagement involving your ship with your Leadership personnel aboard. That ship is Weapons +4. If you win, place this event on an opponent's ship involved. Otherwise, destroy this event. Damage - This ship is Weapons -2.

name: Precise Attack
Name: Precise Attack
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Begin an engagement involving your ship with your Leadership personnel aboard. That ship is Weapons +2. If you win, place this event on an opponent's ship involved. Otherwise, destroy this event. Damage - This ship is Range -2.

name: Prejudice and Politics
Name: Prejudice and Politics
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - If your Praetor or Senator is on {Romulus}, reveal the top card of an opponent's deck. If it is a personnel, that opponent places that card in his or her hand. Otherwise, score 5 points, and that opponent places that card on the bottom of his or her deck. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Process Identification
Name: Process Identification
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Car] personnel. Examine the top five cards of your deck. Take one of those cards into hand and place the others on the bottom of your deck in any order. Destroy this event.

name: Rescue Captives
Name: Rescue Captives
gametext: Discard any number of cards from hand to take an equal number of your personnel from your opponents' brigs and place them on your headquarters mission. Destroy this event.

name: Resistance Tactics
Name: Resistance Tactics
gametext: Plays in your core. When combat or an engagement involving your [Baj] card begins, you may destroy this event to prevent that combat or engagement and stop each personnel and ship involved.

name: Romulan Intelligence Network
Name: Romulan Intelligence Network
gametext: Plays in your core. At the start of each of your turns, if you have a [Rom] personnel at an opponent's planet mission, you may examine the top two cards of that opponent's deck. Place one of those cards on the bottom of that deck and the other one on top.

name: Standard Cardassian Procedure
Name: Standard Cardassian Procedure
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin an engagement involving your [Car] ship. That ship is Weapons +1. If you win, randomly select an opponent's personnel involved to place in your brig.

name: Tactical Planning
Name: Tactical Planning
gametext: To play this event, you must command a [Rom] Security personnel. Discard a card from hand to draw two cards. Destroy this event.

name: Taken Prisoner
Name: Taken Prisoner
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin combat involving your [Car] personnel. If you win, randomly select an opponent's personnel involved to place in your brig.

name: Tapestry
Name: Tapestry
gametext: Remove all the cards in your deck from the game. Take all the personnel and ships from your discard pile and shuffle them to form a new deck. Remove this event and all the other cards in your discard pile from the game.

name: The Orion Underworld
Name: The Orion Underworld
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin an engagement involving your [NA] ship with your Thief aboard. If you win, score 10 points.

name: The Pillage of Bajor
Name: The Pillage of Bajor
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Car] personnel. Examine the top three cards of your deck. Take two of those cards into hand and discard the other. Destroy this event.

name: The Reman Mines
Name: The Reman Mines
gametext: Plays on {Remus}. Each of your [Rom] ships is Range +1 for each Reman you command (limit +3).

name: To Boldly Go
Name: To Boldly Go
gametext: To play this event, you must have completed a planet mission and a space mission. Plays in your core. When any of your [Fed] personnel are about to be stopped by a dilemma, you may destroy this event to prevent that.

name: Alternate Identity
Name: Alternate Identity
gametext: Order - Replace a [Rom] personnel you command with a [Rom] personnel from your hand. Place the personnel you replaced in your discard pile.

name: Amanda Rogers
Name: Amanda Rogers
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must have 5 or more points. When an event or interrupt is played, prevent that event or interrupt and place it in its owner's discard pile. Lose 5 points.

name: Arrest Order
Name: Arrest Order
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must command a [Car] Security personnel equipped with a hand weapon at a non-headquarters mission. Order - Stop that personnel to randomly select an opponent's personnel present to place in your brig.

name: Comfort Women
Name: Comfort Women
gametext: When your Gul or Legate is attempting a mission, he or she gains one skill from your non-[Car] personnel at that mission. Also, each of your Guls and Legates involved is attributes +1. These effects last until the end of that mission attempt.

name: Condition Captive
Name: Condition Captive
gametext: Order - Place your captive on your headquarters mission. You now command that personnel.

name: Dimensional Shifting
Name: Dimensional Shifting
gametext: Order - Discard a random card from hand to place any number of your personnel and equipment at one mission aboard any ship at the same mission.

name: Empathic Touch
Name: Empathic Touch
gametext: When your personnel is about to be killed, if your Telepathy personnel is present, stop both personnel to prevent that.

name: Escape
Name: Escape
gametext: When any number of your personnel facing a dilemma are about to be killed or placed in an opponent's brig, discard a random card from hand to prevent that. Those personnel are stopped instead.

name: Evasive Maneuvers
Name: Evasive Maneuvers
gametext: When your ship with your Navigation personnel aboard is in an engagement, it is Shields +4 until the end of that engagement.

name: Kevin Uxbridge
Name: Kevin Uxbridge
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must have 5 or more points. Order - Destroy an event. Lose 5 points.

name: Lasting Peace
Name: Lasting Peace
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must command a [Baj] Diplomacy personnel. Order - Place an equal number of [Baj] personnel and non-[Baj] personnel from your discard pile on top of your deck in any order.

name: Mission Briefing
Name: Mission Briefing
gametext: When your [Fed] personnel is facing a dilemma, discard a card from hand to make him or her gain all skills on one of your stopped [Fed] personnel at the same mission. This effect lasts until the end of that dilemma.

name: Power to the Shields
Name: Power to the Shields
gametext: When your ship with your Engineer personnel aboard is in an engagement, it is Shields +4 until the end of that engagement.

name: Protection of the Tal Shiar
Name: Protection of the Tal Shiar
gametext: When your non-Intelligence [Rom] personnel is facing a dilemma, he or she is attributes +1 and gains all skills on one of your [Rom] Intelligence personnel at this mission. This effect lasts until the end of that dilemma.

name: Pursuit Course
Name: Pursuit Course
gametext: When an opponent's ship moves away from a mission where you have a staffed ship, place that ship at the mission the opponent's ship moves to.

name: Quantum Slipstream Drive
Name: Quantum Slipstream Drive
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must command a ship with your Engineer personnel aboard. Order - That ship is Range +4 until the end of this turn.

name: Render Assistance
Name: Render Assistance
gametext: When an engagement involving your ship begins, another one of your ships at that mission joins the engagement.

name: Secret Conspiracy
Name: Secret Conspiracy
gametext: When an opponent's personnel is about to complete a mission, add the skills (except Intelligence) of your [Rom] Intelligence personnel at that mission to the mission's requirements. This effect lasts until the end of that opponent's turn.

name: Sensor Sweep
Name: Sensor Sweep
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must command an Astrometrics personnel. Order - Download a Pursuit card.

name: Sermon
Name: Sermon
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must command a personnel who has Anthropology and Leadership. When an opponent plays an event, place a random card from hand on top of your deck to prevent that event and place it on top of that opponent's deck.

name: Shady Resources
Name: Shady Resources
gametext: When your personnel is facing a dilemma, discard a card from hand to make him or her gain all skills on one of your other Treachery personnel at this mission. This effect lasts until the end of that dilemma.

name: Souls of the Dead
Name: Souls of the Dead
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must command three [Baj] personnel. Order - Place a card from your discard pile on top of your deck.

name: Symbol of Devotion
Name: Symbol of Devotion
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must command a Kai, Prylar, or Vedek. Order - Download a [Baj] personnel, then place the Kai, Prylar, or Vedek you command on the bottom of your deck.

name: The Promise
Name: The Promise
gametext: When your [Kli] personnel is facing a dilemma, he or she gains all skills and attributes on a [Kli] personnel in your discard pile. This effect lasts until the end of that dilemma.

name: The Tides of Fortune
Name: The Tides of Fortune
gametext: When your non-Consume space dilemma is revealed from your dilemma stack, if your staffed [Rom] ship is at that mission, that ship and your personnel aboard it face that dilemma instead. Score 10 points.

name: Ties of Blood and Water
Name: Ties of Blood and Water
gametext: When your [Baj] personnel is facing a dilemma, he or she gains all skills on a [Baj] personnel in your discard pile. This effect lasts until the end of that dilemma.

name: Torture
Name: Torture
gametext: You may play only one copy of this interrupt each turn. Order - Choose one of your captives. Each of your Intelligence personnel gains that captive's skills until the end of your turn.

name: Twist of Fate
Name: Twist of Fate
gametext: When your [Rom] personnel is about to be killed, randomly select another of your personnel present to be killed instead.

name: Risan Approach Abduction Plot
Name: Risan Approach Abduction Plot
Skills: Transporters, Treachery, Cunning>34, and (Intelligence and Leadership or Law and Officer)

name: Callinon VII Access Relay Station
Name: Callinon VII Access Relay Station
Skills: 2 Programming, Cunning>34, and (Engineer and Officer or Intelligence and Security)

name: Second Moon of Bajor VIII Acquire Illicit Explosives
Name: Second Moon of Bajor VIII Acquire Illicit Explosives
Skills: Physics, Treachery, Cunning>30, and (Astrometrics or Engineer)

name: Hromi Cluster Amnesty Talks
Name: Hromi Cluster Amnesty Talks
Affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
Skills: Anthropology, 2 Diplomacy, Law and Integrity>31 or Leadership, Security, 2 Treachery, and Cunning>36

name: Bajor Gift of the Prophets
Name: Bajor Gift of the Prophets
Skills: You may play [Baj] cards, [NA] cards, and equipment at this mission.

name: Cardassia Prime Hardscrabble World
Name: Cardassia Prime Hardscrabble World
Skills: You may play [Car] cards, [NA] cards, and equipment at this mission.

name: Beltane IX Cargo Rendezvous
Name: Beltane IX Cargo Rendezvous
Skills: Transporters and (Engineer, Physics, and Integrity>29 or Acquisition, Treachery, and Cunning>31)

name: Edge of Denkiri Arm Chart Stellar Cluster
Name: Edge of Denkiri Arm Chart Stellar Cluster

name: Colony Preparations
Name: Colony Preparations
Skills: Biology, Geology, Science, Security, and Strength>34

name: Deliver Supplies
Name: Deliver Supplies
Skills: Navigation, Transporters, Strength>28, and (Acquisition or Honor)

name: Earth Cradle of the Federation
Name: Earth Cradle of the Federation
Skills: You may play [TNG] cards, [E] cards, [NA] cards, and equipment at this mission.

name: Earth Home of Starfleet Command
Name: Earth Home of Starfleet Command
Skills: You may play [Fed][DS9] cards, [E] cards, [NA] cards, and equipment at this mission.

name: T'Lani III Eliminate Harvesters
Name: T'Lani III Eliminate Harvesters
Skills: Medical and (Exobiology, Programming, and Integrity>27 or Intelligence, Treachery, and Cunning>28)

name: Deneb IV Encounter at Farpoint
Name: Deneb IV Encounter at Farpoint
Affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
Skills: Exobiology, Honor, Telepathy, and Integrity>25 or Acquisition, Diplomacy, Treachery, and Cunning>30

name: Evacuate Colony
Name: Evacuate Colony
Skills: Anthropology, 2 Diplomacy, Honor and Integrity>31 or Officer, Security, 2 Treachery, and Strength>34
gametext: You cannot complete this mission if your [Maq] personnel is on this planet.

name: Explore Black Cluster
Name: Explore Black Cluster
Affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
Skills: Astrometrics, Leadership, Physics, Science, and Cunning>34

name: Extraction
Name: Extraction
Affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
Skills: Biology, Medical, Treachery, Cunning>36, and (Diplomacy or Intelligence)

name: Feldomite Rush
Name: Feldomite Rush
Affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
Skills: Engineer, Geology, Cunning>28, and (Acquisition or Law or 2 Treachery)

name: Forcas Sector Fissure Research
Name: Forcas Sector Fissure Research
Affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.
Skills: Astrometrics, Engineer, Physics, Science, and Cunning>36

name: Lapideas System Geological Survey
Name: Lapideas System Geological Survey
gametext: When you complete this mission, if your personnel completing it have 2 Acquisition or 2 Geology, score 5 points.

name: Host Metaphasic Shielding Test
Name: Host Metaphasic Shielding Test
Affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
Skills: Diplomacy, Engineer, Navigation, Science, and Integrity>29

name: Hunt for DNA Program
Name: Hunt for DNA Program
Affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
Skills: 2 Archaeology, 2 Biology, Leadership, Programming, Cunning>44, and (Honor or Treachery)

name: Intercept Maquis
Name: Intercept Maquis
gametext: You cannot complete this mission using a ship that has a [Maq] personnel aboard.

name: Intercept Renegade
Name: Intercept Renegade
Skills: 2 Intelligence, 2 Treachery, and Cunning>34 or 2 Leadership, Officer, Security, and Integrity>33

name: Investigate Alien Probe
Name: Investigate Alien Probe
Affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.

name: Investigate Coup
Name: Investigate Coup
Skills: Leadership, Navigation, Officer, Security, and Strength>36

name: Investigate Rogue Comet
Name: Investigate Rogue Comet
Affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
Skills: Anthropology, Archaeology, Engineer, Programming, and Cunning>34

name: Investigate Sighting
Name: Investigate Sighting
Skills: Exobiology, 2 Treachery, and Cunning>28 or 2 Telepathy and Integrity>29

name: Khitomer Khitomer Investigation
Name: Khitomer Khitomer Investigation
Skills: Programming, Security, Cunning>32, and (2 Honor or 2 Treachery)

name: Cardassian Outskirts Kressari Rendezvous
Name: Cardassian Outskirts Kressari Rendezvous
gametext: When you complete this mission, you may place up to three of your Hand Weapons aboard the completing ship in their owners' discard piles. Score 5 points for each.

name: Mining Survey
Name: Mining Survey
Affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
Skills: Engineer, Geology, Physics, Science, and Cunning>34

name: Mouth of the Wormhole Deep Space 9
Name: Mouth of the Wormhole Deep Space 9
Skills: You may play [DS9] cards, [NA] cards, and equipment at this mission.
gametext: When any player is about to move a ship between this mission and a [GQ] mission, do not add 2 to the span total of those missions.

name: Pegasus Search
Name: Pegasus Search
Affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.
Skills: 2 Astrometrics, Engineer, 2 Navigation, Physics, Treachery, and Cunning>44

name: Quest for the Sword of Kahless
Name: Quest for the Sword of Kahless
Skills: Archaeology, Leadership, 2 Science, Strength>38 and (Honor or Treachery)

name: Cardassia IV Rescue Prisoners
Name: Cardassia IV Rescue Prisoners
gametext: When you complete this mission, you may take one of your personnel from an opponent's brig and place him or her on your headquarters mission.

name: Romulus Seat of Power
Name: Romulus Seat of Power
Skills: You may play [Rom] cards, [NA] cards, and equipment at this mission.

name: Runabout Search
Name: Runabout Search
Skills: Medical, Science, Transporters, Cunning>32, and (Acquisition or Honor)
gametext: When you complete this mission, if your ship is at this mission, you may take a [Baj] personnel or a [Fed] personnel from your discard pile and place it aboard that ship.

name: Search and Rescue
Name: Search and Rescue
gametext: You cannot complete this mission if your [Maq] personnel is on this planet.

name: Search for Survivors
Name: Search for Survivors
Skills: Leadership, Officer, Programming, Security, and Strength>36

name: Sensitive Search
Name: Sensitive Search
Skills: Programming, Security, Cunning>30, and (Acquisition or Honor or Law or Treachery)

name: Study Cometary Cloud
Name: Study Cometary Cloud
Skills: Astrometrics, Navigation, Programming, Cunning>34, and (Acquisition or Security)

name: Surgery Under Fire
Name: Surgery Under Fire
Skills: Biology, Leadership, Medical, Officer, and Strength>36

name: Uncover DNA Clues
Name: Uncover DNA Clues
Affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.

name: Barzan Wormhole Wormhole Negotiations
Name: Barzan Wormhole Wormhole Negotiations
Skills: Astrometrics, Cunning>42, and (3 Diplomacy and 2 Honor or Telepathy and 3 Treachery)

name: Bralek
Name: Bralek
gametext: While an opponent's Archaeology personnel is at this mission, that opponent must discard a card from hand to use that personnel's skills.

name: Keldon Advanced
Name: Keldon Advanced
gametext: While your [Car] Intelligence personnel is aboard this ship, this ship is attributes +2.

name: Prakesh
Name: Prakesh
gametext: While this ship is in an engagement you did not begin, it is Shields +4.

name: Reklar
Name: Reklar
gametext: While you have a captive, this ship is Weapons +2 and Shields +1.

name: Vetar
Name: Vetar
gametext: When you play this ship, you may download a Pursuit card.

name: U.S.S. Defiant Prototype Warship
Name: U.S.S. Defiant Prototype Warship
gametext: While this ship is in an engagement, it is Weapons +1 and Shields +2.

name: U.S.S. Enterprise-E Federation Envoy
Name: U.S.S. Enterprise-E Federation Envoy
gametext: When you complete a [Fed] planet mission, if this ship is at that mission, score 5 points.

name: I.K.S. Lukara
Name: I.K.S. Lukara
gametext: While your [Kli] personnel at this mission is in combat, you may add this ship's Weapons to your total Strength.

name: I.K.S. Rotarran Ship of Tears
Name: I.K.S. Rotarran Ship of Tears
gametext: For each Honor Klingon aboard this ship, it is Weapons +1 (limit +3).

name: Deranas
Name: Deranas
gametext: While this ship is at a Region: Neutral Zone mission, it is Weapons +2 and Shields +2.

name: Haakona
Name: Haakona
gametext: When you play this ship, you may download {Engage Cloak} or a Pursuit card.

name: Scimitar Predator
Name: Scimitar Predator
gametext: When you win an engagement involving this ship, the loser discards the top card or his or her deck.

name: Serrola
Name: Serrola
gametext: While your [Rom] Intelligence personnel is aboard this ship, this ship is attributes +2. While this ship is at a [GQ] mission, it is Weapons +2 and Shields +1.

name: Valdore
Name: Valdore
gametext: When an opponent begins an engagement involving your other ship, if this ship is on your {Engage Cloak}, you may place this ship at that mission to join that engagement.

name: A Klingon Matter
Name: A Klingon Matter
gametext: Unless you have 2 Intelligence and Treachery or 2 Leadership and Cunning>32, randomly select a personnel. If that personnel has Strength<7, he or she is killed, then all your other personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Casualties of War
Name: Casualties of War
gametext: Randomly select three personnel. If the total cost of those personnel is 4 or less, they are killed. Otherwise, randomly select one of those personnel to be killed.

name: Crippling Attack
Name: Crippling Attack
gametext: Unless you have 2 Leadership and Officer or 2 Navigation and Shields>6, randomly select a personnel to be killed, then this dilemma is placed on your ship. Damage - This ship is attributes -2.

name: Dedication to Duty
Name: Dedication to Duty
gametext: Randomly select a personnel. Unless you choose to kill that personnel, your opponent draws a number of cards equal to the number of [SD] icons on that personnel.

name: Disgraceful Assault
Name: Disgraceful Assault
gametext: Unless you have 2 Security and Transporters, randomly select a personnel to be stopped. Unless you have Biology and 2 Medical, that personnel is killed instead, then all your personnel are stopped.

name: Disruptor Accident
Name: Disruptor Accident
gametext: Randomly select a personnel. Unless you choose to kill that personnel, he or she and a second randomly selected personnel are stopped.

name: DNA Security Scan
Name: DNA Security Scan
gametext: Unless you have Engineer and 2 Programming or 2 Security and Cunning>36, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Exposed Power Relay
Name: Exposed Power Relay
gametext: Randomly select a personnel to be stopped. If you still have nine personnel remaining, that personnel is killed instead, then randomly select a second personnel to be killed. If you still have ten personnel remaining, your opponent chooses a third personnel to be killed.

name: Face to Face
Name: Face to Face
gametext: Your opponent names a skill. Randomly select two personnel. Each of those personnel that has that skill is killed.

name: Flim-Flam Artist
Name: Flim-Flam Artist
gametext: Unless you have Diplomacy and 2 Programming or Law and Cunning>32, all your personnel are stopped, your opponent may draw a card, and this dilemma is returned to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Head to Head
Name: Head to Head
gametext: Your opponent names a skill. Randomly select two personnel. Each of those personnel that has that skill is killed.

name: Hired Muscle
Name: Hired Muscle
gametext: Unless you have 2 Acquisition or choose to discard three cards from hand, your opponent chooses a [NA] personnel to be placed on top of his owner's deck.

name: Houdini Mines
Name: Houdini Mines
gametext: Unless you have 2 Engineer and 2 Science or 2 Programming and 3 Security, randomly select a personnel to be killed, then this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Meaningless Words
Name: Meaningless Words
gametext: Unless you choose to discard the top three cards of your deck, your opponent chooses a personnel to be stopped.

name: Memory Invasion
Name: Memory Invasion
gametext: Your opponent examines your hand and chooses a card. Unless you choose to discard that card, randomly select three personnel to be stopped.

name: Nausicaan Pirates
Name: Nausicaan Pirates
gametext: Unless you have Leadership and 2 Security or 2 Treachery and Strength>35, randomly select a personnel to be killed, then all your other personnel are stopped.

name: Picking Up the Pieces
Name: Picking Up the Pieces
gametext: Unless you have Geology or Programming, all your personnel are stopped. If you have two or more personnel who have Geology or Programming, randomly select all but one of those personnel to be stopped.

name: Plasma Shock
Name: Plasma Shock
gametext: Randomly select a personnel. If that personnel has Strength>6, he or she is stopped. Otherwise, he or she is killed.

name: Quaint Technology
Name: Quaint Technology
gametext: Unless you have 2 Anthropology and Programming or 2 Diplomacy and Cunning>34, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Racial Tension
Name: Racial Tension
gametext: Randomly select two personnel. Unless they are the same species, both are stopped.

name: Sorting Things Out
Name: Sorting Things Out
gametext: If a personnel has been killed during this mission attempt, randomly select a personnel to be stopped.

name: Stolen Computer Core
Name: Stolen Computer Core
gametext: Unless you have Intelligence and Transporters or 2 Security and Cunning>34, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma is placed on your ship. Damage - While a Programming personnel is aboard this ship, his or her owners must discard a card from hand to use that programming.

name: Subspace Accident
Name: Subspace Accident
gametext: Unless you have Astrometrics and 2 Navigation or 2 Physics and Science, randomly select a personnel to be placed on the bottom of his or her owner's deck.

name: Telepathic Deception
Name: Telepathic Deception
gametext: Unless you have Biology, Exobiology, and Security or Telepathy and Cunning>28, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Timescape
Name: Timescape
gametext: Place this dilemma on this mission. You cannot begin a mission attempt at this mission. At the end of this turn, this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Training Accident
Name: Training Accident
gametext: Randomly select three personnel. If the total cost of those personnel is 4 or less, they are killed. Otherwise, randomly select one of those personnel to be killed.

name: Traitor Exposed
Name: Traitor Exposed
gametext: Randomly select a Treachery personnel. If that personnel has Cunning>6, he or she is stopped. Otherwise, he or she is killed.

name: Unexpected
Name: Unexpected
gametext: Randomly select a personnel to be stopped. Unless you have Astrometrics and 2 Diplomacy or Exobiology and 2 Medical, place that personnel on top of his or her owner's deck instead.

name: Assassination Plot
Name: Assassination Plot
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event and return your Assassin to his or her owner's hand to randomly kill an opponent's personnel present with that Assassin.

name: Born for Conquest
Name: Born for Conquest
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin combat involving your [Kli] Officer personnel. If you win, score 10 points and randomly kill an opponent's personnel involved.

name: Brief Reunion
Name: Brief Reunion
gametext: To play this event, you must command {Cardassia Prime}. Download a unique [Car] personnel, then place him or her on your Cardassia Prime. At the end of this turn, kill that personnel. Destroy this event.

name: Cargo Run
Name: Cargo Run
gametext: Plays on your space mission. Add Acquisition to this mission's requirements. When you complete this mission, score 5 points.

name: Common Ground
Name: Common Ground
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [TNG] personnel. Starting with the player to your left, each player may place a personnel from hand on a headquarters mission where that personnel could be played. (Yours must be a [TNG] personnel.) Destroy this event.

name: Complications
Name: Complications
gametext: Plays in your core. When the player on your right begins a mission attempt, you may destroy this event to draw three extra dilemmas and spend three extra in total cost on dilemmas.

name: Confessions in the Pale Moonlight
Name: Confessions in the Pale Moonlight
gametext: Plays in your core. While your [Fed][DS9] Treachery personnel is attempting a mission, you may destroy this event to make him or her gain a skill of your choice until the end of this turn.

name: Conscription
Name: Conscription
gametext: Download two Glinns, then place them on top of your deck in any order. Destroy this event.

name: Crowd Control
Name: Crowd Control
gametext: Plays in your core. When a player is about to play a personnel who costs 1, if that player has played exactly one other personnel who costs 1 during this turn, that personnel is cost +2.

name: Deep Roots
Name: Deep Roots
gametext: Plays in your core. When you play a Bajoran Resistance personnel, you may destroy this event to destroy an event.

name: Disable Sensors
Name: Disable Sensors
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Begin an engagement involving your Leadership personnel. If you win, place this event on an opponent's ship involved. Otherwise, destroy this event. Damage - Personnel aboard this ship cannot attempt missions.

name: Ferocity
Name: Ferocity
gametext: Plays in your core. When you win combat or an engagement involving your [Kli] personnel, you may destroy this event to randomly kill an opponent's personnel involved.

name: For the Cause
Name: For the Cause
gametext: Plays on {Athos IV}. You may attempt and complete Region: Demilitarized Zone missions using your [Maq] personnel (and a ship they are aboard at a space mission), regardless of effects preventing [Maq] personnel (or ships those personnel are aboard) from doing so, with these requirements: Leadership, Security, Treachery, and Strength>36.

name: For The Sisko
Name: For The Sisko
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - If you command three [Baj] personnel, discard a non-personnel card from hand to place two [Baj] personnel from your discard pile on top of your deck in any order.

name: Heart of Glory
Name: Heart of Glory
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin combat or an engagement involving your [Kli] personnel. If you win, randomly kill two opponent's personnel involved.

name: Kotra
Name: Kotra
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Car] personnel. Plays in your core. When an opponent discards a personnel from the top of his or her deck during your turn, score 5 points. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Legal Proceedings
Name: Legal Proceedings
gametext: Plays on your planet mission. Add Law to this mission's requirements. When you complete this mission, score 5 points.

name: Life Support
Name: Life Support
gametext: Take a personnel from your discard pile and place him or her on your headquarters mission where he or she could be played. At the end of this turn, remove that personnel from the game. Destroy this event.

name: Machinations
Name: Machinations
gametext: Plays in your core. When you have drawn dilemmas, you may remove this event and those dilemmas from the game to search your dilemma pile and choose a dilemma that costs no more than the number of dilemmas you removed. Shuffle and replace your dilemma pile face down. Place the chosen dilemma on the top of your dilemma stack.

name: Mental Discipline
Name: Mental Discipline
gametext: Plays in your core. When your unique personnel is facing a dilemma, you may discard a personnel with the same card title from hand to make him or her attributes +1 and gain one of the discarded personnel's skills until the end of that dilemma.

name: Peldor Joi
Name: Peldor Joi
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Baj] personnel. Take a [Baj] personnel from your discard pile and place him or her on your headquarters mission where that personnel could be played. Each of your opponents may take a personnel from his or her discard pile into hand. Destroy this event.

name: Personal Forcefield
Name: Personal Forcefield
gametext: Name a unique personnel you command. For the rest of this turn, when he or she is about to be killed by a dilemma, prevent that. Destroy this event.

name: Picking Up the Basics
Name: Picking Up the Basics
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event and stop one of your [TNG] personnel to make one of your other [TNG] personnel present gain all of that stopped personnel's skills until the end of this turn.

name: Pickpocket
Name: Pickpocket
gametext: To play this event, you must command a Thief. Plays in your core. Order - Reveal the top card of an opponent's deck. If it is not a personnel, destroy this event. Otherwise, each of your Thieves is attributes +2 until the end of this turn. You may only do this once each turn.

name: Political Leverage
Name: Political Leverage
gametext: Choose an opponent's personnel aboard a ship at the same mission as your staffed [Car] ship. Place that personnel in your brig. That opponent may discard the top four cards of his or her deck to prevent this. Destroy this event.

name: Power to the Weapons
Name: Power to the Weapons
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin an engagement involving your Leadership personnel. If you win, randomly kill two opponent's personnel involved.

name: Rash Aggression
Name: Rash Aggression
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin combat involving your [Baj] Treachery personnel. If you win, choose an opponent's personnel involved to be killed.

name: Reconfiguration
Name: Reconfiguration
gametext: To play this event, you must command two Engineer personnel. Shuffle any player's deck to draw a card. Destroy this event.

name: Retaliation
Name: Retaliation
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event and stop your three [Maq] personnel present together at a non-headquarters mission to place an opponent's personnel present in your brig.

name: Salvaging the Wreckage
Name: Salvaging the Wreckage
gametext: Take up to four personnel and ship cards from your discard pile and place them on the bottom of your deck in any order. Remove this event from the game.

name: Shadow Operation
Name: Shadow Operation
gametext: To play this event, you must command two [Rom] Intelligence personnel. Plays in your core. When you are about to play a [Rom] personnel who costs 3, if you have played no other personnel this turn and your staffed ship is at an opponent's non-headquarters mission, that personnel is cost -2.

name: Sickbay
Name: Sickbay
gametext: To play this event, you must command a Medical personnel. Plays in your core. At the end of your turn, destroy this event. When your personnel is about to be killed by a dilemma, if you command a ship at the same mission, place that personnel on top of his or her owner's deck instead.

name: Smuggling Run
Name: Smuggling Run
gametext: Plays in your core. At the start of each of your turns, if your Smuggler is at an opponent's non-headquarters mission, that opponent has no ship at that mission, and your personnel at that mission have its requirements, you may destroy this event to score 10 points.

name: Staunch Determination
Name: Staunch Determination
gametext: Plays in your core. When an opponent's personnel is killed in an engagement involving your [Car] ship, you may destroy this event to make that opponent discard a number of cards from the top of his or her deck equal to that personnel's cost.

name: Straying from the Path
Name: Straying from the Path
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Baj] personnel. If you have fewer cards in your discard pile than in your hand, exchange your discard pile with your hand. Remove this event from the game.

name: Temba, His Arms Wide
Name: Temba, His Arms Wide
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [TNG] personnel. Plays in your core. When you are about to play a personnel, you may give command of this event to the player on your right to make that personnel cost -3 (move this event to his or her core).

name: The Text of the Kosst Amojan
Name: The Text of the Kosst Amojan
gametext: To play this event, you must command {Bajor} and no other headquarters mission. Plays in your core. Order - Stop your Kai or one of your [Baj] Treachery personnel to choose two non-Prophet cards from your discard pile. Choose an opponent to choose one of those cards to place in your hand and one to remove from the game. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Under Scrutiny
Name: Under Scrutiny
gametext: Plays in your core. When you play this event, name a personnel. While that personnel is attempting a mission, his or her owner must discard a card from hand to use his or her skills.

name: Unexpected Difficulties
Name: Unexpected Difficulties
gametext: Plays in your core. When you have drawn dilemmas, you may destroy this event to return them to your dilemma pile and draw an equal number of dilemmas.

name: Unseen Manipulations
Name: Unseen Manipulations
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Rom] Treachery personnel. Plays in your core. When an opponent begins the Execute Orders segment of his or her turn, if that opponent has not drawn two cards or played a ship this turn, he or she discards the top two cards of his or her deck.

name: Vast Resources
Name: Vast Resources
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Car] personnel. Kill your captive to draw a number of cards equal to that captive's cost. Destroy this event.

name: Visionary
Name: Visionary
gametext: To play this event, you must command two [DS9] Engineer personnel. Plays in your core. When you draw a card, you may discard that card to draw a card. You may do this only once each turn.

name: We Will Not Surrender
Name: We Will Not Surrender
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin an engagement involving your [Kli] Officer personnel. If you win, score 10 points and randomly kill and opponent's personnel involved.

name: Bank Heist
Name: Bank Heist
gametext: When your Thief is facing a dilemma, choose an opponent to reveal the top three cards of his or her deck. That Thief gains one skill from each personnel revealed until the end of that dilemma. Replace those cards in the same order.

name: Coordinated Attack
Name: Coordinated Attack
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must command three [Kli] Officer personnel. Order - Download an Assault or Maneuver card.

name: Diplomatic Masquerade
Name: Diplomatic Masquerade
gametext: When your [Rom] Diplomacy personnel is facing a dilemma, reveal the top card of an opponent's deck. If it is a personnel, that [Rom] personnel gains the revealed personnel's skills until the end of this dilemma.

name: Discreet Inquiry
Name: Discreet Inquiry
gametext: When your [Fed][DS9] personnel is attempting a mission, reveal a personnel from hand to make him or her gain one of the revealed personnel's skills until the end of that mission attempt. Place the revealed personnel on top of your deck.

name: Emergency Treatment
Name: Emergency Treatment
gametext: When your unique personnel is about to be killed by a dilemma, if your Medical personnel is present, that unique personnel is stopped instead. That dilemma's owner may draw three cards.

name: Fresh Tactic
Name: Fresh Tactic
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must command three Guls. Order - Download a Capture or Punishment card.

name: Honorable Death
Name: Honorable Death
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must command a unique [Kli] personnel present with an opponent's personnel. Order - Kill that [Kli] personnel to destroy an opponent's event.

name: If Wishes Were Horses
Name: If Wishes Were Horses
gametext: Order - Discard a card from hand to download an event, then discard a random card from hand.

name: Powerful Example
Name: Powerful Example
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must command three [TNG] personnel. Order - Destroy your event to make each of your opponents destroy an event he or she commands.

name: Precautionary Measures
Name: Precautionary Measures
gametext: When your [DS9] personnel is about to be stopped by a dilemma, stop one of your [E] personnel present to prevent that.

name: Relentless
Name: Relentless
gametext: When your Honor Klingon is about to be stopped by a dilemma, discard an interrupt from hand to prevent that.

name: Shared Delicacy
Name: Shared Delicacy
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must command three Guls and have a captive. Order - Reveal a random card from that captive's owner's hand. He or she chooses to discard that card or discard the top three cards of his or her deck.

name: Stricken Dumb
Name: Stricken Dumb
gametext: When your personnel is facing a dilemma, discard a card from hand to make that personnel lose all his or her skills until the end of that dilemma.

name: Team of Ambassadors
Name: Team of Ambassadors
gametext: When your Diplomacy personnel is facing a dilemma, meet Cunning and Strength requirements of that dilemma using Integrity instead.

name: The Truth of War
Name: The Truth of War
gametext: When you win combat, the loser discards the top two cards of his or her deck.

name: Vile Deception
Name: Vile Deception
gametext: When an opponent's personnel is attempting a mission, if your Romulan is at that mission, that opponent chooses to reveal his or her hand and discard all interrupts revealed or chooses two of his or her personnel involved in that mission attempt to be stopped.

name: Vision of Violence
Name: Vision of Violence
gametext: When your [Baj] personnel is in combat, add the Strength of a [Baj] personnel in your discard pile to your total Strength.

name: We Are Klingon
Name: We Are Klingon
gametext: When your [Kli] personnel is attempting a mission, he or she is Strength +1 until the end of that mission attempt (or +3 if you command {Kahless}).

name: Well-Crafted Lure
Name: Well-Crafted Lure
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must command a [Car] Law personnel at a non-headquarters mission. Order - Randomly select an opponent's non-unique personnel present. You may discard a number of cards from hand equal to that personnel's cost to place him or her in your brig.

name: Aid Clone Colony
Name: Aid Clone Colony
Affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
gametext: When you complete this mission, you may download a copy of a personnel you command.

name: Athos IV Maquis Base
Name: Athos IV Maquis Base
Skills: You may play [Maq] cards, [NA] cards, and equipment at this mission.
gametext: At the start of each of your turns, you may discard a card from hand to download {For the Cause}.

name: Avert Danger
Name: Avert Danger
gametext: When you complete this mission, if your personnel completing it have 2 Physics or 2 Science, score 5 points.

name: Brute Force
Name: Brute Force
gametext: When you complete this mission, if each of your personnel at this mission is a [Kli] personnel, score 5 points.

name: Cargo Haul
Name: Cargo Haul
gametext: You cannot move your ship from this mission to a headquarters mission. When you move your ship with your Acquisition personnel aboard it to this mission, if you have not completed this mission, you may stop that personnel draw a card.

name: Investigate Maquis Activity
Name: Investigate Maquis Activity
gametext: You cannot complete this mission if your [Maq] personnel is on this planet. When you complete this mission, if you have completed no other missions, score 5 points.

name: McAllister C-5 Nebula Mine Nebula
Name: McAllister C-5 Nebula Mine Nebula
gametext: When you complete this mission, if you command three [Baj] personnel, score 5 points.

name: Treat Plague Ship
Name: Treat Plague Ship
gametext: When you complete this mission, place one of your Medical personnel at this mission in your discard pile.

name: Kitara
Name: Kitara
gametext: When an opponent beams to or from this mission, if it is a planet mission and this ship is staffed, you may take a card from your discard pile into hand.

name: Aldara
Name: Aldara
gametext: While you have a higher score than each of your opponents, each of your Cardassians aboard this ship is Cunning +1.

name: Guingouin
Name: Guingouin
gametext: When you win an engagement you began involving this ship, if each ship you command is a [Maq] ship, score 10 points.

name: Maquis Raider
Name: Maquis Raider
gametext: When you win an engagement involving this ship, the loser places one of his or her personnel involved on top of that personnel's owner's deck.

name: Valjean
Name: Valjean
gametext: Order - Reveal the top card of an opponent's deck. If it is not a personnel, place it on the bottom of its owner's deck to make this ship attributes +2 until the end of this turn. You may do this only once each turn.

name: I.K.S. Qam-Chee
Name: I.K.S. Qam-Chee
gametext: While this ship is at an opponent's mission, if this ship is staffed, each of your opponent's personnel and ships at this mission is attributes -1.

name: Fortune
Name: Fortune
gametext: When you play this ship, you may download a [NA] Archaeology personnel.

name: Tama
Name: Tama
gametext: While this ship is at a planet mission, if this ship is staffed, an opponent must discard a card from hand to beam to or from this planet.

name: Khazara
Name: Khazara
gametext: Order - If this ship is on your {Engage Cloak}, examine an opponent's hand and choose one of those cards. That opponent exchanges that card with the top card of his or her deck. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Terix
Name: Terix
gametext: While this ship is at an opponent's space mission, if this ship is staffed, that opponent must discard two cards from hand to attempt this mission.

name: Trolarak
Name: Trolarak
gametext: While this ship is at an opponent's planet mission, if this ship is staffed, that opponent must discard two cards from hand to attempt this mission.

name: A Bad End
Name: A Bad End
gametext: Randomly select one of your stopped personnel on this planet to be killed.

name: An Old Debt
Name: An Old Debt
gametext: Unless you have Biology, Physics, and Cunning>32 or Intelligence and 2 Medical, randomly select a Leadership personnel to be killed.

name: Close Call
Name: Close Call
gametext: Unless you have 2 Diplomacy and Security or 2 Programming and Transporters, randomly select an Engineer to be killed.

name: Confined to Quarters
Name: Confined to Quarters
gametext: Randomly select three personnel. If any of those personnel has Leadership, all three are stopped. Otherwise, choose one of those personnel to be stopped.

name: Dangerous Climb
Name: Dangerous Climb
gametext: Unless you have 2 Geology or Strength>40, randomly select a personnel to be killed, then all your other personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Depression
Name: Depression
gametext: Unless you have 2 Anthropology or 2 Medical or Telepathy and Integrity>32, your opponent chooses a personnel to be stopped and this dilemma is returned to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: DNA Analysis
Name: DNA Analysis
gametext: Unless you have a personnel who has 2 Medical or a personnel who has 2 Science, your opponent chooses a Medical or Science personnel to be stopped. If your opponent cannot, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Dressing Down
Name: Dressing Down
gametext: Randomly select three personnel. If the cost of any of those personnel is 1, all three are stopped. Otherwise, choose one of those personnel to be stopped.

name: Failure To Communicate
Name: Failure To Communicate
gametext: Unless you have a personnel who has 2 Anthropology or a personnel who has 2 Security, your opponent chooses a Anthropology or Security personnel to be stopped. If your opponent cannot, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Forsaken
Name: Forsaken
gametext: Unless you have 2 Honor or 2 Treachery, all your personnel are stopped. Each Honor or Treachery personnel that uses his or her skills while facing this dilemma is placed on the bottom of his or her owner's deck.

name: Gomtuu Shock Wave
Name: Gomtuu Shock Wave
gametext: Unless you have 2 Diplomacy and Integrity>32 or Telepathy and Integrity>35, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma is placed on your ship. Damage - This ship is attributes-2.

name: Graviton Wave
Name: Graviton Wave
gametext: Unless you have Astrometrics, Physics, and Cunning>32 or Biology and 2 Medical, randomly select a Science personnel to be killed.

name: History Repeats Itself
Name: History Repeats Itself
gametext: Randomly select three personnel. If any of those personnel has Anthropology, all three are stopped. Otherwise, choose one of those personnel to be stopped.

name: Inside Collaborators
Name: Inside Collaborators
gametext: Unless you have a personnel who has 2 Diplomacy or a personnel who has 2 Treachery, your opponent chooses a Diplomacy or Treachery personnel to be stopped. If your opponent cannot, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Justice or Vengeance
Name: Justice or Vengeance
gametext: Unless you have Anthropology and 2 Security or Exobiology, Honor, and Integrity>32, randomly select a Treachery personnel to be killed.

name: Miner Disagreement
Name: Miner Disagreement
gametext: Unless you have Anthropology, Diplomacy, and Cunning>32 or 2 Exobiology and Leadership, randomly select a personnel to be stopped, then this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Murder Investigation
Name: Murder Investigation
gametext: Randomly select three personnel. If any of those personnel has Security, all three are stopped. Otherwise, randomly select one of those personnel to be stopped.

name: Overwhelmed
Name: Overwhelmed
gametext: Place this dilemma on this mission. When a personnel facing a dilemma at this mission uses his or her skills, he or she is stopped. At the end of this turn, return this dilemma to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Psychic Receptacle
Name: Psychic Receptacle
gametext: Your opponent names a skill. Randomly select a personnel who has that skill. While a personnel who has that same card title is facing a dilemma, he or she cannot use his or her skills. This effect lasts until the end of this mission attempt.

name: Psycho-Kinetic Attack
Name: Psycho-Kinetic Attack
gametext: Unless you have Exobiology and 2 Medical or Honor and Telepathy, randomly select a Security personnel to be killed.

name: Quantum Filament
Name: Quantum Filament
gametext: Unless you have 2 Astrometrics and 2 Navigation or 2 Engineer, Science, and Shields>8, this dilemma is placed on your ship. Damage - When your personnel aboard this ship are about to face a dilemma, randomly select one of them to be stopped.

name: Restricted Area
Name: Restricted Area
gametext: Randomly select a personnel to be stopped. If you still have nine personnel remaining, that personnel is placed in your opponent's brig instead, then randomly select a second personnel to be placed in your opponent's brig. If you still have ten personnel remaining, randomly select a third personnel to be placed in your opponent's brig.

name: "Rock People"
Name: "Rock People"
gametext: Unless you have 2 Anthropology and Integrity>30 or Exobiology, Medical, and Cunning>35, randomly select a personnel to be killed, then all your other personnel are stopped.

name: Rogue Borg Ambush
Name: Rogue Borg Ambush
gametext: Unless you have Intelligence and Cunning>35 or a Hand Weapon and Strength>35, randomly select a personnel to be killed, then all your other personnel are stopped.

name: Secret Identity
Name: Secret Identity
gametext: Your opponent chooses a personnel. You may replace him or her with any one personnel of the same affiliation from your deck. Place the personnel your opponent chose in his or her owner's discard pile. Shuffle and replace your deck.

name: Sheer Lunacy
Name: Sheer Lunacy
gametext: Unless you have 2 Anthropology and Cunning>32 or 2 Programming and Science, randomly select a personnel to be stopped, then this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Skeleton Crew
Name: Skeleton Crew
gametext: Place this dilemma on this mission. To begin a mission attempt at this mission, you must have at least six personnel involved. When you complete this mission, this dilemma is overcome.

name: So Many Enemies
Name: So Many Enemies
gametext: Randomly select three personnel. If any of those personnel has Treachery, all three are stopped. Otherwise, randomly select one of those personnel to be stopped.

name: Sokath, His Eyes Uncovered!
Name: Sokath, His Eyes Uncovered!
gametext: Unless you have 2 Diplomacy or Cunning>35, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: The Demands of Duty
Name: The Demands of Duty
gametext: Your opponent chooses a personnel. Unless you choose to have all your personnel be stopped, that personnel is killed.

name: A Second Chance at Life
Name: A Second Chance at Life
gametext: Reveal your hand. Choose an opponent to choose a card from your hand. Discard it to take any other non-interrupt card from your discard pile into hand. Destroy this event.

name: Abduction
Name: Abduction
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event and stop your two [Bor] Security personnel present together at a non-Headquarters mission to name a skill. Randomly select an opponent's personnel present who has that skill and take command of him or her.

name: Adding to Our Perfection
Name: Adding to Our Perfection
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin combat involving your [Bor] personnel. If you win, randomly select an opponent's personnel and take command of him or her.

name: Borg Cutting Beam
Name: Borg Cutting Beam
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Begin an engagement involving your [Bor] ship. If you win, randomly select an opponent's personnel involved, take command of that personnel, place him or her on that [Bor] ship, then place this event on an opponent's ship involved. Otherwise, destroy this event. Damage - This ship is attributes -2.

name: Bred for Battle
Name: Bred for Battle
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Discard two cards from hand to begin combat involving your Jem'Hadar. Your non-Jem'Hadar present are not involved in the combat. If you win, randomly kill an opponent's personnel involved.

name: Building a Bridge
Name: Building a Bridge
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Dom] personnel. Plays in your core. When you complete a mission, for each Vorta that used any of his or her skills to complete that mission, each opponent discards a card from hand and you may draw a card.

name: Cavalry Raid
Name: Cavalry Raid
gametext: Plays in your core. When an engagement in which an opponent's personnel was killed ends, you may destroy this event to unstop each of your [Kli] personnel and [Kli] ships involved and restore all Range those ships have used this turn. You cannot begin any other engagements this turn.

name: Changeling Sabotage
Name: Changeling Sabotage
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - If your Infiltrator is aboard an opponent's undamaged ship, return that Infiltrator to his or her owner's hand to place a Damage card from hand aboard that ship.

name: Dispensing the White
Name: Dispensing the White
gametext: To play this event, you must command a Treachery Vorta. Discard a card from hand to draw two cards. Destroy this event.

name: Dissolving the Senate
Name: Dissolving the Senate
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Rom] personnel. Plays in your core. When your personnel is stopped by a dilemma, you may destroy this event to make one of your unique personnel present attributes +4. This effect last until the end of that mission attempt.

name: Enemy in Your Midst
Name: Enemy in Your Midst
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to place any number of your Infiltrators at one mission aboard a ship at the same mission.

name: One With the Borg
Name: One With the Borg
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Bor] personnel. Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to score 5 points for each personnel you command but do not own.

name: Psychological Pressure
Name: Psychological Pressure
gametext: Plays in your core. When an opponent's personnel is facing a dilemma, if he or she has the same skills as any of your captives, that opponent must discard a card from hand to use that skill.

name: Quite a Coincidence
Name: Quite a Coincidence
gametext: Plays in your core. When you play this event, name a personnel. When an opponent's personnel who has that card title is killed, destroy this event to score 10 points.

name: Regeneration Alcoves
Name: Regeneration Alcoves
gametext: Plays in your core. When you are about to play a [Bor] personnel at your Unicomplex, you may discard the top card of your deck to play that personnel on your [Bor] ship instead.

name: Sabotage Program
Name: Sabotage Program
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [DS9] personnel. Plays in your core. When an event is played, you must destroy this event to prevent that event and place it in its owner's discard pile.

name: Sensing a Trap
Name: Sensing a Trap
gametext: To play this event, you must command a [Rom] Intelligence personnel. Plays in your core. At the end of each of your turns, name a card. When an opponent plays that card, score 10 points. This effect lasts until the start of your next turn.

name: Set Up
Name: Set Up
gametext: Plays in your core. When an opponent's personnel is about to be randomly selected, if your Infiltrator is at that mission, you may destroy this event to instead choose the opponent's personnel to be selected from all eligible possibilities.

name: Severed Link
Name: Severed Link
gametext: To play this event, you must command a [Bor] Programming personnel. Discard a card from hand to draw two cards. Destroy this event.

name: Sluggo
Name: Sluggo
gametext: Plays in your core. When you play this event, name a personnel. That personnel cannot use his or her skills to meet mission requirements.

name: Steeled By Loss
Name: Steeled By Loss
gametext: Replace a [Baj] personnel you command with a [Baj] personnel in your discard pile that has at least one of the same skills. Place the personnel you replaced in his or her owner's discard pile. Remove this event from the game.

name: Stir Crazy
Name: Stir Crazy
