gametext: Plays in your core. When the player on your right begins a mission attempt, if he or she has already completed a mission of the same type, you may destroy this event to draw three extra dilemmas and spend three extra in total cost on dilemmas.

name: The Blight
Name: The Blight
gametext: To play this event, you must command two Founders. Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event. Starting with the player to your left, each player may choose an event to be destroyed.

name: The Crystalline Entity
Name: The Crystalline Entity
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - If you command another event, give command of this event to the player on your right to destroy an event (move this event to his or her core).

name: The Enterprise Incident
Name: The Enterprise Incident
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin an engagement involving your [Rom] ship. Each of your ships at the same mission that has your [Rom] Intelligence personnel aboard it may join the engagement. If you win, randomly select an opponent's Leadership personnel involved to place in your brig.

name: The Manheim Effect
Name: The Manheim Effect
gametext: Plays in your core. When you are about to draw dilemmas, you may destroy this event to take an overcome dilemma you own from an opponent's completed mission and place it on top of your dilemma pile.

name: The Trial Never Ended
Name: The Trial Never Ended
gametext: Plays in your core. When a dilemma is about to be overcome, you may destroy this event to exchange that dilemma with the top card of its owner's dilemma pile. (The new dilemma is overcome.)

name: The Will of the Collective
Name: The Will of the Collective
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin combat or an engagement involving your [Bor] personnel. If you win, randomly select an opponent's personnel involved, take command of that personnel, and place him or her on your [Bor] ship at this mission.

name: Trial of Faith
Name: Trial of Faith
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Baj] personnel. Plays in your core. An opponent may play a card he or she owns that is on this event as if that card were in his or her hand. If he or she does, score 5 points. Order - Examine an opponent's discard pile. Place one of those cards on this event. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Under Suspicion
Name: Under Suspicion
gametext: Plays in your core. When the player on your right begins a mission attempt, for each of your Infiltrators at that mission, you may draw one extra dilemma and spend one extra in total cost on dilemmas.

name: Vorta Cloning
Name: Vorta Cloning
gametext: Plays in your core. When you are about to place a Vorta in your discard pile, you may reveal a card from hand and remove it from the game to take that Vorta into hand instead.

name: Adapt
Name: Adapt
gametext: When your [Bor] personnel is facing a dilemma, if a copy of that dilemma is overcome at a mission you command, prevent and overcome that dilemma.

name: Analyze
Name: Analyze
gametext: When an opponent's dilemma that your [Bor] personnel is facing is about to be returned to its owner's dilemma pile, overcome that dilemma instead.

name: Cultist Attack
Name: Cultist Attack
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must command a [Baj] Treachery personnel. Order - Each player removes all interrupts in his or her discard pile from the game.

name: Founder Trap
Name: Founder Trap
gametext: When an opponent's personnel is about to complete a mission, discard a random card from hand to add the skills of your Infiltrator at that mission to the mission's requirements. This effect lasts until the end of that opponent's turn. Remove this interrupt from the game.

name: Insult
Name: Insult
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must command three [Rom] personnel. Order - Choose an opponent to discard the top card of his or her deck. If it is not a personnel, discard the top two cards of your deck. If it is a personnel who costs 1, you may place this interrupt on top of your deck instead of discarding it.

name: Our Death is Glory to the Founders
Name: Our Death is Glory to the Founders
gametext: When an event or interrupt is played, kill one of your Jem'Hadar to prevent that event or interrupt and place it in its owner's discard pile.

name: Parting Shot
Name: Parting Shot
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must have 5 or more points. When an opponent's personnel uses his or her skills, if he or she is facing a dilemma, lose 5 points to kill that personnel.

name: Pseudopod
Name: Pseudopod
gametext: Order - Return your Infiltrator to his or her owner's hand to randomly kill an opponent's personnel present with that Infiltrator.

name: Security Sweep
Name: Security Sweep
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must command two [Rom] Security personnel. Order - Reveal the top three cards of an opponent's deck. If they are all personnel, score 10 points. Place them in the same order on the bottom of that opponent's deck.

name: The Founder is Wise
Name: The Founder is Wise
gametext: When your Vorta is facing a dilemma, he or she is attributes +2 and gains all skills on one of your Founders present. This effect lasts until the end of that dilemma.

name: You Could Be Invaluable
Name: You Could Be Invaluable
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must command two [Fed][Maq] personnel. Order - Reveal the top four cards of your deck and take a non-[Maq] personnel revealed into hand. Place the remaining cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Archanis Dispute
Name: Archanis Dispute
Skills: Leadership, Cunning>30, and (Diplomacy and Law or Intelligence and Treachery)

name: Battle Reconnaissance
Name: Battle Reconnaissance
Affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.
Skills: Exobiology, Programming, Security, Transporters, and Strength>32

name: Camping Trip
Name: Camping Trip
Skills: Biology, Geology, Science, Cunning>34, and (Acquisition or Honor)
gametext: You may attempt and complete this mission using your [Dom] personnel with these requirements: Anthropology, Intelligence, Security, Treachery, and Cunning>34.

name: Vandros IV Destroy Iconian Gateway
Name: Vandros IV Destroy Iconian Gateway
Skills: Engineer, Leadership, Physics, Security, and Strength>34

name: Destroy Transwarp Hub
Name: Destroy Transwarp Hub
Affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
Skills: 2 Engineer, Exobiology, Navigation, Physics, Programming, Security, and Cunning>48
gametext: You may attempt and complete this mission for 35 points using your [Bor] personnel with these requirements: Engineer, Programming, 2 Security, and Cunning>34.

name: Evade Borg Vessel
Name: Evade Borg Vessel
Affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
Skills: Astrometrics, Leadership, Navigation, Officer, and Cunning>36
gametext: You may attempt and complete this mission using your [Bor] personnel with these requirements: Astrometrics, Engineer, Physics, Security, and Cunning>34.

name: Evade Dominion Squadron
Name: Evade Dominion Squadron
gametext: You may attempt and complete this mission using your [Dom] personnel with these requirements: Astrometrics, Leadership, 2 Navigation, and Cunning>34.

name: Expose Changeling Influence
Name: Expose Changeling Influence
Skills: Anthropology, Engineer, Honor, 2 Security, and Integrity>36
gametext: You may attempt and complete this mission using your [Dom] personnel with these requirements: Anthropology, Diplomacy, Intelligence, Security, Treachery, and Cunning>40.

name: Extract Defector
Name: Extract Defector
Skills: Intelligence, 2 Navigation, and (Security and Strength>34 or Transporters and Cunning>32)
gametext: You may attempt and complete this mission using your [Car] or [Dom] personnel with these requirements: Intelligence, Leadership, Programming, Security, and Cunning>34.

name: Harness Omega Particle
Name: Harness Omega Particle
Skills: Engineer, Geology, Medical, 2 Physics, Programming, Science, and Cunning>48
gametext: You may attempt and complete this mission using your [Fed] personnel with these requirements: Engineer, Medical, Officer, Physics, Science, Security, Transporters, and Cunning>48.

name: Hunt Alien
Name: Hunt Alien
Skills: 2 Exobiology, Navigation, Strength>32, and (Leadership or Security)

name: Instruct Advanced Drone
Name: Instruct Advanced Drone
Affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
Skills: Anthropology, Diplomacy, Honor, Medical, Programming, and Integrity>35
gametext: You may attempt and complete this mission using your [Bor] personnel with these requirements: Astrometrics, Engineer, Programming, Security, Transporters, and Cunning>40.

name: Mouth of the Wormhole Terok Nor
Name: Mouth of the Wormhole Terok Nor
Skills: You may play [TN] cards, [NA] cards, and equipment at this mission.

name: Pacify Warring Factions
Name: Pacify Warring Factions
gametext: When your personnel attempting this mission is killed by a dilemma, you may return that personnel to his or her owner's hand instead.

name: Peaceful Contact
Name: Peaceful Contact
Skills: Diplomacy, Honor, Leadership, Navigation, and Integrity>31
gametext: You may attempt and complete this mission using your [Dom] personnel with these requirements: Intelligence, Leadership, Security, Transporters, and Strength>34.

name: Plot Invasion
Name: Plot Invasion
Skills: Transporters, Cunning>30, and (Leadership and Officer or 2 Security)
gametext: You may attempt and complete this mission using your [Fed] personnel with these requirements: Intelligence, Leadership, Security, and Strength>30.

name: Farius Prime Political Intrigue
Name: Farius Prime Political Intrigue
Skills: Engineer, Intelligence, Security, Treachery, and Cunning>34
gametext: You may attempt and complete this mission using your [Fed] or [Kli] personnel with these requirements: Anthropology, 2 Intelligence, Security, and Cunning>34.

name: Rescue Prisoners of War
Name: Rescue Prisoners of War
Skills: Intelligence, Navigation, Programming, Transporters, and Cunning>32
gametext: You may attempt and complete this mission using your [Dom] personnel with these requirements: Exobiology, Leadership, Security, Treachery, and Strength>32.

name: Restock Ketracel-White
Name: Restock Ketracel-White
gametext: You may attempt and complete this mission using your [Fed] or [Kli] personnel with these requirements: Engineer, Intelligence, Security, Transporters, and Cunning>36.

name: Salvage Borg Ship
Name: Salvage Borg Ship
Affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.
Skills: Astrometrics, Engineer, Medical, Programming, and Cunning>34

name: Torga IV Salvage Dominion Ship
Name: Torga IV Salvage Dominion Ship
Skills: Diplomacy, Engineer, Leadership, Programming, and Strength>34
gametext: You may attempt and complete this mission using your [Dom] personnel with these requirements: 2 Diplomacy, Honor, Medical, and Cunning>34.

name: Signal for Rescue
Name: Signal for Rescue
Skills: Biology, Engineer, Programming, Security, Strength>42, and (Diplomacy and Treachery or Honor and Leadership)

name: Stage Bombardment
Name: Stage Bombardment
gametext: You may attempt and complete this mission using your [Dom] personnel with these requirements: Intelligence, 2 Leadership, Treachery, and Cunning>32.

name: Study Rare Phenomenon
Name: Study Rare Phenomenon
Skills: Engineer, Navigation, Physics, Science, and Cunning>34
gametext: You may attempt and complete this mission using your [Dom] personnel with these requirements: Engineer, Leadership, Programming, Security, and Strength>34.

name: Survey Star System
Name: Survey Star System
Affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.
gametext: When you complete this mission, if your personnel completing it have Acquisition, Diplomacy, or Treachery, score 5 points.

name: The Siege of AR-558
Name: The Siege of AR-558
Skills: Engineer, Leadership, Physics, Programming, Security, and Strength>38
gametext: You may attempt and complete this mission using your [Fer] personnel with these requirements: Anthropology, Diplomacy, Honor, Security, and Strength>42.

name: Unicomplex Root of the Hive Mind
Name: Unicomplex Root of the Hive Mind
Skills: You may play [Bor] cards and equipment at this mission.
gametext: You cannot command another Headquarters mission.

name: Modern Galor
Name: Modern Galor
gametext: When you play this ship, discard a card from hand. If you command a [Dom] personnel, you may then draw a card.

name: U.S.S. Defiant Stolen Warship
Name: U.S.S. Defiant Stolen Warship
gametext: Order - If this ship is staffed and at a non-headquarters mission, this mission's owner places a card from hand on top of his or her deck. You may do this only once each turn.

name: I.K.S. Pagh
Name: I.K.S. Pagh
gametext: While this ship is on {Engage Cloak}, each opponent's ship is Range -1.

name: Xhosa
Name: Xhosa
gametext: When this ship is about to move between a {Region: Badlands} mission and a non-Region: Badlands mission, subtract 1 from the Range required.

name: Soterus
Name: Soterus
gametext: While this ship is in an engagement, you may discard a Maneuver card from hand to make it attributes +2 until the end of that engagement.

name: A Devil Scorned
Name: A Devil Scorned
gametext: Unless you have 2 Diplomacy, 2 Treachery, and Cunning>42 or 2 Engineer, Navigation, and 2 Physics, randomly select a Leadership personnel to be stopped, then this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: A Pleasant Surprise
Name: A Pleasant Surprise
gametext: Randomly select a Diplomacy or Treachery personnel to be stopped.

name: A Royal Hunt
Name: A Royal Hunt
gametext: For each of your headquarters missions, randomly select a personnel to be stopped. If you still have nine personnel remaining, randomly select another personnel to be stopped. This dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Alluring Spy
Name: Alluring Spy
gametext: Unless you have Diplomacy, 2 Exobiology, and Strength>42 or Intelligence, 2 Leadership, and Cunning>38, randomly select a Security personnel to be stopped, then this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Back Room Dealings
Name: Back Room Dealings
gametext: Choose a personnel who has Treachery or Integrity<4 to be stopped. If you cannot, randomly select a personnel to be killed.

name: Biochemical Hyperacceleration
Name: Biochemical Hyperacceleration
gametext: Randomly select three personnel. They cannot use their skills while facing this dilemma. Unless you have Biology, Geology, and Medical or 2 Security and Strength>38, those personnel are returned to their owner's hand.

name: Bleeding to Death
Name: Bleeding to Death
gametext: Unless you have Biology and 2 Medical or 2 Honor and Integrity>30, randomly select a personnel to be killed, then place this dilemma in your core. At the start of each of your turns, place the top card of your deck on this dilemma. When you complete a mission, all your cards here are shuffled and placed on top of your deck, then this dilemma is removed from the game.

name: Broken Captive
Name: Broken Captive
gametext: Your opponent chooses one of his or her captives. Unless you have the skills on that captive, all your personnel are stopped.

name: Cave-In
Name: Cave-In
gametext: Unless you have 2 Engineer and Transporters or Geology, Officer, and Strength>35, randomly select two personnel to return to their owner's hand.

name: Counterinsurgency Program
Name: Counterinsurgency Program
gametext: Your opponent discards any number of event or equipment cards from hand and names a skill (except Acquisition, Intelligence, Law or Telepathy) for each one. Unless you have those skills, all your personnel are stopped.

name: Dealing With Pressure
Name: Dealing With Pressure
gametext: Randomly select three personnel. Unless one of those personnel has an attribute>6, all three are stopped.

name: Echo Papa Stasis Field
Name: Echo Papa Stasis Field
gametext: Randomly select an Officer or Security personnel to be stopped.

name: Formal Hearing
Name: Formal Hearing
gametext: For each event your opponent commands in his or her core, this dilemma is cost -1. Unless you have Diplomacy, Intelligence, 2 Programming and Cunning>38 or 2 Honor, Law, and 2 Officer, randomly select three personnel to be stopped.

name: Harsh Conditions
Name: Harsh Conditions
gametext: For each headquarters mission you command, your opponent names a skill. Place this dilemma on this mission. While your personnel is facing a dilemma, he or she cannot use those skills. At the end of this mission attempt, this dilemma is overcome.

name: In the Way
Name: In the Way
gametext: Randomly select a personnel. If that personnel has a skill listed in this mission's requirements (or any alternate requirements listed in the game text you are using to attempt it), he or she is stopped.

name: In Training
Name: In Training
gametext: Randomly select a personnel who costs 1 or 2. All other personnel who cost 1 or 2 are stopped.

name: Lack of Preparation
Name: Lack of Preparation
gametext: Unless you have the skills needed to complete this mission, this dilemma and all remaining dilemmas you have not yet faced return to their owner's dilemma pile.

name: Language Barrier
Name: Language Barrier
gametext: Unless you have Anthropology and Leadership or 2 Diplomacy and Integrity>30, randomly stop two personnel for each headquarters mission you command.

name: On Foreign Ground
Name: On Foreign Ground
gametext: Unless you command an event in your core, your opponent chooses a personnel to be killed for each headquarters mission you command. If you have at least one card in your hand, you may discard your hand to prevent this.

name: Renegade Ambush
Name: Renegade Ambush
gametext: If your opponent commands a Jem'Hadar, randomly select a personnel to be killed. Otherwise, choose a personnel to be killed.

name: Short Circuit
Name: Short Circuit
gametext: Unless you have Engineer and 2 Physics or 2 Programming and Science, all of your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Side by Side
Name: Side by Side
gametext: Your opponent names a skill. Randomly select two personnel. Each of those personnel that has that skill is stopped.

name: Talosian Trial
Name: Talosian Trial
gametext: Your opponent takes one of his or her planet dilemmas that is overcome beneath one of your missions and places it face down on top of his or her stack of chosen dilemmas.

name: Test of Wisdom
Name: Test of Wisdom
gametext: Unless you have Anthropology, 2 Archaeology, and Integrity>38 or 2 Honor and 2 Officer, all your Treachery personnel are stopped.

name: The Dreamer and the Dream
Name: The Dreamer and the Dream
gametext: Place this dilemma on this mission. At the end of this turn, this dilemma is overcome. If at that time this mission has not been completed, its owner discards his or her hand.

name: Tsiolkovsky Infection
Name: Tsiolkovsky Infection
gametext: For each event your opponent commands in his or her core, this dilemma is cost -1. Unless you have 2 Anthropology, 2 Programming, and Cunning>38 or 2 Biology, Exobiology, and 2 Medical, randomly select three personnel to be killed.

name: Ungracious Hosts
Name: Ungracious Hosts
gametext: Choose a personnel. Your opponent may discard cards from hand equal to the number of [SD] icons on that personnel to place him or her in your opponent's brig.

name: Whisper in the Dark
Name: Whisper in the Dark
gametext: For each event your opponent commands in his or her core, this dilemma is cost -1. Unless you have 2 Geology, 2 Physics, and Cunning>38 or 2 Honor, 2 Officer, and Transporters, randomly select three personnel to be killed.

name: Your Moment is Fading
Name: Your Moment is Fading
gametext: Randomly select a personnel. Unless that personnel has an attribute>6, he or she is stopped. If that personnel also has an attribute<5, he or she is killed instead of being stopped.

name: Emergency Transport Unit
Name: Emergency Transport Unit
gametext: When your personnel present is about to be killed, you may return this equipment to its owner's hand to place that personnel on your ship at this mission instead. He or she is stopped.

name: The Stone of Gol
Name: The Stone of Gol
gametext: When combat begins involving your personnel present, the opponent's personnel involved who has the highest Strength is killed.

name: The Sword of Kahless
Name: The Sword of Kahless
gametext: Each of your Klingons and Honor personnel present is Integrity -2, Cunning +1, and Strength +2.

name: Accepting the Past
Name: Accepting the Past
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Baj] personnel. Discard a random card from hand, then reveal your hand. If there are two different cards in your hand that you have a copy of in your discard pile, score 5 points. Destroy this event.

name: All-Out War
Name: All-Out War
gametext: Lose 5 points to play in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin combat or an engagement involving your [Kli] personnel. If you win, randomly kill three opponent's personnel involved.

name: Anything or Anyone
Name: Anything or Anyone
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Dom] personnel. Plays in your core. You may only execute one order using this event each turn. Order - Place an Infiltrator from hand on this event. (You now command that personnel.) Order - Place an Infiltrator from this event aboard an opponent's ship or on an opponent's planet mission.

name: Apprehended
Name: Apprehended
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Lose 5 points and destroy this event to begin combat or an engagement involving your [Car] personnel. If you win, choose an opponent's personnel involved to place in your brig.

name: At an Impasse
Name: At an Impasse
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Rom] personnel. Plays in your core. No player may draw cards from his or her deck. (Players do not need to spend all their counters on their turns.) At the end of the opponent on your right's turn, remove this event from the game.

name: At What Cost?
Name: At What Cost?
gametext: Lose 5 points to spend 7 additional counters this turn. Destroy this event.

name: Battle Lust
Name: Battle Lust
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin combat or an engagement involving your Jem'Hadar. If you win, randomly kill an opponent's personnel involved. If that personnel costs 1, randomly kill another personnel involved. Repeat this until you kill a personnel who does not cost 1.

name: Biological Distinctiveness
Name: Biological Distinctiveness
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Bor] personnel. Plays in your core. Each of your [Bor] personnel is attributes +1 for each personnel on this event. Order - Place a personnel you command but do not own on this event.

name: Captain on the Bridge
Name: Captain on the Bridge
gametext: Plays in your core. You may play a Commander that corresponds with your ship aboard that ship. When you do, he or she is cost -1.

name: Caught in the Act
Name: Caught in the Act
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Stop two of your [Car] personnel present together with an opponent's personnel at a non-headquarters mission to reveal the top card of that opponent's deck. If it is a personnel that opponent does not command, place him or her in your brig. (That opponent now commands him or her.) Otherwise, the opponent draws that card. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Collateral Damage
Name: Collateral Damage
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin combat or an engagement involving your Jem'Hadar. If you win, randomly kill an opponent's personnel involved. That opponent discards cards from the top of his or her deck equal to that personnel's cost.

name: Deep Hatred
Name: Deep Hatred
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Rom] personnel. Examine your opponent's discard pile and choose an interrupt to remove from the game. Then examine his or her hand and deck and remove each copy of that interrupt from the game. He or she shuffles and replaces his or her deck. Destroy this event.

name: Deploy the Fleet
Name: Deploy the Fleet
gametext: Score 5 points for each of your staffed ships that has its Commander aboard at an opponent's non-headquarters mission. Destroy this event.

name: Desperate Sacrifice
Name: Desperate Sacrifice
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - If you command four events, destroy this event to make each player choose two events he or she commands, then destroy each other event he or she commands.

name: Endangered
Name: Endangered
gametext: Plays in your core. When the player on your right begins a mission attempt, you may lose 5 points and destroy this event to draw three extra dilemmas and spend three extra in total cost on dilemmas.

name: Escaping Detection
Name: Escaping Detection
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Rom] personnel. Plays in your core. While it is not your turn, if you command more events than each of your opponents, each of your personnel aboard your Cloaking Device ship is at all missions in the same quadrant as that ship.

name: Far-Seeing Eyes
Name: Far-Seeing Eyes
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Rom] personnel. Plays in your core. At the start of each of your turns, you may lose 5 points and destroy this event to examine your opponent's deck and remove two non-ship cards from the game. He or she shuffles and replaces his or her deck.

name: Field Studies
Name: Field Studies
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Fed] personnel at your space mission. Lose 5 points to revel the top two cards of an opponent's dilemma pile. Place face up beneath that mission any dilemmas that could be faced there. Replace the remaining cards in any order. Destroy this event.

name: Forcing Their Hand
Name: Forcing Their Hand
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Rom] personnel. Plays in your core. An opponent may play a card he or she owns that is on this event as if that card were in his or her hand. At the start of each of your turns, place each card here in its owner's discard pile. Order - Place a random card from an opponent's hand on this event. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Forever Linked
Name: Forever Linked
gametext: Plays in your core. When your personnel is killed, you may place him or her on this event. (You no longer command him or her.) When your [Fed] personnel is facing a dilemma, you may place a personnel from this event in his or her owner's discard pile to make that [Fed] personnel gain a skill from that discarded personnel until the end of this turn.

name: Getting Under Your Skin
Name: Getting Under Your Skin
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Rom] personnel. Plays in your core. When you play an event in your core, you may reveal the top card of an opponent's deck. If it is a personnel, score 5 points. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Gunboat Diplomacy
Name: Gunboat Diplomacy
gametext: Plays in your core. When you play a Vorta, you may choose an opponent to choose one: you may download a Jem'Hadar; or each player scores 5 points.

name: Hollow Pleasantries
Name: Hollow Pleasantries
gametext: Plays in your core. When you play a Vorta, each opponent may draw a card. That Vorta is cost -1.

name: Holographic Hoax
Name: Holographic Hoax
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Rom] personnel. Choose an opponent to draw a card, then remove the top card of his or her deck from the game. Destroy this event.

name: Militia Patrol
Name: Militia Patrol
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin combat involving your Bajoran Resistance personnel. If you win, randomly kill three opponent's personnel involved. That opponent may lose 5 points to prevent this.

name: Misdirection
Name: Misdirection
gametext: Plays in your core. While an opponent's personnel is present with your Infiltrator, he or she is attributes -1.

name: Mission Accomplished
Name: Mission Accomplished
gametext: Plays in your core. When you complete a mission, if you command a staffed ship at that mission with its Commander aboard, score 5 points.

name: More Than Meets the Eye
Name: More Than Meets the Eye
gametext: Lose 5 points to play in your core. When you reveal a planet dilemma from your dilemma stack, it is cost -1.

name: Mutual Advantage
Name: Mutual Advantage
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Fed] personnel. Each player discards a card from hand and draws a card. Then you may draw a card. Destroy this event.

name: No Escape
Name: No Escape
gametext: To play this event, you must command two Jem'Hadar. Plays in your core. When you play a Maneuver event, for each of your Damage cards on an opponent's ship, it is cost -1.

name: Organized Terrorist Activities
Name: Organized Terrorist Activities
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Fed][Maq] personnel. Lose 5 points to make an opponent place his or her hand on top of his or her deck. Then you may examine that deck and choose a non-ship card to remove from the game. He or she shuffles and replaces his or her deck. Remove this event from the game.

name: Party Atmosphere
Name: Party Atmosphere
gametext: Plays in your core. When a player plays an event in his or her core, he or she chooses an opponent. For each headquarters mission than opponent commands, that event is cost -1.

name: Power Shift
Name: Power Shift
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Rom] personnel. Plays in your core. While your [Rom] personnel is attempting a mission, you may lose 5 points to make each of your [Rom] personnel attributes +1 until the end of this mission attempt.

name: Prison Compound
Name: Prison Compound
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Car] personnel. Round the total number of [SD] icons on all your captives to the nearest multiple of 5. Score that number of points. Destroy this event.

name: Pulling the Strings
Name: Pulling the Strings
gametext: To play this event, you must command two Vorta. Plays in your core. When the player on your right begins a mission attempt, you may place this event on the bottom of its owner's deck to draw an extra dilemma and spend one extra in total cost on dilemmas.

name: Ressikan Flute
Name: Ressikan Flute
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Stop your personnel who has Integrity>6 to take an event from your discard pile into your hand.

name: Running a Tight Ship
Name: Running a Tight Ship
gametext: Plays in your core. When you attempt a space mission using a ship with its Commander aboard, subtract one from the number of dilemmas your opponent may draw and one from the total cost he or she may spend on dilemmas.

name: Shared Problems
Name: Shared Problems
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [TNG] personnel. Plays in your core. When a player begins a mission attempt, the player to his or her left may draw an extra dilemma and spend one extra in total cost on dilemmas.

name: Standing Your Ground
Name: Standing Your Ground
gametext: Plays in your core. When you are about to destroy an event to begin an engagement involving your ship with its Commander aboard, you may destroy this card instead to pay that cost.

name: Storage Compartment
Name: Storage Compartment
gametext: Plays in your core. When you have chosen dilemmas, you may place one unused planet dilemma or space dilemma on this event instead of beneath your dilemma pile. When you have drawn dilemmas, you may take any dilemmas from this event and add them to those drawn.

name: Targeted for Assimilation
Name: Targeted for Assimilation
gametext: Lose 5 points to play in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin combat involving your [Bor] personnel. If you win, choose an opponent's personnel involved and take command of him or her.

name: Tempted By Flesh
Name: Tempted By Flesh
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Bor] personnel. Examine a number of cards from the top of an opponent's dilemma pile equal to the number of his or her personnel you command. You may place those dilemmas on the top and bottom of that dilemma pile in any order. Destroy this event.

name: The Key to Victory
Name: The Key to Victory
gametext: Draw cards equal to the cost of an event in your core, then discard that number of cards from hand. Then, if you command three [Car] personnel, you may draw a card. Destroy this event.

name: The Perfect Tool
Name: The Perfect Tool
gametext: Plays in your core. During each of your Play and Draw Cards segments, you may spend 1 additional counter for each personnel you command but do not own.

name: Thought Maker
Name: Thought Maker
gametext: Plays in your core. When you have drawn dilemmas, you may search your dilemma pile for a copy of one of your overcome dilemmas and add it to those drawn. Shuffle and replace your dilemma pile face down.

name: Undercover Resource
Name: Undercover Resource
gametext: Plays in your core. While your Infiltrator is at an opponent's incomplete non-headquarters mission, you may spend 1 additional counter during each of your Play and Draw Cards segments.

name: VIP Welcome
Name: VIP Welcome
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [TNG] personnel. Plays in your core. When a player plays a personnel who costs 3 or more, he or she may draw a card.

name: We Are Back
Name: We Are Back
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Rom] personnel. Plays in your core. Each of your [Rom] Officer personnel is Cunning +2. When an opponent plays an event to his or her core, destroy this event.

name: You've Always Been My Favorite
Name: You've Always Been My Favorite
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Bor] personnel. Lose 5 points to play in your core. When you play this event, download up to five cards, then place them on this event. You may spend 1 counter to take a card on this event into your hand. When there are no cards on this event, destroy it.

name: Your Fear Will Destroy You
Name: Your Fear Will Destroy You
gametext: For each opponent's headquarters mission where you command an Infiltrator, score 5 points. Remove this event from the game.

name: Allies on the Inside
Name: Allies on the Inside
gametext: Order - Download a Dissident personnel, then discard cards from hand equal to that personnel's cost. Remove this interrupt from the game.

name: Brainwashing
Name: Brainwashing
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must command three [Rom] personnel. Order - Lose 5 points to reveal an opponent's hand. Choose a personnel that you do not command and place him or her on your headquarters mission. (You now command that personnel.)

name: Chance Observation
Name: Chance Observation
gametext: When your [Rom] personnel is facing a dilemma, reveal the top three cards of an opponent's deck and make that personnel attributes +1 for each non-event card revealed. This effect lasts until the end of that dilemma.

name: Indomitable
Name: Indomitable
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must command three [Bor] personnel. When your mission attempt ends, lose 5 points to unstop each of your personnel who became stopped during that mission attempt. You cannot attempt that same mission again this turn.

name: Knowledge and Experience
Name: Knowledge and Experience
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must command three [Bor] personnel. When a personnel you command but do not own is facing a dilemma, lose 5 points to prevent and overcome that dilemma. Remove this interrupt from the game.

name: Lying in Wait
Name: Lying in Wait
gametext: When a personnel is about to be randomly selected by a dilemma, if you command a [Rom] personnel at the same mission, make the selection as follows instead: the player who commands the eligible personnel excludes one from that selection, then the dilemma's owner chooses from the remaining eligible personnel.

name: Natural Instincts
Name: Natural Instincts
gametext: When your Bajoran Resistance personnel is facing a dilemma, name a skill that none of your personnel facing that dilemma has. That Bajoran Resistance personnel gains that skill until the end of that dilemma.

name: One-Upsmanship
Name: One-Upsmanship
gametext: Order - Download a personnel or event, then shuffle that card and each copy of that card your opponents command into their owners' decks.

name: Operational Necessity
Name: Operational Necessity
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must command two [Fed][Maq] personnel. When an interrupt is played, discard a [Maq] card from hand to prevent that interrupt and place it in its owner's discard pile.

name: Outlining the Stakes
Name: Outlining the Stakes
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must command three [Rom] personnel. When you are checking if your personnel can meet a mission's requirements, lose 5 points to subtract a skill from those requirements.

name: Reborn
Name: Reborn
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must command three [Bor] personnel present together at a non-headquarters mission. Order - Lose 5 points to randomly select an opponent's personnel present with those [Bor] personnel and take command of him or her.

name: The First of Many
Name: The First of Many
gametext: When your Borg is stopped while attempting a mission, discard the top card of your deck to unstop one of your other stopped Borg present. The Borg you unstop joins the mission attempt.

name: The Order of Things
Name: The Order of Things
gametext: When your Founder or Vorta is about to be killed, kill your unique Jem'Hadar present with him or her to prevent that.

name: The Rite of Emergence
Name: The Rite of Emergence
gametext: When your Host is attempting a mission, discard two random cards from hand to make him or her gain Treachery and a skill of your choice until the end of this turn.

name: Talnot
Name: Talnot
gametext: While you command an event in your core and have a copy of that same event in your discard pile, your opponent cannot destroy that event.

name: U.S.S. Valiant Red Squad Training Ship
Name: U.S.S. Valiant Red Squad Training Ship
gametext: This ship is attributes +1 for each of your Cadets aboard (limit +4).

name: Temporal Misalignment
Name: Temporal Misalignment
gametext: Randomly select X personnel to be stopped.

name: The Clown: Bitter Medicine
Name: The Clown: Bitter Medicine
gametext: Place this dilemma on this mission. Your opponent names a skill. Each of your personnel who has that skill is attributes-2. At the end of this turn, this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Tragic Turn
Name: Tragic Turn
gametext: Place this dilemma on this mission (limit one per mission). When a dilemma is overcome here, if that dilemma killed any of your personnel, randomly select a personnel attempting the mission to be killed. Otherwise, if that dilemma stopped any of your personnel, randomly select a personnel attempting the mission to be stopped.

name: Cardassian Protectorate
Name: Cardassian Protectorate
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Car] personnel. Plays in your core. When you spend 1 counter to draw a card, instead examine the top three cards of your deck, place one of them on this event, and take the other two into hand.

name: Expand the Collective
Name: Expand the Collective
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Bor] personnel. Plays on your [AQ] mission worth 35 or fewer points. You may attempt and complete it using your [Bor] personnel with these requirements: [P] - Anthropology, Biology, Security, Transporters, and Strength>32; [S] - Astrometrics, Engineer, Physics, Science, and Cunning>36. When you complete it, destroy this event to score 5 points.

name: Heightened Perception
Name: Heightened Perception
gametext: Plays in your core. When you choose dilemmas for your dilemma stack, you may place any you do not choose face down on this event. When an opponent has faced the last dilemma in your dilemma stack, you may examine your dilemmas here and place one on your dilemma stack. When a mission attempt ends, return each dilemma here to your dilemma pile.

name: Medical Teams
Name: Medical Teams
gametext: Plays in your core. When your [DS9] personnel is about to be killed by a dilemma, you may place him or her on this event instead. When this event is destroyed, you may place each personnel here at your headquarters mission.

name: Noble Cause
Name: Noble Cause
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Kli] personnel. Plays in your core. When you destroy an Assault or Maneuver event you own, you may place it on this event. When this event is destroyed, you may take each card here into your hand.

name: Out of Options
Name: Out of Options
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Rom] personnel. Plays in your core. When an opponent begins a mission attempt, examine his or her hand and choose a card to place on this event. When this event is destroyed, return each card here to its owner's hand.

name: Quantum Incursions
Name: Quantum Incursions
gametext: Plays in your core. At the start of each of your turns, if you command an [AU] personnel, you may choose any number of cards in your hand and set them aside face down. Draw an equal number of cards, then put the cards you set aside on top of your deck in any order.

name: Quarantine
Name: Quarantine
gametext: Plays in your core. When your dilemma is about to be overcome, place it on this event instead. When you lose command of this event, the player on your right places all dilemmas here face up beneath his or her mission.

name: Security Drills
Name: Security Drills
gametext: Plays in your core. While your personnel is facing a dilemma, you may place a [Fed] card from hand on this event to make that personnel gain a skill he or she already has until the end of that dilemma.

name: Spreading Fear
Name: Spreading Fear
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Place a card from hand on this event to begin an engagement involving your Jem'Hadar. If you win, randomly select one opponent's personnel involved for each of your Vorta involved. Choose one of those selected personnel to be killed.

name: Tampering With Time
Name: Tampering With Time
gametext: Plays in your core. At the start of each of your turns, you may choose one: stop one of your [Fut] personnel to examine the top three cards of an opponent's dilemma pile; or stop one of your [Pa] personnel to examine the bottom three cards of an opponent's dilemma pile. Place those cards on the top and/or bottom of that dilemma pile in any order.

name: Temporal Test Subject
Name: Temporal Test Subject
gametext: Discard an [AU], [Fut], or [Pa] personnel from hand to take an [AU], [Fut], or [Pa] personnel from your discard pile into hand. Destroy this event.

name: The Edge of Forever
Name: The Edge of Forever
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Lose 5 points to choose one: download a [Fut] card that could be played at your headquarters mission and place it there; or take a [Pa] card from your discard pile that could be played at your headquarters mission and place it there. Destroy this event.

name: Unyielding
Name: Unyielding
gametext: Plays in your core. When your [Bor] personnel is about to be stopped by a dilemma, you may place a [Bor] personnel from hand on this event to prevent that.

name: Explicit Orders
Name: Explicit Orders
gametext: When your [Dom] personnel is attempting a mission, discard a [Dom] personnel of a different species from hand to make him or her gain the discarded personnel's skills until the end of that mission attempt.

name: Fitting In
Name: Fitting In
gametext: When your personnel is facing a dilemma, choose one for him or her to gain until the end of that dilemma: an attribute from a [Fut] personnel present; or a skill from a [Pa] personnel present.

name: Collapse Anti-Time Anomaly
Name: Collapse Anti-Time Anomaly
Affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.
Skills: Astrometrics, Engineer, Leadership, Physics, and Cunning>36
gametext: When your personnel attempt this mission, if there are no dilemmas overcome beneath it, you may download a Q card.

name: Sphere 634
Name: Sphere 634
gametext: When this ship is about to move between an [AQ] mission and a [DQ] mission, do not add 2 to the span total of those missions.

name: U.S.S. Enterprise-D Personal Flagship
Name: U.S.S. Enterprise-D Personal Flagship
gametext: When you complete a mission requiring Honor or Leadership, if this ship is at that mission, score 5 points (or score 10 points if that mission requires both).

name: Aftermath
Name: Aftermath
gametext: Randomly select three personnel. If the total cost of those personnel is 4 or less, they are killed. Otherwise, randomly select one of those personnel to be stopped.

name: Dignitaries and Witnesses
Name: Dignitaries and Witnesses
gametext: Unless you have an Admiral or a General or 3 Leadership, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Eye to Eye
Name: Eye to Eye
gametext: Your opponent names a number. Randomly select two personnel. Each of those personnel that has an attribute matching that number is stopped.

name: Final Adventure
Name: Final Adventure
gametext: Your opponent names a number. For each of your headquarters missions, randomly select a personnel who has a cost equal to that number to be killed and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Full Security Alert
Name: Full Security Alert
gametext: Randomly select a Security personnel to be stopped. If that personnel costs 2 or less, randomly select two other Security personnel to be stopped.

name: Hard Time
Name: Hard Time
gametext: Place this dilemma in your core. Randomly select a personnel and place him or her on this dilemma. At the start of your next turn, remove this dilemma from the game and return the personnel on it to his or her owner's hand.

name: Helpless
Name: Helpless
gametext: Randomly select a personnel. Unless he or she has at least one skill listed in this mission requirements, stop that personnel, then randomly select another personnel to be stopped.

name: Mr. Tricorder
Name: Mr. Tricorder
gametext: Your opponent chooses a personnel. Unless you choose to place him or her aboard your ship at this mission, randomly select two personnel to be stopped.

name: Shipboard Fire
Name: Shipboard Fire
gametext: Unless there are no damage markers on this ship, all your personnel are stopped.

name: The Three Vipers
Name: The Three Vipers
gametext: Unless you have Engineer and 2 Navigation or Astrometrics, Officer, and Science, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma is placed on your ship. Damage - At the start of each of your turns, discard a card from hand.

name: Unknown Microorganism
Name: Unknown Microorganism
gametext: Unless you have Biology, Medical, and Science or 2 Security and a non-Hand Weapon equipment, randomly select a personnel to be killed, all of your other personnel are stopped, and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Urgency
Name: Urgency
gametext: Place this dilemma on this mission. Each personnel may use no more than one skill during each dilemma he or she faces. Each personnel may use no more than one skill to meet a mission's requirements. At the end of this turn, this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Worn-Out Welcome
Name: Worn-Out Welcome
gametext: Randomly select a personnel to be stopped. Unless you have Anthropology and 2 Diplomacy or Transporters and 3 Treachery, place that personnel on one of your headquarters missions.

name: Adapted to Service Us
Name: Adapted to Service Us
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Bor] personnel. Plays in your core. When you win combat or an engagement involving your [Bor] personnel, you may discard the top card of your deck to take command of an opponent's event that has no cards on it. (Move that event to your core.)

name: Biogenic Weapon
Name: Biogenic Weapon
gametext: To play this event, you must command two [Fed][Maq] personnel. Plays on a mission. This mission cannot be attempted unless its owner has completed each other non-headquarters mission he or she commands.

name: Bustling with Activity
Name: Bustling with Activity
gametext: Plays in your core. When you play a personnel at {Mouth of the Wormhole}, each player may discard a card from hand to download a personnel of the same affiliation as the played personnel.

name: Changed History
Name: Changed History
gametext: Plays in your core. When you win an engagement involving your [Bor] ship, you may reveal the top card of the loser's deck. If it is a personnel you do not command, you may place him or her on that ship. (You now command that personnel).

name: Disadvantage Into Advantage
Name: Disadvantage Into Advantage
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [TNG] personnel. Plays in your core. The first unique personnel played each turn costs -2.

name: Distant Exploration
Name: Distant Exploration
gametext: Plays on your headquarters mission. When you complete a mission that has a different quadrant icon than this mission, score 5 points.

name: Friction
Name: Friction
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Dom] personnel. Plays in your core. When a player plays a non-Jem'Hadar personnel, that personnel is stopped.

name: Foresight
Name: Foresight
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Stop your [Bor] personnel to examine the top card of your deck, then place it on the top or bottom of your deck.

name: Guidance of the Council
Name: Guidance of the Council
gametext: Plays in your core. When you play a Diplomacy personnel, you may destroy this event to download a Chancellor or High Council Member.

name: High Command "Motivation"
Name: High Command "Motivation"
gametext: Plays in your core. At the start of each of your turns, you may kill one of your [Car] personnel to spend a number of additional counters that turn equal to that personnel's cost. If that personnel is unique, you may spend 1 more additional counter that turn.

name: Interstellar Treaty
Name: Interstellar Treaty
gametext: To play this event, you must command two Diplomacy personnel. Place a Diplomacy personnel from hand who costs 3 or less on your headquarters mission. Destroy this event.

name: Invocation of Kosst Amojan
Name: Invocation of Kosst Amojan
gametext: Discard a unique [Baj] personnel from hand to choose one: take two personnel from your discard pile into hand; or download a personnel. Destroy this event.

name: Maquis Raid
Name: Maquis Raid
gametext: To play this event, you must command two [Maq] ships. Plays in your core. When an opponent's personnel gains a skill as an effect of that opponent paying a cost, you may place a card from hand on this event. When your [Maq] personnel is facing a dilemma, you may take a card on this event into hand to make that personnel gain a skill of your choice until the end of that dilemma.

name: Ohhhh! Nothing Happened!
Name: Ohhhh! Nothing Happened!
gametext: Plays in your core. When you play another Temporal card, you may destroy this event to name a dilemma. Choose an opponent to take a copy of that dilemma from his or her dilemma pile and remove it from the game. That opponent shuffles and replaces his or her dilemma pile face down.

name: Quintessence
Name: Quintessence
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Bor] personnel. Plays in your core. At the start of your turn, you may download a [Bor] personnel or [Bor] ship. When you do this, discard cards from the top of your deck equal to the cost of that card.

name: Stalling for Time
Name: Stalling for Time
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Fed][Maq] personnel. Name a personnel. Each opponent returns each personnel he or she commands who has that card title to his or her owner's hand. Remove this event from the game.

name: Stealth Mission
Name: Stealth Mission
gametext: Plays in your core. When your opponent overcomes a dilemma, you may place a card from hand on this event. At the start of each of your turns, take all cards on this event into hand to make your Cloaking Device ship Range +1 until the end of this turn for each card take off this event this way.

name: The New Resistance
Name: The New Resistance
gametext: To play this event, your opponent must command a ship at a non-headquarters mission. Plays in your core. When you play a Dissident personnel, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a Dissident, you may play him or her at cost -3.

name: Tribunal Sentencing
Name: Tribunal Sentencing
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Car] personnel. Plays in your core. While you have an opponent's personnel in your brig, that opponent has 1 fewer counter to spend during each of his or her Play and Draw Cards segments.

name: Change of Heart
Name: Change of Heart
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must command three [Rom] personnel. When a random selection is made by a dilemma, you may ignore its results and select again.

name: Dark Secrets
Name: Dark Secrets
gametext: When your [Baj] personnel is facing a dilemma, remove two cards in your discard pile from the game to make each of your [Baj] personnel attributes +1 until the end of that dilemma (or +3 if you choose an opponent to choose the two cards you remove from the game instead).

name: I Need A Little Counseling
Name: I Need A Little Counseling
gametext: When your personnel is attempting a mission, he or she gains a skill from your [TNG] personnel present until the end of that mission attempt.

name: No Harm Done
Name: No Harm Done
gametext: When a personnel facing a dilemma uses his or her skills, he or she loses all skills until the end of this turn.

name: Shri-tal
Name: Shri-tal
gametext: When your [Car] personnel is killed by a dilemma, you may draw cards equal to that personnel's cost.

name: Strength for Our Struggle
Name: Strength for Our Struggle
gametext: When your [Maq] personnel is facing a dilemma, he or she gains one of every skill he or she already has until the end of that dilemma.

name: Transwarp Conduit
Name: Transwarp Conduit
gametext: Order - Move your ship at {Destroy Transwarp Hub} or {Unicomplex} to any mission. (No Range is required or used.)

name: Dominion Battleship
Name: Dominion Battleship
gametext: This ship is attributes +1 for each of these species you have aboard it: Changeling, Jem'Hadar, Vorta.

name: U.S.S. Defiant Repurposed Warship
Name: U.S.S. Defiant Repurposed Warship
gametext: When you play this ship, if each of your non-headquarters missions is a [GQ] mission, you may spend 5 additional counters this turn.

name: Baraka
Name: Baraka
gametext: Order - Lose 5 points to make this ship Range +10 until the end of this turn.

name: Queen's Borg Cube
Name: Queen's Borg Cube
gametext: You may use a card which begins an engagement to begin one involving this ship even if it is at a headquarters mission.

name: Naprem
Name: Naprem
gametext: While this ship is at an opponent's planet mission, if your personnel is on that planet, he or she is an Infiltrator.

name: U.S.S. Defiant Commandeered Warship
Name: U.S.S. Defiant Commandeered Warship
gametext: To staff this ship, you must have an [Dom] Engineer personnel aboard. Order - If this ship is staffed and at your mission, stop this ship to take an overcome dilemma from beneath that mission and place it face up beneath your [AQ] mission.

name: U.S.S. Enterprise-D Explorer
Name: U.S.S. Enterprise-D Explorer
gametext: When you complete a space mission requiring Diplomacy, if this ship is at that mission, score 10 points.

name: U.S.S. Sutherland
Name: U.S.S. Sutherland
gametext: When you fail a mission attempt at a space mission, if this ship is at that mission, you may discard three cards from hand to place the top card of an opponent's dilemma pile face up beneath this mission. If you do this, you cannot attempt this mission again this turn.

name: I.K.S. Bortas
Name: I.K.S. Bortas
gametext: When you win an engagement involving this ship, you may discard a card from hand to download a Maneuver event.

name: Fortune Raider for Hire
Name: Fortune Raider for Hire
gametext: While your Treachery personnel is aboard this ship, he or she is attributes +1 for each Artifact you command (limit +3).

name: Rovaran
Name: Rovaran
gametext: When you win an engagement involving this ship, you may examine the loser's hand and choose a card to be removed from the game. Order - Discard a Maneuver card from hand to begin an engagement involving this ship.

name: Bynars' Password
Name: Bynars' Password
gametext: Unless you have a personnel who has 2 Engineer or a personnel who has 2 Programming, your opponent chooses an Engineer or Programming personnel to be stopped. If your opponent cannot, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Captain's Holiday
Name: Captain's Holiday
gametext: Unless you have 2 Archaeology or 2 Geology, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: The Moon's a Window to Heaven
Name: The Moon's a Window to Heaven
gametext: Unless you have a Leadership personnel who has Cunning>6 or Telepathy, randomly select a personnel to be placed in your opponent's brig, then all your other personnel are stopped.

name: D'Arsay Archive
Name: D'Arsay Archive
gametext: Count the number of cards in your hand, shuffle them, and place them on the bottom of your deck to draw an equal number of cards. Destroy this event.

name: Order of the Bat'leth
Name: Order of the Bat'leth
gametext: To play this event, you must command a [Kli] Honor personnel. Discard a card from hand to draw two cards. Destroy this event.

name: Warrior's Birthright
Name: Warrior's Birthright
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Kli] personnel. Plays on your mission. You may meet Integrity and Cunning requirements of this mission and each dilemma you face at this mission using Strength instead.

name: I.K.S. Hegh'ta
Name: I.K.S. Hegh'ta
gametext: While this ship is at a space mission, it is Weapons +2.

name: I.K.S. Maht-H'a
Name: I.K.S. Maht-H'a
gametext: While an opponent's Archaeology personnel is at this mission, that opponent must discard a card from hand to use that personnel's skills.

name: D'deridex Advanced
Name: D'deridex Advanced
gametext: While your [Rom] Intelligence personnel is aboard this ship, this ship is attributes +2.

name: Bat'leth
Name: Bat'leth
gametext: To play this equipment, you must command a Klingon. When you win combat involving your Klingon present, the loser discards a random card from hand.

name: Ak'voh
Name: Ak'voh
gametext: Plays in your core. When a dilemma kills a personnel, his or her owner discards a card from hand.

name: Ja'chuq
Name: Ja'chuq
gametext: When you win combat or an engagement involving your [Kli] Leadership personnel, choose one of your missions. The player to your left places the top card of his or her dilemma pile face up beneath that mission (that dilemma is overcome). Remove this interrupt from the game.

name: The Prophets' Guidance
Name: The Prophets' Guidance
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must command two Vedeks. Order - Take a [Baj] personnel from your discard pile into hand.

name: Don't Let It End This Way
Name: Don't Let It End This Way
gametext: Randomly select one of your stopped personnel on this ship to be killed.

name: Jem'Hadar Disruptor Pistol
Name: Jem'Hadar Disruptor Pistol
gametext: While in combat, each of your [Dom] personnel present is Strength +1.

name: I Don't Like to Lose
Name: I Don't Like to Lose
gametext: Plays in your core. When you are about to draw dilemmas, you may discard a card from hand to subtract up to three dilemmas from the number of dilemmas you may draw and add that same number to the total cost you may spend on dilemmas.

name: Jem'Hadar Ambush
Name: Jem'Hadar Ambush
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin combat or an engagement involving your [Dom] personnel. If you win, score 10 points.

name: Jem'Hadar Birthing Chamber
Name: Jem'Hadar Birthing Chamber
gametext: Plays in your core. When you place a Jem'Hadar in your discard pile, you may discard a non-personnel card from hand to place a non-unique Jem'Hadar from hand at your Headquarters where he could be played.

name: Jem'Hadar Strike Force
Name: Jem'Hadar Strike Force
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin combat or an engagement involving your [Dom] personnel. If you win, score 10 points and randomly kill and opponent's personnel involved.

name: We're Mutants
Name: We're Mutants
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Fed] personnel. Plays in your core. While your Genetically Enhanced personnel is attempting a mission, you may destroy this event to make him or her gain one of every skill he or she already has until the end of this turn.

name: We're Everywhere
Name: We're Everywhere
gametext: When your Shape-shifter is killed, download a Shape-shifter.

name: Kasidy Yates Maquis Smuggler
Name: Kasidy Yates Maquis Smuggler
gametext: Order - Discard a card from hand to take {Smuggling Run} from your discard pile into hand.

name: Ruwon Intelligence Analyst
Name: Ruwon Intelligence Analyst
gametext: When your Romulan present is stopped by a dilemma, you may discard a card from hand to make this personnel Cunning +2 until the end of this mission attempt.

name: Locutus' Borg Cube
Name: Locutus' Borg Cube
gametext: Order - If this ship is staffed, return your {Drone} aboard it to his or her owner's hand to download a Maneuver card. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Tenak'talar Weyoun's Warship
Name: Tenak'talar Weyoun's Warship
gametext: When an opponent's mission attempt fails, if this ship is staffed and at that mission, score 10 points.

name: B'omar Stipulations
Name: B'omar Stipulations
gametext: Unless you have Diplomacy and Cunning>30 or Leadership and Strength>30, all of your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Guess Who's Coming to Dinner?
Name: Guess Who's Coming to Dinner?
gametext: Choose a personnel who has Diplomacy or Integrity>6 to be stopped. If you cannot, randomly select a personnel to be killed.

name: I.K.S. Ning'tao
Name: I.K.S. Ning'tao
gametext: When you win an engagement involving this ship, you may lose 5 points to download a Damage card and place it on an opponent's ship at this mission.

name: The Play's the Thing
Name: The Play's the Thing
gametext: Plays in your core. When you play this event, chose [AU], [Fut], or [Pa]. Each personnel you own who costs 3 or more gains that icon. At the start of each of your turns, place a card from hand on this event.

name: B'tanay
Name: B'tanay
gametext: When you play this ship, remove all the cards in your discard pile from the game.

name: Qo'noS Heart of the Empire
Name: Qo'noS Heart of the Empire
Skills: You may play [Kli] cards, [NA] cards, and equipment at this mission.

name: Clash at Chin'toka
Name: Clash at Chin'toka
Skills: Engineer, Leadership, Navigation, Officer, and Cunning>36

name: Founders' Homeworld Home of the Great Link
Name: Founders' Homeworld Home of the Great Link
Skills: You may play [Dom] cards, [NA] cards, and equipment at this mission.

name: Where No One Has Gone Before
Name: Where No One Has Gone Before
gametext: Unless you have Astrometrics, Navigation, Physics, and Cunning>34 or Exobiology, Leadership, Medical, and Integrity>32, place this dilemma in your core and place your ship on this dilemma. At the end of your next turn, remove this dilemma from the game and place the ship at your headquarters mission.

name: Rule of Acquisition #141
Name: Rule of Acquisition #141
gametext: Plays in your core. When you do not command three [Fer] personnel, destroy this event. At the start of each of your turns, if this event is beneath your {Ferenginar}, you may exchange it with a Rule in your core.

name: Rule of Acquisition #144
Name: Rule of Acquisition #144
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Fer] personnel. Plays in your core. When your [Fer] personnel is facing a dilemma, you may take two cards from beneath your Ferenginar and place them in your discard pile to make that personnel gain any skill until the end of that dilemma.

name: Ferenginar Financial Hub
Name: Ferenginar Financial Hub
Skills: You may play [Fer] cards, [NA] cards, and equipment at this mission.
gametext: When you place a card beneath this mission, place it face down. Dilemmas cannot be placed beneath this mission. Cards beneath this mission are not in play.

name: Leonard H. McCoy Remarkable Man
Name: Leonard H. McCoy Remarkable Man
gametext: While this personnel is attempting a mission, if you have completed no missions, each of your personnel present is attributes +2.

name: Brunt FCA Liquidator
Name: Brunt FCA Liquidator
gametext: Order - If an opponent commands more events in his or her core than you, return this personnel to his owner's hand to destroy an event.

name: Kol
Name: Kol
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may place the top card of your deck beneath your {Ferenginar}.

name: Vic Fontaine Vegas Crooner
Name: Vic Fontaine Vegas Crooner
gametext: When you begin a mission attempt involving this personnel, you may discard a card from hand to subtract one from the total cost your opponent may spend on dilemmas.

name: Aurulent
Name: Aurulent
gametext: When this ship is about to move between a non-[GQ] mission and a [GQ] mission, do not add 2 to the span total of those missions.

name: Ferengi Whip
Name: Ferengi Whip
gametext: When you play this equipment, place the top card of your deck beneath your {Ferenginar}. While in combat, each of your [Fer] personnel present is Strength +1. While facing a dilemma, each [Fer] Treachery personnel present is Strength +1.

name: Rom Younger Brother
Name: Rom Younger Brother
gametext: When a [Fer] personnel present is randomly selected by a dilemma, you may make that personnel attributes +1 until the end of the dilemma.

name: Delicate Negotiations
Name: Delicate Negotiations
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Fer] personnel. Discard a card from hand to spend two additional counters this turn. Destroy this event.

name: Palor Toff Trader
Name: Palor Toff Trader
gametext: This personnel is attributes +1 for each Artifact you command.

name: B-4 Dangerous Simpleton
Name: B-4 Dangerous Simpleton
gametext: While this personnel is attempting a mission, you may reveal three Androids from hand to make him Cunning +7 and gain Intelligence and Treachery. These effects last until the end of the mission attempt. You may only do this once each turn.

name: Noonien Soong Often-Wrong
Name: Noonien Soong Often-Wrong
gametext: While this personnel is on a planet or aboard a ship, you may play Androids on that planet or ship. When you play an Android, you may discard a card from hand to download an Android.

name: Soong-type Android
Name: Soong-type Android
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may reveal three Androids from hand to make it attributes +4 and gain a skill of your choice. These effects last until the end of the dilemma. You may do this only once each mission attempt.

name: Coordinated Effort
Name: Coordinated Effort
gametext: Unless you have twelve different skills, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: In the Pah-wraith's Wake
Name: In the Pah-wraith's Wake
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Baj] personnel. Remove two events in your discard pile from the game to destroy an event in an opponent's core. Destroy this event.

name: Tongo: Confront
Name: Tongo: Confront
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Stop your [Fer] personnel to make each player discard the top card of his or her deck. The owner of the discarded card that has the highest cost scores 5 points. (In the case of a tie, each tied player scores.) You may do this only once each turn.

name: Delegated Assignment
Name: Delegated Assignment
gametext: When one of your unique [DS9] personnel is about to be stopped by a dilemma, stop two of your personnel present to make that [DS9] personnel present attributes +2 until the end of the turn instead.

name: Heart to Heart
Name: Heart to Heart
gametext: Randomly select two personnel. If they share one or more of the same skills, both are stopped.

name: Entanglement
Name: Entanglement
gametext: Your opponent may spend three extra in total cost on dilemmas during this mission attempt.

name: Deliver Prisoners
Name: Deliver Prisoners
Skills: Law, Leadership, Security, Treachery, and Strength>32
gametext: When you play a Capture or Punishment event, if you have completed this mission, that event's cost is -1.

name: Investigate Destruction
Name: Investigate Destruction
Skills: Astrometrics, Diplomacy, Officer, and Integrity>25 or Navigation, Security, Treachery, and Cunning>28

name: Crensen Gap Protect the Escapees
Name: Crensen Gap Protect the Escapees
gametext: You may attempt and complete this mission using your [Kli] personnel with these requirements: Leadership, Officer, Treachery, and Strength>30.

name: Psych Test
Name: Psych Test
gametext: Your opponent chooses two personnel. Randomly select one of those personnel to be stopped.

name: Dr. Leah Brahms Holographic Representation
Name: Dr. Leah Brahms Holographic Representation
gametext: While this personnel is attempting a space mission, she is attributes +1 and gains Engineer.

name: Montgomery Scott Relic
Name: Montgomery Scott Relic
gametext: While this personnel is equipped with an equipment, each dilemma he faces that requires Programming or Transporters is prevented and overcome.

name: Code of Honor
Name: Code of Honor
gametext: Randomly select two personnel. They cannot use their skills while facing this dilemma. Unless you have Anthropology, Diplomacy, and Honor or Law, Security, and Strength>35, all your personnel are stopped.

name: Rule of Acquisition #6
Name: Rule of Acquisition #6
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Fer] personnel. Plays in your core. You cannot spend counters to draw cards. (You do not need to spend all your counters during each of your turns.) Order - Stop one of your [Fer] personnel to draw a card.

name: Letek
Name: Letek
gametext: While you have a higher score than each of your opponents, this personnel is attributes +1 and gains Medical and Treachery.

name: Par Lenor Lascivious Emissary
Name: Par Lenor Lascivious Emissary
gametext: At the start of each of your turns, you may destroy one of your Rule events to spend additional counters this turn equal to that event's cost.

name: Observation Drone
Name: Observation Drone
gametext: When this personnel uses a skill to complete an [AQ] mission, you may exchange up to three cards in your discard pile with the same number of cards from your deck. Then shuffle your deck.

name: Worth the Price
Name: Worth the Price
gametext: To play this event, you must command two [Fer] personnel. Destroy an event. The player who commands that event may draw cards equal to its cost. Destroy this event.

name: Meaningless Modifications
Name: Meaningless Modifications
gametext: Unless you have 3 Engineer and Leadership or a personnel who has Cunning>6, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Molecular Reversion Field
Name: Molecular Reversion Field
gametext: Unless you have two personnel who each have Integrity>5, Cunning>5, and Strength>5, or have two personnel who have total attributes>38, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma is placed on your ship. Damage - You have 1 fewer counters to spend during each of your Play and Draw Cards segments.

name: Outmatched
Name: Outmatched
gametext: For each dilemma your opponent consumes with this dilemma, add 10 Cunning to this dilemma's requirements. Unless you have Cunning>15, all your personnel are stopped.

name: Small Problems
Name: Small Problems
gametext: Randomly select three personnel. Each of those who is a [Cmd] personnel is stopped.

name: Clandestine Agent
Name: Clandestine Agent
gametext: When your Founder is attempting a mission, if your Infiltrator is present with an opponent's personnel, that Founder gains a skill of your choice until the end of this turn.

name: Reinforcement Drone
Name: Reinforcement Drone
gametext: You may play this personnel at cost +1 where you have three [Bor] personnel present together.

name: Sonchi
Name: Sonchi
gametext: Plays in your core. When you play an Anthropology Klingon, you may destroy this event to remove an event in an opponent's core from the game.

name: Quarrel
Name: Quarrel
gametext: Randomly select two personnel. Unless they have Integrity>11 or Cunning>11, both are stopped.

name: Rule of Acquisition #22
Name: Rule of Acquisition #22
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Fer] personnel. Plays in your core. At the start of each of your turns, you may discard three cards from hand to spend 3 additional counters this turn.

name: Vedek Assembly
Name: Vedek Assembly
gametext: For each Vedek you command, take a card from your discard pile and place it on the bottom of your deck. Remove this event from the game.

name: Holodeck Grid
Name: Holodeck Grid
gametext: Plays in your core. You may play Holograms aboard your ship if both of them could be played at the same headquarters mission you command.

name: Bruce Maddox Chair of Robotics
Name: Bruce Maddox Chair of Robotics
gametext: While this personnel is present with an Android, he is attributes +1 and gains Exobiology and Science.

name: Provoked Attack
Name: Provoked Attack
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin an engagement involving your ship with your Gul aboard. That ship is Weapons +2. If you win, you may name a skill and randomly select an opponent's personnel involved who has that skill to place in your brig.

name: Temporal Incursion
Name: Temporal Incursion
gametext: Plays in your core. When the player on your right begins a mission attempt, you may flip your dilemma pile over to draw an extra dilemma. (Cards that were face up on the bottom of your dilemma pile become face down on the top.)

name: Selay Transport Delegations
Name: Selay Transport Delegations
Affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.

name: Arridor "Great Sage"
Name: Arridor "Great Sage"
Skills: Acquisition Anthropology Exobiology Leadership Medical Physics Treachery
gametext: When you begin a mission attempt involving this personnel, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a personnel, make this personnel gain all of the revealed personnel's skills until the end of that mission attempt.

name: Goss Direct Negotiator
Name: Goss Direct Negotiator
gametext: While you have six or more cards in hand, this personnel gains Diplomacy, Transporters, and Treachery.

name: Brinkmanship
Name: Brinkmanship
gametext: Plays in your core. While your [Rom] Diplomacy personnel is facing a dilemma, you may discard a card from hand to meet that dilemma's Integrity requirements using Cunning instead.

name: Kassem Stern Operative
Name: Kassem Stern Operative
gametext: When this personnel uses a skill to complete a non-[Rom] mission, score 5 points. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Spock Celebrated Ambassador
Name: Spock Celebrated Ambassador
gametext: While this personnel is present with a Dissident, each of your Romulan personnel present is attributes +1.

name: Lenaris Holem Bold Veteran
Name: Lenaris Holem Bold Veteran
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, if you have ten or more cards in your discard pile, you may meet Cunning and Strength requirements of that dilemma using Integrity instead.

name: Kira Nerys Pious Major
Name: Kira Nerys Pious Major
gametext: When this personnel uses a skill to complete a [Baj] mission, score 5 points. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Charged-Particle Precipitation
Name: Charged-Particle Precipitation
gametext: The personnel who has the fewest [SD] icons is stopped. If that personnel does not have at least four [SD] icons, he or she is killed instead.

name: Omet'iklan Steely Disciplinarian
Name: Omet'iklan Steely Disciplinarian
gametext: When you lose 5 points, you may place two of your Jem'Hadar present in their owner's discard pile to score 5 points. You may do this only once per turn.

name: Financial Pitfall
Name: Financial Pitfall
gametext: Unless you have 3 Acquisition or Cunning>35, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Proximity-Actuated Field
Name: Proximity-Actuated Field
gametext: Unless you have Biology and 2 Security or 2 Physics and Cunning>35, randomly select a personnel to be stopped and your opponent may move up to two dilemmas from beneath one of your missions to another of your non-headquarters missions.

name: Stay Where Thou Art
Name: Stay Where Thou Art
gametext: Unless you have Cunning>40 or a personnel who has both Diplomacy and Integrity>7, randomly select three personnel. They cannot use their skills during this mission attempt.

name: Ferengi Computer
Name: Ferengi Computer
gametext: When a [Fer] personnel present is about to be stopped by a dilemma, you may place this equipment beneath your {Ferenginar} to prevent that.

name: Exceed Engine Output
Name: Exceed Engine Output
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Move your ship with your Engineer aboard to a space mission, then place this event on that ship. Damage - This ship is Weapons -2 and Shields -2.

name: Recover Components
Name: Recover Components
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Bor] personnel. Take a personnel you own from your discard pile and place it on the top of your deck. Place this event on the bottom of your deck.

name: Rule of Acquisition #76
Name: Rule of Acquisition #76
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Fer] personnel. Plays in your core. Order - Return a Rule to its owner's hand.

name: Seeing Double
Name: Seeing Double
gametext: Choose one: Place your Founder from your headquarters mission aboard a ship; or exchange any number of your [Dom] personnel at your headquarters mission with an equal number of your personnel aboard a ship. Destroy this event.

name: Ascertain
Name: Ascertain
gametext: When your Drone is facing a dilemma, discard a card from hand and stop that Drone to replace all levels of any one skill in that dilemma's requirements with 2 Programming.

name: Clear Ultimatum
Name: Clear Ultimatum
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must command three [Rom] personnel. Order - Examine an opponent's hand. Choose an event or interrupt revealed. That opponent discards it.

name: Cluttering Irrelevancies
Name: Cluttering Irrelevancies
gametext: When your Hologram is facing a dilemma, name a skill. That Hologram gains that skill and is attributes +2 until the end of that dilemma. At the end of this mission attempt, return that Hologram to its owner's hand.

name: Impromptu Prison
Name: Impromptu Prison
gametext: When an opponent's personnel becomes stopped by a dilemma, you may discard two cards from hand to randomly select another personnel present to be stopped.

name: Means of Control
Name: Means of Control
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must have a captive. When your [Car] personnel is attempting a mission, he or she is attributes +2 and gains all skills from that captive until the end of this turn.

name: Swagger
Name: Swagger
