gametext: To play this interrupt, you must command three [Car] personnel. Order - Discard two cards from hand to destroy an event in an opponent's core that costs 3 or less.

name: Veiled Threat
Name: Veiled Threat
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must command three [Fer] personnel. When your [Fer] personnel is facing a dilemma, make him or her attributes +2 until the end of the mission attempt for each of these categories in which you have more than any of your opponents: cards in hand, events in core, and incomplete non-headquarters missions.

name: Braslota Advanced Battle Simulation
Name: Braslota Advanced Battle Simulation
Affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
Skills: 2 Leadership, Cunning>33, and (Engineer and Programming or Navigation and Security)
gametext: When you play a Maneuver event, if you have completed this mission, that event's cost is -1.

name: Advanced Combat Training
Name: Advanced Combat Training
Affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
Skills: Leadership, Medical, Officer, Security, and Strength>34
gametext: When you play an Assault event, if you have completed this mission, that event's cost is -1.

name: Obtain Vaccine
Name: Obtain Vaccine
gametext: Any affiliation may attempt and complete this mission with these requirements: Biology, Leadership, Security, Treachery, and Strength>32.

name: Delphi Ardu IV The Last Outpost
Name: Delphi Ardu IV The Last Outpost
Skills: Acquisition, Security, 2 Treachery, and Cunning>36 or 2 Diplomacy, Leadership, Officer, and Integrity>31

name: Dejar Cunning Saboteur
Name: Dejar Cunning Saboteur
gametext: When this personnel uses her Intelligence to complete a mission, score 5 points.

name: Tekeny Ghemor Prominent Official
Name: Tekeny Ghemor Prominent Official
Skills: Diplomacy Engineer Honor Law Leadership Programming Transporters
gametext: When you play this personnel, discard a card from hand. When this personnel is about to be stopped by a dilemma, you may stop your Dissident present instead.

name: Duran'Adar Attentive Sixth
Name: Duran'Adar Attentive Sixth
gametext: When this personnel uses a skill to complete an [AQ] mission, score 5 points. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Goran'Agar Trusted Commander
Name: Goran'Agar Trusted Commander
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, each of your Jem'Hadar present is Cunning +1 Order - Stop one of your Jem'Hadar present to draw a card. You may only do this once each turn.

name: Daneeka Reassuring Physician
Name: Daneeka Reassuring Physician
gametext: When this personnel uses Biology to complete a mission, score 5 points.

name: Michael Eddington Loyal Leader
Name: Michael Eddington Loyal Leader
gametext: While this personnel is attempting a mission, you may make him attributes +3 and gain Honor and Leadership until the end of this mission attempt. If you do, he is killed at the end of this turn. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Birta "Helpful" DaiMon
Name: Birta "Helpful" DaiMon
gametext: When you play an Acquisition personnel at this mission, you may examine the top card of your deck, then place it on the top or bottom of your deck.

name: Bok Vengeful DaiMon
Name: Bok Vengeful DaiMon
gametext: While you command an event that has a higher cost than every other opponent's event, this personnel is attributes +1 and gains Programming.

name: Gozar
Name: Gozar
Skills: Acquisition Archaeology Leadership Navigation Officer Treachery

name: Ishka Moogie
Name: Ishka Moogie
gametext: Order - Examine the top card of your deck and exchange it with a card beneath your {Ferenginar}.

name: Kazago First Officer
Name: Kazago First Officer
gametext: For each card beneath your {Ferenginar}, this personnel is attributes +1 (limit +3).

name: Leck Eliminator
Name: Leck Eliminator
gametext: Order - Discard any number of cards from hand and return this personnel to his owner's hand to randomly kill an opponent's personnel present whose cost equals the number of cards you discarded.

name: Lurin Renegade DaiMon
Name: Lurin Renegade DaiMon
Skills: Acquisition Geology Leadership Officer Transporters 2 Treachery
gametext: At the start of each of your turns, you may discard a ship or equipment from hand to spend 2 additional counters this turn.

name: Lwaxana Troi Telepathic Asset
Name: Lwaxana Troi Telepathic Asset
gametext: Order - One of your [Fer] Leadership personnel present gains any skill. This effect lasts until this order is executed again.

name: Maihar'du Silent Servant
Name: Maihar'du Silent Servant
gametext: Order - Stop your [Fer] Leadership personnel present to take a card from beneath your {Ferenginar} into hand.

name: Mordoc
Name: Mordoc
gametext: While you have more cards in hand than any of your opponents, this personnel is attributes +1 and gains Transporters.

name: Nava
Name: Nava
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may take a card from beneath your {Ferenginar} into hand.

name: Quark True Ferengi
Name: Quark True Ferengi
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may download a card and place that card beneath your {Ferenginar}. This personnel is Cunning +1 for each Rule you command that has a different card title.

name: Sovak Treasure Hunter
Name: Sovak Treasure Hunter
gametext: Order - Discard a card from hand to examine a number of cards from the top of your deck equal to the discarded card's cost, then replace them in any order.

name: Taar Bristling DaiMon
Name: Taar Bristling DaiMon
gametext: This personnel is attributes +2 for each of these categories in which you have more than any of your opponents: cards in hand, events in core, and points scored.

name: Zek The Grand Nagus
Name: Zek The Grand Nagus
gametext: Order - Stop this card to reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a [Fer] personnel, draw it; otherwise, place it beneath your {Ferenginar}.

name: Jean-Luc Picard Worf's cha'Dich
Name: Jean-Luc Picard Worf's cha'Dich
gametext: When your Klingon personnel present is selected by a dilemma, you may replace him or her with this personnel.

name: K'Ehleyr Diplomatic Advisor
Name: K'Ehleyr Diplomatic Advisor
gametext: When this personnel uses her Diplomacy to complete a mission, score 5 points.

name: Aikido
Name: Aikido
gametext: When a non-Hologram personnel present is randomly selected by a dilemma, you may make that personnel Strength +1 until the end of that dilemma.

name: Calisthenics Opponent
Name: Calisthenics Opponent
gametext: This personnel is attributes +1 for each of your Security personnel present.

name: Ira Graves Noted Molecular Cyberneticist
Name: Ira Graves Noted Molecular Cyberneticist
gametext: When this personnel or your Android present is about to be stopped or killed by a dilemma, you may discard an Android from hand to prevent that. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Kivas Fajo Collector
Name: Kivas Fajo Collector
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may meet Diplomacy and Honor requirements of that dilemma using Acquisition instead.

name: Minuet Jazz Lover
Name: Minuet Jazz Lover
gametext: When this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may stop a non-Hologram personnel present to make this personnel attributes +1 and gain Programming and Security. These effects last until the end of the mission attempt.

name: Ruk Old One Servitor
Name: Ruk Old One Servitor
gametext: When you play this personnel, each Android you command is attributes +1 until the end of this turn.

name: Tolian Soran Renegade Scientist
Name: Tolian Soran Renegade Scientist
Skills: Astrometrics Engineer 2 Physics Programming Transporters 2 Treachery
gametext: When this personnel uses a skill, randomly stop one of your personnel present.

name: Tebok Posturing Commander
Name: Tebok Posturing Commander
gametext: You may play this personnel at cost +1 to reveal the top three cards of an opponent's deck and replace them in any order.

name: Audit's Spoils
Name: Audit's Spoils
gametext: When you begin a mission attempt involving this ship, you may take a card from beneath your {Ferenginar} into hand. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Kurdon
Name: Kurdon
gametext: While your personnel are attempting a space mission that requires Acquisition or Treachery, each [Fer] personnel aboard this ship is Cunning +1.

name: Devoras
Name: Devoras
gametext: When an opponent's personnel is killed, if this ship is at the same mission, you may place a [Rom] personnel from hand who has the same cost aboard this ship.

name: Borg Queen The One Who Is Many *AP
Name: Borg Queen The One Who Is Many *AP

name: Agonizing Encounter
Name: Agonizing Encounter
gametext: For each headquarters you command, this dilemma is cost -1. Your opponent names a skill. For each of your missions that requires that skill, randomly select a personnel to be stopped.

name: Assist Rescue Operation
Name: Assist Rescue Operation
gametext: Unless you have Anthropology, Diplomacy, and Leadership or Officer, Treachery, and Strength>26, randomly select a personnel to be stopped, and if the opponent on your left commands {Earth}, he or she may download a [Fed] ship and its Commander that he or she does not command. If he or she does this, that ship and personnel are then placed at a mission where your opponent could play them.

name: Between Duty and Respect
Name: Between Duty and Respect
gametext: Unless you have Archaeology, Geology, and Science or Honor, Leadership, and Officer, randomly select a personnel to be stopped, and if the opponent on your left commands {Bajor}, he or she may take a card from his or her discard pile into hand.

name: Bre'Nan Ritual
Name: Bre'Nan Ritual
gametext: Place this dilemma on this mission. At the start of each mission attempt at this mission, randomly select a personnel to be stopped. When this mission is completed, place this dilemma beneath your incomplete non-headquarters mission.

name: Cardassian Processing
Name: Cardassian Processing
gametext: Unless you have Diplomacy, Honor, and Transporters or Law, Security, and Strength>30, randomly select a personnel to be stopped, and if the opponent on your left commands {Cardassia Prime}, that personnel is placed in your opponent's brig instead.

name: Chula: Move Along Home
Name: Chula: Move Along Home
gametext: Randomly select three personnel. If the highest Strength among those personnel is even, all three of them are stopped.

name: Covert Insertion
Name: Covert Insertion
gametext: Unless you have Diplomacy, Officer, and Security or Biology, Intelligence, and Treachery, randomly select a personnel to be stopped, and if the opponent on your left commands {Founders' Homeworld}, he or she may download an Infiltrator that he or she does not command and place him or her on your ship or planet mission.

name: Cultural Differences
Name: Cultural Differences
gametext: Choose a personnel who has Acquisition or Anthropology to be stopped. If you cannot, randomly select a personnel to be killed.

name: Dangerous Standoff
Name: Dangerous Standoff
gametext: Unless you have Diplomacy, Leadership, and Physics or Exobiology, Medical, and Cunning>28, randomly select a personnel to be stopped, and if the opponent on your left commands {Unicomplex} and does not command that personnel, he or she may place that personnel there. Your opponent now commands that personnel.

name: Deuterium Plunderers
Name: Deuterium Plunderers
gametext: Unless you have Exobiology and 2 Medical or Officer, Security, and Treachery, randomly select a personnel to be stopped, and if the opponent on your left command {Qo'noS}, he or she may download up to three [Kli] personnel that he or she does not command and place them at this mission.

name: Molecular Mishap
Name: Molecular Mishap
gametext: Unless you have Anthropology, Biology, and Cunning>28 or Law, Officer, and Strength>32, lose 5 points.

name: Opportunity for Profit
Name: Opportunity for Profit
gametext: Unless you have Acquisition, Engineer, and Programming or Honor, Officer, and Security, randomly select a personnel to be stopped, and the opponent on your left may discard a card from beneath his or her {Ferenginar} to randomly select an additional personnel to be stopped.

name: Outclassed
Name: Outclassed
gametext: Unless you have unused Range>8 or Weapons>8 all your personnel are stopped.

name: Parallels
Name: Parallels
gametext: Reveal a number of cards from the top of your deck equal to the number of events the opponent to your left has in his or her core. If any of the revealed cards are a copy of a personnel attempting this mission, stop each of those personnel. Place the revealed cards on the bottom of their owner's deck in any order.

name: Profitable Venture
Name: Profitable Venture
gametext: Unless you have Acquisition, Diplomacy, and Transporters or Law, Officer, and Security, randomly select a personnel to be stopped and the next dilemma revealed during this mission attempt is cost -3.

name: Tactical Disadvantage
Name: Tactical Disadvantage
gametext: Reveal your hand and the hand of the opponent on your left. If your opponent reveals ships with more total Weapons than the total Shields of ships that you have revealed in this way, randomly select one of your personnel to be killed and all your personnel are stopped.

name: Telepathic Invasion
Name: Telepathic Invasion
gametext: Unless you have Diplomacy, Officer, and Telepathy or Intelligence, Treachery, and Cunning>22, randomly select a personnel to be stopped, and if the opponent on your left commands {Romulus}, he or she may examine your hand and discard a card of his or her choice from the revealed cards.

name: Up the Ante
Name: Up the Ante
gametext: You may end this mission attempt to prevent and overcome this dilemma (all your personnel are stopped). If you do not and you complete this mission this turn, you win the game. If you do not and do not complete this mission this turn, you lose the game.

name: Warp Bubble Mishap
Name: Warp Bubble Mishap
gametext: Choose a personnel who has Physics or Science to be stopped. If you cannot, randomly select a personnel to be killed.

name: Zero Hour
Name: Zero Hour
gametext: Place this dilemma on this mission. Add 3 to each attribute requirement needed to complete this mission for each event in your core. At the end of this turn, this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Aggressive Solutions
Name: Aggressive Solutions
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [TNG] personnel. Each player places the top card of his or her dilemma pile beneath an opponent's non-headquarters mission. Destroy this event.

name: Continuing Committee Hearing
Name: Continuing Committee Hearing
Keywords: Replicate - Discard the top card of your deck.
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Rom] personnel. Choose an opponent to discard the top card of his or her deck. Destroy this event.

name: Distracting Exhibition
Name: Distracting Exhibition
gametext: Plays in your core. When you play this event, name a skill. While an opponent's personnel is facing your dilemma, if he or she uses that skill, take a dilemma from beneath an opponent's completed mission and place it on top of you dilemma pile. You may do this only once each mission attempt.

name: Not Easily Destroyed
Name: Not Easily Destroyed
gametext: Plays in your core. When your Hologram is about to be killed by a dilemma, you may discard a card from hand to stop him or her instead.

name: That's the Last Time
Name: That's the Last Time
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [SF] personnel. Discard a card from hand to draw two cards. Destroy this event.

name: We're All On Strike
Name: We're All On Strike
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Fer] personnel. Plays in your core. Order - Stop your Dabo Girl or Waiter to examine an opponent's hand. If none of those cards are events, draw two cards. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Earth Humanity's Home
Name: Earth Humanity's Home

gametext: When you complete a space mission, if no other space mission has been completed, score 10 points.

Name: Borg Queen The One Who is Many

Name: Turan'Ekan

name: Arik Soong Father of Many

Name: Miss Sarda Not a Legal Expert

Choose an opponent to shuffle his or her dilemma pile and then reveal the top card of that pile. If its cost matched the number you named, place it beneath your non-headquarters mission.

Name: Daniels Temporal Agent
gametext: When this personnel is stopped by a dilemma, return him to his or her owner's hand.

name: Kelby Arrogant Engineer
Name: Kelby Arrogant Engineer
gametext: Order - If this personnel is aboard your ship, discard the top card of your deck to remove a Damage card from that ship. You may only do this once each turn.

name: Revelry
Name: Revelry
gametext: For each of your headquarters missions, randomly select a personnel to be stopped. You may place two personnel from hand in your discard pile to prevent this.

name: Avert Solar Implosion
Name: Avert Solar Implosion
Affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
Skills: Archaeology, Geology, Physics, Science, and Cunning>34 or Anthropology, Honor, Leadership, Officer, and Strength>38

name: Deliver Ancient Artifact
Name: Deliver Ancient Artifact
Affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
Skills: Archaeology, Exobiology, 2 Geology, Science, and Cunning>34 or Diplomacy, 2 Honor, Leadership, Security, and Strength>38

name: Deliver Evidence
Name: Deliver Evidence
Affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
Skills: Anthropology, Honor, Intelligence, Officer, and Integrity>32 or Archaeology, Navigation, Science, Security, and Cunning>34

name: U.S.S. Enterprise-D Federation Flagship
Name: U.S.S. Enterprise-D Federation Flagship
gametext: When you complete a space mission, if this ship is at that mission and you have three [Cmd] aboard this ship, score 10 points.

name: Maquis Vendetta
Name: Maquis Vendetta
gametext: Randomly select a personnel to be stopped. If that personnel has Officer or Security, randomly select an additional personnel to be stopped.

name: Shields Up!
Name: Shields Up!
gametext: Randomly select a personnel to be stopped. If that personnel has Astrometrics or Navigation, randomly select an additional personnel to be stopped.

name: An Issue of Trust
Name: An Issue of Trust
gametext: Unless you have Honor or Treachery, all your personnel are stopped. If you have two or more personnel who have Honor or Treachery, randomly select all but one of those personnel to be stopped.

name: Destiny Reset
Name: Destiny Reset
gametext: Plays in your core. When you have drawn dilemmas, you may destroy this event and remove those dilemmas from the game to search your dilemma pile for up to two dilemmas whose total cost does not exceed the number of dilemmas you removed. Place those dilemmas on your dilemma stack in any order. Then shuffle your dilemma pile.

name: The Doctor Emergency Medical Hologram
Name: The Doctor Emergency Medical Hologram
gametext: When your [Voy] personnel present is about to be killed by a dilemma that costs 3 or more, you may discard two cards from hand to stop that personnel instead.

name: Not Quite Domesticated Pets
Name: Not Quite Domesticated Pets
gametext: Unless you have Diplomacy, 2 Leadership and Integrity>28 or Biology, 2 Exobiology and Cunning>34, randomly select a personnel to be stopped. If your opponent has more events in his or her core than you and he or she does not command that personnel, place that personnel at his or her headquarters mission instead and that opponent now commands that personnel.

name: Carol Marcus Intelligent Scientist
Name: Carol Marcus Intelligent Scientist
gametext: This personnel is Cunning +1 for each card in an opponent's hand (limit +5).

name: Jadzia Dax Elder
Name: Jadzia Dax Elder
gametext: When you play this personnel, for each Vedek you command, she is cost -1.

name: William T. Riker Skilled Commander
Name: William T. Riker Skilled Commander
gametext: When your Leadership personnel present is killed by a dilemma, you may discard two cards from your hand to download a [TNG] personnel.

name: Bio-neural Computer Core
Name: Bio-neural Computer Core
gametext: Randomly select a personnel to be stopped. If your opponent does not command that personnel and you still have nine personnel remaining, place him or her on your opponent's headquarters mission instead, then randomly select a second personnel that your opponent does not command to be placed on that opponent's headquarters mission. That opponent now commands those personnel.

name: Necessary Execution
Name: Necessary Execution
gametext: Your opponent chooses a personnel to be killed. If you do not command a completed space mission, he or she chooses an additional personnel to be killed.

name: The Long Journey Home
Name: The Long Journey Home
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Voy] personnel. Plays on your {Caretaker's Array}. When you command four completed [DQ] space missions and have 100 or more points, you win the game.

name: Surprise Snag
Name: Surprise Snag
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must discard the top three cards of your deck. When you are about to draw dilemmas, draw one extra dilemma and spend one extra in total cost on dilemmas.

name: Chakotay Bridge Between Two Crews
Name: Chakotay Bridge Between Two Crews
gametext: When your [Fed] personnel present is about to be stopped by a dilemma, you may destroy an event in your core to prevent that.

name: Harry Kim Eager to Please
Name: Harry Kim Eager to Please
Skills: Astrometrics Biology Physics Programming Science Transporters
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma at a [DQ] mission, each of your Programming personnel present is attributes +1.

name: Quark's Treasure Sabotaged Shuttle
Name: Quark's Treasure Sabotaged Shuttle
gametext: Order - If this ship has its Commander aboard it, lose 5 points to take an additional turn after this one. At the end of that turn, you lose the game.

name: Unbelievable Emergency
Name: Unbelievable Emergency
gametext: Your opponent names a skill. For each headquarters mission you command, randomly select two personnel to be stopped. If either of those personnel that is selected has the named skill, kill that personnel instead.

name: Saavik Protegee
Name: Saavik Protegee
gametext: When you play this personnel, if James T. Kirk is at this mission, you may download {No-Win Situation}.

name: Kira Nerys Hero of Bajor
Name: Kira Nerys Hero of Bajor
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may remove a card in your discard pile from the game to make her gain a skill from your Vedek present until the end of that mission attempt. You may only do this once each turn.

name: Bareil Antos Escort
Name: Bareil Antos Escort
gametext: Order - Stop this personnel to reveal a Vedek or Kai personnel from your hand. You may discard cards from the top of your deck equal to that personnel's cost to place that personnel at your mission where he or she could be played.

name: Vedek Assembly Transport
Name: Vedek Assembly Transport
gametext: This ship is attributes +1 for each of these keywords you have aboard: Kai, Prylar and Vedek.

name: Jonathan Archer Bearer of Surak's Katra
Name: Jonathan Archer Bearer of Surak's Katra
gametext: When your non-[SF] personnel is about to be stopped by a dilemma, you may discard a card from your hand to have this personnel gain a skill from him or her until the end of the mission attempt.

name: T'Pol Non-believer
Name: T'Pol Non-believer
gametext: When this personnel uses a skill to complete a mission, you may take an Artifact or event from your discard pile into hand. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Charles Tucker III Standing In
Name: Charles Tucker III Standing In
gametext: During your Play and Draw Cards segment, you may spend 1 additional counter for each space mission you have completed.

name: Enterprise Battle Hardened
Name: Enterprise Battle Hardened
gametext: Order - Discard a Temporal event from your hand to make this ship Range +2 until the end of this turn.

name: James T. Kirk Irrational Human Being
Name: James T. Kirk Irrational Human Being
gametext: When your Leadership personnel present is selected by a dilemma, you may stop this personnel to make that personnel attributes +3 until the end of that dilemma.

name: Jean-Luc Picard Captain of the Enterprise
Name: Jean-Luc Picard Captain of the Enterprise
Skills: Diplomacy Honor Leadership Officer Programming Security
gametext: When your [Fed] personnel present is killed by a dilemma, you may make this personnel attributes +3 and gain Leadership until the end of the turn. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Worf The Strongest Heart (Promo)
Name: Worf The Strongest Heart (Promo)
gametext: When your Host or Honor Klingon present is about to be stopped by a dilemma, you may discard an event from hand to prevent that.

name: Jadzia Dax The Second Heart (Promo)
Name: Jadzia Dax The Second Heart (Promo)
gametext: Order - Stop your Honor Klingon present and destroy an event in your core to take an event from your discard pile into hand.

name: Kathryn Janeway Forceful Captain
Name: Kathryn Janeway Forceful Captain
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma at a [DQ] mission, she is attributes +4.

name: Caretaker's Array
Name: Caretaker's Array
gametext: At the start of each of your turns, you may discard a card from hand to download {Finding Our Way}. When a card instructs you to place a ship at your headquarters mission, that ship may be placed at this mission instead.

name: U.S.S. Voyager Home Away From Home
Name: U.S.S. Voyager Home Away From Home
gametext: While you do not command a headquarters mission, you may play this ship at {Caretaker's Array}. While this ship is at a [DQ] mission, you may play [Voy] personnel, [NA] personnel, and equipment aboard this ship. When you play this ship, you may place up to two [Voy] personnel from your hand aboard this ship.

name: Finding Our Way
Name: Finding Our Way
gametext: To play this event, you must not command a headquarters mission. Plays on your {Caretaker's Array}. Cards an opponent owns cannot prevent or destroy this event. When a card instructs you to place a personnel on your headquarters mission, that personnel may be placed aboard your [Voy] ship instead. Order - Discard a card from hand to download a [Voy] ship. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Nose to Nose
Name: Nose to Nose
gametext: Randomly select two personnel. If they both have the same cost, they are both stopped.

name: Martia Duplicitous Chameloid
Name: Martia Duplicitous Chameloid
gametext: Order - This personnel gains one skill and one keyword from one of your personnel present. She keeps that skill and keyword until this order is executed again.

name: Imagined Emergency
Name: Imagined Emergency
gametext: Unless you have Engineer, Exobiology, and Medical or Leadership, Security, and Strength>30, randomly select a personnel to be stopped and your opponent may move up to two dilemmas from beneath one of your missions to another of your non-headquarters missions.

name: Contaminating a Culture
Name: Contaminating a Culture
gametext: Randomly select a personnel to be killed. You may prevent this by placing one of your equipment cards present in its owner's discard pile.

name: A Sight for Sore Eyes
Name: A Sight for Sore Eyes
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [SF] personnel. Plays in your core. At the start of each of your turns, score 5 points. At the end of each of your turns, if you have at least 5 points, lose 5 points.

name: Fifth Neonatal Drone
Name: Fifth Neonatal Drone
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may return a non-dilemma card on your Decay event to its owner's hand.

name: Second Neonatal Drone
Name: Second Neonatal Drone
gametext: When your unique Borg present is about to be stopped, you may discard a random card from hand and stop this personnel to prevent that.

name: Erika Hernandez Comparable Captain
Name: Erika Hernandez Comparable Captain
gametext: While this personnel is aboard your {Columbia}, that ship is attributes +2.

name: Daniel Leonard Cautious Admiral
Name: Daniel Leonard Cautious Admiral
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may download a [SF] ship.

name: Observe Kazon Ritual
Name: Observe Kazon Ritual
Skills: Anthropology, Honor, Officer, Transporters and Integrity>31 or Astrometrics, Navigation, Security, Treachery, and Strength>34

name: Obtain Advanced Technology
Name: Obtain Advanced Technology
Affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
Skills: Anthropology, Diplomacy, Honor, and Integrity>29 or Security, Transporters, Treachery, and Cunning>30

name: The Dominion Will Prevail
Name: The Dominion Will Prevail
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin an engagement involving your [Dom] Officer personnel. If you win, the opponent on your left places the top two dilemmas of his or her dilemma pile beneath one of your non-headquarters missions.

name: Bennet
Name: Bennet
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card from hand.

name: Targeting the Nacelles
Name: Targeting the Nacelles
gametext: When your opponent's ship is about to move from a mission where you have a staffed ship that has its Commander aboard, you may discard an event from hand to make that opponent's ship Range -3 until the end of the turn.

name: Jadzia Dax Defiant Captain
Name: Jadzia Dax Defiant Captain
gametext: While this personnel is aboard your {U.S.S. Defiant}, she loses [Stf] and gains [Cmd] and Leadership.

name: U.S.S. Defiant Patrolling Warship
Name: U.S.S. Defiant Patrolling Warship
gametext: When an opponent's ship moves to this mission, if this ship's Commander is aboard it, that opponent's ship is stopped.

name: Sweet Nothings
Name: Sweet Nothings
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must command three [Fer] personnel. Order - Choose an opponent to reveal his or her hand. You may draw a card for each interrupt revealed.

name: Collect Omicron Particles
Name: Collect Omicron Particles
Affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.
Skills: Astrometrics, Engineer, Leadership, Navigation, and Cunning>36
gametext: When a ship is about to move between another [DQ] mission and this mission, subtract 1 from the Range required.

name: Explore Micro-Wormhole
Name: Explore Micro-Wormhole
gametext: When you complete this mission, you may place any number of personnel on your ship here on your ship at an [AQ] mission.

name: Investigate Alleged Murder
Name: Investigate Alleged Murder
gametext: You may attempt and complete this mission using your [NA] personnel with these requirements: Anthropology, Security, Transporters, and Strength>28.

name: Investigate Unknown Element
Name: Investigate Unknown Element
Affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
Skills: Anthropology, Leadership, Officer, and Integrity>27 or Exobiology, Geology, Science, and Cunning>30

name: A Pattern of Lies
Name: A Pattern of Lies
gametext: Randomly select three personnel. Unless at least one of them is a different species than the others, all three are stopped. Otherwise, choose one of those personnel to be stopped.

name: Making It Work
Name: Making It Work
Keywords: Replicate - Discard a card from hand.
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Voy] personnel. Remove a damage card from your ship. Destroy this event.

name: B'Elanna Torres Straightforward Engineer
Name: B'Elanna Torres Straightforward Engineer
gametext: Order - If this personnel is aboard your ship, discard a card from hand to remove a Damage card from that ship. You may do this only once each turn.

name: A Long Road
Name: A Long Road
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must command a Navigation personnel. Order - Discard a card from hand to take up to two Pursuit cards from your discard pile into hand.

name: Warp Speed Transfer
Name: Warp Speed Transfer
gametext: While your personnel aboard a ship are facing a dilemma, move your staffed ship to that mission from a different mission and place one of your personnel aboard that ship aboard the ship attempting the mission. That personnel joins the mission attempt.

name: Matthew Dougherty Misguided Admiral
Name: Matthew Dougherty Misguided Admiral
gametext: Order - Destroy your staffed [E] ship or your staffed [TNG] ship with two or more staffing icons to make all your personnel attributes +3 until the end of this turn. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Drake Voyager Shuttle
Name: Drake Voyager Shuttle
gametext: While you do not command a headquarters mission, you may play this ship at {Caretaker's Array} or at the same mission as your {U.S.S. Voyager}. While you command six or more personnel aboard this ship, it is Range -2. While you command a Temporal event in your core, this ship is Range +3.

name: Chameloid Chicanery
Name: Chameloid Chicanery
gametext: Randomly select a personnel to be stopped. If your opponent has an Infiltrator at this mission, randomly select a personnel to be killed.

name: Vosk Temporal Fanatic
Name: Vosk Temporal Fanatic
Skills: Astrometrics Engineer Exobiology Leadership Officer 2 Treachery
gametext: For each Temporal event in your core, this personnel is attributes +1 (limit +4). When you do not command a Temporal card, place this personnel in his owner's discard pile.

name: Columbia The Second Warp Five Ship
Name: Columbia The Second Warp Five Ship
gametext: While the first mission you completed this game was a space mission, this ship is attributes +1. While a personnel aboard this ship is facing a dilemma, you may discard a card from hand to have that personnel gain Astrometrics or Science until the end of the mission attempt.

name: Thermokinetic Explosion
Name: Thermokinetic Explosion
gametext: Unless you have Astrometrics, Navigation, and Cunning>30 or total ship's attributes>21, place this dilemma on your ship and all your personnel are stopped. Damage - At the start of each of your turns, choose an opponent. That opponent may download a Damage card and place it on this ship.

name: New Discovery
Name: New Discovery
gametext: Plays in your core. When your ship moves from a mission where an opponent has a ship, you may examine the top two dilemmas of that opponent's dilemma pile and replace them in any order.

name: Preventative Ritual
Name: Preventative Ritual
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must command three [Rom] personnel. Order - Reveal the top four cards of an opponent's deck and place one of those cards on the bottom of that deck. Replace the remaining cards in any order on top of that deck.

name: Stadi Focused
Name: Stadi Focused
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may make your [Voy] ship Range +2 until the end of the turn.

name: U.S.S. Yangtzee Kiang Modified Transport
Name: U.S.S. Yangtzee Kiang Modified Transport
gametext: While you command eight or more personnel aboard this ship, it is Range -3. When this ship is about to move between your headquarters mission and a non-headquarters mission, subtract 1 from the Range required. Order - Discard two events from hand to make this ship Range +2 until the end of this turn.

name: Confessions of a Captain
Name: Confessions of a Captain
gametext: Plays in your core. While your [Fed][Voy] Leadership personnel is attempting a mission, you may destroy this event to make him or her gain a skill from a [Fed][Voy] personnel present until the end of this turn.

name: Compassionate Interference
Name: Compassionate Interference
gametext: Randomly select a personnel to be stopped. Unless you reveal a Biology personnel from your hand or reveal a Geology personnel from your hand, that personnel is killed instead.

name: Hull Breach
Name: Hull Breach
gametext: Randomly select a personnel to be stopped. Unless you reveal an Astrometrics personnel from your hand or reveal a Navigation personnel from your hand, that personnel is killed instead.

name: Last Gasp
Name: Last Gasp
gametext: Randomly select a personnel to be stopped. Unless you reveal a Leadership personnel from your hand or reveal an Officer personnel from your hand, that personnel is killed instead.

name: Parallel Course
Name: Parallel Course
gametext: Plays in your core. When your opponent moves from a mission where you have a staffed ship, you may take a dilemma from beneath that mission and return it to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Basso Tromac Smug Subordinate
Name: Basso Tromac Smug Subordinate
gametext: While this personnel is attempting a mission, you may remove a card in your discard pile from the game to add its cost to this personnel's attributes until the end of the mission attempt. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Grebnedlog Pakled Captain
Name: Grebnedlog Pakled Captain
gametext: While present with a non-[NA] personnel, this personnel loses Honor and gains Transporters and Treachery.

name: Lal Beloved
Name: Lal Beloved
gametext: While this personnel is attempting a mission, you may reveal three Androids from hand to make her attributes +4 and gain any two skills until the end of the turn. If you do this, she is killed at the end of this turn. You may only do this once each turn.

name: D'Tan Curious Youth
Name: D'Tan Curious Youth
gametext: When this personnel is stopped by a dilemma, choose an opponent to discard the top card of his or her deck.

name: Charles Tucker III Chief Engineer
Name: Charles Tucker III Chief Engineer
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma and the first mission you completed this game was a space mission, you may stop this personnel to replace all levels of any one skill in that dilemma's requirements with 2 Engineer. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Trager Patrol Ship
Name: Trager Patrol Ship
gametext: When this ship is about to move from an opponent's mission, subtract 2 from the Range required.

name: Krayton Trade Envoy
Name: Krayton Trade Envoy
gametext: Order - If this ship has its Commander aboard it, discard a Rule card from your hand to add the discarded card's cost to the Range of this ship. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Baxial Salvage Ship
Name: Baxial Salvage Ship
gametext: While you do not command a headquarters mission, you may play this ship at {Caretaker's Array} or at the same mission as your {U.S.S. Voyager}. While you have six or more events in your discard pile, this ship is attributes +3.

name: Armed Search Party
Name: Armed Search Party
gametext: Randomly select three personnel. Unless they have Strength>17 or you have a non-Hand Weapon equipment, for each headquarters mission you command, randomly select one of those personnel to be placed in your opponent's brig.

name: Difficult Rescue
Name: Difficult Rescue
gametext: Unless you have Shields + remaining Range>the number of personnel attempting this mission, randomly select a personnel to be killed and all your other personnel are stopped.

name: Psionic Attack
Name: Psionic Attack
gametext: Unless you have Medical and Science or 3 Security, randomly select a personnel to place on the bottom of his or her owner's deck. If that personnel has Anthropology, randomly select an additional personnel and place that personnel on the bottom of his or her owner's deck.

name: Sabotaged Reactor
Name: Sabotaged Reactor
gametext: Unless you have Astrometrics, Engineer, and Navigation or Leadership, Officer, and Cunning>28, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma is placed on your ship. Damage - This ship is Range -2.

name: Joint Operation Drills
Name: Joint Operation Drills
gametext: Your opponent names a skill. For each headquarters mission you command, randomly select a person who has that skill to be stopped.

name: Stand-Off
Name: Stand-Off
gametext: Unless you have Anthropology, Diplomacy, and Honor or Law, Security, and Strength>28, randomly select a Leadership personnel, place him or her in your opponent's brig, and all your other personnel are stopped.

name: Symbalene Blood Burn
Name: Symbalene Blood Burn
gametext: Unless you have Biology, Exobiology, and Medical or Officer, Security, and Strength>28, randomly select four personnel to be stopped and place this dilemma on your ship at this mission. Damage - At the start of each turn, randomly select a personnel on this ship to be killed.

name: Temporal Conduit
Name: Temporal Conduit
gametext: Unless you have 2 Diplomacy and Leadership or Programming, Science, and Transporters, your opponent places this dilemma on one of your completed missions. At the end of each of your turns, your opponent may place a dilemma from beneath one of your other missions beneath this mission.

name: Under Pressure
Name: Under Pressure
gametext: Unless you have Astrometrics, Engineer, and Navigation or Biology, Medical, and Science, randomly select a personnel to be killed. You may randomly select two personnel to be stopped to prevent this.

name: Federation Compression Rifle
Name: Federation Compression Rifle
gametext: While in combat, each of your [Voy] personnel present is Strength +1. While facing a dilemma at a [DQ] mission, each [Voy] Security personnel present is Strength +1.

name: Dark Pursuit
Name: Dark Pursuit
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Rom] personnel. Plays in your core. When the player on your right's personnel begin a mission attempt, you may draw one extra dilemma for each Pursuit card you command.

name: Political Putsch
Name: Political Putsch
gametext: To play this event, you must command two Treachery [Baj] personnel. Plays in your core. When you play this event, remove all events in each player's discard pile from the game. When an event is played, prevent that event and remove it from the game unless that event's owner has an event in his or her discard pile.

name: Rule of Acquisition #16
Name: Rule of Acquisition #16
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Fer] personnel. Plays in your core. At the start of each of your turns, you may destroy this event to spend an additional counter this turn for each card on this event. Order - Stop your [Fer] personnel to place a card from hand on this event.

name: Modified Tricorder
Name: Modified Tricorder
gametext: When your personnel present are facing a dilemma at a [DQ] mission, you may discard a card from hand to make each [Voy] Biology and each [Voy] Science personnel present attributes +1 until the end of that dilemma.

name: Make a Run for It
Name: Make a Run for It
gametext: Plays in your core. If your opponent moves from a mission where you have a ship that has its Commander aboard, place this event on that ship. When your opponent's personnel attempt this mission, you may draw an extra dilemma and spend one extra on dilemmas.

name: Starting Over
Name: Starting Over
gametext: Count the number of cards in your hand and discard your hand to draw an equal number of cards. Then, if you command a Borg personnel, draw two additional cards. Destroy this event.

name: The Spirit of Kahless
Name: The Spirit of Kahless
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin combat involving your [Kli] Honor personnel. If you win, the opponent on your left places the top two dilemmas of his or her dilemma pile beneath one of your non-headquarters missions.

name: And Raise You
Name: And Raise You
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must command three [Voy] personnel. When your personnel begin a mission attempt, make an opponent reveal the top three cards of his or her dilemma pile. Then replace those dilemmas in the same order. You may then make that opponent shuffle his or her dilemma pile.

name: Fajo's Menagerie
Name: Fajo's Menagerie
gametext: Order - Download an equipment card, then draw a card for each non-Hand Weapon equipment you command.

name: Kira Nerys Blockade Commander
Name: Kira Nerys Blockade Commander
gametext: While this personnel is aboard your {Kitara}, that ship is attributes +2.

name: Zayra Bigoted Witness
Name: Zayra Bigoted Witness
gametext: While this personnel is present with your non-[Baj] personnel, he cannot use his skills.

name: Baxter Wandering Security Officer
Name: Baxter Wandering Security Officer
gametext: When this personnel is placed in his owner's discard pile from play, you may take an event from your discard pile into your hand.

name: Joe Carey Next In Line
Name: Joe Carey Next In Line
gametext: While this personnel is attempting a mission, if there are three or less dilemmas beneath that mission, he is attributes +1.

name: Macet Skeptical Commander
Name: Macet Skeptical Commander
gametext: While this personnel is aboard your {Trager} and this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may meet Diplomacy and Honor requirements of that dilemma using Treachery instead.

name: Umat'Adan Eager Fifth
Name: Umat'Adan Eager Fifth
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, return your non-Alpha Jem'Hadar present to its owner's hand to make this personnel attributes +2 until the end of that dilemma.

name: Andreas Colter
Name: Andreas Colter
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, each of your Security personnel present is Strength +1.

name: Cavit Apprehensive First Officer
Name: Cavit Apprehensive First Officer
gametext: While this personnel is attempting a [DQ] mission, you may make him attributes +3 until the end of the turn. If you do this and fail this mission attempt, kill this personnel. Otherwise he is stopped. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Kenneth Dalby Insubordinate Crewman
Name: Kenneth Dalby Insubordinate Crewman
gametext: At the start of each of your turns, you may examine the top card of an opponent's deck. You may choose to place that card on the bottom of its owner's deck.

name: Kosinski Arrogant Engineer
Name: Kosinski Arrogant Engineer
Skills: Astrometrics Engineer Navigation Physics Programming Science Transporters
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, he is Cunning -2 and loses Astrometrics and Navigation.

name: Larson Security Team Member
Name: Larson Security Team Member
Skills: Archaeology Geology Physics Science Security Transporters
gametext: When your [Voy] personnel present is stopped, stop this personnel.

name: Lyndsay Ballard Back From the Dead
Name: Lyndsay Ballard Back From the Dead
Skills: Astrometrics Honor Navigation Physics Programming Science
gametext: While this personnel is facing the last dilemma on your opponent's dilemma stack, you may kill her to make each [Voy] personnel present attributes +1 until the end of this turn.

name: Marie Kaplan Observant Officer
Name: Marie Kaplan Observant Officer
gametext: While this personnel is at a [DQ] mission, she gains Biology and Medical.

name: Marquay
Name: Marquay
gametext: While this personnel is attempting a mission, if there are three or more dilemmas overcome beneath that mission, he gains Security and Treachery.

name: Rachel Garrett Displaced Captain
Name: Rachel Garrett Displaced Captain
Skills: Astrometrics Diplomacy Leadership Navigation Officer Transporters
gametext: When this personnel is stopped by a dilemma, randomly return one of your personnel present to his or her owner's hand.

name: Samantha Wildman First Mother on Voyager

name: Quark Little Green Man

name: Jadzia Dax The Second Heart

name: K'Temoc Long Slumbering Commander
Name: K'Temoc Long Slumbering Commander

name: Kes Curious Ocampa

name: Neelix Morale Officer
Name: Neelix Morale Officer

name: Shran Reluctant Diplomat

name: Tam Elbrun Prodigal Telepath
Name: Tam Elbrun Prodigal Telepath

name: Thon
Name: Thon
gametext: Order - If you do not command a completed space mission, discard a random card from your hand to place your ship this personnel is aboard at your incomplete space mission. You may do this once each turn.

name: The Viceroy Advisor to the Praetor
Name: The Viceroy Advisor to the Praetor
gametext: When an opponent plays an event, you may discard a Romulan from hand to download an event. You may only do this once each turn.

name: Cochrane Voyager Shuttle
Name: Cochrane Voyager Shuttle
gametext: While you do not command a headquarters mission, you may play this ship at {Caretaker's Array} or at the same mission as your {U.S.S. Voyager}. While you command six or more personnel aboard this ship, it is Range -2. This ship is attributes +1 for each Navigation personnel aboard.

name: U.S.S. Enterprise-C Yesterday's Enterprise
Name: U.S.S. Enterprise-C Yesterday's Enterprise
gametext: When you complete a [Kli] mission, if this ship is at that mission, score 5 points.

name: U.S.S. Enterprise-E Flagship of the Federation
Name: U.S.S. Enterprise-E Flagship of the Federation
gametext: When you play this ship, for each [TNG] Leadership personnel at this mission, this ship is cost -1. Order - Stop your [Fed] Diplomacy personnel aboard this ship and return your event with no cards on it to its owner's hand to have each opponent return one of his or her events with no cards on it to its owner's hand.

name: I.K.S. T'Ong Sleeper Ship
Name: I.K.S. T'Ong Sleeper Ship
gametext: When you win an engagement with this ship and its Commander is aboard it, you may place a [Kli] personnel from hand aboard this ship.

name: Jovis Museum
Name: Jovis Museum
gametext: While you have more Artifacts in your core than any opponent, each Treachery personnel aboard this ship is attributes +1.

name: Mondor Far From Home
Name: Mondor Far From Home
gametext: While you have its Commander aboard it, this ship is attributes +1 for each non-[NA] personnel aboard. (limit +4)

name: Accelerated Aging
Name: Accelerated Aging
gametext: Place this dilemma on this mission. Each personnel at this mission cannot use their first-listed skill. At the end of this mission attempt, this dilemma is overcome.

name: Destined Journey
Name: Destined Journey
gametext: Choose a personnel who has Honor or Leadership to be stopped. If that personnel has both Honor and Leadership, you may unstop your stopped personnel present and that personnel joins the mission attempt. If you cannot choose a personnel with Honor or Leadership, all your personnel are stopped.

name: Final Triumph
Name: Final Triumph
gametext: Unless you choose to discard an event from your hand, your opponent chooses a personnel to be stopped.

name: Blow You Out of the Stars
Name: Blow You Out of the Stars
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Begin an engagement involving your [Kli] personnel. If you win, place this event on an opponent's ship involved. That opponent may place one of his or her unique personnel involved in your brig to prevent this and destroy this event. If you do not win, destroy this event. Damage - This ship is attributes -2.

name: Cellular Peptide Cake
Name: Cellular Peptide Cake
Keywords: Replicate - Discard an event from your hand.
gametext: To play this event, you must command a Klingon. Each player returns a non-[Ref] event in an opponent's core to its owner's hand. Destroy this event.

name: Khan!
Name: Khan!
gametext: When an opponent scores 5 or more points, if he or she has not completed a mission, he or she loses 5 points.

name: Genesis Planet
Name: Genesis Planet
Affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.
Skills: Geology, Cunning>42 and (Biology, 2 Exobiology and 2 Science or 2 Security, Transporters and 2 Treachery)
gametext: Order - If this mission is completed, lose 5 points to make this a space mission. Kill all personnel (and destroy all equipment) on this mission.

name: Kira Nerys Outspoken Major
Name: Kira Nerys Outspoken Major
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, each [Baj] personnel present is attributes +1 and gains Honor.

name: Subterranean Barrier
Name: Subterranean Barrier
gametext: Unless you have Biology, Exobiology, Geology and Integrity>25 or Diplomacy, Leadership, Officer and Cunning>32, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: The Caretaker's "Guests"
Name: The Caretaker's "Guests"
gametext: Your opponent chooses a personnel. You may replace him or her with any one personnel of the same affiliation from your discard pile. Place the personnel your opponent chose on the top of his or her owner's deck.

name: Learning Curve
Name: Learning Curve
gametext: Plays in your core. At the end of each of your turns, if you played two or more [Maq] personnel this turn, place two cards from the top of your deck on this event. You may play cards from this event as though there were in your hand.

name: No-Win Situation
Name: No-Win Situation
gametext: Plays in your core. When your dilemma is prevented or its requirements are met, randomly select an opponent's personnel that was facing that dilemma to be stopped.

name: The Genesis Effect
Name: The Genesis Effect
gametext: Plays on your mission. When you play this event, name a dilemma. When your personnel face that dilemma at this mission, prevent and overcome it.

name: Jasad
Name: Jasad
gametext: While this personnel is aboard your [Car] ship, that ship is attributes +1 for each of your different Capture cards and each of your different Punishment cards.

name: James T. Kirk Original Thinker
Name: James T. Kirk Original Thinker

name: Spock Trainee Instructor
Name: Spock Trainee Instructor

gametext: When a Damage card is about to be placed on your ship that this personnel is aboard, you may kill him to remove it from the game instead.

name: Tom Paris "Starfleet Observer"
Name: Tom Paris "Starfleet Observer"
gametext: When this personnel is stopped by a dilemma, you may discard a card from hand to choose one: draw two cards; or take a [Maq] personnel from your discard pile into your hand.

name: Tuvok Undercover
Name: Tuvok Undercover
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma and you have a [Maq] personnel present, this personnel is attributes +1 and gains Intelligence.

name: Kruge Instinctive Commander
Name: Kruge Instinctive Commander
gametext: When you win an engagement involving this personnel and there are two or less personnel aboard an opponent's ship involved, you may remove a damage event from that ship to place those personnel in your brig. You now command that ship (it is now a [Kli] ship).

name: David Marcus Young Scientist
Name: David Marcus Young Scientist
gametext: When this personnel is stopped by a dilemma, you may destroy an event in your core (if you do not, lose 5 points instead).

Name: U.S.S. Enterprise Earth's Savior

name: Psychokinetic Control
Name: Psychokinetic Control
gametext: Place this dilemma on this mission. Each personnel at this mission loses each skill he or she has gained. Each personnel cannot gain skills. Each personnel cannot increase his or her attributes. At the end of this mission attempt, this dilemma is overcome.

name: Barrier's Effect
Name: Barrier's Effect
gametext: Choose a unique personnel to be attributes +3 until the end of this mission attempt. At the end of this mission attempt, place that personnel and an event in your core in their owner's discard piles.

name: Mark of Gideon
Name: Mark of Gideon
gametext: Randomly select a personnel to be stopped. If you still have nine personnel remaining, return that personnel to his or her owner's hand, then your opponent chooses a second personnel to return to his or her owner's hand. If you still have ten personnel remaining, your opponent chooses a third personnel to return to his or her owner's hand.

name: Final Cry
Name: Final Cry
gametext: Plays in your core. When your [TOS] personnel is about to be killed by a dilemma, you may discard three [TOS] cards (or a [TOS] personnel who costs 4 or more) from hand to stop him or her instead.

name: Driven
Name: Driven
gametext: When your [TOS] Officer is facing a dilemma, discard a [TOS] Officer from hand to choose one: he or she is attributes +5 until the end of that dilemma; or he or she gains a skill of your choice until the end of that dilemma.

Name: Earth Lush and Beautiful Home

Name: Navigate Argolis Cluster

name: Angela Martine

name: Excalbian Drama
Name: Excalbian Drama
gametext: When your opponent reveals this dilemma, he or she may discard any number of cards from hand. For each card discarded this way, add 5 Integrity to this dilemma's requirements. Unless you have Integrity>30, all your personnel are stopped.

name: Fesarius Bluff
Name: Fesarius Bluff
gametext: When your opponent reveals this dilemma, he or she may discard any number of cards from hand. For each card discarded this way, add 5 Cunning to this dilemma's requirements. Unless you have Cunning>30, all your personnel are stopped.

gametext: Randomly select three personnel. If the total cost of those personnel is 4 or less, they are stopped and this dilemma is placed in your core. Otherwise, randomly select one of those personnel to be stopped. When you play a non-unique personnel, he or she is cost +1.

name: Evans
Name: Evans
gametext: You may play this personnel at cost +2 to download {Final Cry} or a [TOS] Security personnel.

name: Keras Creature of Duty
Name: Keras Creature of Duty

name: Khod Conniving Captain
Name: Khod Conniving Captain
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you command two [Pa] Klingons, this personnel is cost -2. While this personnel is facing a space dilemma, you may exclude him from any random selections.

name: Kras Merciless Officer
Name: Kras Merciless Officer
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you command two [Pa] Klingons, this personnel is cost -2. While this personnel is facing a planet dilemma, you may exclude him from any random selections.

name: U.S.S. Enterprise Beautiful Lady
Name: U.S.S. Enterprise Beautiful Lady
gametext: To play this ship, you must command four [TOS] personnel. You may play this ship at cost +4 to score 5 points.

name: Neural Transceiver
Name: Neural Transceiver
gametext: When one of your unique [Bor] personnel is facing a dilemma, discard a card from the top of your deck to give him or her a skill that one of your personnel has until the end of the turn.

name: Montgomery Scott Chief Engineer
Name: Montgomery Scott Chief Engineer
gametext: You may play this personnel at cost +1 to place any number of cards from your hand on the bottom of your deck in any order and draw an equal number of cards.

name: Charvanek Neutral Zone Commander
Name: Charvanek Neutral Zone Commander
gametext: When you play this personnel, reveal an opponent's hand. For each personnel revealed, this personnel is cost -1. When this personnel is an eligible target for a random selection, you may choose one: exclude her from that selection; or exclude a [Pa][Rom] personnel present from that selection.

name: Three of Nine Tactician Drone
Name: Three of Nine Tactician Drone
gametext: Order - Place this personnel on the bottom of her owner's deck and discard four cards from the top of your deck to take up to four cards from your discard pile and shuffle them into your deck.

name: Benjamin Sisko Command Staffer
Name: Benjamin Sisko Command Staffer
gametext: You may play this personnel aboard your [TOS] ship. When an opponent plays an interrupt, if this personnel is present with three [Pa] personnel, you may return this personnel to his owner's hand to prevent that interrupt and place it in its owner's discard pile.

name: Amanda Cole
Name: Amanda Cole
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, if your [SF] Engineer and MACO are present with her, she is attributes +2 and gains Engineer and Programming.

name: Arena
Name: Arena
gametext: Randomly select a personnel. Unless that personnel has total attributes>18, your opponent places him or her on a planet mission.

name: Bashir Founder Imperturbable Infiltrator
Name: Bashir Founder Imperturbable Infiltrator
gametext: While you command two Founders, you may play this personnel at cost +2 aboard an opponent's ship. If you do this, that opponent now commands him. While you command but do not own this personnel, each of your personnel is attributes -1 (even if this personnel is stopped).

name: Distress Call
Name: Distress Call
gametext: This dilemma is cost -3 for each mission you have completed. All your personnel are stopped.

name: Neural Parasites
Name: Neural Parasites
gametext: This dilemma is cost +3 for each mission you have completed. For each headquarters mission you command, your opponent chooses a personnel to be killed.

name: Not Easily Avoided
Name: Not Easily Avoided
gametext: Plays in your core. When you are about to draw dilemmas, you may discard two cards (or an equipment) from hand to search your dilemma pile, choose a dilemma, and place it aside. Then shuffle and replace your dilemma pile and place that dilemma on top of your dilemma pile.

name: B'Elanna Torres Chief Engineer
Name: B'Elanna Torres Chief Engineer
gametext: Order - Discard an equipment, event, or ship from hand to draw two cards. You may do this only once each turn.

name: James T. Kirk Highly-Decorated Captain
Name: James T. Kirk Highly-Decorated Captain
gametext: You may play this personnel at cost +3 to download two cards. Those cards must be [TOS], Assault, Maneuver, Pursuit, or Temporal cards.

name: Leonard H. McCoy Chief Medical Officer
Name: Leonard H. McCoy Chief Medical Officer
gametext: You may play this personnel at cost +3 to take two dilemmas you own from beneath an opponent's mission and return them to your dilemma pile.

name: Mark Piper
Name: Mark Piper
gametext: You may play this personnel at cost +2 to take a [TOS] personnel from your discard pile and place him or her on the bottom of his or her owner's deck.

name: Mathews

name: Vian Test
Name: Vian Test

name: Casualties
Name: Casualties
gametext: The personnel who has the fewest [SD] icons is stopped. If that personnel does not have at least four [SD] icons, he or she is killed instead.

name: Swashbuckler at Heart
Name: Swashbuckler at Heart
gametext: Reveal your hand and place each interrupt revealed this way on top of your deck in any order. Your opponent draws up to two cards.

name: Vault of Tomorrow
Name: Vault of Tomorrow
gametext: Your opponent searches his or her dilemma pile and chooses a dilemma that has a cost of 2 or less to place on top of his or her dilemma stack. Then your opponent shuffles his or her dilemma pile and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Tox Uthat
Name: Tox Uthat
gametext: While your personnel present is facing a dilemma, you may place this equipment on the bottom of your deck to end your mission attempt. That dilemma and all remaining dilemmas in the dilemma stack are returned to their owner's dilemma pile.

name: Seven of Nine Efficient Analyst
Name: Seven of Nine Efficient Analyst
gametext: Order - Examine the top two cards of your deck. Replace those cards in any order. Order - Exchange a card in hand with the top card of your deck.

name: Christine Chapel Medical Assistant
Name: Christine Chapel Medical Assistant
gametext: You may play this personnel at cost +2 to take a [TOS] personnel from your discard pile into hand.

name: Palmer
Name: Palmer

name: Uhura Skilled Technician
Name: Uhura Skilled Technician
gametext: You may play this personnel at cost +2 to choose one: download an interrupt; or take an interrupt from your discard pile and shuffle it into your deck.

name: Cascade Virus
Name: Cascade Virus
gametext: To play this interrupt you must command {Athos IV} and three [Maq] personnel. When an opponent is about to play a non-unique personnel or a personnel who costs 2 or less, prevent that and place the personnel in its owner's discard pile.

name: Gav Diplomat
Name: Gav Diplomat

name: Hideaki Chang Conscientious Corporal

name: Jeremiah Hayes Diligent Major
Name: Jeremiah Hayes Diligent Major

name: Sean Hawkins

gametext: When your [SF] personnel present is about to be killed by a dilemma, you may stop this personnel and your MACO present to prevent that.

name: Spock Science Officer

name: George Stocker Starbase Commodore

name: U.S.S. Constellation Dead Hulk
Name: U.S.S. Constellation Dead Hulk
