name: Grav-Plating Trap
Name: Grav-Plating Trap
gametext: When an event or interrupt is played, destroy one of your non-Hand Weapon equipment to prevent that event or interrupt and place it in its owner's discard pile. Order - Destroy one of your non-Hand Weapon equipment to destroy an event.

name: Khan Noonien Singh Bold Man
Name: Khan Noonien Singh Bold Man
gametext: This personnel is the corresponding Commander of your unique ship that he is aboard.

name: Dominion Hierarchy
Name: Dominion Hierarchy
gametext: When your Vorta is facing a dilemma, if he or she is present with a Changeling and a Jem'Hadar, he or she is attributes +2 and gains a skill of your choice until the end of that mission attempt.

name: Gangster's Welcome
Name: Gangster's Welcome
gametext: Unless you have Law and 2 Leadership or 2 Officer and 2 Security, randomly select a personnel to be killed and your opponent may destroy up to two events in your core.

name: Gorgan
Name: Gorgan
gametext: Your opponent discards a card from his or her hand. Unless you discard a card from hand that has an equal or greater cost than that card, all your personnel are stopped.

name: Lawgivers
Name: Lawgivers
gametext: For each headquarters mission you command, your opponent chooses a personnel to be stopped. Each [NA] personnel stopped this way is returned to his or her owner's hand.

name: Condition Red
Name: Condition Red
gametext: Plays in your core. Each of your [Stf] personnel loses [Stf] and gains [Cmd]. At the start of each of your turns, if an opponent commands more ships than you, you may discard a card from hand to download a non-unique ship.

name: Discovered
Name: Discovered
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Rom] personnel. Search an opponent's deck and place up to two of those cards in that opponent's discard pile. Those cards cannot be personnel or ships. Then that opponent shuffles and replaces his or her deck. Remove this event from the game.

name: Trelane's Trial
Name: Trelane's Trial
gametext: Choose a personnel that does not have an attributes>6 to be stopped. If you cannot, for each headquarters mission you command, randomly select a personnel to be killed.

name: Obstacle to Opportunity
Name: Obstacle to Opportunity
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Fer] personnel. Plays in your core. When you play an Acquisition personnel, you may discard a card from hand to choose an opponent and examine the top card of his or her dilemma pile. Place that dilemma on the top or bottom of that dilemma pile.

name: Rule of Acquisition #18
Name: Rule of Acquisition #18
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Fer] personnel. Plays in your core. At the start of each of your turns, you may destroy this event to spend four additional counters this turn.

name: The Circle
Name: The Circle
gametext: To play this event, you must command {Bajor} and no other headquarters missions. Plays in your core. While an opponent has seven or more personnel in his or her discard pile, you may spend 2 additional counters during your turn.

name: You Have a Disease
Name: You Have a Disease
gametext: Plays in your core. When your unique [Bor] personnel uses a skill to meet a requirement on a dilemma or mission, you may choose an opponent to discard a card from hand. Then you may draw a card for each headquarters mission that opponent commands. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Mullibok Gnarled and Battered Old Tree
Name: Mullibok Gnarled and Battered Old Tree
gametext: When you have ten or more cards in your discard pile, this personnel cannot be killed or stopped by dilemmas.

name: Four of Nine Heuristics Drone
Name: Four of Nine Heuristics Drone
gametext: Order - Place this personnel on the bottom of his owner's deck to download two unique [Bor] personnel.

name: Two of Nine Transtator Drone
Name: Two of Nine Transtator Drone
gametext: Order - Place this personnel on the bottom of his owner's deck to choose one: destroy an event; download a card that has a cost of 5 or more; or draw three cards.

name: Oran Irritable Gul
Name: Oran Irritable Gul
gametext: When you play this personnel, this personnel and a unique personnel present gain any one skill of your choice until the end of this turn.

name: Krajensky Founder Adversary
Name: Krajensky Founder Adversary
gametext: When personnel the opponent on your right commands attempts this mission, if this mission has two or more dilemmas overcome beneath it, you may draw two extra dilemmas and spend two extra in total cost on dilemmas.

name: Lovok Founder Effective Changeling
Name: Lovok Founder Effective Changeling
gametext: While this personnel is not present with your personnel, an opponent cannot take command of, capture, or kill him.

name: Areel Shaw
Name: Areel Shaw
gametext: You may play this personnel at cost +2 to examine a number of cards from the top of your deck equal to the number of [TOS] personnel you command who have Honor or Officer. Take one of those cards into hand and shuffle the rest into your deck.

name: Bejal Otner Wormhole Theorist
Name: Bejal Otner Wormhole Theorist
gametext: You may play this personnel at [HQ] {Mouth of the Wormhole}. When this personnel uses a skill to complete a [GQ] mission, score 5 points. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Carolyn Palamas
Name: Carolyn Palamas
gametext: You may play this personnel at cost +2 to reveal the top card of your deck. If that card's cost is odd, you may subtract one from the number of dilemmas your opponent may draw this turn. Otherwise, add one to the number of dilemmas your opponent may draw this turn.

name: Chakotay First Officer
Name: Chakotay First Officer
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may discard two cards from hand to download two [Voy] Treachery personnel and place each where he or she could be played.

name: Gary Mitchell Godlike Mutant
Name: Gary Mitchell Godlike Mutant
gametext: You may play this personnel at cost +1 to make him attributes +5 and gain Telepathy and Treachery until the end of this turn.

name: Julian Bashir Medical Staffer
Name: Julian Bashir Medical Staffer
gametext: You may play this personnel aboard your [TOS] ship. At the start of each of your turns, you may take a personnel in your discard pile and place that personnel on the bottom of your deck. When you do this, each opponent may do the same with his or her discard pile and deck.

name: Orfil Quinteros
Name: Orfil Quinteros
gametext: When you play this personnel, each player chooses one: download a non-unique ship; draw two cards; shuffle his or her deck; or shuffle his or her dilemma pile.

name: Krax Arrogant Heir
Name: Krax Arrogant Heir
gametext: When your [Fer] Leadership personnel is killed by a dilemma, you may make this personnel attributes +3 and have him gain a skill of your choice until the end of the turn.

name: Kang Vigilant Commander
Name: Kang Vigilant Commander
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you command two [Pa] Klingons, this personnel is cost -2. While facing a dilemma, each of your Klingons present is Integrity +2.

name: Kor Courageous Governor
Name: Kor Courageous Governor
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you command two [Pa] Klingons, this personnel is cost -2. While facing a dilemma, each of your Klingons present is Strength +1.

name: Korax Instigator
Name: Korax Instigator
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you command two [Pa] Klingons, this personnel is cost -1. This personnel is Strength +1 for each [Pa][Kli] personnel present.

name: Mara Science Officer
Name: Mara Science Officer
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you command two [Pa] Klingons, this personnel is cost -2. When you play a [Pa][Kli] personnel, you may discard a [Pa] card from hand to download an interrupt.

name: Dukat Pah-Wraith Puppet
Name: Dukat Pah-Wraith Puppet
gametext: While you have no cards in your discard pile, this personnel is Cunning +4, Strength +4, and cannot be killed by dilemmas. Order - Examine and remove two cards in a player's discard pile from the game. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Koloth Ingratiating Captain
Name: Koloth Ingratiating Captain
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you command two [Pa] Klingons, this personnel is cost -2. While facing a dilemma, each of your Klingons present is Cunning +2.

name: Gem
Name: Gem
gametext: When this personnel begins a mission attempt, you may remove her from the game to name a dilemma and choose an opponent to remove a copy of that dilemma in his or her dilemma pile from the game. That opponent shuffles and replaces his or her dilemma pile.

name: T'Auethn Obedient Centurion
Name: T'Auethn Obedient Centurion
gametext: When you play this personnel, reveal an opponent's hand. For each event revealed, this personnel is cost -1. Then you may choose a non-ship card revealed and remove it from the game. Order - Kill this personnel to discard a card from hand.

name: Delta Flyer Innovative Vessel
Name: Delta Flyer Innovative Vessel
gametext: While you do not command a headquarters mission, you may play this ship at the same mission as your {U.S.S. Voyager}. Personnel aboard this ship cannot attempt missions.

name: D-7 Battlecruiser
Name: D-7 Battlecruiser
gametext: To play this ship, you must command two [Pa][Kli] personnel.

name: Gal Gath'thong Pride of the Praetor
Name: Gal Gath'thong Pride of the Praetor
gametext: To play this ship, you must command two [Pa][Rom] personnel. When you move this ship from an opponent's mission, if this ship's Commander is aboard, that opponent must discard two cards from hand (limit two cards per turn).

name: James T. Kirk Brutal Barbarian
Name: James T. Kirk Brutal Barbarian
gametext: While you command an [AU] personnel, you may play this personnel at cost +2 to have him gain any skill of your choice and make each of your [AU] personnel attributes +1 until the end of this turn.

name: Spock Man of Integrity
Name: Spock Man of Integrity
gametext: While you command an [AU] personnel, you may play this personnel at cost +2 to make each player place a personnel from hand on a headquarters mission where that personnel could be played.

name: Predicament
Name: Predicament
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [AU] personnel. Plays in your core. When a personnel that the player on your right commands begins a mission attempt, you may destroy this event to draw three extra dilemmas and spend three extra in total cost on dilemmas.

name: Bigger Tattoo
Name: Bigger Tattoo
gametext: Plays in your core. When you draw dilemmas, if your opponent's personnel is attempting a space mission, you may remove a planet dilemma you have drawn from the game to draw two additional dilemmas. When you draw dilemmas, if your opponent's personnel is attempting a planet mission, you may remove a space dilemma you have drawn from the game to draw two additional dilemmas.

name: Sabotaged Transporter
Name: Sabotaged Transporter
gametext: Plays in your core. When a personnel is stopped by a dilemma you own, you may discard a personnel who has a cost of 4 or more from hand to kill that personnel.

name: Revised Janeway Cold-Blooded Killer
Name: Revised Janeway Cold-Blooded Killer
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may discard a card titled {Kathryn Janeway} or Revised Janeway from hand to make her Cunning +5 and Strength +5 until the end of that dilemma.

name: Investigate Derelict
Name: Investigate Derelict
Affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.
Skills: Engineer, Exobiology, Navigation, Security, and Cunning>35
gametext: When you complete this mission, if an opponent has had more turns than you have, restore all Range of your ship at this mission used this turn.

name: Slar Gorn Slave Master
Name: Slar Gorn Slave Master
gametext: This personnel is Cunning +1 and Strength +1 for each [AU] personnel present.

name: These Are The Voyages
Name: These Are The Voyages
gametext: Draw a number of cards equal to the cost of one of your personnel, then place three cards from hand on the bottom of your deck in any order. Destroy this event.

name: Pran Thot
Name: Pran Thot
Skills: Engineer Leadership Medical Navigation Officer Physics
gametext: When you play this personnel, each player discards any number of cards from hand that have a total cost of 4 or more. If a player cannot, he or she discards his or her entire hand.

name: Interphasic Effects
Name: Interphasic Effects
gametext: Unless you have an [AU] personnel, randomly select a personnel to be killed and your opponent may choose an event to destroy.

name: Lwaxana Troi Extravagant Ambassador
Name: Lwaxana Troi Extravagant Ambassador
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you command three [Fed] personnel, she is cost -5.

name: Tuvok Coldly Logical Soldier
Name: Tuvok Coldly Logical Soldier
gametext: When you download a card, if you command an [AU] personnel and you have not downloaded a card titled Tuvok this turn, you may also download this personnel. (This ability may be used while this personnel is in your deck.)

name: Paranoid Escape
Name: Paranoid Escape
gametext: Place this dilemma on this mission. Randomly select a personnel to be removed from the game. You cannot play cards that have the same title as that personnel. When you complete this mission, put the personnel removed from the game in his or her owner's hand and this dilemma is overcome.

name: Revised Paris Female Ensign Chaser
Name: Revised Paris Female Ensign Chaser
gametext: Order - Discard a card titled {Tom Paris} or Revised Paris from hand to make each of your [Fut][Voy] Holograms gain [Cmd] until the end of this turn. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Defiant Mirror Warship
Name: Defiant Mirror Warship
gametext: To play this ship, you must command three [AU] personnel. When you play this ship, you may discard any number of cards from hand. This ship is cost -1 for each card discarded this way.

name: Gint The First Grand Nagus
Name: Gint The First Grand Nagus
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you command an Acquisition personnel, he is cost -3. While you command four cards that have a cost of four or more, you may spend an additional counter each turn.

name: Brennan Scott
Name: Brennan Scott
gametext: This personnel is attributes -1 for each card in your hand.

name: Hikaru Sulu Savage Security Chief
Name: Hikaru Sulu Savage Security Chief
gametext: While you command an [AU] personnel, you may play this personnel at cost +1 to draw a card for each of your [TOS] Treachery personnel, then place the same number of cards from hand on the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: T'Pol Not a Slave
Name: T'Pol Not a Slave
Skills: Anthropology Astrometrics Engineer Leadership Officer Programming Science
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you command an Officer personnel, this personnel is cost -1. While you have no cards in hand, this personnel is attributes +1.

name: Rom Professional Soldier
Name: Rom Professional Soldier
gametext: When this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may exchange two cards in hand with an interrupt beneath your {Ferenginar}. You may do this only once each dilemma.

name: Chula: The Dice
Name: Chula: The Dice
gametext: Unless you have a personnel with Integrity>6, a second personnel with Cunning>6, and a third personnel with Strength>6, all your personnel are stopped.

name: U.S.S. Enterprise-D Battleship
Name: U.S.S. Enterprise-D Battleship
gametext: When you win an engagement involving this ship, you may score 5 points.

name: Farrell
Name: Farrell
gametext: While you command an [AU] personnel, you may play this personnel at cost +2 to make each player download a unique personnel.

name: Crew Advancement
Name: Crew Advancement
gametext: Your opponent names an attributes (Integrity, Cunning, or Strength). Your personnel with the highest named attribute is stopped.

name: Montgomery Scott Uncivilized Engineer
Name: Montgomery Scott Uncivilized Engineer
gametext: While you command an [AU] personnel, you may play this personnel at cost +2 to make each player destroy an event he or she commands.

name: Brutal Experiments
Name: Brutal Experiments
gametext: When any number of your [AU] personnel facing a dilemma are about to be killed, destroy a non-Hand Weapon equipment present to prevent that. Those personnel are stopped instead.

name: Call to Arms
Name: Call to Arms
gametext: Plays in your core. When you win combat or an engagement involving two of your personnel who both have a cost of 4 or more, score 10 points.

name: Kira Nerys Resourceful Prisoner
Name: Kira Nerys Resourceful Prisoner
Skills: Anthropology Diplomacy Intelligence Law Leadership Transporters 2 Treachery
gametext: At the start of each of your turns, if this personnel is in your discard pile or an opponent's brig, you may remove an [AU] personnel in your discard pile from the game to place this personnel on a headquarters mission where she could be played.

name: Odo Efficient Overseer
Name: Odo Efficient Overseer
gametext: While this personnel is attempting a mission, you may kill one of your personnel to make him gain a skill on a personnel in your discard pile who has a cost of 4 or more until the end of that mission attempt.

name: Mardel Overseer
Name: Mardel Overseer
Skills: Anthropology Engineer Geology Physics Security Treachery
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may discard a personnel from hand to add his or her cost to this personnel's attributes until the end of that dilemma.

name: Elim Garak Crafty Underling
Name: Elim Garak Crafty Underling
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you command a Treachery personnel, he is cost -1. While this personnel is attempting a mission, you may discard an [AU] card from hand to make him gain a skill of your choice until the end of that mission attempt.

name: Phoenix Risen From the Ashes
Name: Phoenix Risen From the Ashes
gametext: While this ship is at a non-headquarters mission and does not have a Damage marker on it, each of your opponents needs an additional 10 points to win the game.

name: Maximilian Forrest Confident Captain
Name: Maximilian Forrest Confident Captain
Skills: Archaeology Biology Law Leadership Navigation Officer Transporters Treachery
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, if you have no cards in hand, he cannot be placed in an opponent's brig or killed.

name: I.S.S. Enterprise Terran Flagship
Name: I.S.S. Enterprise Terran Flagship
gametext: To play this ship, you must command three [AU] personnel. You do not need to spend all your counters on your turns. While you have no cards in your hand, this ship is Range +2.

name: Nog Bar Owner
Name: Nog Bar Owner
gametext: While you have six or more cards in hand, this personnel is attributes +3. While you command more events than an opponent, if you command {Ferenginar}, that opponent's events cannot destroy your events.

name: Brunt Nice Guy
Name: Brunt Nice Guy
Skills: Archaeology Engineer Honor Medical Navigation Programming Security
gametext: When you play this personnel, choose one: download an [AU] personnel; or download a [Fer] ship.

name: Call of the Nagus
Name: Call of the Nagus
gametext: Download three [Fer] personnel. Choose an opponent to select two of those personnel to be placed beneath your Ferenginar (discard them if you do not command Ferenginar). Then place the other personnel in your hand. Destroy this event.

name: Strange New Worlds
Name: Strange New Worlds
gametext: Plays on an opponent's mission. Replace this mission's requirements (and alternate requirements in game text) with Anthropology, Diplomacy, Law, and Integrity>32.

name: Data From the City of Rateg
Name: Data From the City of Rateg
gametext: Order - Name a dilemma. While this personnel is facing that dilemma, he cannot be killed or stopped. This effect lasts until this order is executed again.

name: Fractured Time
Name: Fractured Time
gametext: Randomly select nine personnel. All your other personnel are removed from the game.

name: Deyos Ruthless Administrator
Name: Deyos Ruthless Administrator
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you command a Vorta, this personnel is cost -1. While this personnel is attempting a mission, you may meet Integrity and Strength requirements with Cunning instead.

name: Tykk
Name: Tykk
gametext: You may play Breen personnel aboard this ship. When a Breen personnel aboard this ship is involved in an engagement you win, you may place a [Dom] personnel with a cost of 4 or more from hand aboard this ship.

name: Seasoned Leader
Name: Seasoned Leader
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [AU][SF] personnel. Plays in your core. When you play a personnel who has a cost of 4 or more, you may choose one: draw a card; download a [SF] Leadership personnel; or shuffle two cards from hand into their owner's deck.

name: Aftereffects
Name: Aftereffects
gametext: Randomly select three personnel. If the total cost of those personnel is 5 or less, they are killed. Otherwise, randomly select one of those personnel to be stopped.

name: Preventative Repercussions
Name: Preventative Repercussions
gametext: Randomly select three personnel. If the total cost of those personnel is 5 or less, they are killed. Otherwise, randomly select one of those personnel to be stopped.

name: Dangerous Missions
Name: Dangerous Missions
gametext: Place this dilemma on this mission. Each personnel who has a cost of 2 or less cannot use his or her skills while facing dilemmas. At the end of this turn, this dilemma is overcome.

name: Worf Defiant Commander
Name: Worf Defiant Commander
gametext: Each of your personnel present who has a cost of 4 or more is attributes +1.

name: Phlox Sadistic Physiologist
Name: Phlox Sadistic Physiologist
Skills: Biology Engineer 2 Exobiology Medical Science 2 Treachery
gametext: Order - If you have no cards in hand, each opponent must kill one of his or her non-unique personnel. You may do this only once each turn.

name: U.S.S. Lakota Modified Starship
Name: U.S.S. Lakota Modified Starship
gametext: This ship is attributes +2 for each corresponding Commander aboard it.

name: Logan Black
Name: Logan Black
gametext: When you play this personnel you may discard a card from hand to choose one: download a Maneuver card or download an [AU][SF] ship.

name: Erika Benteen Leyton's Adjunct
Name: Erika Benteen Leyton's Adjunct
gametext: When this personnel uses a skill to complete a mission, you may discard a personnel who has a cost of 4 or more from hand to unstop all your stopped [Fed] personnel at this mission.

name: Distraction
Name: Distraction
gametext: Choose a number of personnel who have a total cost of 4 or more to be stopped.

name: Jonathan Archer Covetous Commander
Name: Jonathan Archer Covetous Commander
Skills: Astrometrics Leadership Navigation Officer Security 2 Treachery
gametext: When this personnel uses a skill to complete a mission, if you have no cards in hand, score 5 points. You may do this only once each turn. Order - Discard a card from hand to download {Watch Dog}.

name: The Inner Light
Name: The Inner Light
gametext: To play this event, you must command no [Bor] cards. Plays in your core. When you play this event, you may play an [AU] personnel aboard your ship. That personnel loses each of his or her icons (except for [AU] and those in gametext), gains [Stf], and becomes [NA]. When this event is destroyed, kill that personnel.

name: Leonard H. McCoy Fiendish Physician
Name: Leonard H. McCoy Fiendish Physician
gametext: While you command an [AU] personnel, you may play this personnel at cost +3 to name a personnel. Each opponent kills each personnel he or she commands with that card title.

name: Hoshi Sato Captain's Woman
Name: Hoshi Sato Captain's Woman
gametext: While you have no cards in hand, this personnel and each of your Leadership personnel present are attributes +1.

name: Revised Seven of Nine Shock-Trooper
Name: Revised Seven of Nine Shock-Trooper
gametext: Order - Discard a card titled {Seven of Nine} or Revised Seven of Nine from hand to choose one: place a personnel present on the bottom of his or her owner's deck, or take a Hologram from your discard pile into hand.

name: Unimatrix Zero
Name: Unimatrix Zero
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Bor] personnel. When you play this event, for each unique Borg personnel you command, this event is cost -1. Plays in your core. You may spend an additional counter each turn. Each unique personnel you command gains [AU].

name: Critical Care
Name: Critical Care
Affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.
gametext: When you complete this mission, you may take up to three personnel in your discard pile and place each on the bottom of his or her owner's decks.

name: Marlena Moreau (Mirror)
Name: Marlena Moreau (Mirror)
gametext: While you command an [AU] personnel, you may play this personnel at cost +1 to make each player discard a personnel from hand.

name: Soval Idealist
Name: Soval Idealist
gametext: While you have no cards in hand, this personnel gains Biology, Exobiology, and Geology.

name: Infestation
Name: Infestation
gametext: Your opponent may have more than three copies of this card in his or her dilemma pile. Your personnel can face more than one copy of this dilemma during each mission attempt. Choose a personnel to be stopped.

name: Charles Tucker III Competent Engineer
Name: Charles Tucker III Competent Engineer
gametext: While you have no cards in your hand, cards your opponent owns cannot destroy your events.

name: Travis Mayweather Opportunistic Sergeant
Name: Travis Mayweather Opportunistic Sergeant
gametext: When this personnel is an eligible target for a random selection, if you have no cards in hand, you may exclude a [SF] personnel present from that selection.

name: Captain's Log
Name: Captain's Log
gametext: Plays in your core. While facing a dilemma, you may exclude your corresponding Commander aboard his or her ship from random selections.

name: Rekar Tool of the Tal'Shiar
Name: Rekar Tool of the Tal'Shiar
Skills: Astrometrics Engineer Intelligence Leadership Officer Security
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you command an Intelligence personnel, he is cost -1. When this personnel attempts a non-[Rom] mission and your [Rom] personnel who has a cost of 4 or more is present, subtract one from the number of dilemmas your opponent can draw.

name: Wesley Crusher Battleship Helmsman
Name: Wesley Crusher Battleship Helmsman
Skills: Astrometrics Engineer Navigation Officer Physics Programming
gametext: While your [TNG] personnel who has a cost of 4 or more is present, the ship this personnel is aboard is attributes +1 and this personnel gains Geology and Science.

name: Energize
Name: Energize
gametext: Plays in your core. At the start of each of your turns, place the top card of your deck on this event. The first non-[TNG] personnel you play each turn is cost -2 for each card on this event.

name: Jadzia Dax Soldier of Fortune
Name: Jadzia Dax Soldier of Fortune
gametext: When this personnel is randomly selected by a dilemma, draw cards up to the cost of a personnel present, then place the same number of cards from hand on the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Stripped Down *AP
Name: Stripped Down *AP
gametext: Your opponent moves up to two dilemmas from beneath this mission to another of your non-headquarters missions.

name: Neras Slave Girl *AP
Name: Neras Slave Girl *AP
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may draw two cards.

name: Disarming Dream
Name: Disarming Dream
gametext: Your opponent names a species. Randomly select a personnel of that species to be stopped.

name: Watch Dog
Name: Watch Dog
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [AU][SF] personnel. Plays in your core. While your personnel is facing a dilemma, you may play interrupts on this event as if they were in hand. Order - Place an interrupt from hand on this event.

name: Standard Punishment
Name: Standard Punishment
gametext: When your personnel is attempting a mission, make each of your [AU] personnel attributes +1 until the end of this mission attempt.

name: Six of Ten Invalidation Drone
Name: Six of Ten Invalidation Drone
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you command a unique personnel, he is cost -1. At the start of each of your turns, you may discard a card from hand that has a cost of 4 or more to download a card that has a cost of 4 or more.

name: Gor Thot
Name: Gor Thot
gametext: When you play this personnel, name 1, 2 or 3. Until the start of your next turn, each player cannot play cards that have a cost equal to the named number.

name: Keiko O'Brien Botanist
Name: Keiko O'Brien Botanist
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may examine the top four cards of your deck. You may reveal a card that has a cost of 4 or more and take it into your hand. Place the remaining cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Revised Chakotay Imposturous First Officer
Name: Revised Chakotay Imposturous First Officer
gametext: When one of your personnel present is about to be stopped or killed by a dilemma, you may discard a card titled {Chakotay} or Revised Chakotay from hand to prevent that.

name: Revised Kim Interrogator
Name: Revised Kim Interrogator
gametext: While this personnel is attempting a mission, you may discard a Hologram from hand to give him one of the discarded Hologram's skills until the end of this mission attempt.

name: Revised Neelix Hedgehog Ops Officer
Name: Revised Neelix Hedgehog Ops Officer
Skills: Astrometrics Biology Physics Programming Science Transporters 2 Treachery
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may discard a card titled {Neelix} or Revised Neelix from hand to make each of your Treachery personnel present attributes +1 until the end of this dilemma.

name: Quark Simple Barkeep
Name: Quark Simple Barkeep
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may download a card and place it beneath your {Ferenginar}. At the start of each of your turns, you may place one of your non-[Fer] personnel present on the bottom of his or her owner's deck to spend 2 additional counters this turn.

name: Grilka Glorious Lady
Name: Grilka Glorious Lady
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you command an Honor personnel, she is cost -1. While this personnel is facing a dilemma, the cost of the personnel in your discard pile that has the highest cost is added to her attributes.

name: Telok Bodyguard
Name: Telok Bodyguard
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you command three [AU] cards, draw up to two cards.

name: Ezri Tigan Soldier of Fortune
Name: Ezri Tigan Soldier of Fortune
Skills: Anthropology Geology Medical Navigation Security Transporters
gametext: When this personnel is stopped by a dilemma, choose an opponent and place this personnel at his or her headquarters mission. That opponent now commands this personnel.

name: Laas One of the 100
Name: Laas One of the 100
gametext: The cost of the personnel present that has the highest cost is added to this personnel's attributes.

name: Tomek Displaced Alien
Name: Tomek Displaced Alien
gametext: You may play this personnel aboard your [Rom] ship. When you play an [AU] personnel, you may discard an [AU] card from hand to download an interrupt.

name: Malcolm Reed Enthusiastic Major
Name: Malcolm Reed Enthusiastic Major
gametext: While your MACO is present, if you have no cards in hand, this personnel is attributes +1 and gains Leadership and Security.

name: I.S.S. Avenger Admiral's Ship
Name: I.S.S. Avenger Admiral's Ship
gametext: To play this ship, you must command three [AU] personnel. Order - Discard a card from hand to make this ship attributes +1 (limit +2) until the end of the turn.

name: Reflections
Name: Reflections
gametext: Reveal a number of cards from the top of your deck equal to the number of [AU] cards your opponent commands. For each event or interrupt revealed, your opponent chooses a personnel to be stopped.

name: Guardian's Advice
Name: Guardian's Advice
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [AU] personnel. Plays in your core. At the start of each of your turns, the player on your right places the top card of your dilemma pile beneath one of his or her non-headquarters missions. You may spend 2 additional counters each turn.

name: Multidimensional Transporter Device
Name: Multidimensional Transporter Device
gametext: Order - Destroy this equipment to exchange your personnel present with a personnel in your hand. Both of those personnel must have the same card title.

name: Alien Conspiracy
Name: Alien Conspiracy
gametext: Choose three personnel. Your opponent chooses one of those personnel to be stopped.

name: Captured by the Breen
Name: Captured by the Breen
gametext: Randomly select three personnel. If the total cost of those personnel is 4 or less, they are placed in your opponent's brig. Otherwise, randomly select one of those personnel to be stopped.

name: Necessary Evil
Name: Necessary Evil
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [AU] personnel. Remove one of your personnel from the game. Destroy this event.

name: Weyoun "Defective" Clone
Name: Weyoun "Defective" Clone
Skills: Diplomacy Honor Intelligence Law Leadership Security
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you command a Law personnel, he is cost -1. When a personnel present who has a cost of 4 or more is randomly selected by a dilemma, you may replace him or her with this personnel.

name: Beverly Crusher Battleship Doctor
Name: Beverly Crusher Battleship Doctor
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you command an [AU][TNG] Officer personnel, she is cost -1. When your [TNG] personnel present who has a cost of 4 or more is about to be killed by a dilemma, you may discard a card from hand to stop that personnel instead.

name: Data Battleship Officer
Name: Data Battleship Officer
gametext: While your [TNG] personnel who has a cost of 4 or more is present, this personnel cannot be stopped by dilemmas.

name: Jean-Luc Picard Battleship Captain
Name: Jean-Luc Picard Battleship Captain
Skills: Archaeology 2 Diplomacy Honor Leadership Officer Security
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you command two [TNG] personnel who both have a cost of 4 or more, you may download a card.

name: William T. Riker Battleship First Officer
Name: William T. Riker Battleship First Officer
Skills: Anthropology Diplomacy Leadership Navigation Officer Security
gametext: While your [TNG] personnel who has a cost of 4 or more is present, this personnel is attributes +2.

name: Revised Doctor Mass Murderer
Name: Revised Doctor Mass Murderer
gametext: Order - Discard a card titled {The Doctor} or Revised Doctor from hand to download an interrupt.

name: The Dal'Rok
Name: The Dal'Rok
gametext: Unless your personnel have a total cost>17, for each headquarters mission you command, randomly select a personnel to be killed and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Temporal Flux Energy Ribbon
Name: Temporal Flux Energy Ribbon
gametext: Plays on a mission. At the start of each player's turn, that player removes a personnel he or she commands at this mission from the game and moves this event to a different mission. When this event is placed on a headquarters mission, remove it from the game.

name: Bareil Antos Petty Thief
Name: Bareil Antos Petty Thief
Skills: Anthropology Biology Law Navigation Programming Security
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you command an Anthropology personnel, he is cost -2. Order - Discard a personnel who has cost of 4 or more from hand to take a card that has a cost of 4 or more from your discard pile into hand.

name: Julian Bashir Rebel Captain
Name: Julian Bashir Rebel Captain
Skills: Biology Exobiology Leadership Medical Officer Science
gametext: When you play this personnel, choose an opponent. For each headquarters mission he or she commands, this personnel is cost -3.

name: Leeta Enticing Rebel
Name: Leeta Enticing Rebel
gametext: When this personnel is randomly selected by a dilemma, you may download a card and place it in your discard pile.

name: Key to the Alpha Quadrant
Name: Key to the Alpha Quadrant
gametext: Unless you have Astrometrics, Diplomacy, and Officer or Leadership, Security, and Treachery, randomly select a personnel to be stopped, and if the opponent on your left commands Mouth of the Wormhole, he or she scores 5 points.

name: New Advancements
Name: New Advancements
gametext: Unless you have Diplomacy, Leadership, and Navigation or a ship at a completed space mission, randomly select a personnel to be stopped, and if the opponent on your left commands {Earth}, he or she may download two [SF] cards.

name: Shattered
Name: Shattered
gametext: Unless you have Anthropology, Leadership, and Science or Engineer, Transporters, and Cunning>28, randomly select a personnel to be stopped, and if the opponent on your left does not command a headquarters mission, he or she may take a [Voy] personnel from his or her discard pile and place him or her aboard a ship at a [DQ] mission.

name: The Secret War
Name: The Secret War
gametext: Unless you have Honor, Officer, and Integrity>34, or Security, Treachery, and Strength>34, randomly select a personnel to be stopped, and if the opponent on your left commands {Athos IV}, that personnel is returned to his or her owner's hand instead.

name: Paradan Replicant
Name: Paradan Replicant
gametext: Randomly select a personnel to be stopped. If that personnel is non-unique, remove all copies of that personnel in hand from the game, search your deck for any additional copies of that personnel, remove them from the game as well, and shuffle and replace your deck.

name: Security Weapons
Name: Security Weapons
gametext: Randomly select a personnel to be stopped. If that personnel has a cost of 2 or less, kill him or her instead.

name: One Man Cannot Summon the Future
Name: One Man Cannot Summon the Future
gametext: Plays in your core. When you play an [AU] card, if you command two non-[AU] personnel, you may draw a card and then place a card from hand on the bottom of your deck.

name: To Be a Warrior
Name: To Be a Warrior
gametext: Plays in your core. When your Klingon who has a cost of 4 or more is about to be killed by a dilemma, you may destroy this event instead.

name: Vorta Experiment Tables
Name: Vorta Experiment Tables
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Dom] personnel. Plays in your core. Each personnel you own who costs 4 or more gains [AU]. When you complete a mission that requires Cunning, you may score 5 points.

name: Gateway Historical Research
Name: Gateway Historical Research
Affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.
gametext: At the start of your turn, if this is your first turn and any opponent has had a turn, you may download a personnel.

name: Damar Cardassian Liberator
Name: Damar Cardassian Liberator
gametext: When you play this personnel, examine cards from the top of your deck equal to the cost of a personnel you command. Take up to two cards examined into your hand. Discard the remaining cards.

name: Lam
Name: Lam
gametext: To play this personnel, stop any number of your personnel that have a total cost of 4 or more.

name: Pavel A. Chekov Treacherous Underling
Name: Pavel A. Chekov Treacherous Underling
gametext: While you command an [AU] personnel, you may play this personnel at cost +1 to make each player draw two cards, then place two cards from hand on the bottom of his or her deck in any order.

name: Revised Tuvok Evil Instrument of Destruction
Name: Revised Tuvok Evil Instrument of Destruction
gametext: At the start of each of your turns, you may discard a card titled {Tuvok} or Revised Tuvok from hand to download a [Fut][Voy] Hologram.

name: Uhura Unprincipled Technician
Name: Uhura Unprincipled Technician
gametext: While you command an [AU] personnel, you may play this personnel at cost +2 to make each player discard two cards from hand.

name: Jera
Name: Jera
gametext: You may play this personnel aboard your [Rom] ship. When this personnel is randomly selected by a dilemma, return her to her owner's hand.

name: Data Tempted by Flesh
Name: Data Tempted by Flesh
Skills: Astrometrics 2 Engineer Exobiology 2 Programming Science Treachery
gametext: At the start of each of your turns, you may return this personnel to your hand. If you do not, remove this personnel from the game.

name: Prisoner of the Exile
Name: Prisoner of the Exile
gametext: Choose a personnel to be placed in your opponent's brig.

name: U.S.S. Pasteur Medical Ship
Name: U.S.S. Pasteur Medical Ship
gametext: While your [Fed] Medical personnel is aboard this ship, it is Range +5. While your [Fut] personnel aboard is attempting a space mission, you may destroy your Decay event to make that personnel gain a skill required by that mission until the end of this turn.

name: Kira Nerys First Officer
Name: Kira Nerys First Officer
gametext: Order - If you command two missions worth 40 or more points, discard four cards from hand to take a [Baj] personnel from your discard pile and place it on your headquarters mission. You may only do this once each turn.

name: Vascular Pad
Name: Vascular Pad
gametext: When your personnel present is about to be stopped by a dilemma, you may place this equipment on the bottom of its owner's deck to prevent that.

name: Sector 21396 Commandeer Prototype
Name: Sector 21396 Commandeer Prototype
Skills: Intelligence, Officer, Treachery, and Cunning>33 or Leadership, 2 Officer, and Cunning>35
gametext: When you complete this mission, you may download a ship and place it at this mission (that ship is stopped). Name an affiliation. The downloaded ship becomes the named affiliation.

name: Scimitar Built for Only One Purpose
Name: Scimitar Built for Only One Purpose
gametext: When you take this ship off of {Engage Cloak}, you may begin an engagement involving your personnel aboard this ship. If you win, name a personnel. Each opponent's copy of that personnel involved in that engagement is killed. Then unstop this ship and all personnel aboard this ship. You cannot begin any other engagements this turn. Also, this ship is Range +9 until the end of this turn.

name: Eris Duplicitous Vorta
Name: Eris Duplicitous Vorta
gametext: When you reveal a Persistent dilemma from your dilemma stack, it is cost -1. When you begin combat involving this personnel, randomly select an opponent's personnel present to be excluded from that combat.

name: Distant Control
Name: Distant Control
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Rom] personnel. Plays in your core. When you play this event, name an event or interrupt. Opponents cannot play that named card. At the start of each of your turns, place the top card of your deck on this event.

name: Military Assault Command Operations
Name: Military Assault Command Operations
gametext: Download a MACO. Destroy this event.

name: Moral Choice
Name: Moral Choice
gametext: Randomly select three personnel. If any of those personnel is a [Fed] personnel, they are all stopped. Otherwise, choose one of those personnel to be stopped.

name: Expand Business Opportunities
Name: Expand Business Opportunities
Skills: Acquisition, Anthropology, and (Diplomacy and Cunning>30 or Treachery and Strength>30)
gametext: When you end a mission attempt at this mission, your opponent to your left may place the top two cards of his or her dilemma pile under this mission to score 5 points.

name: Gowron Celebrated Leader
Name: Gowron Celebrated Leader
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you command three events, he is cost -1. Order - Stop eight of your Honor Klingons to score 5 points.

name: Borg Queen's Vessel Borg Flagship
Name: Borg Queen's Vessel Borg Flagship
gametext: Order - Examine a number of cards from the top of your deck equal to the number of Persistent dilemmas you own beneath an opponent's missions. Set any number of those cards aside face down. Shuffle the remaining cards into your deck and place those cards on top of your deck in any order. You may do this only once each turn.

name: I.K.S. Qel'Poh H.M.S. Bounty
Name: I.K.S. Qel'Poh H.M.S. Bounty
gametext: While you command two missions that are worth 40 points or more, this ship is Range +2. While a personnel you command aboard this ship is facing a dilemma, you may discard a [Pa] personnel from hand to make that personnel attributes +1 until the end of that dilemma.

name: U.S.S. Prometheus Experimental Prototype
Name: U.S.S. Prometheus Experimental Prototype
gametext: To play this ship, you must discard a personnel who costs 4 or more from hand. When you win an engagement involving this ship, you may discard a Decay event from hand to download a Damage card and place it on an opponent's ship at this mission.

name: U.S.S. Reliant Searching for Lifeless Planets
Name: U.S.S. Reliant Searching for Lifeless Planets
gametext: While you command a [TOS] personnel, you may play this ship at your {Earth}. When you complete this mission, you may destroy an event. (If that event is your event, you may download an event with a cost of 4 or more.)

name: I.K.S. Kla'Diyus Prototype
Name: I.K.S. Kla'Diyus Prototype
gametext: When you take this ship off of {Engage Cloak}, it is Weapons +3 until the end of the turn and you may begin an engagement involving your personnel aboard. If you win, name a personnel. Each opponent's copy of that personnel involved in that engagement is killed.

name: I.K.S. Qel'Poh Clandestine Vessel
Name: I.K.S. Qel'Poh Clandestine Vessel
gametext: While you command two missions that are worth 40 points or more, this ship is Range +2. While you have a captive, this ship is attributes +2.

name: Kronos One
Name: Kronos One
gametext: Order - If your corresponding Commander is aboard this ship, search your dilemma pile and remove a Persistent dilemma from the game to make this ship attributes +2 until the end of the turn. Then shuffle and replace your dilemma pile. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Devna-Lev Harrad-Sar's Barge
Name: Devna-Lev Harrad-Sar's Barge
gametext: While three of your [NA] personnel are aboard this ship, it is Range +2 and when you reveal a Persistent dilemma from your dilemma stack, it is cost -1.

name: U.S.S. Reliant Part of One Big Happy Fleet
Name: U.S.S. Reliant Part of One Big Happy Fleet
gametext: Order - Discard a [NA] personnel from hand to make this ship attributes +2 until the end of this turn.

name: U.S.S. Prometheus Stolen Prototype
Name: U.S.S. Prometheus Stolen Prototype
gametext: To play this ship, you must discard a personnel who costs 4 or more from hand. When you win an engagement involving this ship, you may discard a personnel who has a cost of 4 or more from hand to download a Damage card and place it on an opponent's ship at this mission.

name: Ezri Dax Resourceful Counselor
Name: Ezri Dax Resourceful Counselor
gametext: If you command {Jadzia Dax}, place this personnel in her owner's discard pile. Your [DS9] personnel and [E] personnel present cannot be killed by dilemmas that cost 3 or more.

name: Shocking Betrayal
Name: Shocking Betrayal
gametext: Choose a personnel to be stopped and your opponent may discard a non-[NA] personnel from hand to choose a personnel that is the same affiliation as that discarded personnel to be killed.

name: Spatial Distortions
Name: Spatial Distortions
gametext: Choose a personnel to be placed in your discard pile.

name: Toe to Toe
Name: Toe to Toe
gametext: Randomly select a personnel. Unless you stop that personnel and another personnel with the same cost, he or she is killed.

name: Disruptive Presence
Name: Disruptive Presence
gametext: Discard a personnel from hand to download a personnel with the same affiliation as that discarded personnel, then discard a random card from hand. Destroy this event.

name: U.S.S. Enterprise-J
Name: U.S.S. Enterprise-J
gametext: Plays in your core. Each of your personnel at a mission that is worth 40 or more points is attributes +1.

name: Dear Friends
Name: Dear Friends
gametext: When a [DS9] personnel you command is about to be killed by a dilemma that costs 3 or more, discard an [E] personnel from hand to prevent that.

name: Geordi La Forge Retired Engineer
Name: Geordi La Forge Retired Engineer
gametext: While this personnel is facing a Damage dilemma, you may lose 5 points to prevent and overcome that dilemma.

name: Deja Q
Name: Deja Q
gametext: Plays in your core. When you reveal a Consume dilemma from your dilemma stack, you may take a Consume dilemma you own from beneath an opponent's completed mission and return it to your dilemma pile.

name: Vacation from the Continuum
Name: Vacation from the Continuum
gametext: To play this event, you must command a Q event. Plays in your core. When personnel that the player on your right commands begin a mission attempt, you may destroy your other Q event to draw five extra dilemmas.

name: Silaran Prin Between Darkness and Light
Name: Silaran Prin Between Darkness and Light
gametext: Order - Name a personnel. When an opponent plays that personnel, you may place this personnel in his owner's discard pile to kill that personnel. This effect lasts until this order is executed again.

name: Kasidy Yates Conflicted Captain
Name: Kasidy Yates Conflicted Captain
gametext: While present with four [Maq] personnel, each [Maq] personnel present is Strength +2.

name: Rule of Acquisition #33
Name: Rule of Acquisition #33
gametext: When your [Fer] personnel is facing a dilemma, say "It never hurts to suck up to the boss" to choose one - make that personnel attributes +2 until the end of the turn; or replace all levels of any one skill in that dilemma's requirements with 3 Acquisition.

name: Silent Strike
Name: Silent Strike
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must command a staffed ship that has been on {Engage Cloak} since the start of your turn. Order - Take your staffed ship off Engage Cloak to place it at a non-headquarters mission where an opponent's ship is at and begin an engagement involving your personnel aboard that ship. If you win, randomly kill two opponent's personnel involved.

name: The Doctor Emergency Command Hologram
Name: The Doctor Emergency Command Hologram
gametext: When you play this personnel, choose one - remove a Damage card from one of your ships, or download a Maneuver.

name: Tuvix Symbiogenesis
Name: Tuvix Symbiogenesis
Skills: Anthropology Diplomacy Exobiology Honor Law Navigation Security
gametext: To play this personnel, remove two of your personnel at this mission from the game. You cannot play personnel with the same title as those personnel.

name: Neurogenic Field
Name: Neurogenic Field
gametext: Choose a personnel who has Anthropology or Medical to be stopped. If you cannot, randomly select a personnel to be killed.

name: Night Terrors
Name: Night Terrors
gametext: Choose a personnel who has Medical or Science to be stopped. If you cannot, randomly select a personnel to be killed.

name: Nog Little Green Man
Name: Nog Little Green Man
gametext: While this personnel is present with a [Pa] personnel, he cannot be stopped or killed by a dilemma that costs 3 or more.

name: Rom Little Green Man
Name: Rom Little Green Man
gametext: While this personnel is present with a [Pa] personnel, if he is attempting a mission worth 40 or more points, he is attributes +2 and gains one of every skill he already has.

name: D'Vela
Name: D'Vela
gametext: While a personnel present is facing a dilemma, if you have no cards in your hand, you may destroy your event to have that personnel gain a skill of your choice until the end of that dilemma.

name: Kelby Industrious Engineer
Name: Kelby Industrious Engineer
gametext: When this personnel is about to be killed by a dilemma that costs 3 or more, if you have no cards in your hand, you may stop this personnel instead.

name: Tallera Covert Isolationist
Name: Tallera Covert Isolationist
gametext: When you complete this mission, if it is worth 40 or more points, you may score 5 points.

name: Sela Cunning Strategist
Name: Sela Cunning Strategist
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, if this mission is worth 40 or more points, you may meet that dilemma's Integrity or Strength requirements using Cunning instead.

name: Elude Federation Forces
Name: Elude Federation Forces
Affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.
Skills: 2 Astrometrics, 2 Navigation, and Strength>32 or Engineer, 2 Programming, Treachery, and Cunning>32
gametext: When you complete this mission, if you command four [Maq] personnel at this mission, score 10 points.

name: Purchase Moon
Name: Purchase Moon
gametext: When you complete this mission, if your personnel completing it have 4 Acquisition, you may place a card from hand beneath your {Ferenginar}.

name: Cargo Pirates
Name: Cargo Pirates
gametext: Randomly select a personnel to be stopped and if your opponent commands three Thief personnel, choose an additional personnel to be stopped.

name: Inferiority
Name: Inferiority
gametext: Place this dilemma in your core. When your personnel begin a mission attempt, your opponent may remove this dilemma from the game to draw three extra dilemmas and spend three extra in total cost on dilemmas.

name: Prefix Codes
Name: Prefix Codes
gametext: Place this dilemma on this mission. At the end of this mission attempt, if there are no damage markers on any of your ships at this mission, choose one of those ships and place this dilemma on it. Otherwise, overcome this dilemma. Damage - This ship is Shields -10.

name: In a Mirror, Darkly
Name: In a Mirror, Darkly
gametext: Lose 5 points to shuffle each personnel and ship you own in your discard pile into your deck and then draw cards until you have seven cards in hand. Remove this event and all the other cards in your discard pile from the game.

name: One Man Can Summon the Future
Name: One Man Can Summon the Future
gametext: Plays in your core. When you play a personnel who has a cost of 4 or more, examine the top five cards of your deck and replace them in any order. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Sarek Logical Being
Name: Sarek Logical Being
gametext: When you play this personnel, each player takes a Consume or Persistent dilemma he or she owns from beneath a mission and returns it to his or her dilemma pile.

name: Sarek Vulcan Delegate
Name: Sarek Vulcan Delegate
gametext: You may play this personnel at cost +1 to draw a card for each mission you command that is worth 40 or more points.

name: D'Nesh Manipulative Gift
Name: D'Nesh Manipulative Gift
gametext: While a Thief present is facing a dilemma, you may destroy your event to make that Thief attributes +1 until the end of that mission attempt.

name: Harrad-Sar Slave of the Situation
Name: Harrad-Sar Slave of the Situation
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may download up to three Thief personnel.

name: Maras
Name: Maras
gametext: While a Thief present is about to be killed by a dilemma that costs 3 or more, you may destroy your event to prevent that.

name: Navaar Experienced Gift
Name: Navaar Experienced Gift
gametext: When a Thief present is facing a dilemma, you may destroy your event to have that Thief gain a skill of your choice until the end of that mission attempt.

name: Neras Slave Girl
Name: Neras Slave Girl
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may draw two cards.

name: Back to Basics
Name: Back to Basics
gametext: Your opponent counts each personnel and ship card in his or her discard pile and shuffles each of those cards into his or her deck. If fourteen or more cards were shuffled into his or her deck this way, all your personnel are stopped.

name: Ghost Stories
Name: Ghost Stories
gametext: Plays in your core. When you play this event, name a non-dual dilemma. Your copies of that dilemma have: Persistent. (When your personnel complete this mission, this dilemma's owner may discard a non-personnel card from hand to return this dilemma to his or her dilemma pile.)

name: Reclaim Terok Nor
Name: Reclaim Terok Nor
gametext: Plays in your core. Each [Car] personnel and [Dom] personnel you own gains [TN]. At the start of each of your turns, place a card from hand on this event.

name: The New Occupation
Name: The New Occupation
gametext: Plays in your core. While your [Car] personnel or [Dom] personnel is attempting a mission aboard your [TN] ship, you may place your Dissident on this event to make that personnel attributes +1 until the end of that mission attempt.

name: Katherine Pulaski Chief Medical Officer
Name: Katherine Pulaski Chief Medical Officer
gametext: When any number of your personnel present are about to be killed by a dilemma, you may shuffle each of those personnel into your deck instead.

name: Hugh Rogue Borg
Name: Hugh Rogue Borg
Skills: Anthropology Engineer Exobiology Honor Leadership Programming
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may destroy your equipment present to add its cost to this personnel's attributes until the end of the turn.

name: Nanclus Co-Conspirator
Name: Nanclus Co-Conspirator
gametext: Order - Choose an opponent to reveal his or her hand. For each personnel revealed, this personnel is Cunning +1 and Strength +1 (if a [Fed] personnel is revealed this way he may gain a skill of your choice as well) until the end of this turn. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Clarity
Name: Clarity
gametext: To play this event, you must command two Founders. Plays in your core. When your Consume dilemma places any number of dilemmas beneath an opponent's mission, you may destroy this event to choose one of those dilemmas and return it to your dilemma pile.

name: Odo The Great Link's Savior
Name: Odo The Great Link's Savior
Skills: Anthropology Exobiology Honor Law Leadership Programming 2 Security
gametext: When this personnel is about to be killed or stopped by a dilemma, you may have each opponent score 5 points to prevent that.

name: Gorkon Visionary Chancellor
Name: Gorkon Visionary Chancellor
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you have completed a mission requiring Diplomacy or Leadership, he is cost -4.

name: Borg Queen Obsessed
Name: Borg Queen Obsessed
Skills: Biology Diplomacy Exobiology 2 Leadership Science 2 Treachery
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you have completed a mission requiring Exobiology or Science, she is cost -4. This personnel is the corresponding Commander of your [Bor] ship that she is aboard.

name: Gatherers' Raid
Name: Gatherers' Raid
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Place a card from hand on this event to reveal a number of cards from the top of an opponent's deck equal to the number of Gatherers you command. For each event and interrupt revealed this way, you may draw a card.

name: Data Lucasian Chair
Name: Data Lucasian Chair
Skills: 2 Astrometrics Engineer Exobiology Physics Programming 2 Science
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you have completed a mission requiring Diplomacy or Leadership, he is cost -4.

name: Five Year Mission
Name: Five Year Mission
gametext: Plays in your core. When you are about to play a [TOS] card, you may place a [TOS] card from hand on this event to make that card cost -1. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Walk the Line
Name: Walk the Line
gametext: Plays in your core. When your [Baj][DS9] personnel is about to be stopped, you may place your [Fed][DS9] personnel on this event to prevent that. When your [Fed][DS9] personnel is about to be stopped, you may place your [Baj][DS9] personnel on this event to prevent that.

name: Hall of Warriors
Name: Hall of Warriors
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Kli] personnel. Plays in your core. When you win combat or an engagement, place the top card of your deck on this event. Each of your [Kli] ships is attributes +1 for each card on this event.

name: Improvised Modifications
Name: Improvised Modifications
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Place your [Fed][Maq] personnel on top of this event to make each of your [Maq] ships attributes +1 until the end of turn and each opponent chooses a personnel he or she commands to return to his or her owner's hand.

name: The Reckoning
Name: The Reckoning
gametext: Plays in your core. While your [Baj] personnel is facing a dilemma, you may place a Prophet card or a Pah-wraith card from your hand on this event to make that personnel attributes +1 until the end of this turn.

name: Standard Orbit
Name: Standard Orbit
gametext: To play this event, you must command two missions worth 40 or more points. Plays in your core. When an opponent is about to download a card, he or she can only download from the top ten cards of his or her deck. When an opponent discards a personnel from your hand or from the top of your deck, you may place him or her on the bottom of your deck instead.

name: Good Shepherd
Name: Good Shepherd
gametext: Plays in your core. At the start of each of your turns, you may stop your [Voy] Commander to download a non-unique [Voy] personnel or a [Voy] personnel who costs 1 or less and place them on this event. When this event is destroyed, place each personnel here aboard your [Voy] ship.

name: Straight and Steady
Name: Straight and Steady
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [SF] personnel. Plays in your core. When your personnel aboard a [SF] ship uses a skill to complete a mission worth 40 or more points, you may place a card from hand on this event. Order - Destroy this event to download a card that has a cost equal to the number of cards on this event.

name: Aid Lost Colony
Name: Aid Lost Colony
gametext: This mission is worth 10 fewer points for each other mission you command that does not require Biology, Diplomacy, or Leadership.

name: Risa Shore Leave
Name: Risa Shore Leave
Skills: Anthropology, and (Archaeology, Science, Treachery, and Cunning>36 or Diplomacy, Exobiology, Officer, and Integrity>32)
gametext: When you complete this mission, score 5 points for each different species of personnel who uses his or her skills to complete this mission.

name: Juxtaposition
Name: Juxtaposition
gametext: Your opponent may return up to two Persistent dilemmas he or she owns from beneath one of your completed missions to his or her dilemma pile and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Are You Offering Me ... a Bribe?
Name: Are You Offering Me ... a Bribe?
gametext: To play this event, lose 5 points. Plays in your core. Your [Fer] personnel may meet Integrity and Strength requirements of your missions and each dilemma you face at those missions using Cunning instead. Your [Fer] personnel may attempt and complete your missions.

name: Quark's Advice
Name: Quark's Advice
gametext: To play this event, you must command {Ferenginar}. Download a card and place it beneath your Ferenginar. Destroy this event.

name: Crell Moset Notorious Exobiologist
Name: Crell Moset Notorious Exobiologist
gametext: When your [Car] personnel present is about to be killed or stopped by a dilemma that costs 3 or more, you may discard a non-[Car] personnel from hand to prevent that.

name: Founder Leader Single-Minded
Name: Founder Leader Single-Minded
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may discard a Morph card from hand to exchange a Founder in your hand with a Founder present.

name: Benjamin Finney Bitter Records Officer
Name: Benjamin Finney Bitter Records Officer
gametext: You may play this personnel at cost +2 to name a skill. Each player reveals his or her hand and places each revealed personnel with that skill on top of his or her owner's deck.

name: Stewart Rivers Patriotic Engineer
Name: Stewart Rivers Patriotic Engineer
gametext: Order - Discard a Decay event from hand to download an non-Decay event or interrupt. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Mot The Barber
Name: Mot The Barber
gametext: When your six personnel present attempt a mission, subtract one from the number of dilemmas your opponent may draw and one from the total cost he or she may spend on dilemmas.

name: Sirna Kolrami Famed Strategist
Name: Sirna Kolrami Famed Strategist
gametext: While facing a dilemma, a personnel present may lose all of his or her skills until the end of that dilemma. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Caretaker's Wave
Name: Caretaker's Wave
gametext: Unless you have Astrometrics and Engineer or 3 Navigation, stop all of your personnel and this dilemma is placed on your ship. Damage - At the start of each of your turns, the owner of this dilemma may place this ship at your mission.

name: Restore Errant Moon
Name: Restore Errant Moon
Affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.
gametext: When you begin a mission attempt at this mission, each player may search his or her dilemma pile and set aside a Consume dilemma, shuffle his or her dilemma pile, and then place that dilemma on top of his or her dilemma pile.

name: Chang Gorkon's Chief of Staff
Name: Chang Gorkon's Chief of Staff
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may have him lose 2 Treachery to make him gain Diplomacy and Law until the end of this turn.

name: Soval Vulcan Ambassador
Name: Soval Vulcan Ambassador
Skills: Anthropology 2 Diplomacy Honor Law Leadership Science
gametext: While present with two [SF] personnel or two Vulcans, this personnel cannot be stopped or killed by dilemmas that cost 3 or more.

name: Leeta Union Member
Name: Leeta Union Member
gametext: When this personnel is randomly selected by a dilemma, you may take the top card of the opponent on your left's dilemma pile and place it beneath your mission that is worth 40 or more points.

name: Leosa Grifter
Name: Leosa Grifter
gametext: Order - Stop this personnel and choose an opponent to make that opponent choose a Hologram he or she commands and return him or her to his or her owner's hand.

name: Old Differences
Name: Old Differences
gametext: When you reveal this dilemma from the dilemma stack, if this mission is worth 35 or less points, it is cost -1. Randomly select two personnel to be stopped.

name: Nevala
Name: Nevala
gametext: While aboard a ship that has four or more staffing icons, this personnel is attributes +1.

name: Kir'Shara
Name: Kir'Shara
gametext: When your Dissident present is stopped by a dilemma, you may make each player discard the top card of his or her deck.

name: A Few Minor Difficulties
Name: A Few Minor Difficulties

Name: Follow Homing Beacon
Affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.
Skills: Engineer, Programming, Transporters, (Honor or Treachery), 2 Androids and Cunning>35
gametext: Each {Unscientific Method} revealed here is cost -2.

name: Sylvia
Name: Sylvia
gametext: For each event your opponent commands in his or her core, this dilemma is cost -1 (-2 for each Decay event). Unless you have 2 Leadership, Officer, Security, and Cunning>38 or 2 Engineer, Programming, and 2 Science, randomly select two personnel to be placed in your opponent's brig.

name: Ceti Alpha V Find Lifeless World
Name: Ceti Alpha V Find Lifeless World
Affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.
gametext: You may attempt and complete this mission using your [SF] personnel with these requirements: Honor, Leadership, 2 Security and Strength>35. At the start of each of your turns, you may discard six cards from hand to draw five cards.

name: Chula: The Chandra
Name: Chula: The Chandra
gametext: Randomly select a personnel. Repeat this until you select a personnel with a cost equal to or greater than the first personnel that you selected. Stop each selected personnel.

name: The Phage
Name: The Phage
gametext: Choose a personnel to be placed in your discard pile.

name: The Clown: Guillotine
Name: The Clown: Guillotine
gametext: Your opponent names a skill. Randomly select a personnel with that skill. Unless that personnel has an attribute>6, randomly select a second personnel with that skill. Each selected personnel is killed and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Clark Terrell Reliant Captain
Name: Clark Terrell Reliant Captain
gametext: You may play this personnel aboard your {U.S.S. Reliant}. While you command a [NA] ship, this personnel becomes [NA].

name: Talak'talan Keen Third

name: Winn Adami Religious Opportunist

gametext: While at a mission worth 40 or more points, this personnel cannot be stopped by dilemmas.

name: Covenant

gametext: When your [Baj] Treachery personnel is facing a dilemma, remove a [Baj] personnel in your discard pile from the game to make that Treachery personnel gain all skills and attributes on that [Baj] personnel removed from the game until the end of this mission attempt.

Name: Patrol Neutral Zone

When a dilemma is overcome here, if that dilemma killed any of your personnel, randomly select a personnel attempting the mission to be killed. Otherwise, if that dilemma stopped any of your personnel, randomly select a personnel attempting the mission to be stopped.

Name: Nanite Attack (AC)

Name: Amanda Rogers (AC)

Name: I.K.S. Maht-H'a (AC)
gametext: While an opponent's Archaeology personnel is at this mission, that opponent must discard a card from hand to use that personnel's skills.

Name: Tsiolkovsky Infection

name: Whisper in the Dark
Name: Whisper in the Dark
gametext: For each event your opponent commands in his or her core, this dilemma is cost -1. Unless you have 2 Geology, 2 Physics, and Cunning>38 or 2 Honor, 2 Officer, and Transporters, randomly select three personnel to be killed.

name: All-Out War
Name: All-Out War
gametext: Lose 5 points to play in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin combat or an engagement involving your [Kli] personnel. If you win, randomly kill three opponent's personnel involved.

name: Anything or Anyone
Name: Anything or Anyone
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Dom] personnel. Plays in your core. You may only execute one order using this event each turn. Order - Place an Infiltrator from hand on this event. (You now command that personnel.) Order - Place an Infiltrator from this event aboard an opponent's ship or on an opponent's planet mission.

name: Storage Compartment
Name: Storage Compartment
gametext: Plays in your core. When you have chosen dilemmas, you may place one unused planet dilemma or space dilemma on this event instead of beneath your dilemma pile. When you have drawn dilemmas, you may take any dilemmas from this event and add them to those drawn.

name: You've Always Been My Favorite
Name: You've Always Been My Favorite
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Bor] personnel. Lose 5 points to play in your core. When you play this event, download up to five cards, then place them on this event. You may spend 1 counter to take a card on this event into your hand. When there are no cards on this event, destroy it.

name: Knowledge and Experience
Name: Knowledge and Experience
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must command three [Bor] personnel. When a personnel you command but do not own is facing a dilemma, lose 5 points to prevent and overcome that dilemma. Remove this interrupt from the game.

name: Machinations (R2)
Name: Machinations (R2)
gametext: Plays in your core. When you have drawn dilemmas, you may remove this event and those dilemmas from the game to search your dilemma pile and choose a dilemma that costs no more than the number of dilemmas you removed. Shuffle and replace your dilemma pile face down. Place the chosen dilemma on the top of your dilemma stack.

Name: Storage Compartment (R2)

gametext: Randomly select two personnel. They cannot use their skills while facing this dilemma. Unless you have Anthropology, Diplomacy, and Honor or Law, Security, and Strength>35, all your personnel are stopped.

name: Sovak Treasure Hunter *A
Name: Sovak Treasure Hunter *A
gametext: Order - Discard a card from hand to examine a number of cards from the top of your deck equal to the discarded card's cost, then replace them in any order.

name: Jean-Luc Picard Worf's cha'Dich *A
Name: Jean-Luc Picard Worf's cha'Dich *A
gametext: When your Klingon personnel present is selected by a dilemma, you may replace him or her with this personnel.

name: Kivas Fajo Collector *A
Name: Kivas Fajo Collector *A
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may meet Diplomacy and Honor requirements of that dilemma using Acquisition instead.

name: Vic Fontaine Vegas Crooner *A
Name: Vic Fontaine Vegas Crooner *A
gametext: When you begin a mission attempt involving this personnel, you may discard a card from hand to subtract one from the total cost your opponent may spend on dilemmas.

name: Spock Celebrated Ambassador *A
Name: Spock Celebrated Ambassador *A
gametext: While this personnel is present with a Dissident, each of your Romulan personnel present is attributes +1.

name: Aurulent *A
Name: Aurulent *A
gametext: When this ship is about to move between a non-[GQ] mission and a [GQ] mission, do not add 2 to the span total of those missions.

name: Kurdon *A
Name: Kurdon *A
gametext: While your personnel are attempting a space mission that requires Acquisition or Treachery, each [Fer] personnel aboard this ship is Cunning +1.

name: Devoras *A
Name: Devoras *A
gametext: When an opponent's personnel is killed, if this ship is at the same mission, you may place a [Rom] personnel from hand who has the same cost aboard this ship.

name: Cardassian Processing *A
Name: Cardassian Processing *A
gametext: Unless you have Diplomacy, Honor, and Transporters or Law, Security, and Strength>30, randomly select a personnel to be stopped, and if the opponent on your left commands {Cardassia Prime}, that personnel is placed in your opponent's brig instead.

name: Outclassed *A
Name: Outclassed *A
gametext: Unless you have unused Range>8 or Weapons>8 all your personnel are stopped.

name: Zero Hour *A
Name: Zero Hour *A
gametext: Place this dilemma on this mission. Add 3 to each attribute requirement needed to complete this mission for each event in your core. At the end of this turn, this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Distracting Exhibition *A
Name: Distracting Exhibition *A
gametext: Plays in your core. When you play this event, name a skill. While an opponent's personnel is facing your dilemma, if he or she uses that skill, take a dilemma from beneath an opponent's completed mission and place it on top of you dilemma pile. You may do this only once each mission attempt.

name: Latinum Storage *A
Name: Latinum Storage *A
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Fer] personnel. Plays in your core. During your Discard Excess Cards segment, you may keep one additional card in your hand for each different Rule you command.

name: Reman Subterfuge *A
Name: Reman Subterfuge *A
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Rom] personnel. Plays in your core. At the start of each opponent's Execute Orders segment, that player must discard a card from hand.

name: Remarkable Regeneration *A
Name: Remarkable Regeneration *A
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [SF] personnel. Plays in your core. While an opponent has more points than you, subtract one from each Consume on each of your dilemmas.

name: Temporal Delineation *A
Name: Temporal Delineation *A
gametext: When you are about to draw dilemmas, shuffle your dilemma pile. If you command a [Fut] or [Pa] personnel, you may also spend one extra in total cost on dilemmas.

name: First Unstable *A
Name: First Unstable *A
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may discard a random card from hand to download an event.

name: Thrax Chief of Security *A
Name: Thrax Chief of Security *A
gametext: When you play a Punishment card, you may draw a card.

name: Wesley Crusher Nova Squadron Pilot *A
Name: Wesley Crusher Nova Squadron Pilot *A
gametext: While this personnel is present with your Cadet, he loses Honor and gains Navigation and Treachery.

name: Shran In Archer's Debt *A
Name: Shran In Archer's Debt *A
gametext: When this personnel is stopped by a dilemma, you may discard a card from hand to take your overcome dilemma and place it on the bottom of your dilemma pile.

name: Silik Chameleon *A
Name: Silik Chameleon *A
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may discard a random card from hand to make him gain a skill that is required by that dilemma until the end of this turn. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Jonathan Archer Headstrong Captain *A
Name: Jonathan Archer Headstrong Captain *A
Skills: Diplomacy Engineer Honor Leadership Officer Security
gametext: While this personnel is at your [Fed] mission requiring Diplomacy, you may attempt it.

name: U.S.S. Ganges One of the First *A
Name: U.S.S. Ganges One of the First *A
gametext: While you command more than seven personnel aboard this ship, it is Range -3. This ship is attributes +1 for each [DS9] personnel aboard (limit +5).

name: U.S.S. Rio Grande Built to Last *A
Name: U.S.S. Rio Grande Built to Last *A
gametext: While you command more than seven personnel aboard this ship, it is range -3. When this ship is about to move between your headquarters and a non-headquarters mission, subtract 1 from the range required. While your Engineer is aboard, this ship is Range +1.

name: Enterprise Finally Ready to Swim *A
Name: Enterprise Finally Ready to Swim *A
gametext: While you have three different species aboard this ship, it is attributes +2.

name: Strafing Fire *A
Name: Strafing Fire *A
gametext: To play this event, you must command two [Maq] ships. Destroy an event in an opponent's core. Then search that opponent's hand and deck and place each copy of that event in its owner's discard pile. That opponent shuffles and replaces his or her deck. Destroy this event.

name: An Issue of Trust *A
Name: An Issue of Trust *A
gametext: Unless you have Honor or Treachery, all your personnel are stopped. If you have two or more personnel who have Honor or Treachery, randomly select all but one of those personnel to be stopped.

name: Armed Search Party *A
Name: Armed Search Party *A
gametext: Randomly select three personnel. Unless they have Strength>17 or you have a non-Hand Weapon equipment, for each headquarters mission you command, randomly select one of those personnel to be placed in your opponent's brig.

name: Thermokinetic Explosion *A
Name: Thermokinetic Explosion *A
gametext: Unless you have Astrometrics, Navigation, and Cunning>30 or total ship's attributes>21, place this dilemma on your ship and all your personnel are stopped. Damage - At the start of each of your turns, choose an opponent. That opponent may download a Damage card and place it on this ship.

name: A Sight for Sore Eyes *A
Name: A Sight for Sore Eyes *A
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [SF] personnel. Plays in your core. At the start of each of your turns, score 5 points. At the end of each of your turns, if you have at least 5 points, lose 5 points.

name: Dark Pursuit *A
Name: Dark Pursuit *A
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Rom] personnel. Plays in your core. When the player on your right's personnel begin a mission attempt, you may draw one extra dilemma for each Pursuit card you command.

name: The Long Journey Home *A
Name: The Long Journey Home *A
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Voy] personnel. Plays on your {Caretaker's Array}. When you command four completed [DQ] space missions and have 100 or more points, you win the game.

name: Warp Speed Transfer *A
Name: Warp Speed Transfer *A
