gametext: While your personnel aboard a ship are facing a dilemma, move your staffed ship to that mission from a different mission and place one of your personnel aboard that ship aboard the ship attempting the mission. That personnel joins the mission attempt.

name: Second Neonatal Drone *A
Name: Second Neonatal Drone *A
gametext: When your unique Borg present is about to be stopped, you may discard a random card from hand and stop this personnel to prevent that.

name: Kathryn Janeway Forceful Captain *A
Name: Kathryn Janeway Forceful Captain *A
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma at a [DQ] mission, she is attributes +4.

name: The Doctor Emergency Medical Hologram *A
Name: The Doctor Emergency Medical Hologram *A
gametext: When your [Voy] personnel present is about to be killed by a dilemma that costs 3 or more, you may discard two cards from hand to stop that personnel instead.

name: The Viceroy Advisor to the Praetor *A
Name: The Viceroy Advisor to the Praetor *A
gametext: When an opponent plays an event, you may discard a Romulan from hand to download an event. You may only do this once each turn.

name: Charles Tucker III Chief Engineer *A
Name: Charles Tucker III Chief Engineer *A
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma and the first mission you completed this game was a space mission, you may stop this personnel to replace all levels of any one skill in that dilemma's requirements with 2 Engineer. You may do this only once each turn.

name: U.S.S. Defiant Patrolling Warship *A
Name: U.S.S. Defiant Patrolling Warship *A
gametext: When an opponent's ship moves to this mission, if this ship's Commander is aboard it, that opponent's ship is stopped.

name: U.S.S. Enterprise-C Yesterday's Enterprise *A
Name: U.S.S. Enterprise-C Yesterday's Enterprise *A
gametext: When you complete a [Kli] mission, if this ship is at that mission, score 5 points.

name: U.S.S. Enterprise-E Flagship of the Federation *A
Name: U.S.S. Enterprise-E Flagship of the Federation *A
gametext: When you play this ship, for each [TNG] Leadership personnel at this mission, this ship is cost -1. Order - Stop your [Fed] Diplomacy personnel aboard this ship and return your event with no cards on it to its owner's hand to have each opponent return one of his or her events with no cards on it to its owner's hand.

name: U.S.S. Yangtzee Kiang Modified Transport *A
Name: U.S.S. Yangtzee Kiang Modified Transport *A
gametext: While you command eight or more personnel aboard this ship, it is Range -3. When this ship is about to move between your headquarters mission and a non-headquarters mission, subtract 1 from the Range required. Order - Discard two events from hand to make this ship Range +2 until the end of this turn.

name: Quark's Treasure Sabotaged Shuttle *A
Name: Quark's Treasure Sabotaged Shuttle *A
gametext: Order - If this ship has its Commander aboard it, lose 5 points to take an additional turn after this one. At the end of that turn, you lose the game.

name: Columbia The Second Warp Five Ship *A
Name: Columbia The Second Warp Five Ship *A
gametext: While the first mission you completed this game was a space mission, this ship is attributes +1. While a personnel aboard this ship is facing a dilemma, you may discard a card from hand to have that personnel gain Astrometrics or Science until the end of the mission attempt.

name: No Kill I *A
Name: No Kill I *A
gametext: All your personnel are stopped.

name: Psychokinetic Control *A
Name: Psychokinetic Control *A
gametext: Place this dilemma on this mission. Each personnel at this mission loses each skill he or she has gained. Each personnel cannot gain skills. Each personnel cannot increase his or her attributes. At the end of this mission attempt, this dilemma is overcome.

name: Swashbuckler at Heart *A
Name: Swashbuckler at Heart *A
gametext: Reveal your hand and place each interrupt revealed this way on top of your deck in any order. Your opponent draws up to two cards.

name: Vian Test *A
Name: Vian Test *A
gametext: Choose a personnel to place in your opponent's brig. If that personnel is non-unique, your opponent draws up to three cards.

name: James T. Kirk Highly-Decorated Captain *A
Name: James T. Kirk Highly-Decorated Captain *A
gametext: You may play this personnel at cost +3 to download two cards. Those cards must be [TOS], Assault, Maneuver, Pursuit, or Temporal cards.

name: Leonard H. McCoy Chief Medical Officer *A
Name: Leonard H. McCoy Chief Medical Officer *A
gametext: You may play this personnel at cost +3 to take two dilemmas you own from beneath an opponent's mission and return them to your dilemma pile.

name: Seven of Nine Efficient Analyst *A
Name: Seven of Nine Efficient Analyst *A
gametext: Order - Examine the top two cards of your deck. Replace those cards in any order. Order - Exchange a card in hand with the top card of your deck.

name: Spock Science Officer *A
Name: Spock Science Officer *A
gametext: You may play this personnel at cost +2 to examine the top four dilemmas of an opponent's dilemma pile and remove one from the game. Replace the remaining cards in the same order.

name: Kang Vigilant Commander *A
Name: Kang Vigilant Commander *A
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you command two [Pa] Klingons, this personnel is cost -2. While facing a dilemma, each of your Klingons present is Integrity +2.

name: Koloth Ingratiating Captain *A
Name: Koloth Ingratiating Captain *A
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you command two [Pa] Klingons, this personnel is cost -2. While facing a dilemma, each of your Klingons present is Cunning +2.

name: Kor Courageous Governor *A
Name: Kor Courageous Governor *A
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you command two [Pa] Klingons, this personnel is cost -2. While facing a dilemma, each of your Klingons present is Strength +1.

name: Dukat Pah-Wraith Puppet *A
Name: Dukat Pah-Wraith Puppet *A
gametext: While you have no cards in your discard pile, this personnel is Cunning +4, Strength +4, and cannot be killed by dilemmas. Order - Examine and remove two cards in a player's discard pile from the game. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Khan Noonien Singh Bold Man *A
Name: Khan Noonien Singh Bold Man *A
gametext: This personnel is the corresponding Commander of your unique ship that he is aboard.

name: Charvanek Neutral Zone Commander *A
Name: Charvanek Neutral Zone Commander *A
gametext: When you play this personnel, reveal an opponent's hand. For each personnel revealed, this personnel is cost -1. When this personnel is an eligible target for a random selection, you may choose one: exclude her from that selection; or exclude a [Pa][Rom] personnel present from that selection.

name: Keras Creature of Duty *A
Name: Keras Creature of Duty *A
gametext: At the start of each of your turns, you may choose an opponent and name a card. That opponent searches his or her deck, places the named card in his or her hand, and shuffles his or her deck.

name: Delta Flyer Innovative Vessel *A
Name: Delta Flyer Innovative Vessel *A
gametext: While you do not command a headquarters mission, you may play this ship at the same mission as your {U.S.S. Voyager}. Personnel aboard this ship cannot attempt missions.

name: U.S.S. Enterprise Beautiful Lady *A
Name: U.S.S. Enterprise Beautiful Lady *A
gametext: To play this ship, you must command four [TOS] personnel. You may play this ship at cost +4 to score 5 points.

name: Gal Gath'thong Pride of the Praetor *A
Name: Gal Gath'thong Pride of the Praetor *A
gametext: To play this ship, you must command two [Pa][Rom] personnel. When you move this ship from an opponent's mission, if this ship's Commander is aboard, that opponent must discard two cards from hand (limit two cards per turn).

name: Chula: The Dice *A
Name: Chula: The Dice *A
gametext: Unless you have a personnel with Integrity>6, a second personnel with Cunning>6, and a third personnel with Strength>6, all your personnel are stopped.

name: Paranoid Escape *A
Name: Paranoid Escape *A
gametext: Place this dilemma on this mission. Randomly select a personnel to be removed from the game. You cannot play cards that have the same title as that personnel. When you complete this mission, put the personnel removed from the game in his or her owner's hand and this dilemma is overcome.

name: The Dal'Rok *A
Name: The Dal'Rok *A
gametext: Unless your personnel have a total cost>17, for each headquarters mission you command, randomly select a personnel to be killed and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Temporal Flux Energy Ribbon *A
Name: Temporal Flux Energy Ribbon *A
gametext: Plays on a mission. At the start of each player's turn, that player removes a personnel he or she commands at this mission from the game and moves this event to a different mission. When this event is placed on a headquarters mission, remove it from the game.

name: Elim Garak Crafty Underling *A
Name: Elim Garak Crafty Underling *A
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you command a Treachery personnel, he is cost -1. While this personnel is attempting a mission, you may discard an [AU] card from hand to make him gain a skill of your choice until the end of that mission attempt.

name: Gor Thot *A
Name: Gor Thot *A
gametext: When you play this personnel, name 1, 2 or 3. Until the start of your next turn, each player cannot play cards that have a cost equal to the named number.

name: Pran Thot *A
Name: Pran Thot *A
Skills: Engineer Leadership Medical Navigation Officer Physics
gametext: When you play this personnel, each player discards any number of cards from hand that have a total cost of 4 or more. If a player cannot, he or she discards his or her entire hand.

name: James T. Kirk Brutal Barbarian *A
Name: James T. Kirk Brutal Barbarian *A
gametext: While you command an [AU] personnel, you may play this personnel at cost +2 to have him gain any skill of your choice and make each of your [AU] personnel attributes +1 until the end of this turn.

name: Spock Man of Integrity *A
Name: Spock Man of Integrity *A
gametext: While you command an [AU] personnel, you may play this personnel at cost +2 to make each player place a personnel from hand on a headquarters mission where that personnel could be played.

name: Worf Defiant Commander *A
Name: Worf Defiant Commander *A
gametext: Each of your personnel present who has a cost of 4 or more is attributes +1.

name: Slar Gorn Slave Master *A
Name: Slar Gorn Slave Master *A
gametext: This personnel is Cunning +1 and Strength +1 for each [AU] personnel present.

name: Jonathan Archer Covetous Commander *A
Name: Jonathan Archer Covetous Commander *A
Skills: Astrometrics Leadership Navigation Officer Security 2 Treachery
gametext: When this personnel uses a skill to complete a mission, if you have no cards in hand, score 5 points. You may do this only once each turn. Order - Discard a card from hand to download {Watch Dog}.

name: T'Pol Not a Slave *A
Name: T'Pol Not a Slave *A
Skills: Anthropology Astrometrics Engineer Leadership Officer Programming Science
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you command an Officer personnel, this personnel is cost -1. While you have no cards in hand, this personnel is attributes +1.

name: Tykk *A
Name: Tykk *A
gametext: You may play Breen personnel aboard this ship. When a Breen personnel aboard this ship is involved in an engagement you win, you may place a [Dom] personnel with a cost of 4 or more from hand aboard this ship.

name: U.S.S. Lakota Modified Starship *A
Name: U.S.S. Lakota Modified Starship *A
gametext: This ship is attributes +2 for each corresponding Commander aboard it.

name: Defiant Mirror Warship *A
Name: Defiant Mirror Warship *A
gametext: To play this ship, you must command three [AU] personnel. When you play this ship, you may discard any number of cards from hand. This ship is cost -1 for each card discarded this way.

name: Phoenix Risen From the Ashes *A
Name: Phoenix Risen From the Ashes *A
gametext: While this ship is at a non-headquarters mission and does not have a Damage marker on it, each of your opponents needs an additional 10 points to win the game.

name: I.S.S. Enterprise Terran Flagship *A
Name: I.S.S. Enterprise Terran Flagship *A
gametext: To play this ship, you must command three [AU] personnel. You do not need to spend all your counters on your turns. While you have no cards in your hand, this ship is Range +2.

name: The Clown: Guillotine *A
Name: The Clown: Guillotine *A
gametext: Your opponent names a skill. Randomly select a personnel with that skill. Unless that personnel has an attribute>6, randomly select a second personnel with that skill. Each selected personnel is killed and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Clarity *A
Name: Clarity *A
gametext: To play this event, you must command two Founders. Plays in your core. When your Consume dilemma places any number of dilemmas beneath an opponent's mission, you may destroy this event to choose one of those dilemmas and return it to your dilemma pile.

name: Ghost Stories *A
Name: Ghost Stories *A
gametext: Plays in your core. When you play this event, name a non-dual dilemma. Your copies of that dilemma have: Persistent. (When your personnel complete this mission, this dilemma's owner may discard a non-personnel card from hand to return this dilemma to his or her dilemma pile.)

name: U.S.S. Enterprise-J *A
Name: U.S.S. Enterprise-J *A
gametext: Plays in your core. Each of your personnel at a mission that is worth 40 or more points is attributes +1.

name: Data Tempted by Flesh *A
Name: Data Tempted by Flesh *A
Skills: Astrometrics 2 Engineer Exobiology 2 Programming Science Treachery
gametext: At the start of each of your turns, you may return this personnel to your hand. If you do not, remove this personnel from the game.

name: Odo The Great Link's Savior *A
Name: Odo The Great Link's Savior *A
Skills: Anthropology Exobiology Honor Law Leadership Programming 2 Security
gametext: When this personnel is about to be killed or stopped by a dilemma, you may have each opponent score 5 points to prevent that.

name: Data Lucasian Chair *A
Name: Data Lucasian Chair *A
Skills: 2 Astrometrics Engineer Exobiology Physics Programming 2 Science
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you have completed a mission requiring Diplomacy or Leadership, he is cost -4.

name: Borg Queen's Vessel Borg Flagship *A
Name: Borg Queen's Vessel Borg Flagship *A
gametext: Order - Examine a number of cards from the top of your deck equal to the number of Persistent dilemmas you own beneath an opponent's missions. Set any number of those cards aside face down. Shuffle the remaining cards into your deck and place those cards on top of your deck in any order. You may do this only once each turn.

name: I.K.S. Qel'Poh H.M.S. Bounty *A
Name: I.K.S. Qel'Poh H.M.S. Bounty *A
gametext: While you command two missions that are worth 40 points or more, this ship is Range +2. While a personnel you command aboard this ship is facing a dilemma, you may discard a [Pa] personnel from hand to make that personnel attributes +1 until the end of that dilemma.

name: U.S.S. Pasteur Medical Ship *A
Name: U.S.S. Pasteur Medical Ship *A
gametext: While your [Fed] Medical personnel is aboard this ship, it is Range +5. While your [Fut] personnel aboard is attempting a space mission, you may destroy your Decay event to make that personnel gain a skill required by that mission until the end of this turn.

name: U.S.S. Prometheus Experimental Prototype *A
Name: U.S.S. Prometheus Experimental Prototype *A
gametext: To play this ship, you must discard a personnel who costs 4 or more from hand. When you win an engagement involving this ship, you may discard a Decay event from hand to download a Damage card and place it on an opponent's ship at this mission.

name: U.S.S. Reliant Searching for Lifeless Planets *A
Name: U.S.S. Reliant Searching for Lifeless Planets *A
gametext: While you command a [TOS] personnel, you may play this ship at your {Earth}. When you complete this mission, you may destroy an event. (If that event is your event, you may download an event with a cost of 4 or more.)

name: I.K.S. Kla'Diyus Prototype *A
Name: I.K.S. Kla'Diyus Prototype *A
gametext: When you take this ship off of {Engage Cloak}, it is Weapons +3 until the end of the turn and you may begin an engagement involving your personnel aboard. If you win, name a personnel. Each opponent's copy of that personnel involved in that engagement is killed.

name: I.K.S. Qel'Poh Clandestine Vessel *A
Name: I.K.S. Qel'Poh Clandestine Vessel *A
gametext: While you command two missions that are worth 40 points or more, this ship is Range +2. While you have a captive, this ship is attributes +2.

name: Kronos One *A
Name: Kronos One *A
gametext: Order - If your corresponding Commander is aboard this ship, search your dilemma pile and remove a Persistent dilemma from the game to make this ship attributes +2 until the end of the turn. Then shuffle and replace your dilemma pile. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Devna-Lev Harrad-Sar's Barge *A
Name: Devna-Lev Harrad-Sar's Barge *A
gametext: While three of your [NA] personnel are aboard this ship, it is Range +2 and when you reveal a Persistent dilemma from your dilemma stack, it is cost -1.

name: Scimitar Built for Only One Purpose *A
Name: Scimitar Built for Only One Purpose *A
gametext: When you take this ship off of {Engage Cloak}, you may begin an engagement involving your personnel aboard this ship. If you win, name a personnel. Each opponent's copy of that personnel involved in that engagement is killed. Then unstop this ship and all personnel aboard this ship. You cannot begin any other engagements this turn. Also, this ship is Range +9 until the end of this turn.

name: U.S.S. Prometheus Stolen Prototype *A
Name: U.S.S. Prometheus Stolen Prototype *A
gametext: To play this ship, you must discard a personnel who costs 4 or more from hand. When you win an engagement involving this ship, you may discard a personnel who has a cost of 4 or more from hand to download a Damage card and place it on an opponent's ship at this mission.

name: Benjamin Sisko Shipwright *
Name: Benjamin Sisko Shipwright *
gametext: While this personnel is aboard a [Baj] ship, it is Range +1.

name: Borg Queen Perfectionist *
Name: Borg Queen Perfectionist *
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, each personnel you command but do not own cannot be stopped.

name: Dukat True Cardassian *
Name: Dukat True Cardassian *
gametext: When an engagement involving this personnel ends, the ship he is aboard and each of your [Car] personnel aboard it are not stopped. You cannot begin any other engagements this turn.

name: Kudak'Etan Arrogant First *
Name: Kudak'Etan Arrogant First *
gametext: Order - Discard a Vorta from hand to place this personnel and any number of your Jem'Hadar present aboard a ship at the same mission.

name: Data Commanding Officer *
Name: Data Commanding Officer *
gametext: Order - Discard a card from hand to name a card. When an opponent plays that card, score 5 points. This effect lasts until the start of your next turn. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Jean-Luc Picard Starship Captain *
Name: Jean-Luc Picard Starship Captain *
Skills: Diplomacy Honor Law Leadership Navigation Officer
gametext: Order - This personnel loses Diplomacy, Law, and Navigation and gains Anthropology, Archaeology, and Science until the end of this turn. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Gowron Sole Leader of the Empire *
Name: Gowron Sole Leader of the Empire *
gametext: When your Honor Klingon is about to be stopped or killed by a dilemma, you may discard a Treachery Klingon from hand to prevent that. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Arctus Baran Treasure Seeker *
Name: Arctus Baran Treasure Seeker *
gametext: When this personnel uses a skill to complete a mission, you may download an Artifact card and place it in your core (if it is an event) or present with this personnel (if it is an equipment).

name: Velal Reluctant Aggressor *
Name: Velal Reluctant Aggressor *
gametext: When the player on your right attempts this mission, if you command a Maneuver event, you may draw an extra dilemma and spend one extra in total cost on dilemmas.

name: Baraka *
Name: Baraka *
gametext: Order - Lose 5 points to make this ship Range +10 until the end of this turn.

name: Queen's Borg Cube *
Name: Queen's Borg Cube *
gametext: You may use a card which begins an engagement to begin one involving this ship even if it is at a headquarters mission.

name: Naprem *
Name: Naprem *
gametext: While this ship is at an opponent's planet mission, if your personnel is on that planet, he or she is an Infiltrator.

name: U.S.S. Defiant Commandeered Warship *
Name: U.S.S. Defiant Commandeered Warship *
gametext: To staff this ship, you must have an [Dom] Engineer personnel aboard. Order - If this ship is staffed and at your mission, stop this ship to take an overcome dilemma from beneath that mission and place it face up beneath your [AQ] mission.

name: U.S.S. Enterprise-D Explorer *
Name: U.S.S. Enterprise-D Explorer *
gametext: When you complete a space mission requiring Diplomacy, if this ship is at that mission, score 10 points.

name: U.S.S. Sutherland *
Name: U.S.S. Sutherland *
gametext: When you fail a mission attempt at a space mission, if this ship is at that mission, you may discard three cards from hand to place the top card of an opponent's dilemma pile face up beneath this mission. If you do this, you cannot attempt this mission again this turn.

name: I.K.S. Bortas *
Name: I.K.S. Bortas *
gametext: When you win an engagement involving this ship, you may discard a card from hand to download a Maneuver event.

name: Fortune Raider for Hire *
Name: Fortune Raider for Hire *
gametext: While your Treachery personnel is aboard this ship, he or she is attributes +1 for each Artifact you command (limit +3).

name: Rovaran *
Name: Rovaran *
gametext: When you win an engagement involving this ship, you may examine the loser's hand and choose a card to be removed from the game. Order - Discard a Maneuver card from hand to begin an engagement involving this ship.

name: Caretaker's Array (Promo)
Name: Caretaker's Array (Promo)
gametext: At the start of each of your turns, you may discard a card from hand to download {Finding Our Way}. When a card instructs you to place a ship at your headquarters mission, that ship may be placed at this mission instead.

name: Accelerated Aging
Name: Accelerated Aging
gametext: Place this dilemma on this mission. Each personnel at this mission cannot use their first-listed skill. At the end of this mission attempt, this dilemma is overcome.

name: Destined Journey
Name: Destined Journey
gametext: Choose a personnel who has Honor or Leadership to be stopped. If that personnel has both Honor and Leadership, you may unstop your stopped personnel present and that personnel joins the mission attempt. If you cannot choose a personnel with Honor or Leadership, all your personnel are stopped.

name: Final Triumph
Name: Final Triumph
gametext: Unless you choose to discard an event from your hand, your opponent chooses a personnel to be stopped.

name: Not Quite Domesticated Pets
Name: Not Quite Domesticated Pets
gametext: Unless you have Diplomacy, 2 Leadership and Integrity>28 or Biology, 2 Exobiology and Cunning>34, randomly select a personnel to be stopped. If your opponent has more events in his or her core than you and he or she does not command that personnel, place that personnel at his or her headquarters mission instead and that opponent now commands that personnel.

name: Subterranean Barrier
Name: Subterranean Barrier
gametext: Unless you have Biology, Exobiology, Geology and Integrity>25 or Diplomacy, Leadership, Officer and Cunning>32, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: The Caretaker's "Guests"
Name: The Caretaker's "Guests"
gametext: Your opponent chooses a personnel. You may replace him or her with any one personnel of the same affiliation from your discard pile. Place the personnel your opponent chose on the top of his or her owner's deck.

name: Unbelievable Emergency
Name: Unbelievable Emergency
gametext: Your opponent names a skill. For each headquarters mission you command, randomly select two personnel to be stopped. If either of those personnel that is selected has the named skill, kill that personnel instead.

name: Blow You Out of the Stars
Name: Blow You Out of the Stars
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Begin an engagement involving your [Kli] personnel. If you win, place this event on an opponent's ship involved. That opponent may place one of his or her unique personnel involved in your brig to prevent this and destroy this event. If you do not win, destroy this event. Damage - This ship is attributes -2.

name: Cellular Peptide Cake
Name: Cellular Peptide Cake
Keywords: Replicate - Discard an event from your hand.
gametext: To play this event, you must command a Klingon. Each player returns a non-[Ref] event in an opponent's core to its owner's hand. Destroy this event.

name: Learning Curve
Name: Learning Curve
gametext: Plays in your core. At the end of each of your turns, if you played two or more [Maq] personnel this turn, place two cards from the top of your deck on this event. You may play cards from this event as though there were in your hand.

name: No-Win Situation
Name: No-Win Situation
gametext: Plays in your core. When your dilemma is prevented or its requirements are met, randomly select an opponent's personnel that was facing that dilemma to be stopped.

name: The Genesis Effect
Name: The Genesis Effect
gametext: Plays on your mission. When you play this event, name a dilemma. When your personnel face that dilemma at this mission, prevent and overcome it.

name: Khan!
Name: Khan!
gametext: When an opponent scores 5 or more points, if he or she has not completed a mission, he or she loses 5 points.

name: Genesis Planet
Name: Genesis Planet
Affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.
Skills: Geology, Cunning>42 and (Biology, 2 Exobiology and 2 Science or 2 Security, Transporters and 2 Treachery)
gametext: Order - If this mission is completed, lose 5 points to make this a space mission. Kill all personnel (and destroy all equipment) on this mission.

name: Kira Nerys Outspoken Major
Name: Kira Nerys Outspoken Major
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, each [Baj] personnel present is attributes +1 and gains Honor.

name: Jasad
Name: Jasad
gametext: While this personnel is aboard your [Car] ship, that ship is attributes +1 for each of your different Capture cards and each of your different Punishment cards.

name: James T. Kirk Original Thinker
Name: James T. Kirk Original Thinker
gametext: When a dilemma is about to be revealed, if this personnel is attempting a mission, you may remove him from the game to prevent and overcome that dilemma.

name: Spock Trainee Instructor
Name: Spock Trainee Instructor
Skills: Biology Honor Leadership Officer Physics Science
gametext: When a Damage card is about to be placed on your ship that this personnel is aboard, you may kill him to remove it from the game instead.

name: Tom Paris "Starfleet Observer"
Name: Tom Paris "Starfleet Observer"
gametext: When this personnel is stopped by a dilemma, you may discard a card from hand to choose one: draw two cards; or take a [Maq] personnel from your discard pile into your hand.

name: Tuvok Undercover
Name: Tuvok Undercover
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma and you have a [Maq] personnel present, this personnel is attributes +1 and gains Intelligence.

name: Saavik Protegee
Name: Saavik Protegee
gametext: When you play this personnel, if James T. Kirk is at this mission, you may download {No-Win Situation}.

name: Kruge Instinctive Commander
Name: Kruge Instinctive Commander
gametext: When you win an engagement involving this personnel and there are two or less personnel aboard an opponent's ship involved, you may remove a damage event from that ship to place those personnel in your brig. You now command that ship (it is now a [Kli] ship).

name: Carol Marcus Intelligent Scientist
Name: Carol Marcus Intelligent Scientist
gametext: This personnel is Cunning +1 for each card in an opponent's hand (limit +5).

name: David Marcus Young Scientist
Name: David Marcus Young Scientist
gametext: When this personnel is stopped by a dilemma, you may destroy an event in your core (if you do not, lose 5 points instead).

name: Khan Noonien Singh Genetically-Engineered Nemesis
Name: Khan Noonien Singh Genetically-Engineered Nemesis
gametext: While present with an opponent's personnel, each of that opponent's personnel is attributes -1.

name: Queen's Borg Sphere Contingency Vessel
Name: Queen's Borg Sphere Contingency Vessel
gametext: While this ship is at a [Bor] mission, personnel aboard it are attributes +1. While your Borg Queen is aboard this ship, it is staffed.

name: U.S.S. Enterprise Earth's Savior
Name: U.S.S. Enterprise Earth's Savior
gametext: While you command a [TOS] personnel, you may play this ship at your {Earth}. When this ship is about to move between Earth and another mission, subtract 1 from the Range required.

name: Earth Cradle of the Federation (SR)
Name: Earth Cradle of the Federation (SR)
Skills: You may play [TNG] cards, [E] cards, [NA] cards, and equipment at this mission.

name: Mouth of the Wormhole Deep Space 9 (SR)
Name: Mouth of the Wormhole Deep Space 9 (SR)
Skills: You may play [DS9] cards, [NA] cards, and equipment at this mission.
gametext: When any player is about to move a ship between this mission and a [GQ] mission, do not add 2 to the span total of those missions.

name: Qo'noS Heart of the Empire (SR)
Name: Qo'noS Heart of the Empire (SR)
Skills: You may play [Kli] cards, [NA] cards, and equipment at this mission.

name: Romulus Seat of Power (SR)
Name: Romulus Seat of Power (SR)
Skills: You may play [Rom] cards, [NA] cards, and equipment at this mission.

name: Authenticate Artifacts (SR)
Name: Authenticate Artifacts (SR)
gametext: Unless you have a personnel who has 2 Anthropology or a personnel who has 2 Archaeology, your opponent chooses an Anthropology or Archaeology personnel to be stopped. If your opponent cannot, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Command Decisions (SR)
Name: Command Decisions (SR)
gametext: Choose a personnel who has Leadership or Officer to be stopped. If you cannot, randomly select a personnel to be killed.

name: Kolaran Raiders (SR)
Name: Kolaran Raiders (SR)
gametext: Choose a personnel who has Leadership or Security to be stopped. If you cannot, randomly select a personnel to be killed.

name: Limited Welcome (SR)
Name: Limited Welcome (SR)
gametext: Randomly select nine personnel. All your other personnel are stopped. Place this dilemma on this mission. When you attempt this mission again, after your opponent draws dilemmas, he or she may take this dilemma and add it to those drawn.

name: Ornaran Threat (SR)
Name: Ornaran Threat (SR)
gametext: Randomly select a personnel to be stopped. Unless you have Diplomacy and Medical or 2 Security, that personnel is killed instead, then all your other personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Pinned Down (SR)
Name: Pinned Down (SR)
gametext: Randomly select a personnel to be stopped. If you still have nine personnel remaining, randomly select a second personnel to be stopped. If you still have ten personnel remaining, randomly select a third personnel to be stopped.

name: Systems Diagnostic (SR)
Name: Systems Diagnostic (SR)
gametext: Choose a personnel who has Engineer or Programming to be stopped. If you cannot, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Triage (SR)
Name: Triage (SR)
gametext: Choose a personnel who has Biology or Medical to be stopped. If you cannot, randomly select a personnel to be killed.

name: Wavefront (SR)
Name: Wavefront (SR)
gametext: Unless you have a personnel who has 2 Astrometrics or a personnel who has 2 Navigation, your opponent chooses an Astrometrics or Navigation personnel to be stopped. If your opponent cannot, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Cry "Havoc!" (SR)
Name: Cry "Havoc!" (SR)
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin an engagement involving your Leadership personnel. If you win, randomly kill an opponent's personnel involved.

name: D'Arsay Archive (SR)
Name: D'Arsay Archive (SR)
gametext: Count the number of cards in your hand, shuffle them, and place them on the bottom of your deck to draw an equal number of cards. Destroy this event.

name: Salvaging the Wreckage (SR)
Name: Salvaging the Wreckage (SR)
gametext: Take up to four personnel and ship cards from your discard pile and place them on the bottom of your deck in any order. Remove this event from the game.

name: Render Assistance (SR)
Name: Render Assistance (SR)
gametext: When an engagement involving your ship begins, another one of your ships at that mission joins the engagement.

name: Azetbur Visionary Chancellor
Name: Azetbur Visionary Chancellor
Skills: Anthropology Diplomacy Exobiology Honor Law 2 Leadership
gametext: When this personnel uses a skill to complete a mission, you may destroy three of your Assault and/or Maneuver events to score 10 points.

name: Lance Cartwright Co-Conspirator
Name: Lance Cartwright Co-Conspirator
Skills: Astrometrics Intelligence Leadership Officer Security Treachery
gametext: To play this personnel, you must destroy an event you command.

name: Instigate Dissension
Name: Instigate Dissension
gametext: Randomly select two personnel to be stopped. Unless you command one or less headquarters missions, your opponent places this dilemma on one of your headquarters missions. You cannot play personnel at this mission. At the end of each of your turns, you may reveal three different non-[NA] personnel from hand who could be played at this headquarters to remove this dilemma from the game.

name: Breaking the Ice
Name: Breaking the Ice
gametext: Unless you have 3 Geology or two non-Hand Weapon equipment, all your personnel are stopped.

name: We'll Never Know
Name: We'll Never Know
gametext: Unless you have 3 Physics or two non-Hand Weapon equipment, all your personnel are stopped.

name: Once More Unto the Breach
Name: Once More Unto the Breach
gametext: Your opponent chooses a staffed Cloaking Device ship he or she commands at this mission. That ship is Weapons +1 until the end of this dilemma. Unless you have Shields>that ship's Weapons, randomly select a personnel to be killed and all of your personnel are stopped.

name: Debate Over Dinner
Name: Debate Over Dinner
gametext: Plays on a mission with no dilemmas beneath it (limit one per mission). When a Consume dilemma is revealed at this mission, place one less dilemma under this mission than that Consume dilemma indicates. When a player completes this mission, he or she may score 5 points.

name: Gaila Arms Dealer
Name: Gaila Arms Dealer
gametext: At the start of each of your turns, you may take an equipment from beneath your {Ferenginar} and place it in your discard pile to spend 4 additional counters this turn.

name: D'Ral Mutinous Commander
Name: D'Ral Mutinous Commander
gametext: When your [Rom] personnel present is randomly selected by a dilemma, you may replace that personnel with a [Rom] personnel from hand who has the same cost as that personnel. Place the personnel you replaced in his or her owner's discard pile.

name: Surprise Amity
Name: Surprise Amity
gametext: When your opponent's mission attempt ends, if that opponent has more points than you, stop each of that opponent's personnel. Place this interrupt on the bottom of your deck.

name: Breach Barrier
Name: Breach Barrier
Affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.
gametext: When you are about to complete this mission, if an opponent has more points than you, choose one - score 5 points; unstop all your personnel; or restore Range of each ship you command.

name: U.S.S. Enterprise-D Salvaged Ship
Name: U.S.S. Enterprise-D Salvaged Ship
gametext: This ship is Range +2 for each [Fer] Programming personnel aboard. When your personnel complete a planet mission requiring Acquisition, if this ship is at that mission, you may score 10 points.

name: Kira Nerys Rescuer
Name: Kira Nerys Rescuer
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may choose one: take up to two of your [Baj] personnel from your discard pile into hand; or place the bottom two cards of your deck in your discard pile.

name: Strength of Spirit
Name: Strength of Spirit
gametext: Plays in your core. At the start of each of your turns, if you command three different species, you may place this event on the bottom of your deck to download a [SF] Human who has a cost of 3 or less.

name: Vaatrik Pallra Seductive Manipulator
Name: Vaatrik Pallra Seductive Manipulator
gametext: When this personnel begins a mission attempt, you may remove a non-[Baj] personnel in your discard pile from the game to download a [Baj] personnel.

name: Operation Retrieve
Name: Operation Retrieve
gametext: Plays in your core. When you are about to place an interrupt in your discard pile, if your opponent's personnel is facing a dilemma you own, you may place that interrupt on the bottom of your deck instead.

name: What You Leave Behind
Name: What You Leave Behind
gametext: Discard a card from hand to take the bottom two cards of your deck and place them on the top of their owners' decks in random order. Remove this event from the game.

name: Aldea Aid Legendary Civilization
Name: Aldea Aid Legendary Civilization
Affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.
Skills: Biology, Diplomacy, Exobiology, Medical, and Cunning>34
gametext: When you complete this mission, place up to 12 total cost of your personnel involved beneath their owners' decks. Your opponents must place their personnel with at least the same total cost beneath their owner's decks.

name: Laurence T. Stone Portmaster
Name: Laurence T. Stone Portmaster
gametext: You may play this personnel at cost +3 to place up to three of your [TOS] personnel who have a cost of 1 or less on the bottom of their owner's decks.

name: The Conscience of the King
Name: The Conscience of the King
gametext: Place this dilemma on this mission. Each planet dilemma and space dilemma revealed at this mission is cost -1.

name: Ferengi Locator Bomb
Name: Ferengi Locator Bomb
gametext: Unless you have Navigation, Physics, and Programming or Acquisition, Treachery, and Cunning>32, randomly select a personnel to be placed on the bottom of his or her owner's deck and all your personnel are stopped.

name: What Lies Beneath
Name: What Lies Beneath
gametext: Unless you have Archaeology, Geology, and Honor or Anthropology, Treachery, and Cunning>32, randomly select a personnel to be placed on the bottom of his or her owner's deck and all your personnel are stopped.

name: Harvest Drone
Name: Harvest Drone
gametext: When you take command of a personnel that you do not own, you may randomly select an opponent's personnel present with this personnel, take command of him or her, and place this personnel on the bottom of your deck.

name: Synergy Drone
Name: Synergy Drone
gametext: When this personnel gains a skill he does not already have, he is attributes +1 until the end of the turn (limit +4).

name: Three of Twelve Specialty Drone
Name: Three of Twelve Specialty Drone
gametext: While this personnel is attempting a mission, each of your unique personnel present is attributes +1.

name: Weyoun Scheming Negotiator
Name: Weyoun Scheming Negotiator
gametext: When you play a [Dom] Treachery personnel, you may take a Jem'Hadar personnel from your discard pile and place it on the bottom of your deck.

name: The Perils of Peacemaking
Name: The Perils of Peacemaking
gametext: When a dilemma you own is revealed, the opponent on your left takes a copy of that dilemma from his or her dilemma pile and removes it from the game. That opponent shuffles and replaces his or her dilemma pile face down. Place this interrupt on the bottom of your deck.

name: The Cost of Freedom
Name: The Cost of Freedom
gametext: Plays in your core. At the start of your Execute Orders segment, discard the top three cards of your deck. For each event you discarded this way, each of your [Car] personnel is attributes +1 until the end of the turn. If you do not discard an event this way, all of your [Car] personnel are stopped.

name: Kes Experienced Ocampa
Name: Kes Experienced Ocampa
Skills: Anthropology Exobiology Honor Medical Science Telepathy
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may discard an equipment or event from hand to make this personnel cost -2. When this personnel uses a skill to complete a [DQ] mission, each player may download a personnel with that skill.

name: Inexorable Torture
Name: Inexorable Torture
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Car] personnel. Plays in your core. When you are about to place a Capture card or a Punishment card in your discard pile, you may discard the top two cards of your deck to place that card on the bottom of your deck instead.

name: Shall We Not Revenge?
Name: Shall We Not Revenge?
gametext: When an opponent's personnel uses his or her Anthropology, Astrometrics, Diplomacy, or Security, if he or she is facing a dilemma you own, place the top card of your dilemma pile face down beneath your dilemma stack to kill that personnel. Place this interrupt on the bottom of your deck.

name: Predictable Response
Name: Predictable Response
gametext: Unless you have Anthropology and Diplomacy or 2 Security, all your [Cmd] personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Curt Reprimand
Name: Curt Reprimand
gametext: Randomly select three personnel. If the cost of any of those personnel is 1 or less, all three are stopped. Otherwise, randomly select one of those personnel to be stopped.

name: Show Trial
Name: Show Trial
gametext: Randomly select a personnel who has Leadership or Medical to be stopped. If you have more points than each of your opponents, randomly select an additional personnel to be stopped.

name: The Void Alliance
Name: The Void Alliance
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Voy] personnel. Plays in your core. When your personnel is facing a dilemma, you may give command of this event to the player on your left to have that personnel gain a skill of your choice until the end of that dilemma (move this event to his or her core).

name: Treasured Collectibles
Name: Treasured Collectibles
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Fer] personnel. Place a number of your equipment with a total cost of 3 or more on the bottom of their owner's deck to spend an additional 7 counters this turn. Destroy this event.

name: Warrior's Resolve
Name: Warrior's Resolve
gametext: Order - Randomly select a card in your discard pile to be removed from the game. If that card was a [Kli] personnel, add that personnel's cost to the attributes of each of your [Kli] ships until the end of turn. Place this interrupt on the bottom of your deck.

name: Hikaru Sulu Loyal Captain
Name: Hikaru Sulu Loyal Captain
Skills: Archaeology Astrometrics Honor Leadership Navigation Officer
gametext: You may play this personnel aboard your {U.S.S. Excelsior}. When the ship this personnel is aboard is about to move to a mission where you command a ship, subtract 2 from the Range required.

name: Jake Sisko Engineer's Apprentice
Name: Jake Sisko Engineer's Apprentice
gametext: When an event in your core is destroyed, if this personnel is equipped with a non-Hand Weapon equipment, you may download a [DS9] personnel. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Nog Eager Ensign
Name: Nog Eager Ensign
gametext: When an event in your core is destroyed, if this personnel is equipped with a non-Hand Weapon equipment, you may download an event. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Kerla Military Advisor
Name: Kerla Military Advisor
gametext: When you win an engagement involving this personnel, you may place him on the bottom of his owner's deck to choose one of your non-headquarters missions. The player on your left places the top card of his or her dilemma pile beneath that mission.

name: Annorax Temporal Architect
Name: Annorax Temporal Architect
Skills: Anthropology 2 Engineer Leadership Physics Science 2 Treachery
gametext: While this personnel is aboard your non-[Fed] ship, that ship is Weapons +2. Order - Remove your Temporal event that has a cost of 3 or more from the game to name an event. Each player shuffles each copy of that event they command into its owner's deck.

name: Sorus
Name: Sorus
gametext: Order - Place this personnel on the bottom of his owner's deck to examine each opponent's hand. You may discard an event or interrupt from each examined hand.

name: Jonathan Archer Heroic Diplomat
Name: Jonathan Archer Heroic Diplomat
Skills: Anthropology Diplomacy Exobiology Honor Leadership Navigation Officer
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, if you command three non-Human personnel, you may discard the top card of your deck to make each of your Humans attributes +1 until the end of that dilemma.

name: Kyana's Hope Temporal Weapon
Name: Kyana's Hope Temporal Weapon
gametext: This ship is attributes +1 for each of your Temporal events. Order - Remove a number of your Temporal events with a total cost of 4 or more from the game to name a personnel. Each player shuffles each copy of that personnel they command into his or her owner's deck.

name: Bold Plan
Name: Bold Plan
gametext: Your opponent may return up to two dilemmas from beneath any of your non-headquarters missions to their owner's dilemma piles.

name: Let Them Worry
Name: Let Them Worry
gametext: Unless you have 3 Honor or Medical, Physics, and Strength>28, randomly select a personnel to be stopped, and if your opponent commands 3 Shape-shifter personnel, all your personnel are stopped.

name: Reprogrammed
Name: Reprogrammed
gametext: When an opponent plays an interrupt, if one of his or her personnel is facing a dilemma you own, discard a personnel from hand to prevent that interrupt and place it in its owner's discard pile.

name: Inversion Mystery
Name: Inversion Mystery
Affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.
gametext: When you complete this mission, name a dilemma. When your personnel face that dilemma, you may prevent it and overcome it.

name: Husnock Ship
Name: Husnock Ship
gametext: This ship does not have to be staffed to move to an opponent's mission. When this ship is about to move to an opponent's mission, subtract 4 from the span total required. When personnel that the player on your right commands begin a mission attempt at this mission, you may draw an extra dilemma and spend one extra on dilemmas.

name: One to One
Name: One to One
gametext: Randomly select two personnel. If they both are [Cmd] or both are [Stf], they are stopped.

name: Treachery Running Deep
Name: Treachery Running Deep
gametext: Unless you have 3 Anthropology or Physics, Treachery, and Cunning>28, randomly select a personnel to be stopped, and discard a card from hand for each Praetor personnel and Senator personnel your opponent commands.

name: Ro Laren Headstrong Ensign
Name: Ro Laren Headstrong Ensign
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dual dilemma, she cannot be randomly selected by dilemmas.

name: Neral Seasoned Politician
Name: Neral Seasoned Politician
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma that requires Leadership or Treachery, he and each Treachery personnel present cannot be randomly selected by that dilemma.

name: All-Consuming Evil
Name: All-Consuming Evil
gametext: Place this dilemma on top of its owner's dilemma pile. When this dilemma is placed beneath a mission by a Consume dilemma, your opponent names a skill. Randomly select a personnel that is attempting that mission with that skill to be killed.

name: Artificial Wormhole
Name: Artificial Wormhole
gametext: Your personnel cannot gain skills while facing this dilemma. Unless you have 2 Leadership and 2 Officer, or Engineer, Programming, and Cunning>33, or this ship's Commander aboard your opponent may take a ship at a mission and place it at a different mission. That ship's Range for this turn is used.

name: Best Interests at Heart
Name: Best Interests at Heart
gametext: Randomly select three personnel. If the total cost of those personnel is 4 or less, lose 5 points and your opponent scores 5 points. Otherwise, randomly select one of those personnel to be stopped.

name: Ajur Temporal Thief
Name: Ajur Temporal Thief
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may search your dilemma pile for a dilemma that costs 3 or more and set it aside. Shuffle and replace your dilemma pile and place that dilemma on top of your dilemma pile.

name: Boratus Temporal Thief
Name: Boratus Temporal Thief
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may search your dilemma pile for a dilemma that costs 3 or less and set it aside. Shuffle and replace your dilemma pile and place that dilemma on top of your dilemma pile.

name: Skeptical Superiors
Name: Skeptical Superiors
gametext: Unless you have 3 Leadership or Astrometrics, Programming, and Cunning>28, randomly select a personnel to be stopped, and randomly select a personnel to be stopped for each Admiral personnel your opponent commands.

name: The Clown: On His Throne
Name: The Clown: On His Throne
gametext: Place this dilemma on this mission. Your opponent names an attribute (Integrity, Cunning, or Strength). Replace attributes in this mission's requirements (and alternate requirements in game text) with the named attribute. At the end of the turn, remove this dilemma from the game.

name: Helen Noel Enterprise Psychiatrist
Name: Helen Noel Enterprise Psychiatrist
gametext: You may play this personnel at cost +3 to reveal the top four dilemmas of an opponent's dilemma pile and remove each dilemma that has a cost of 1 or more and does not require a skill from the game. The remaining dilemmas return to their owner's dilemma pile.

name: Klingon Law
Name: Klingon Law
gametext: Unless you have Integrity>40 or Leadership, Programming, and Cunning>28, randomly select a personnel to be stopped, and your opponent may draw a card for each Chancellor personnel and High Council Member personnel he or she commands.

name: The Seen and the Unseen
Name: The Seen and the Unseen
gametext: Unless at least half your personnel are not [NA], stop all your personnel, lose 5 points, and your opponent scores 5 points.

name: Kira Nerys Defiant Leader
Name: Kira Nerys Defiant Leader
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you command [HQ] {Bajor}, you may destroy an event. When an opponent plays an interrupt, if you command [HQ] {Mouth of the Wormhole}, you may return this personnel to her owner's hand to prevent that interrupt and place it in its owner's discard pile.

name: Unionize
Name: Unionize
gametext: Unless you have 3 Security or Anthropology, Diplomacy, and Integrity>24, randomly select a personnel to be stopped, and you must destroy any number of events from your core that have a total cost equal to or greater than the number of Dabo Girl personnel and Waiter personnel your opponent commands.

name: Hindrance
Name: Hindrance
gametext: Plays in your core. When personnel that the player on your right commands begin a mission attempt, you may kill one of your unique [Fut] personnel who costs 3 or more and destroy this event to draw three extra dilemmas and spend three extra in total cost on dilemmas.

name: Keeping Track of You
Name: Keeping Track of You
gametext: When you are about to play this event, choose one: it gains the gametext of a non-unique Q event you command; or it gains the gametext of a non-unique Q event an opponent commands.

name: Savagery to Match Their Numbers
Name: Savagery to Match Their Numbers
gametext: Unless you have Strength>40 or Officer, Security, and Cunning>28, randomly select a personnel to be stopped, and choose a number of personnel who have a total cost equal to or greater than the number of Alpha personnel your opponent commands to be killed.

name: The Undiscovered Country
Name: The Undiscovered Country
gametext: Plays in your core. When a personnel that the player on your right commands begins a mission attempt, before you have drawn dilemmas, you may destroy this event to name a personnel. Each opponent's personnel with that card title is stopped.

name: Uninvited
Name: Uninvited
gametext: When personnel that the player on your right commands begin a mission attempt, search your dilemma pile for a dilemma that costs 1 or less, and place it aside. Shuffle and replace your dilemma pile. After you have chosen dilemmas for your dilemma stack, place that dilemma on top of your dilemma stack.

name: Patriotic Spirit
Name: Patriotic Spirit
gametext: Unless you have 3 Officer or Honor, Leadership, and Strength>28, randomly select a personnel to be stopped, and randomly select a personnel to be stopped for each Glinn personnel your opponent commands.

name: Telle Macet's Aide
Name: Telle Macet's Aide
gametext: When this personnel is about to face a dual dilemma, you may discard three cards from hand to exchange that dilemma with a dual dilemma beneath this mission that this personnel has not faced this turn.

name: Delivery Boy
Name: Delivery Boy
gametext: Plays in your core. When you are about to play a Q event or a Temporal event, you may destroy this event to play that event at cost -3.

name: Reyga Young Scientist
Name: Reyga Young Scientist
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma that has a cost of 1 or more and does not require a skill, you may stop him and remove two Rule cards from beneath your {Ferenginar} from the game to prevent and overcome that dilemma.

name: Subliminal Signal
Name: Subliminal Signal
gametext: Plays in your core. When a dilemma that has a cost of 3 is revealed from your dilemma stack, you may place the top card of your dilemma pile face up beneath the mission being attempted to make that dilemma cost -3.

name: Arak'Taral Suspicious Second
Name: Arak'Taral Suspicious Second
gametext: When this personnel is an eligible target for a random selection, you may exclude a [Cmd] personnel present from that selection.

name: Strategic Superiority
Name: Strategic Superiority
gametext: Unless you have 3 Diplomacy or Weapons>8, randomly select a personnel to be stopped, and choose a number of personnel who have a total cost equal to or greater than the number of General personnel your opponent commands to be killed.

name: Klag Second Officer
Name: Klag Second Officer
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma that requires Honor or Officer, he and each Honor personnel present cannot be randomly selected by that dilemma.

name: The Beast at El-Adrel
Name: The Beast at El-Adrel
gametext: Your personnel cannot gain skills while facing this dilemma. Unless you have 2 Diplomacy and 2 Leadership, or Engineer, Transporters, and Cunning>33 or a Hand Weapon, all your personnel are stopped.

name: The Waters Aid Maritime Sovereignty
Name: The Waters Aid Maritime Sovereignty
Affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.
Skills: Diplomacy, Leadership, Science, and Integrity>34 or Navigation, Physics, Treachery, and Cunning>36
gametext: When you complete this mission, take a dilemma you own from beneath a mission and return it to your dilemma pile.

name: Two of Two Adaptation Drone
Name: Two of Two Adaptation Drone
gametext: When this personnel begins a mission attempt, you may name a dilemma that is beneath one of your missions. When he faces that dilemma, you may prevent that dilemma and overcome it. This effect lasts until the end of this turn.

name: Lore Brother and Son
Name: Lore Brother and Son
gametext: While this personnel is facing a non-Consume dilemma, he cannot be killed or stopped.

name: Unwanted Guests
Name: Unwanted Guests
gametext: Your opponent randomly discards a personnel from his or her hand. Unless you have that personnel's skills, all your personnel are stopped.

name: Chula: Unfortunate Roll
Name: Chula: Unfortunate Roll
gametext: Randomly select three personnel. If their total Integrity is odd, all three are stopped.

name: In-Fighting
Name: In-Fighting
gametext: Your opponent names a skill. Unless you have three or less of that skill, randomly select a personnel with that skill to be killed.

name: Time for Action
Name: Time for Action
gametext: For each headquarters mission your opponent commands, this dilemma is cost +2. Randomly select a personnel. Unless he or she has at least one skill listed in this mission's requirements, stop that personnel, then for each headquarters mission you command, randomly select another personnel to be stopped.

name: Tabor Apoplectic Bajoran
Name: Tabor Apoplectic Bajoran
gametext: While you have six or more personnel in your discard pile, this personnel is Cunning +2, Strength +2, and cannot be stopped by dilemmas.

name: George Primmin Starfleet Security
Name: George Primmin Starfleet Security
gametext: When this personnel is about to be stopped by a dilemma, name a unique personnel present. That personnel cannot be killed or stopped by dilemmas until the end of turn.

name: Masaro Idealistic Saboteur
Name: Masaro Idealistic Saboteur
gametext: Order - If you command four different species, kill this personnel to examine the top four dilemmas of an opponent's dilemma pile and remove one from the game. The remaining dilemmas return to their owner's dilemma pile.

name: Azetbur Visionary Chancellor *VP
Name: Azetbur Visionary Chancellor *VP
Skills: Anthropology Diplomacy Exobiology Honor Law 2 Leadership
gametext: When this personnel uses a skill to complete a mission, you may destroy three of your Assault and/or Maneuver events to score 10 points.

name: Ro Laren Headstrong Ensign *VP
Name: Ro Laren Headstrong Ensign *VP
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dual dilemma, she cannot be randomly selected by dilemmas.

name: All-Consuming Evil *VP
Name: All-Consuming Evil *VP
gametext: Place this dilemma on top of its owner's dilemma pile. When this dilemma is placed beneath a mission by a Consume dilemma, your opponent names a skill. Randomly select a personnel that is attempting that mission with that skill to be killed.

name: Hikaru Sulu Loyal Captain *VP
Name: Hikaru Sulu Loyal Captain *VP
Skills: Archaeology Astrometrics Honor Leadership Navigation Officer
gametext: You may play this personnel aboard your {U.S.S. Excelsior}. When the ship this personnel is aboard is about to move to a mission where you command a ship, subtract 2 from the Range required.

name: Klag Second Officer *VP
Name: Klag Second Officer *VP
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma that requires Honor or Officer, he and each Honor personnel present cannot be randomly selected by that dilemma.

name: Earth Cradle of the Federation *VP
Name: Earth Cradle of the Federation *VP
Skills: You may play [TNG] cards, [E] cards, [NA] cards, and equipment at this mission.

name: At What Cost? *VP
Name: At What Cost? *VP
gametext: Lose 5 points to spend 7 additional counters this turn. Destroy this event.

name: Causal Recursion
Name: Causal Recursion
gametext: Unless you choose to remove five cards in your discard pile from the game or have three missions worth 40 or more points each, place this dilemma in your core. You need an additional 10 points to win the game. When you score points from an event, you may remove this dilemma from the game.

name: Covert Ambush
Name: Covert Ambush
gametext: Unless you have a personnel with 2 Engineer or a personnel with 2 Programming, place this dilemma in your core. When your personnel is about to be placed in an opponent's brig, this dilemma's owner may remove this dilemma from the game to randomly select an additional personnel present to be placed in that opponent's brig.

name: Full Complement
Name: Full Complement
gametext: If your personnel have faced another dilemma during this mission attempt, this dilemma is cost +2. Unless you have five or more personnel, randomly select a personnel to return to his or her owner's hand and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: He Wasn't Nice
Name: He Wasn't Nice
gametext: This dilemma is cost +5. Your opponent names a personnel. Kill each personnel with that card title.

name: Miner Revolt
Name: Miner Revolt
gametext: Randomly select personnel until their total cost is 6 or more. Those personnel are stopped.

name: Punishment Box
Name: Punishment Box
gametext: Unless you destroy one of your equipment or have Engineer and a personnel with Honor and Leadership, randomly select an Officer to be stopped and place this dilemma in your core. At the start of each of your turns, choose an Officer personnel to be stopped.

name: Stupefy
Name: Stupefy
gametext: Place this dilemma in your core. When your opponent's dilemma is revealed, he or she may remove this dilemma from the game to add one level of one skill that is in that dilemma's requirements to that requirement until the end of dilemma.

name: Unorthodox Tactics
Name: Unorthodox Tactics
gametext: Unless you command more ships than your opponent or command an event that has a cost of 4 or more, place this dilemma in your core. When an engagement begins, this dilemma's owner may remove this dilemma from the game to make a ship Weapons +4 and Shields +6 until the end of the turn.

name: Horga'hn
Name: Horga'hn
gametext: Order - Choose any number of your stopped personnel present who have a cost of 4 or more. Shuffle this equipment into its owner's deck to unstop each of those personnel.

name: Always Welcome
Name: Always Welcome
gametext: To play this event, you must command six [TNG] personnel. Plays in your core. When you play a [Fed] personnel that costs 4 or more, each player may choose one: draw a card; or discard a card from hand to draw two cards.

name: Coordinated Counterattack
Name: Coordinated Counterattack
gametext: To play this event, you must command six [TOS] personnel. Plays in your core. Opponent's personnel cannot gain skills.

name: Defensive Upgrades
Name: Defensive Upgrades
gametext: To play this event, you must command six [DS9] personnel. Plays in your core. When your event is about to be destroyed by a card an opponent owns, you may destroy this event instead. When your event or interrupt you own is about to be prevented, you may destroy this event instead.

name: Ensnared
Name: Ensnared
gametext: To play this event, you must command six [Car] personnel. Name a personnel and choose an opponent to reveal each copy of that personnel he or she commands. You may discard the top five cards of your deck to choose one of those personnel at a non-headquarters mission and place him or her in your brig. Remove this event from the game.

name: Favor the Bold
Name: Favor the Bold
gametext: To play this event, you must command three personnel who have a cost of 4 or more. Lose 5 points to choose your completed mission. Return each dilemma beneath that mission to their owner's dilemma piles. That mission is no longer completed. Remove this event from the game.

name: For Better or For Worse
Name: For Better or For Worse
gametext: To play this event, you must command six [Voy] personnel. Plays in your core. At the start of each of your turns, each player places the top cards of his or her dilemma pile beneath the opponent on his or her left's incomplete non-headquarters mission.

name: Noble Intentions
Name: Noble Intentions
gametext: To play this event, you must command six [SF] personnel. Plays in your core. When you play a [SF] personnel, you may discard the top card of your deck to download a personnel of a different species. If neither of those personnel are Human, you may draw a card. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Relentless Charge
Name: Relentless Charge
gametext: To play this event, you must command six [Dom] personnel. Plays in your core. At the start of each player's turn, you may remove this event from the game to make that player choose one: stop his or her staffed ship at a non-headquarters mission; kill a personnel he or she commands; or lose 5 points.

name: Tenuous Alliance
Name: Tenuous Alliance
gametext: To play this event, you must command [HQ] {Mouth of the Wormhole} and six [TN] personnel. Choose one of your [TN] personnel. Each player removes a number of cards from top of their dilemma pile equal to the cost of that personnel from the game. Remove this event from the game.

name: Wariness
Name: Wariness
gametext: To play this event, you must command six [Rom] personnel. Plays in your core. While an opponent owns six cards that have been removed from the game, your [Rom] personnel that cost 4 or more may be excluded from random selections.

name: Alarming Rumors
Name: Alarming Rumors
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must command {Athos IV} and six [Maq] personnel. When an opponent plays a non-ship card, discard a card of the same card type from hand to prevent that and place that card on top of its owner's deck.

name: Down to Business
Name: Down to Business
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must command six [Fer] personnel. Order - Each player discards a random card from hand. The owner of the discarded card that has the highest cost takes a dilemma they own from beneath an opponent's mission and returns it to their dilemma pile. (In the case of a tie, prevent this interrupt and place it on the bottom of its owner's deck.)

name: Improved Scenery
Name: Improved Scenery
gametext: Order - Discard a random card from hand to examine a number of dilemmas on the top of an opponent's dilemma pile equal to the cost of the discarded card. Remove this interrupt from the game.

name: Space Near New Bajor Demonstrate Aggressive Intent
Name: Space Near New Bajor Demonstrate Aggressive Intent
Affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Baj] or [Fed]) may attempt this mission.
Skills: Astrometrics, Honor, Navigation, Officer, Security, and Cunning>40
gametext: When your personnel complete this mission, you may destroy your staffed ship that costs 5 or more here to download two Damage cards and place them on an opponent's ship.

name: Meridian Explore Extradimensional World
Name: Meridian Explore Extradimensional World
Affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
Skills: Anthropology, 2 Exobiology, Science, Transporters, and Cunning>32
gametext: At the end of your turn, if your personnel attempted this mission this turn, flip this mission. - At the end of your turn, flip this mission.

name: Protect Wormhole
Name: Protect Wormhole
Skills: Astrometrics, Engineer, 2 Navigation, Science, and Cunning>40
gametext: When any player is about to move a ship between this mission and Region: Bajor System mission, do not add 2 to the span total of those missions.

name: Kira Nerys Lela
Name: Kira Nerys Lela
Skills: Diplomacy Honor Law Leadership Officer Security
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may take a card from your discard pile into hand.

name: Shakaar Edon First Minister of Bajor
Name: Shakaar Edon First Minister of Bajor
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you have completed a mission requiring Anthropology or Leadership, he is cost -4. When your personnel complete a mission worth 40 or more points, you may unstop each of your stopped [Baj] personnel.

name: Nador Curious Commander
Name: Nador Curious Commander
Skills: Archaeology Astrometrics Geology Law Navigation Officer Physics Treachery
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you have completed a mission requiring Officer or Treachery, he is cost -4. While you have completed a mission worth 40 or more points, each [AU] personnel present is attributes +1.

name: Breen Founder Persuader
Name: Breen Founder Persuader
Skills: Archaeology Engineer Exobiology Geology Intelligence Science Transporters
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you have completed a mission requiring Engineer or Science, she is cost -4.

name: Cal Hudson Convincing Recruiter
Name: Cal Hudson Convincing Recruiter
Skills: Diplomacy Law Leadership Navigation Physics Security Treachery
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you have completed a mission requiring Leadership or Security, he is cost -4. While present with this personnel, each [Fed] Treachery personnel present gains [Maq].

name: Geordi La Forge Battleship Engineer
Name: Geordi La Forge Battleship Engineer
Skills: Astrometrics 2 Engineer Honor Physics Programming Science
gametext: Order - If this personnel is present with your personnel who has a cost of 4 or more and he is aboard your [TNG] ship, return him to his owner's hand to place that ship at your mission.

name: Kathryn Janeway Regretful Leader
Name: Kathryn Janeway Regretful Leader
Skills: Biology Diplomacy Engineer Leadership Officer Physics Programming Science
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you have completed a mission requiring Engineer or Science, she is cost -4. When you play this personnel, each player may download an equipment card or a Temporal card.

name: Tristan Adams Deranged Psychiatrist
Name: Tristan Adams Deranged Psychiatrist
gametext: You may play this personnel at cost +2 to name a dilemma. Each copy of that dilemma this personnel faces this turn is prevented and overcome. When you play this personnel, if you command a completed mission requiring Anthropology or Treachery, he is cost -4.

name: William Ross "Temporary" Ally
Name: William Ross "Temporary" Ally
Skills: Astrometrics Diplomacy Law Leadership Navigation Officer Science Security
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you have completed a mission requiring Diplomacy or Officer, he is cost -4. While facing a dilemma, this personnel gains Intelligence and Treachery.

name: Brunt Acting Grand Nagus
Name: Brunt Acting Grand Nagus
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you have completed a mission requiring Acquisition or Treachery, he is cost -4. When you play this personnel, if you command a mission worth 40 or more points and three [Fer] personnel, score 5 points.

name: Uri'lash Silent Servant
Name: Uri'lash Silent Servant
gametext: Order - Stop your [Fer] Treachery personnel present to take a card from beneath your {Ferenginar} into hand. You may do this only once each turn.

name: K'mpec Protector of the Empire
Name: K'mpec Protector of the Empire
gametext: At the start of each of your turns, you may stop six [Kli] Leadership personnel you command to spend 5 additional counters this turn.

name: Syrran Desert Wind
Name: Syrran Desert Wind
gametext: When this personnel begins a mission attempt at a mission worth 40 or more points, you may draw two cards.

name: T'Les Syrrannite
Name: T'Les Syrrannite
gametext: When this personnel begins a mission attempt at a mission worth 40 or more points, you may choose a personnel present. That personnel gains Dissident until the end of this turn.

name: T'Pau Syrrannite
Name: T'Pau Syrrannite
gametext: When this personnel begins a mission attempt at a mission worth 40 or more points, she may gain all skills from a Dissident present until the end of this turn.

name: Taibak Prodigious Conditioner
Name: Taibak Prodigious Conditioner
Skills: Biology Engineer Exobiology Medical Programming 2 Science Treachery
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you have completed a mission requiring Exobiology or Science, he is cost -4. This personnel is Cunning +1 and Strength +1 for each different card type an opponent owns that has been removed from the game.

name: A. G. Robinson Prototype Captain
Name: A. G. Robinson Prototype Captain
Skills: Astrometrics Engineer Honor Leadership 2 Navigation Officer Science
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you have completed a mission requiring Astrometrics or Navigation, he is cost -4. Each of your [SF] ships is attributes +1.

name: Rokassa Tampering Vessel
Name: Rokassa Tampering Vessel
gametext: While your corresponding Commander is aboard this ship, each [Car] personnel aboard this ship gains [AU].

name: Javert Maquis Flagship
Name: Javert Maquis Flagship
gametext: While this ship is at your [Fed] mission that is worth 40 or less points and your corresponding Commander is aboard this ship, your personnel may attempt and complete that mission, regardless of effects preventing [Maq] personnel (or ships those personnel are aboard) from doing so, with these requirements: Leadership, Security, Treachery, and Strength>36.

name: NX-Prototype
Name: NX-Prototype
gametext: This ship is Range -1 for each Human aboard. When this ship moves to a non-headquarters mission, you may download a Damage card and place it on this ship. When a Damage card is placed on this ship, you may download a [SF] card.

name: Assassin Team
Name: Assassin Team
gametext: Your opponent chooses a personnel to be stopped. If he or she commands three Assassin personnel, that personnel is killed instead and all of your personnel are stopped.

name: Echo Papa Attack
Name: Echo Papa Attack
gametext: Your personnel cannot gain skills while facing this dilemma. Unless you have these requirements: [P] - Medical, Officer, and Security; or [S] - Leadership, Navigation, and Programming, randomly select a personnel to be killed and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: It's Only a Paper Moon
Name: It's Only a Paper Moon
gametext: Your opponent reveals his or her hand. For each non-ship card revealed this way that has a cost of 4 or more, add 5 to each of this dilemma's attribute requirements. Unless you have Integrity>25 or 2 Programming and Cunning>25 or Strength>25, all your personnel are stopped.

name: Occupational Hazards
Name: Occupational Hazards
gametext: Unless you have 2 Acquisition or 2 Treachery, randomly select a personnel to be killed and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Slightly Overbooked
Name: Slightly Overbooked
gametext: For each mission worth 40 or more points that your opponent commands, this dilemma is cost -2. Unless you have three personnel who each have a cost of 4 or more, each of your personnel who has a cost of 2 or less is stopped.

name: Spatial Interphase
Name: Spatial Interphase
gametext: For each mission worth 40 or more points that your opponent commands, this dilemma is cost -2. Your opponent chooses a personnel who has three or less [SD] icons to be killed.

name: Technique of a Desperate Man
Name: Technique of a Desperate Man
gametext: Unless you have Anthropology and 2 Officer or two Temporal events in your core, place this dilemma in your core. When one of your personnel begins a mission attempt, this dilemma's owner may remove this dilemma from the game to place a dilemma beneath one of your completed missions on the top of his or her dilemma pile.

name: Unfair Terms
Name: Unfair Terms
gametext: For each mission worth 40 or more points that your opponent commands, this dilemma is cost -2. Randomly select three personnel. Each of those personnel who has a cost of 2 or less is killed.

name: Well-Prepared Defenses
Name: Well-Prepared Defenses
gametext: Unless the missions you command are worth more total points than the total points of missions your opponent commands, your opponent chooses a personnel to be stopped.

name: You Vant to Go Back?
Name: You Vant to Go Back?
gametext: This dilemma is cost +3. Reveal the top card of your deck. Unless the cost of that card is odd, your opponent chooses a personnel to be returned to his or her owner's hand.

name: Self-Sealing Stem Bolts
Name: Self-Sealing Stem Bolts
gametext: Order - If you own this equipment, you may choose an opponent. Place this equipment aboard one of his or her ships (he or she now commands this equipment) to make him or her place an equipment he or she commands and owns on one of your ships (you now command that equipment).

name: B'aht Qul Challenge
Name: B'aht Qul Challenge
gametext: To play this event, you must command a completed mission and an Anthropology Klingon. Each player randomly removes a number of cards in his or her discard pile from the game equal to the number of missions worth 40 or more points he or she commands. The player that removes the cards with the highest total cost scores 10 points. (In the case of a tie, each tied player scores.) Destroy this event.

name: Delirium
Name: Delirium
gametext: Plays in your core. When the opponent on your right's personnel begin a mission attempt at a mission worth 35 or less points, you may draw one extra dilemma and spend one extra in total cost on dilemmas.

name: Duranja
Name: Duranja
gametext: To play this event, you must command six [Baj] Anthropology personnel. Plays in your core. At the end of each of your turns, you make take a card from your discard pile and place it on top of your deck.

name: Greed
Name: Greed
gametext: To play this event, you must command a personnel with 2 Treachery. Discard a card from hand to draw a card for each dilemma you own that is in an opponent's core. Destroy this event.

name: Imperfect Replacement
Name: Imperfect Replacement
gametext: Plays in your core. While you command a personnel you do not own, the player who owns that personnel cannot play a personnel with the same card title.

name: Jem'Hadar Entrenchment
Name: Jem'Hadar Entrenchment
gametext: To play this event, you must command three Jem'Hadar. Plays on a mission worth 35 points or less (limit one per mission). Add 2 Leadership to each of this mission's requirements.

name: Leverage
Name: Leverage
gametext: Plays in your core. When a personnel is about to be killed by a dilemma, the player who commands that personnel may choose an opponent and place that personnel in that opponent's brig instead.

name: Parting Thought
Name: Parting Thought
gametext: Plays on a mission. When your dilemma is revealed at this mission, you may discard a card from hand to add one level of one skill that is in that dilemma's requirements to that requirement until the end of that dilemma.

name: Bridge Officer's Test
Name: Bridge Officer's Test
gametext: When your personnel with 2 Leadership is facing a dilemma and that dilemma is about to stop all of your personnel, the opponent on your left chooses a personnel present. Kill that personnel to prevent and overcome that dilemma.

name: Posturing
Name: Posturing
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must command three [Rom] personnel. When your personnel is attempting a mission, choose an opponent and remove the top card of his or her deck from the game to add the cost of that card to that personnel's attributes until the end of the mission attempt.

name: Rebuilding the Fleet
Name: Rebuilding the Fleet
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must command a personnel with 2 Engineer or a personnel with 2 Medical. Order - Each player counts the number of ships costs 6 or more in his or her discard pile. Then each player shuffles each personnel and ship from his or her discard pile into his or her deck and draws cards equal to the number of ships counted (limit 6).

name: Honor the Fallen
Name: Honor the Fallen
Skills: Engineer, 2 Honor, Medical, Officer, and Integrity>38
gametext: When your personnel complete this mission, you may remove a personnel in your discard pile from the game to restore all Range to each of your ships.
