name: Obtain Illegal Embryos
Name: Obtain Illegal Embryos
Skills: Biology, Exobiology, Medical, Security, Treachery, and Cunning>40
gametext: When your Medical personnel is about to be stopped by a dilemma at this mission, you may kill him or her instead to download a Genetically Enhanced personnel.

name: Reestablish Neural Cooperative
Name: Reestablish Neural Cooperative
Skills: 2 Anthropology, Biology, Exobiology, Security, and Cunning>38
gametext: When your personnel complete this mission, you may take up to three Borg personnel from your discard pile and place them on the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Seek Savior
Name: Seek Savior
Skills: Anthropology, Biology, Honor, Law, and Integrity>40
gametext: At the start of each of your turns, if this is your first turn, name a personnel. When your personnel complete this mission, if an opponent commands that personnel, score 10 points.

name: Scrutiny Drone
Name: Scrutiny Drone
gametext: When you play this personnel, choose an opponent. You may draw a card for each non-headquarters mission worth 35 points or less he or she commands.

name: Madred Persistent Inquisitor
Name: Madred Persistent Inquisitor
gametext: Order - Choose an opponent. That opponent guesses how many cards that have a cost of 4 or more are in your hand. Reveal your hand. If that opponent is correct, kill this personnel. Otherwise, he is attributes +3 until the end of the turn.

name: Dikut'ukan
Name: Dikut'ukan
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, he may gain Security and a skill from a Changeling present until the end of the mission attempt. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Karl Jaeger
Name: Karl Jaeger
gametext: You may play this personnel at cost +2 to examine and remove four cards in a player's discard pile from the game.

name: Nagata
Name: Nagata
gametext: You may play this personnel at cost +1 to draw three cards for each headquarters mission the opponent on your left commands, then place three cards from hand on the bottom of your deck.

name: Nilva Lascivious Chairman
Name: Nilva Lascivious Chairman
gametext: When your personnel present complete this mission, if it is worth 40 or more points, you may take up to three cards from your discard pile and place them beneath your {Ferenginar}.

name: Kohlar Pilgrim Commander
Name: Kohlar Pilgrim Commander
gametext: While this personnel is attempting a [DQ] mission, each of your Klingon personnel present is attributes +1.

name: Morak Pilgrim Cynic
Name: Morak Pilgrim Cynic
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma at a [DQ] mission he gains Security, Transporters, and Treachery.

name: T'Greth Pilgrim Contender
Name: T'Greth Pilgrim Contender
gametext: While this personnel is eligible for a random selection at a [DQ] mission, you may destroy your Assault event to exclude one of your Klingon personnel present from that selection.

name: Ptol
Name: Ptol
Skills: Archaeology Biology Engineer Geology Officer Programming Security
gametext: When you play this personnel, reveal four cards from the top of an opponent's dilemma pile. This personnel is cost -1 for each dual dilemma revealed. Place the revealed cards on the bottom of the owner's dilemma pile in any order.

name: Upexi
Name: Upexi
gametext: When a random selection is made, if this personnel is facing a dilemma at a mission worth 40 or more points, you may stop this personnel to ignore its results and select again.

name: Nathan Samuels Earth Minister
Name: Nathan Samuels Earth Minister
gametext: When you play a non-Human [SF] personnel at this mission, you may stop this personnel to make that personnel cost -2.

name: Assimilated Transport
Name: Assimilated Transport
gametext: Order - Kill six personnel you command but do not own aboard this ship to place the top three dilemmas of the opponent on your left's dilemma pile beneath this mission. You may do this only if the ship is at one of your non-headquarters missions.

name: U.S.S. Bellerophon Conference Host
Name: U.S.S. Bellerophon Conference Host
gametext: When you play this ship, you may place a [DS9] Diplomacy personnel from your hand aboard this ship.

name: I.K.S. Voq'leng Ship of Prophecy
Name: I.K.S. Voq'leng Ship of Prophecy
gametext: While you command {Qo'noS} and no other [AQ] missions, you may play this ship at your [DQ] mission. While this ship is at a [DQ] mission, you may play [Kli] personnel and equipment aboard this ship.

name: Orion Interceptor
Name: Orion Interceptor
gametext: While you command another ship that has a cost of 6 or more, this ship is Range +2. While this ship is at a [NA] mission or a mission worth 40 or more points, it is Weapons +4 and Shields +4.

name: U.S.S. Dauntless False Hope
Name: U.S.S. Dauntless False Hope
gametext: To play this ship, you must command three personnel of the same affiliation. When you are about to play this ship, it becomes that affiliation. Order - Discard a card from hand to download {Quantum Slipstream Drive}. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Bird-of-Prey
Name: Bird-of-Prey
gametext: This ship is Range +1 for each [Rom] personnel aboard who has a cost of 4 or more (Limit +3). This ship is Weapons +1 and Shields +1 for each [Pa][Rom] personnel aboard (Limit +3).

name: Emergency Transport Unit *VP
Name: Emergency Transport Unit *VP
gametext: When your personnel present is about to be killed, you may return this equipment to its owner's hand to place that personnel on your ship at this mission instead. He or she is stopped.

name: Hard Time *VP
Name: Hard Time *VP
gametext: Place this dilemma in your core. Randomly select a personnel and place him or her on this dilemma. At the start of your next turn, remove this dilemma from the game and return the personnel on it to his or her owner's hand.

name: Miner Revolt *VP
Name: Miner Revolt *VP
gametext: Randomly select personnel until their total cost is 6 or more. Those personnel are stopped.

name: William Ross "Temporary" Ally *VP
Name: William Ross "Temporary" Ally *VP
Skills: Astrometrics Diplomacy Law Leadership Navigation Officer Science Security
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you have completed a mission requiring Diplomacy or Officer, he is cost -4. While facing a dilemma, this personnel gains Intelligence and Treachery.

name: Worf Chief of Security
Name: Worf Chief of Security
gametext: When your [TNG] personnel present is about to be stopped by a dilemma, you may stop this personnel instead.

name: In a Mirror, Darkly *VP
Name: In a Mirror, Darkly *VP
gametext: Lose 5 points to shuffle each personnel and ship you own in your discard pile into your deck and then draw cards until you have seven cards in hand. Remove this event and all the other cards in your discard pile from the game.

name: Engage Cloak *VP
Name: Engage Cloak *VP
gametext: Plays in your core. You may exectue only one order using this event each turn. Order - If there is no ship on this event, place your staffed ship that has a Cloaking Device on this event (While a ship is here, this event cannot leave play.) Order - If a ship is on this event, place that ship at any mission. That ship's Range for this turn is used.

name: Unexpected Difficulties *VP
Name: Unexpected Difficulties *VP
gametext: Plays in your core. When you have drawn dilemmas, you may destroy this event to return them to your dilemma pile and draw an equal number of dilemmas.

name: U.S.S. Voyager Home Away From Home *VP
Name: U.S.S. Voyager Home Away From Home *VP
gametext: While you do not command a headquarters mission, you may play this ship at {Caretaker's Array}. While this ship is at a [DQ] mission, you may play [Voy] personnel, [NA] personnel, and equipment aboard this ship. When you play this ship, you may place up to two [Voy] personnel from your hand aboard this ship.

name: U.S.S. Enterprise Earth's Savior *VP
Name: U.S.S. Enterprise Earth's Savior *VP
gametext: While you command a [TOS] personnel, you may play this ship at your {Earth}. When this ship is about to move between Earth and another mission, subtract 1 from the Range required.

name: Queen's Borg Sphere Contingency Vessel *VP
Name: Queen's Borg Sphere Contingency Vessel *VP
gametext: While this ship is at a [Bor] mission, personnel aboard it are attributes +1. While your Borg Queen is aboard this ship, it is staffed.

name: Its Thinking is Chaotic
Name: Its Thinking is Chaotic
gametext: Place this dilemma on this mission. Randomly select a personnel. That personnel and each copy of that personnel loses all skills and abilities and gains the following ability: "When this personnel is an eligible target for a random selection, you may choose this personnel instead." These effects last until the end of the mission attempt. At the end of this mission attempt, this dilemma is overcome.

name: Old Feelings
Name: Old Feelings
gametext: Order - Stop two of your personnel to choose one: remove a dilemma that has no cards on it in your core from the game; or take a personnel from your discard pile and place him or her on the bottom of his or her owner's deck.

name: Warm Welcome
Name: Warm Welcome
gametext: If you have six or more personnel attempting this mission, this dilemma is cost +3. Unless you have 3 [Cmd] personnel or 2 Officer, choose a personnel to be placed on the bottom of his or her owner's deck and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Arandis Risan Facilitator
Name: Arandis Risan Facilitator
gametext: When you play this personnel, each player may download a card.

name: A Royal Welcome
Name: A Royal Welcome
gametext: Order - Destroy your event that has a cost of 3 or more to make your opponent name a skill (except Acquisition, Intelligence, Law, or Telepathy). You may download a personnel who has that skill and place him or her at your headquarters mission where that personnel could be played. That personnel is attributes +1 until the end of this turn.

name: Ba'el Naive Prisoner
Name: Ba'el Naive Prisoner
gametext: When this personnel is randomly selected by a dilemma, that dilemma's owner must discard a card at random from his or her hand.

name: Kalenna Sentry
Name: Kalenna Sentry
gametext: When this personnel begins a mission attempt, you may discard an event from hand to name up to two unique personnel. While each of those personnel is not [NA], he or she cannot be randomly selected by dilemmas. This effect lasts until the end of this mission attempt.

name: Lending a Hand
Name: Lending a Hand
gametext: Your opponent chooses two personnel to be stopped. Choose a personnel from your hand that you do not command who has a cost less than the total cost of those two personnel. You may place that personnel on this planet mission and have him or her join this mission attempt.

name: Losira
Name: Losira
gametext: Your opponent names a personnel. Randomly select three personnel. Each named personnel selected is killed.

name: Parallel Romance
Name: Parallel Romance
gametext: Randomly select two personnel to be stopped. For each personnel stopped by this dilemma, each of your personnel is attributes +1 until the end of this mission attempt.

name: Polywater Intoxication
Name: Polywater Intoxication
gametext: If you have six or more personnel attempting this mission, this dilemma is cost +3. Choose a personnel to be stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: The Captain's "Guest"
Name: The Captain's "Guest"
gametext: Your opponent names a keyword. Randomly select three personnel. If any of those personnel has that keyword, they are all stopped. Otherwise, choose one of those personnel to be stopped.

name: The Charismatic Mister Kor
Name: The Charismatic Mister Kor
gametext: For each dilemma beneath this mission, this dilemma is cost -1. Randomly select a personnel to be placed on the bottom of his or her owner's deck.

name: The Charming Mister Riker
Name: The Charming Mister Riker
gametext: For each dilemma beneath this mission, this dilemma is cost -1. Randomly select a personnel to be placed on the bottom of his or her owner's deck.

name: The Gentleman Doctor McCoy
Name: The Gentleman Doctor McCoy
gametext: For each dilemma beneath this mission, this dilemma is cost -1. Randomly select a personnel to be placed on the bottom of his or her owner's deck.

name: Watch Your Step
Name: Watch Your Step
gametext: Unless you have Leadership, Security, and Cunning>34, or Telepathy and 2 Treachery, or 3 Honor, place this dilemma in your core. When you are about to draw a card, this dilemma's owner may remove this dilemma from the game to make you draw three cards instead and he or she examines those cards and chooses two of them to be discarded.

name: Deal With the Count Man
Name: Deal With the Count Man
gametext: To play this event, you must command a Thief. Plays in your core. Name a personnel. At the start of each Execute Orders segment, each personnel who has that card title cannot use abilities, attributes, and skills until the end of each turn. At the start of each of your turns, place the top card of your deck on this event.

name: Mudd's Women
Name: Mudd's Women
gametext: Plays in your core. When an opponent's dilemma is revealed, you may discard a card from hand to name a personnel. When that named personnel is randomly selected by that dilemma, you may place the top card of your deck on this event. At the start of each of your turns, you may take a card from this event to your hand to spend two additional counters this turn.

name: Raise the Stakes
Name: Raise the Stakes
gametext: Plays in your core. Each of your opponent's personnel are attributes +1. Each of your missions are worth 5 more points. When you are about to lose command of this event, remove it from the game instead.

name: A Q Scorned
Name: A Q Scorned
gametext: When a personnel that the player on your right commands begins a mission attempt, destroy your event to shuffle your dilemma pile and the opponent on your right chooses one: you may draw four extra dilemmas; or you may spend two extra on dilemmas.

name: Track Survivors
Name: Track Survivors
Skills: Engineer, Geology, Science, Transporters, and Cunning>32 or Diplomacy, Honor, Law, Leadership, and Integrity>30
gametext: When your personnel complete this mission, if none of them have an attribute >6, score 5 points.

name: Chalan Aroya Accessible Restaurateur
Name: Chalan Aroya Accessible Restaurateur
gametext: When this personnel is randomly selected by a dilemma, you may take a card from your discard pile into hand.

name: Neela Misguided Activist
Name: Neela Misguided Activist
gametext: Order - Remove a personnel in your discard pile from the game and return this personnel to her owner's hand to kill an opponent's personnel present who has a skill the removed personnel has.

name: Seven of Nine Prodigal Daughter
Name: Seven of Nine Prodigal Daughter
Skills: Astrometrics Engineer Exobiology Programming Science Treachery
gametext: When a card your opponent owns is about to prevent an interrupt you own, you may give command of this personnel to an opponent to ignore that effect. If you do, choose a ship commanded by that opponent and place this personnel aboard that ship.

name: Korinas Observer from the Obsidian Order
Name: Korinas Observer from the Obsidian Order
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, she and each [Car] Intelligence personnel present adds his or her Cunning to his or her Integrity.

name: Luaran Critical Coordinator
Name: Luaran Critical Coordinator
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may draw a card for each staffing requirement icon on your staffed [Dom] ship.

name: Alynna Nechayev Adamant Admiral
Name: Alynna Nechayev Adamant Admiral
Skills: Diplomacy Law Leadership Officer Science Security
gametext: Order - Discard a [Fed] personnel that you do not command from hand. This personnel gains an order ability from that personnel until the end of this turn. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Jenna D'Sora Veteran Security Officer
Name: Jenna D'Sora Veteran Security Officer
gametext: When this personnel begins a mission attempt, you may name a personnel. If that personnel is chosen or selected by a dilemma during this mission attempt, he or she is attributes +2 and gains Anthropology until the end of that dilemma.

name: Melora Pazlar Independent Personality
Name: Melora Pazlar Independent Personality
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may lose 5 points to choose one: make her gain two different skills on a personnel present; or make her gain an attribute on a personnel present. This effect lasts until the end of this turn. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Naomi Wildman Astrometrics Officer
Name: Naomi Wildman Astrometrics Officer
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may destroy your Temporal event that has a cost greater than or equal to the cost of that dilemma to make each random selection made by that dilemma your choice instead. This effect lasts until the end of the mission attempt.

name: Nella Daren Head of Stellar Cartography
Name: Nella Daren Head of Stellar Cartography
gametext: When a personnel present is randomly selected to be killed, you may destroy an equipment this personnel is equipped with to stop that personnel instead.

name: Number One Reputable Officer
Name: Number One Reputable Officer
gametext: You may play this personnel at cost +2 to choose up to three of your personnel in your opponents' brigs and place them at your headquarters mission.

name: Valeris Co-Conspirator
Name: Valeris Co-Conspirator
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you command three Treachery personnel, name a non-ship card. Each opponent searches his or her deck, places the named card in his or her discard pile, and shuffles and replaces his or her deck.

name: Watley Recent Transfer
Name: Watley Recent Transfer
gametext: You may play this personnel at cost +3 to name a personnel. Each opponent must choose a personnel he or she commands who has that title and return him or her to his or her owner's hand.

name: Marta Delusional Seductress
Name: Marta Delusional Seductress
gametext: When your Leadership personnel present is randomly selected by a dilemma, you may destroy one of your events to ignore its results and select again.

name: Leeta Devoted Wife
Name: Leeta Devoted Wife
gametext: When this personnel is randomly selected by a dilemma, if you command {Ferenginar}, download a card and place it beneath your Ferenginar.

name: Quark Lumba
Name: Quark Lumba
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may download a card and place it beneath your {Ferenginar}. When your Rule is about to be destroyed by a card an opponent owns, you may destroy your Rule instead.

name: M'Pella Seductive Employee
Name: M'Pella Seductive Employee
gametext: When this personnel is randomly selected by a dilemma, reveal the top card of your deck. If the cost of the revealed card matches the cost of that dilemma, it is prevented and overcome.

name: Ch'Regha Open-Minded
Name: Ch'Regha Open-Minded
gametext: Order - Stop this personnel aboard your [Kli] ship at a [DQ] mission to place a Klingon at your {Qo'noS} aboard this ship.

name: Anastasia Komananov Russian Seductress
Name: Anastasia Komananov Russian Seductress
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may take a Hologram from your discard pile into hand. When this personnel is killed by a dilemma, each player kills each copy of {Kira Nerys} that he or she commands.

name: Rayna Kapec Developing Android
Name: Rayna Kapec Developing Android
Skills: Biology Engineer Medical Physics Programming Science
gametext: When your non-Android personnel present is about to be stopped or killed by a dilemma, you may discard two Android personnel from hand to prevent that.

name: Sakonna Puzzled Interrogator
Name: Sakonna Puzzled Interrogator
gametext: When this personnel is randomly selected by a dilemma, if there are two [Maq] personnel present, that dilemma's owner must place two cards from hand on top of his or her deck in any order.

name: Fiona McKenzie Experienced Corporal
Name: Fiona McKenzie Experienced Corporal
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, if three MACO personnel are present with her, you may discard a card from hand to make a [SF] personnel present attributes +2 until the end of that dilemma.

name: Gannet Brooks Undercover Operative
Name: Gannet Brooks Undercover Operative
gametext: While this personnel is attempting a mission, you may discard a [SF] personnel from hand to give her one of the discarded personnel's skills until the end of that mission attempt.

name: U.S.S. Sao Paulo NCC-75633
Name: U.S.S. Sao Paulo NCC-75633
gametext: When your [DS9] personnel aboard this ship is about to be killed by a dilemma, you may stop that personnel instead.

name: Agonizing Encounter *VP
Name: Agonizing Encounter *VP
gametext: For each headquarters you command, this dilemma is cost -1. Your opponent names a skill. For each of your missions that requires that skill, randomly select a personnel to be stopped.

name: Stripped Down *VP
Name: Stripped Down *VP
gametext: Your opponent moves up to two dilemmas from beneath this mission to another of your non-headquarters missions.

name: Machinations *VP
Name: Machinations *VP
gametext: Plays in your core. When you have drawn dilemmas, you may remove this event and those dilemmas from the game to search your dilemma pile and choose a dilemma that costs no more than the number of dilemmas you removed. Shuffle and replace your dilemma pile face down. Place the chosen dilemma on the top of your dilemma stack.

name: Amanda Rogers *VP
Name: Amanda Rogers *VP
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must have 5 or more points. When an event or interrupt is played, prevent that event or interrupt and place it in its owner's discard pile. Lose 5 points.

name: Escape *VP
Name: Escape *VP
gametext: When any number of your personnel facing a dilemma are about to be killed or placed in an opponent's brig, discard a random card from hand to prevent that. Those personnel are stopped instead.

name: Kira Nerys Iliana Ghemor *VP
Name: Kira Nerys Iliana Ghemor *VP
gametext: Order - Lose 5 points and stop this personnel to download up to three [Car] Dissident personnel, then place them on a headquarters mission where they could be played.

name: Arandis Risan Facilitator *VP
Name: Arandis Risan Facilitator *VP
gametext: When you play this personnel, each player may download a card.

name: Kamala The Perfect Mate *VP
Name: Kamala The Perfect Mate *VP
gametext: Order - This personnel gains one skill from another personnel present. She keeps this skill until the start of your next turn. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Hoshi Sato Uneasy Educator *VP
Name: Hoshi Sato Uneasy Educator *VP
Skills: Anthropology Biology Exobiology Geology Medical Programming Science
gametext: While facing a dilemma, this personnel loses Anthropology and Science.

name: Chula: The Precipice
Name: Chula: The Precipice
gametext: If you have an even number of personnel, randomly split them in half. Unless one half has a personnel with Leadership, a second personnel with Cunning>5, and a third personnel with Honor, randomly select one half to be stopped.

name: Left Behind
Name: Left Behind
gametext: Randomly select two personnel. They cannot use their skills while facing this dilemma. Unless you have 2 Biology and 2 Medical or 2 Navigation, Transporters, and Shields>8, those personnel are stopped, and your opponent places them on a planet mission in the same quadrant as this mission.

name: Repressed Message
Name: Repressed Message
gametext: Reveal the top card of your dilemma pile. Your opponent may remove this dilemma from the game to replace it with the revealed dilemma. When that dilemma is about to be overcome, remove it from the game instead.

name: Rogue Borg Ship
Name: Rogue Borg Ship
gametext: Unless you command three or more ships or ships at this mission with total Weapons>14 or more [Cmd] personnel than [Stf] personnel, your opponent may download a Damage card and place it on one of your ships at this mission, then this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Exocomp
Name: Exocomp
gametext: Each of your Programming personnel present gains Engineer. When a Damage card an opponent owns is about to be placed on this ship, you may destroy this equipment to prevent that. Order - Destroy this equipment to remove a Damage card an opponent owns from this ship.

name: Subtle Influence
Name: Subtle Influence
gametext: To play this event, you must command six [Rom] personnel. Plays in your core. While personnel your opponent commands are attempting a mission, that opponent must discard an interrupt from hand to play an interrupt.

name: Earth Stop First Contact
Name: Earth Stop First Contact
Skills: Borg Queen, (Locutus or a personnel you do not own), Cunning>40 and Strength>40
gametext: When your personnel complete this mission, remove a personnel involved from the game to choose five opponent's personnel at a headquarters mission to remove from the game.

name: Kriosian Passage Mediate Peace Treaty
Name: Kriosian Passage Mediate Peace Treaty
Skills: Diplomacy, Law, Leadership and (Integrity>35 or Cunning>37)
gametext: Players cannot begin combat nor begin an engagement at this mission.

name: Evek Agent of Cardassian Justice
Name: Evek Agent of Cardassian Justice
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you command six [Car] personnel, you may reveal the top three cards of an opponent's deck. Each revealed card that is a personnel that opponent does not command is placed in your brig. (That opponent now commands them.)

name: Changeling Infiltrator
Name: Changeling Infiltrator
gametext: Order - Choose a captive in your brig. While that captive is in your brig, this personnel gains all icons, skills, keywords and attributes on that personnel. These effects last until this order is executed again.

name: Pel Profit-Seeker
Name: Pel Profit-Seeker
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma at a mission worth 40 or more points, your [Fer] personnel may meet Integrity and Strength requirements using Cunning.

name: Miles O'Brien Connelly
Name: Miles O'Brien Connelly
gametext: While this personnel is present with a Thief, this personnel is Cunning +1 for each non-Artifact equipment present (limit +4). You may play equipment at cost +1 at this mission.

name: Romulan Impersonator "Geordi La Forge"
Name: Romulan Impersonator "Geordi La Forge"
gametext: When an opponent's personnel is about to complete this mission, you may return this personnel to his owner's hand to increase each attributes requirement of that mission by 5 until the end of the turn.

name: U.S.S. Centaur Patrolling Ship
Name: U.S.S. Centaur Patrolling Ship
gametext: While your [DS9] personnel aboard is attempting a mission that has three or less dilemmas beneath it, he or she is attributes +1.

name: Tenak'talar Vanguard of the Occupation
Name: Tenak'talar Vanguard of the Occupation
gametext: This ship is Range +1 for each unique [Car] personnel aboard (limit +3). When your unique Cardassian aboard uses a skill to complete a [Car] mission, if this ship is staffed, score 10 points. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Personal Duty *VP
Name: Personal Duty *VP
gametext: Unless you have Leadership or Officer, all your personnel are stopped. If you have two or more personnel who have Leadership or Officer, randomly select all but one of those personnel to be stopped.

name: Tactical Disadvantage *VP
Name: Tactical Disadvantage *VP
gametext: Reveal your hand and the hand of the opponent on your left. If your opponent reveals ships with more total Weapons than the total Shields of ships that you have revealed in this way, randomly select one of your personnel to be killed and all your personnel are stopped.

name: The Caretaker's "Guests" *VP
Name: The Caretaker's "Guests" *VP
gametext: Your opponent chooses a personnel. You may replace him or her with any one personnel of the same affiliation from your discard pile. Place the personnel your opponent chose on the top of his or her owner's deck.

name: The Clown: Bitter Medicine *VP
Name: The Clown: Bitter Medicine *VP
gametext: Place this dilemma on this mission. Your opponent names a skill. Each of your personnel who has that skill is attributes -2. At the end of this turn, this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Friction *VP
Name: Friction *VP
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Dom] personnel. Plays in your core. When a player plays a non-Jem'Hadar personnel, that personnel is stopped.

name: Getting Under Your Skin *VP
Name: Getting Under Your Skin *VP
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Rom] personnel. Plays in your core. When you play an event in your core, you may reveal the top card of an opponent's deck. If it is a personnel, score 5 points. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Prison Compound *VP
Name: Prison Compound *VP
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Car] personnel. Round the total number of [SD] icons on all your captives to the nearest multiple of 5. Score that number of points. Destroy this event.

name: Solbor Faithful Attendant *VP
Name: Solbor Faithful Attendant *VP
gametext: When you complete a mission involving this personnel, if your Kai, other Prylar, or Vedek used a skill to complete it, score 5 points.

name: Rusot Proud Nationalist *VP
Name: Rusot Proud Nationalist *VP
gametext: While you command more events in your core than each of your opponents, this personnel gains Leadership and Security.

name: Founder Architect *VP
Name: Founder Architect *VP
gametext: While this personnel is attempting a mission, he is attributes +1 for each event in each player's core (limit +5).

name: Dukat Pah-Wraith Puppet *VP
Name: Dukat Pah-Wraith Puppet *VP
gametext: While you have no cards in your discard pile, this personnel is Cunning +4, Strength +4, and cannot be killed by dilemmas. Order - Examine and remove two cards in a player's discard pile from the game. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Malik Devious Augment *VP
Name: Malik Devious Augment *VP
gametext: When this personnel is about to be stopped by a dilemma, you may draw a card. When this personnel is killed by a dilemma, you must discard your hand.

name: Data From the City of Rateg *VP
Name: Data From the City of Rateg *VP
gametext: Order - Name a dilemma. While this personnel is facing that dilemma, he cannot be killed or stopped. This effect lasts until this order is executed again.

name: The Viceroy Advisor to the Praetor *VP
Name: The Viceroy Advisor to the Praetor *VP
gametext: When an opponent plays an event, you may discard a Romulan from hand to download an event. You may only do this once each turn.

name: Dominion Battleship *VP
Name: Dominion Battleship *VP
gametext: This ship is attributes +1 for each of these species you have aboard it: Changeling, Jem'Hadar, Vorta.

name: Improved Scenery *VAP
Name: Improved Scenery *VAP
gametext: Order - Discard a random card from hand to examine a number of dilemmas on the top of an opponent's dilemma pile equal to the cost of the discarded card. Remove this interrupt from the game.

name: Gannet Brooks Undercover Operative *VP
Name: Gannet Brooks Undercover Operative *VP
gametext: While this personnel is attempting a mission, you may discard a [SF] personnel from hand to give her one of the discarded personnel's skills until the end of that mission attempt.

name: Rogue Borg Ship *VP
Name: Rogue Borg Ship *VP
gametext: Unless you command three or more ships or ships at this mission with total Weapons>14 or more [Cmd] personnel that [Stf] personnel, your opponent may download a Damage card and place it on one of your ships at this mission, then this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Indebtedness
Name: Indebtedness
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Draw a card and then discard a card from hand. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Virtual Reality Headset
Name: Virtual Reality Headset
gametext: Order - If you do not command a Dissident, choose one: stop two [Car] personnel present to place a non-[TN][Dom] personnel from hand at your [HQ] {Mouth of the Wormhole}; or stop two [Dom] personnel present to place a non-[TN][Car] personnel from hand at your [HQ] Mouth of the Wormhole. That personnel is stopped. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Firestorm
Name: Firestorm
gametext: Plays in your core. At the end of your turn, place a card from your hand on this event and for each headquarters mission each player commands, he or she chooses two non-Decay events he or she commands and the owners of those events shuffles them into his or her deck.

name: Helping Hand
Name: Helping Hand
gametext: Plays in your core. While your personnel is facing a dilemma or are involved in an engagement, you may discard a ship that is the same class as the ship he or she is aboard from hand to make it Weapons +4 and Shields +4 until the end of the turn.

name: Reman Assault Team
Name: Reman Assault Team
gametext: Plays on your ship. When your Reman aboard this ship is killed by a dilemma, you may place a Reman in your hand aboard this ship. (That personnel joins the mission attempt.)

name: Under Siege
Name: Under Siege
gametext: Plays in your opponent's core. (He or she commands this event.) When a player loses command of this event, return it to its owner's hand.

name: Locate Fuel Source
Name: Locate Fuel Source
Skills: Anthropology, Exobiology, Science, 2 Treachery, and Cunning>38
gametext: When your personnel complete this mission, each player may shuffle each Nucleogenic card in his or her discard pile into his or her deck.

name: Li Nalas Vastly Outnumbered
Name: Li Nalas Vastly Outnumbered
gametext: While an opponent commands an Assault event, this personnel and each [DS9] personnel present is Strength +1.

name: Odo Vastly Outnumbered
Name: Odo Vastly Outnumbered
gametext: While an opponent commands an Assault event, this personnel cannot be killed or stopped by dual dilemmas.

name: Angelo Tassoni
Name: Angelo Tassoni
gametext: When you play this personnel you may choose one: take a Nucleogenic card from your discard pile into hand; or place a Nucleogenic card you own that has been removed from the game on top of your deck.

name: Benjamin Sisko Vastly Outnumbered
Name: Benjamin Sisko Vastly Outnumbered
gametext: When this personnel begins a mission attempt, if an opponent commands a Maneuver event, you may name a dilemma. This personnel gains "This personnel and each [DS9] personnel present cannot be killed or stopped by that dilemma" until the end of turn.

name: Equinox Doctor Unethical Medical Hologram
Name: Equinox Doctor Unethical Medical Hologram
gametext: When you are about to lose command of your [Voy] Treachery personnel present, you may lose 5 points to prevent that.

name: Hikaru Sulu Experienced Helmsman
Name: Hikaru Sulu Experienced Helmsman
gametext: You may play this personnel at cost -2 to ignore his next ability. When you play this personnel, you may place your [TOS] ship at your mission.

name: Ilia Finest Navigator in Starfleet
Name: Ilia Finest Navigator in Starfleet
gametext: You may play this personnel at cost -2 to ignore her next ability. When you play this personnel, if you command a [TOS] personnel who has a cost of 4 or more, for each headquarters mission your opponent commands, you may shuffle two cards from your discard pile into your deck.

name: James T. Kirk Experienced Commander
Name: James T. Kirk Experienced Commander
gametext: You may play this personnel at cost -2 to ignore his next ability. When you play this personnel, he gains "This personnel and each [TOS] personnel present who has a cost of 4 or more may be excluded from random selections" until the end of this turn.

name: Julian Bashir Vastly Outnumbered
Name: Julian Bashir Vastly Outnumbered
gametext: When a dilemma that has a cost of 1 or more and does not require a skill is about to kill your [DS9] personnel present, if an opponent commands an Assault event, you may discard a card from hand to prevent that.

name: Leonard H. McCoy Experienced Advisor
Name: Leonard H. McCoy Experienced Advisor
gametext: You may play this personnel at cost -2 to ignore his next ability. When you play this personnel, the next [TOS] personnel you play this turn is cost -3.

name: Marla Gilmore Conflicted Engineer
Name: Marla Gilmore Conflicted Engineer
Skills: Astrometrics Engineer Physics Programming Transporters Treachery
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma that requires Treachery, you may lose 5 points to exclude her and each [Voy] Treachery personnel present from being randomly selected by that dilemma.

name: Maxwell Burke Arrogant First Officer
Name: Maxwell Burke Arrogant First Officer
Skills: Anthropology Leadership Officer 2 Programming Security Treachery
gametext: Order - Discard two cards from hand to choose one: download a Nucleogenic card; or take a Nucleogenic card from your discard pile and place it on top of your deck.

name: Miles O'Brien Vastly Outnumbered
Name: Miles O'Brien Vastly Outnumbered
gametext: While an opponent commands a Maneuver event, the ship this personnel is aboard is Shields +4.

name: Montgomery Scott Experienced Engineer
Name: Montgomery Scott Experienced Engineer
gametext: You may play this personnel at cost -2 to ignore his next ability. When you play this personnel, if you command another [TOS] personnel who has a cost of 4 or more, you may remove an event in an opponent's core from the game.

name: Noah Lessing Driven Officer
Name: Noah Lessing Driven Officer
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may lose 5 points to have him gain a skill required by that dilemma until the end of that dilemma. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Rudolph Ransom Devious Captain
Name: Rudolph Ransom Devious Captain
Skills: Diplomacy Exobiology Leadership Officer Science Transporters Treachery
gametext: While this personnel is attempting a mission, you may lose 5 points and choose two of your stopped [Voy] Treachery personnel present and stop this personnel to unstop those two personnel. Those personnel join this mission attempt.

name: Spock Experienced Officer
Name: Spock Experienced Officer
gametext: You may play this personnel at cost -1 to ignore his next ability. You may play this personnel aboard your [TOS] ship that has a [TOS] personnel who has a cost of 4 or more aboard.

name: Thompson
Name: Thompson
Skills: Anthropology Archaeology Astrometrics Medical Physics Science Treachery
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may lose 5 points to make his cost -3.

name: Willard Decker Recommended Replacement
Name: Willard Decker Recommended Replacement
Skills: Anthropology Diplomacy Leadership Officer Programming Science Security
gametext: You may play this personnel at cost -1 to ignore his next ability. When you play this personnel, return your [TOS] personnel who has a cost of 4 or more to his or her owner's hand.

name: Grish
Name: Grish
gametext: When your [Fer] personnel present is killed by a dilemma, this personnel and each [Pa][Fer] personnel present cannot be killed by dilemmas until the end of this turn.

name: Krem Unidentified Pirate
Name: Krem Unidentified Pirate
Skills: Archaeology Astrometrics Geology Honor Navigation Science
gametext: When this personnel uses a skill to complete a mission, if he is present with two [Pa][Fer] personnel, you may unstop all your stopped [Fer] personnel at this mission.

name: Muk Unidentified Pirate
Name: Muk Unidentified Pirate
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you command three [Pa][Fer] personnel, you may download up to three equipment.

name: Quark Vastly Outnumbered
Name: Quark Vastly Outnumbered
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may download an Assault, Maneuver, or a [DS9] card and place that card beneath your {Ferenginar}. When you play this personnel, if an opponent commands a Maneuver event, he is cost -2.

name: Ulis Unidentified Pirate
Name: Ulis Unidentified Pirate
gametext: When this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may stop him to take a [Pa][Fer] personnel from your discard pile and place him or her present with this personnel. That personnel joins the mission attempt.

name: Elder T'Pol Displaced Survivor
Name: Elder T'Pol Displaced Survivor
gametext: When this personnel uses a skill to complete a mission, you may shuffle each non-Human [SF] personnel that you own that has been removed from the game into his or her owner's deck.

name: Greer
Name: Greer
Skills: Anthropology Astrometrics Biology Honor Navigation Officer
gametext: When this personnel is about to be removed from the game, if he is present with three non-Human [SF] personnel, you may download an interrupt.

name: Karyn Archer Displaced Descendant
Name: Karyn Archer Displaced Descendant
Skills: Archaeology Honor Leadership Programming Science Security
gametext: When this personnel is removed from the game, each of your [SF] personnel are attributes +2 until the end of the turn.

name: Lorian Displaced Descendant
Name: Lorian Displaced Descendant
Skills: Engineer Leadership Officer Science Security Transporters
gametext: When this personnel is about to be removed from the game, you may unstop each stopped [SF] personnel present. (Those personnel may join the mission attempt.)

name: U.S.S. Enterprise Where She Belongs
Name: U.S.S. Enterprise Where She Belongs
gametext: You may play this ship at cost -4 to ignore its next ability. When you play this ship, you may download a [TOS] personnel who has a cost of 4 or more and play him or her at cost -4 aboard this ship.

name: U.S.S. Equinox Determined To Get Home
Name: U.S.S. Equinox Determined To Get Home
gametext: While you do not command a headquarters mission, you may play this ship at {Caretaker's Array}. While this ship is at a [DQ] mission, you may play [Voy] Treachery personnel, [NA] personnel, and equipment aboard this ship. While you do not command {U.S.S. Voyager}, you may pay the cost of losing 5 points to use an ability on a [Voy] personnel you own by discarding a Nucleogenic card from hand.

name: Quetsivoo Unidentified Pirate Ship
Name: Quetsivoo Unidentified Pirate Ship
gametext: While you command three [Pa][Fer] personnel aboard this ship, it is attributes +4 and each of your [Fer] personnel aboard this ship gains [Pa].

name: Future Enterprise Displaced Starship
Name: Future Enterprise Displaced Starship
gametext: When your non-Human [SF] personnel at this mission is about to be killed or stopped by a dilemma, you may remove that personnel from the game instead.

name: Conflict
Name: Conflict
gametext: When personnel that the player on your right commands begin a mission attempt, discard 5 cards from hand or lose 5 points to draw three extra dilemmas and spend three extra in total cost on dilemmas.

name: Forcing Their Way
Name: Forcing Their Way
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must not command {U.S.S. Voyager}. Order - Discard a Nucleogenic card from hand to place a [Voy] Treachery personnel from hand aboard your {U.S.S. Equinox}.

name: Genetronic Treatment
Name: Genetronic Treatment
gametext: When one of your personnel is about to be killed by a dilemma, if he or she is present with a Medical personnel, stop that personnel instead. Then you may discard the top card of your deck to shuffle this interrupt into your deck.

name: Interspatial Fissures
Name: Interspatial Fissures
gametext: While your personnel present with three [Voy] Treachery personnel is facing a dilemma, you may discard a card from hand to make that personnel gain a skill from a Treachery personnel present until the end of that dilemma.

name: Relentless Attacks
Name: Relentless Attacks
gametext: While your personnel present with three [Voy] Treachery personnel is facing a dilemma, you may discard a card from hand to make that personnel attributes +3 until the end of that dilemma.

name: Team of Infiltrators
Name: Team of Infiltrators
gametext: When your Infiltrator is facing a dilemma, if he or she is present with two Infiltrators, meet Integrity and Strength requirements of that dilemma using Cunning instead.

name: The Central Command
Name: The Central Command
gametext: When any number of your [Car] Officer and/or [Car] Treachery personnel are about to be stopped by a dilemma, discard the top three cards of your deck to prevent that.

name: Finding Our Way *VP
Name: Finding Our Way *VP
gametext: To play this event, you must not command a headquarters mission. Plays on your {Caretaker's Array}. Cards an opponent owns cannot prevent or destroy this event. When a card instructs you to place a personnel on your headquarters mission, that personnel may be placed aboard your [Voy] ship instead. Order - Discard a card from hand to download a [Voy] ship. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Ilia Finest Navigator in Starfleet *VP
Name: Ilia Finest Navigator in Starfleet *VP
gametext: You may play this personnel at cost -2 to ignore her next ability. When you play this personnel, if you command a [TOS] personnel who has a cost of 4 or more, for each headquarters mission your opponent commands, you may shuffle two cards from your discard pile into your deck.

name: Jean-Luc Picard Genial Captain
Name: Jean-Luc Picard Genial Captain
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may download {U.S.S. Enterprise-D}.

name: The Sword of Kahless *VP
Name: The Sword of Kahless *VP
gametext: Each of your Klingons and Honor personnel present is Integrity -2, Cunning +1, and Strength +2.

name: Ressikan Flute *VP
Name: Ressikan Flute *VP
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Stop your personnel who has Integrity>6 to take an event from your discard pile into your hand.

name: Thought Maker *VP
Name: Thought Maker *VP
gametext: Plays in your core. When you have drawn dilemmas, you may search your dilemma pile for a copy of one of your overcome dilemmas and add it to those drawn. Shuffle and replace your dilemma pile face down.

name: Kira Nerys Colonel Kira *VP
Name: Kira Nerys Colonel Kira *VP
Skills: Diplomacy Honor Leadership Officer Programming Security
gametext: While this personnel is present with your [Fed] personnel, each of your other [Baj] personnel present is attributes +1.

name: B'Elanna Torres Straightforward Engineer *VP
Name: B'Elanna Torres Straightforward Engineer *VP
gametext: Order - If this personnel is aboard your ship, discard a card from hand to remove a Damage card from that ship. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Pavel A. Chekov Young Navigator *VP
Name: Pavel A. Chekov Young Navigator *VP
gametext: You may play this personnel at cost +1 to return a [TOS] personnel you command to his or her owner's hand.

name: Quark Little Green Man *VP
Name: Quark Little Green Man *VP
gametext: While this personnel is present with a [Pa] personnel, he is attributes +1 and gains Acquisition, Diplomacy, and Treachery.

name: Vash Treasure Hunter *VP
Name: Vash Treasure Hunter *VP
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may place a card from your discard pile on the bottom of your deck, then draw a card (or, if {Jean-Luc Picard} is at this mission, draw two cards instead).

name: Phlox Alien Physiologist *VP
Name: Phlox Alien Physiologist *VP
gametext: When your personnel present is about to be killed, you may stop this personnel to prevent that and place that personnel on your headquarters where he or she could be played.

name: Energize *VP
Name: Energize *VP
gametext: Plays in your core. At the start of each of your turns, place the top card of your deck on this event. The first non-[TNG] personnel you play each turn is cost -2 for each card on this event.

name: Olarra
Name: Olarra
gametext: While your [NA] Hologram with no staffing icons is aboard this ship, he or she gains [Stf]. While you have a lower score than each of your opponents and a Hologram personnel is aboard this ship, you may spend an additional counter this turn.

name: Olarra *VP
Name: Olarra *VP
gametext: While your [NA] Hologram with no staffing icons is aboard this ship, he or she gains [Stf]. While you have a lower score than each of your opponents and a Hologram personnel is aboard this ship, you may spend an additional counter this turn.

name: Sumek
Name: Sumek
gametext: While you command three [Fed] personnel, this personnel gains Biology and Officer, and becomes [Fed].

name: K'wov
Name: K'wov
gametext: While you command three [Kli] personnel, this personnel is attributes +1, gains Leadership, and becomes [Kli].

name: Garren
Name: Garren
gametext: While you command three [Rom] personnel, this personnel is attributes +1, gains Engineer, and becomes [Rom].

name: Doran
Name: Doran
gametext: While you command three [Car] personnel, this personnel is attributes +1, gains Archaeology, and becomes [Car].

name: Automated Server
Name: Automated Server
gametext: While you command three [Fer] personnel, this personnel is attributes +1, gains Acquisition, and becomes [Fer].

name: Alpha 5 Approach Transport Crash Survivor
Name: Alpha 5 Approach Transport Crash Survivor
Affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.
gametext: When a player's personnel begin a mission attempt with five or less personnel, the player to the left of that player may draw six extra dilemmas and spend six extra on dilemmas.

name: Dark Page
Name: Dark Page
gametext: Choose a personnel who has Anthropology or Exobiology to be stopped. If you cannot, randomly select a personnel to be killed.

name: Persistent Strike
Name: Persistent Strike
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Begin an engagement involving your Officer personnel. If you win, place this event on an opponent's ship involved. Otherwise, destroy this event. Damage - If this is a non-[Voy] ship, ignore its game text.

name: Mark of Gideon (ID)
Name: Mark of Gideon (ID)
gametext: Randomly select a personnel to be stopped. If you still have nine personnel remaining, return that personnel to his or her owner's hand, then your opponent chooses a second personnel to return to his or her owner's hand. If you still have ten personnel remaining, your opponent chooses a third personnel to return to his or her owner's hand.

name: Pillage and Plunder
Name: Pillage and Plunder
gametext: Choose a personnel who has Archaeology or Treachery to be stopped. If you cannot, randomly select a personnel to be killed.

name: The First Duty
Name: The First Duty
gametext: Choose a personnel who has Honor or Law to be stopped. If you cannot, randomly select a personnel to be killed.

name: A Private Little War
Name: A Private Little War
gametext: Randomly select a personnel to be stopped. Unless you have Honor, Medical, Science and Integrity>32 or Engineer, Security, Treachery and Strength>32, randomly select a second personnel to be stopped and your opponent may download an equipment.

name: In Development
Name: In Development
gametext: For each headquarters mission you command, this dilemma is cost -1. Randomly select a personnel who has a cost of 2 or less. All your other personnel who have a cost of 2 or less are stopped.

name: Setting the Stage
Name: Setting the Stage
gametext: Randomly select nine personnel. All your other personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: The Clown: Go Away
Name: The Clown: Go Away
gametext: Place this dilemma on this mission. At the start of each of your turns, if you command no personnel or ships that you own at this mission, remove this dilemma from the game. When personnel begin a mission attempt at this mission, randomly select a personnel to be returned to their owner's hand.

name: Inhumane Interrogation
Name: Inhumane Interrogation
gametext: Randomly select a personnel to be killed. You may destroy an event in your core to prevent this.

name: Hypospray
Name: Hypospray
gametext: When your personnel present is about to be killed by a dilemma, you may stop that personnel and your Medical personnel present to prevent that. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Product Placement
Name: Product Placement
gametext: Discard an equipment, event, or interrupt from hand to spend two additional counters this turn. Destroy this event.

name: Slightly Awkward
Name: Slightly Awkward
gametext: Plays in your core. When a personnel that the player on your right commands begins a mission attempt, you may discard an equipment, event, or interrupt from hand to choose one: draw an extra dilemma; or, spend one extra in total cost on dilemmas.

name: Tolian Soran Renegade Scientist *VP
Name: Tolian Soran Renegade Scientist *VP
Skills: Astrometrics Engineer 2 Physics Programming Transporters 2 Treachery
gametext: When this personnel uses a skill, randomly stop one of your personnel present.

name: Timescape *VP
Name: Timescape *VP
gametext: Place this dilemma on this mission. You cannot begin a mission attempt at this mission. At the end of this turn, this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Urgency *VP
Name: Urgency *VP
gametext: Place this dilemma on this mission. Each personnel may use no more than one skill during each dilemma he or she faces. Each personnel may use no more than one skill to meet a mission's requirements. At the end of this turn, this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Deploy the Fleet *VP
Name: Deploy the Fleet *VP
gametext: Score 5 points for each of your staffed ships that has its Commander aboard at an opponent's non-headquarters mission. Destroy this event.

name: Desperate Sacrifice *VP
Name: Desperate Sacrifice *VP
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - If you command four events, destroy this event to make each player choose two events he or she commands, then destroy each other event he or she commands.

name: How Would You Like a Trip to Romulus? *VP
Name: How Would You Like a Trip to Romulus? *VP
gametext: Choose one: download a Commander that corresponds with your ship; or download a ship that corresponds with your Commander. Destroy this event.

name: You've Always Been My Favorite *VP
Name: You've Always Been My Favorite *VP
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Bor] personnel. Lose 5 points to play in your core. When you play this event, download up to five cards, then place them on this event. You may spend 1 counter to take a card on this event into your hand. When there are no cards on this event, destroy it.

name: Allies on the Inside *VP
Name: Allies on the Inside *VP
gametext: Order - Download a Dissident personnel, then discard cards from hand equal to that personnel's cost. Remove this interrupt from the game.

name: Leeta Rebel Supporter *VP
Name: Leeta Rebel Supporter *VP
gametext: When you play this personnel, discard a card from hand. While you have more than ten cards in your discard pile, each of your Dissident personnel present is attributes +1.

name: Jake Sisko Reporter Behind the Lines *VP
Name: Jake Sisko Reporter Behind the Lines *VP
gametext: When you play this personnel, discard a card from hand. When you play another Dissident personnel, you may make each player discard the top card of his or her deck.

name: Healing Hand
Name: Healing Hand
gametext: Choose a Medical personnel to be stopped. Unless the personnel stopped by this dilemma has 2 Medical, this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Sent Back
Name: Sent Back
gametext: To play this event, you must discard two [Rom] cards from hand. Choose an opponent and name a personnel or event. That opponent places each card he or she commands with that card title on the bottom of its owner's deck and then draws two cards. Destroy this event.

name: Dukat Cardassian Representative
Name: Dukat Cardassian Representative
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may choose one: download {Ruling Council} or download a [Dom] card. Order - Discard three non-personnel cards (or two [TN] cards) from hand to destroy an event.

name: Morgan Bateson Confident Commander
Name: Morgan Bateson Confident Commander
gametext: While no player commands a Temporal event, this personnel is attributes +1.

name: Enterprise Damaged Starship
Name: Enterprise Damaged Starship
gametext: While this ship is at a Region: Delphic Expanse mission, you may play [SF] personnel and equipment aboard this ship. While you command a completed Region: Delphic Expanse mission and this ship is at a Region: Delphic Expanse mission, you may play [NA] personnel aboard this ship.

name: Enterprise Damaged Starship *VP
Name: Enterprise Damaged Starship *VP
gametext: While this ship is at a Region: Delphic Expanse mission, you may play [SF] personnel and equipment aboard this ship. While you command a completed Region: Delphic Expanse mission and this ship is at a Region: Delphic Expanse mission, you may play [NA] personnel aboard this ship.

name: Infinite Diversity
Name: Infinite Diversity
gametext: Your opponent discards two cards from hand to name a skill (except Acquisition, Intelligence, Law, or Telepathy). Unless you have Anthropology and that skill or Science and that skill, all your personnel are stopped.

name: Allegiance
Name: Allegiance
gametext: To play this event, you must command six [Fed][Maq] personnel. Plays in your core. At the end of each of your turns, if an opponent has no cards in hand, you may choose one: Download a [Maq] Leadership personnel, or score 5 points, or draw six cards and then place three cards from hand on the bottom of your deck.

name: Kira Nerys Liberator
Name: Kira Nerys Liberator
gametext: When a [Baj] personnel present is killed by a dilemma, you may take a different Bajoran Resistance personnel from your discard pile and place him or her present with this personnel. That personnel joins this mission attempt.

name: Legacy
Name: Legacy
gametext: You and your opponent each reveal the top three dilemmas of your dilemma piles. Unless you revealed an equal or greater number of dilemmas that require a skill than your opponent, all of your personnel are stopped.

name: This Side of Paradise
Name: This Side of Paradise
gametext: Plays in your core. When your personnel is about to be killed by a dilemma, you may place him or her on this event instead.

name: Berlinghoff Rasmussen Temporal "Historian"
Name: Berlinghoff Rasmussen Temporal "Historian"
gametext: Order - Stop this personnel to take command of an equipment present that you do not own. Order - If this personnel is on an opponent's planet mission, stop him to give command of an equipment present you command but do not own to that opponent to score 5 points.

name: Forced Into Labor
Name: Forced Into Labor
gametext: Unless you have Geology, Leadership, and {Trellium-D} or 2 Security and Strength>32, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Trellium-D
Name: Trellium-D
gametext: When you play this equipment, it is cost -1 for each Region: Delphic Expanse mission you command. Plays aboard your ship. When you play this equipment, discard a non-personnel card from hand to draw two cards.

name: Spatial Reconfiguration
Name: Spatial Reconfiguration
gametext: Plays on your non-headquarters mission. This mission gains Region: Delphic Expanse and can be attempted by your [SF] personnel. When a card an opponent owns causes you to lose command of this event, return it to its owner's hand.

name: Travis Mayweather Damaged Navigator
Name: Travis Mayweather Damaged Navigator
gametext: While this personnel is at a Region: Delphic Expanse mission, if there is a [SF] ship at this mission with unused Range>5, this personnel is attributes +1 and gains Geology, Honor, and Security.

name: Investigate Refinery
Name: Investigate Refinery
Skills: 2 Physics, Security, Treachery, and Strength>31 or Engineer, Leadership, Science, and Cunning>34

name: Holding Cell
Name: Holding Cell
gametext: To play this event, you must command six [DS9] personnel. Plays in your core. When you play this event, name a personnel, then each player places each copy of that personnel they command on this event (those personnel cannot use abilities). When an opponent is about to play an interrupt, prevent that interrupt and place it on this event.

name: Elim Garak Federation Agent
Name: Elim Garak Federation Agent
gametext: Your Intelligence personnel present are each attributes +1.

name: Elim Garak Federation Agent *VAP
Name: Elim Garak Federation Agent *VAP
gametext: Your Intelligence personnel present are each attributes +1.

name: Phlox Damaged Doctor
Name: Phlox Damaged Doctor
gametext: When a personnel present is about to be killed by a dilemma, if this personnel is at a Region: Delphic Expanse mission, you may return that personnel to his or her owner's hand.

name: Diversionary Tactics
Name: Diversionary Tactics
gametext: To play this interrupt, discard two [Fed] cards from hand. When an opponent plays an interrupt, if one of his or her personnel is facing a dilemma you own, prevent that interrupt and place it in its owner's discard pile. Order - Take a [Fed] card from your discard pile and place it on top of its owner's deck.

name: Opportunity Seized
Name: Opportunity Seized
gametext: To play this interrupt, discard a card from beneath your {Ferenginar}. When an opponent plays an interrupt, you may destroy your Rule to prevent that interrupt and place it in its owner's discard pile. Place this interrupt beneath your {Ferenginar}. Order - Your [Fer] ship is Range +4 until the end of the turn.

name: Ruling Council
Name: Ruling Council
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must command [HQ] {Mouth of the Wormhole} and three non-Dissident [TN] personnel. Order - Unstop each of your stopped [TN] personnel.

name: Vorta Discipline
Name: Vorta Discipline
gametext: When your Founder or Vorta is about to be stopped, stop your Jem'Hadar present with him or her to prevent that. Order - Kill your Jem'Hadar present with a Treachery Vorta to destroy an event that has a cost equal to or less than that Jem'Hadar's cost.

name: Ibboko Kreetassan Chancellor
Name: Ibboko Kreetassan Chancellor
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may download a Ritual event or a Kreetassan personnel. When a Ritual event you own is destroyed, you may discard a card from hand to place that Ritual event in your core.

name: Code Forty-Seven
Name: Code Forty-Seven
gametext: Choose one or more [Cmd] personnel to be stopped. Unless the total cost of personnel stopped by this dilemma is 4 or more, this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Gravitational Anomaly
Name: Gravitational Anomaly
gametext: Unless you have Navigation, Science, and {Trellium-D} or Geology, Physics, and Cunning>32, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Honorable Pursuit
Name: Honorable Pursuit
gametext: Choose an Honor personnel to be stopped. Unless the personnel stopped by this dilemma has 2 Honor, this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Pitching In
Name: Pitching In
gametext: If you have four or more personnel who have a cost of 2 or less attempting this mission, this dilemma is cost -3. Choose a Leadership or Security personnel to be stopped. Then choose an Engineer or Programming personnel to be stopped.

name: Unfair Comparison
Name: Unfair Comparison
gametext: You and your opponent each reveal the top three dilemmas of your dilemma piles. Unless you revealed dilemmas that have an equal or greater total cost than your opponent, randomly select three personnel to be stopped.

name: Alvera Tree Ritual
Name: Alvera Tree Ritual
gametext: Plays in your core. When a personnel begins a mission attempt, you may have each player shuffle his or her dilemma pile.

name: Klingon Tea Ceremony
Name: Klingon Tea Ceremony
gametext: Plays in your core. When an opponent downloads a card, if he or she has already downloaded a card this turn, that opponent must place it on top of his or her deck instead of in his or her hand.

name: Exchange Program
Name: Exchange Program
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must command two [Kli] ships. When an opponent plays an interrupt, download an interrupt. Order - Place one of your [Kli] personnel at an opponent's headquarters mission (he or she now commands that personnel) to take a personnel at that headquarters mission that has a cost equal to or less than that [Kli] personnel and place him or her at your {Qo'noS} (you now command that personnel).

name: Hidden Resource
Name: Hidden Resource
gametext: When an opponent plays a ship, discard a [Baj] card from hand to download a [Baj] ship. Order - Each of your [Baj] ships is Range +5 until the end of this turn.

name: Lustful Distraction
Name: Lustful Distraction
gametext: To play this interrupt, stop two of your [AU][SF] personnel. While you have no cards in hand, you may play this interrupt from on your {Watch Dog}. When an interrupt is played, prevent that interrupt and place it in its owner's discard pile. Order - Choose an event. The owner of that event shuffles it into his or her deck.

name: Secret Agenda
Name: Secret Agenda
gametext: When your [Rom] Leadership personnel is facing a dilemma, name a skill that none of your personnel facing that dilemma has. That [Rom] Leadership personnel gains that skill until the end of that dilemma. Order - Examine an opponent's hand. For each [Rom] Leadership personnel you command, choose an interrupt revealed. That opponent discards each one.

name: Superior Position
Name: Superior Position
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must have more points or command more ships than one of your opponents. When your [Car] personnel is about to be killed by a dilemma, stop that personnel instead. Order - Discard the top card of your deck to take a [Car] card from your discard pile and place it on top of its owner's deck.

name: Unrelenting
Name: Unrelenting
gametext: To play this interrupt, stop a personnel you command but do not own aboard your [Bor] ship. When an opponent plays an interrupt, you may give command and place a personnel he or she owns but that you command at his or her headquarters mission to prevent that interrupt and place it in its owner's discard pile. Order - Take command of an opponent's personnel present with a personnel that he or she owns but that you command.

name: Investigate Anachronism
Name: Investigate Anachronism
Skills: Diplomacy, Leadership, 2 Security, and Strength>30 or 2 Anthropology, Biology, Honor, and Cunning>30

name: Benjamin Sisko Man of Two Worlds
Name: Benjamin Sisko Man of Two Worlds
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may download a Prophet card and/or take each personnel you own that has been removed from the game and place them in your discard pile.

name: Odo Bajoran Representative
Name: Odo Bajoran Representative
gametext: To play this personnel, you must command three non-Dissident [TN] personnel. You may play this personnel at your [HQ] {Mouth of the Wormhole} at cost +5 to do any or all of the following: score 5 points, download an equipment, download {Ruling Council}, download a [TN] card.

name: Amat'igan Founder Bodyguard
Name: Amat'igan Founder Bodyguard
gametext: When your [Dom] personnel present is killed by a dilemma, you may take a Jem'Hadar from hand and place him present with this personnel. That personnel joins the mission attempt.

name: Weyoun Dominion Representative
Name: Weyoun Dominion Representative
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may choose one: download {Ruling Council} or download a [Car] card. Order - Place this personnel on the bottom of his owner's deck to name a personnel. Each opponent takes a personnel that he or she commands with that card title and places each on the bottom of his or her owner's deck.

name: Giotto Security Chief
Name: Giotto Security Chief
gametext: You may play this personnel at cost +2 to prevent and overcome the first dilemma he faces this turn that has a cost of 1 or more and does not require a skill.

name: Farek Distrusting Doctor
Name: Farek Distrusting Doctor
gametext: When this personnel or a Ferengi personnel present is about to be killed by a dilemma, you may remove a non-Ferengi personnel beneath your {Ferenginar} from the game to prevent that.

name: Amaros Freedom Fighter
Name: Amaros Freedom Fighter
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may discard any number of [Maq] cards from hand to download an equal number of cards. Those cards must have different titles and be events, interrupts or [Maq] ships.

name: Laavros Kreetassan Civil Servant
Name: Laavros Kreetassan Civil Servant
gametext: When a personnel present who has a cost of 4 or more is killed by a dilemma, you may stop this personnel to download a personnel of the same affiliation as that killed personnel and place him or her with this personnel. That personnel joins the mission attempt.

name: Punull
Name: Punull
gametext: When you play this personnel you may download up to four cards that have different titles. Then choose an opponent. He or she chooses two of those cards to be removed from the game.

name: Karina Hindering Analyst
Name: Karina Hindering Analyst
gametext: When your [Rom] personnel present is about to be stopped by a dilemma, if you have more cards in hand than each opponent, discard an event from hand to prevent that.

name: Ruwon Hindering Analyst
Name: Ruwon Hindering Analyst
gametext: When your [Rom] personnel present is about to be killed by a dilemma, if you have more cards in hand than each opponent, discard an event from hand to prevent that.

name: Charles Tucker III Damaged Engineer
Name: Charles Tucker III Damaged Engineer
gametext: Order - If this personnel is aboard your ship at a Region: Delphic Expanse mission, discard a card from hand to remove a Damage card from that ship. You may only do this once each turn.

name: Jonathan Archer Damaged Captain
Name: Jonathan Archer Damaged Captain
Skills: Astrometrics Diplomacy Engineer Leadership Officer Physics Security
gametext: While this personnel in facing a dilemma that does not require a skill at a Region: Delphic Expanse mission, you may exclude him and each of your [SF] personnel present from random selections.

name: Malcolm Reed Damaged Security Officer
Name: Malcolm Reed Damaged Security Officer
gametext: When an engagement involving this personnel at a Region: Delphic Expanse mission begins, you may discard a random card from hand to prevent that engagement and stop each personnel and ship involved.

name: T'Pol Damaged Science Officer
Name: T'Pol Damaged Science Officer
Skills: Archaeology Engineer Geology Law Physics Programming Science Transporters
gametext: While this personnel is at a Region: Delphic Expanse mission, ignore her next ability. When this personnel is about to face the third dilemma of a mission attempt, stop her.

name: U.S.S. Bozeman Well-Preserved Antique
Name: U.S.S. Bozeman Well-Preserved Antique
gametext: While a player commands a Temporal event, this ship is Range -3. Order - If this ship is at a non-headquarters mission, stop six personnel aboard to destroy a Temporal event.

name: Kilhra Hidden Threat
Name: Kilhra Hidden Threat
gametext: When you lose command of one of your events, you may take a non-dilemma card that you own that was on that event into hand.

name: Sphere 634 *VP
Name: Sphere 634 *VP
gametext: When this ship is about to move between an [AQ] mission and a [DQ] mission, do not add 2 to the span total of those missions.

name: Secret Identity *VP
Name: Secret Identity *VP
gametext: Your opponent chooses a personnel. You may replace him or her with any one personnel of the same affiliation from your deck. Place the personnel your opponent chose in his or her owner's discard pile. Shuffle and replace your deck.

name: Formal Hearing *VP
Name: Formal Hearing *VP
gametext: For each event your opponent commands in his or her core, this dilemma is cost -1. Unless you have Diplomacy, Intelligence, 2 Programming and Cunning>38 or 2 Honor, Law, and 2 Officer, randomly select three personnel to be stopped.

name: Overwhelmed *VP
Name: Overwhelmed *VP
gametext: Place this dilemma on this mission. When a personnel facing a dilemma at this mission uses his or her skills, he or she is stopped. At the end of this turn, return this dilemma to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Grav-Plating Trap *VP
Name: Grav-Plating Trap *VP
gametext: When an event or interrupt is played, destroy one of your non-Hand Weapon equipment to prevent that event or interrupt and place it in its owner's discard pile. Order - Destroy one of your non-Hand Weapon equipment to destroy an event.

name: Enabran Tain "Retired" Spymaster *VP
Name: Enabran Tain "Retired" Spymaster *VP
gametext: When you play this personnel, if each of your non-headquarters missions requires Intelligence, you may draw up to seven cards, then discard two cards from hand.

name: Gelnon Aloof Tactician *VP
Name: Gelnon Aloof Tactician *VP
gametext: When you play this personnel, if each of your non-headquarters missions is an [AQ] mission, you may download a Jem'Hadar and place it aboard your [Dom] ship.

name: Jean-Luc Picard Vintner *VP
Name: Jean-Luc Picard Vintner *VP
gametext: When you play this personnel, if each of your non-headquarters missions requires Biology, you may download up to three [TNG] personnel.

name: Alexander Rozhenko K'mtar *VP
Name: Alexander Rozhenko K'mtar *VP
gametext: When you play this personnel, if each of your non-headquarters missions requires Diplomacy, you may download up to two events, then play each of them at cost -3.

name: U.S.S. Defiant Repurposed Warship *VP
Name: U.S.S. Defiant Repurposed Warship *VP
gametext: When you play this ship, if each of your non-headquarters missions is a [GQ] mission, you may spend 5 additional counters this turn.

name: Coolant Leak
Name: Coolant Leak
gametext: Unless you have Engineer or a personnel who has a cost of 4 or more, all your personnel are stopped. If you have two or more personnel who have Engineer or cost 1 or less, randomly select all but one of those personnel to be stopped.

name: Information Extraction
Name: Information Extraction
gametext: Your personnel cannot gain skills while facing this dilemma. Unless you have Intelligence, Officer, and Programming or Exobiology, Medical, and Treachery, randomly select a personnel to be stopped and if this dilemma's owner chooses to lose 5 points, then add 10 to each attribute requirement of this mission until the end of this mission attempt.

name: I Stand With My Shipmates
Name: I Stand With My Shipmates
gametext: Plays in your core. When you are about to lose 5 points to pay the cost of a card you own, if you have 5 points, you may destroy this card instead to pay that cost.

name: Quinn
Name: Quinn
gametext: Order - Lose 5 points to make each player choose two events in play. All other events are destroyed.

name: Garth of Izar Criminally Insane
Name: Garth of Izar Criminally Insane
gametext: You may play this personnel at cost +5 to reveal the top card of an opponent's deck. If it is a personnel that opponent does not command, it is placed in your brig (that opponent now commands him or her) and this personnel gains each of that personnel's skills until the end of this turn.

name: Richard Galen Legendary Archaeologist
Name: Richard Galen Legendary Archaeologist
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may download an Artifact. While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may lose 5 points to have a personnel present gain all skills that this mission has in its requirements until the end of this mission attempt.

name: DaiMon Solok Cargo Runner
Name: DaiMon Solok Cargo Runner
Skills: Acquisition Anthropology Engineer Navigation Officer Transporters
gametext: To play this personnel, place the top card of your dilemma pile underneath a non-headquarters mission of the opponent to your right's choice. When you play this personnel, if you command three [Fer] personnel, score 5 points.

name: Deanna Troi Durango
Name: Deanna Troi Durango
gametext: When an opponent plays a Security personnel or places a Security personnel from hand on a headquarters mission, you may discard two cards from hand to stop that personnel.

name: Alien Encounter
Name: Alien Encounter
gametext: Unless you have Anthropology, Diplomacy, Exobiology, Leadership, and Integrity>34, or command one or less headquarters missions, choose five personnel to be stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Broken Link
Name: Broken Link
gametext: Your personnel cannot gain skills while facing this dilemma. Unless you have Anthropology, Biology, and Law or Diplomacy, Leadership, and Security, randomly select a personnel to be stopped and if this dilemma's owner discards a Capture card or a Punishment card from hand, then that personnel is placed in your opponent's brig instead.

name: Desperation
Name: Desperation
gametext: Unless you have 3 Security or Leadership, Treachery, and Strength>28, randomly select a personnel and choose a personnel to be stopped for each different Bajoran Resistance personnel your opponent commands.

name: Family
Name: Family
gametext: Randomly select a personnel to be stopped. Unless you reveal an Honor personnel from your hand or reveal a Treachery personnel from your hand, place that personnel on the bottom of his or her owner's deck instead.

name: Inequitable Exchange
Name: Inequitable Exchange
gametext: If your opponent has a captive in his or her brig, this dilemma is cost -3. Take a personnel you own from an opponent's brig (he or she joins this mission attempt). Then your opponent chooses a different personnel to be placed in his or her brig.

name: Just Following Orders
Name: Just Following Orders
gametext: Your personnel cannot gain skills while facing this dilemma. Unless you have Astrometrics, Intelligence, and Treachery or Geology, Honor, and Navigation, randomly select a personnel to be stopped and if this dilemma's owner discards an event from hand, then he or she may destroy an event.

name: One Step Ahead
Name: One Step Ahead
gametext: Unless you have 2 Programming and 2 Transporters or two Hand Weapons, all your personnel are stopped. When you meet the requirements of this dilemma, you may stop a Security personnel to score 5 points.

name: The Launching
Name: The Launching
gametext: Unless you have 2 Astrometrics and 2 Physics or two non-Hand Weapon equipment, all your personnel are stopped. When you meet the requirements of this dilemma, you may stop an Engineer personnel to score 5 points.

name: Trilithium Heist
Name: Trilithium Heist
gametext: Your personnel cannot gain skills while facing this dilemma. Unless you have Acquisition, Engineer, and Transporters or Medical, Physics, and Science, randomly select a personnel to be stopped and if this dilemma's owner discards a Crime card from hand, then he or she scores 5 points.

name: Earring of Li Nalas
Name: Earring of Li Nalas
gametext: When your Bajoran Resistance personnel present is about to be stopped by a dilemma, you may destroy your Assault event or your Hand Weapon he or she is equipped with to prevent that. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Resistance Rifle
Name: Resistance Rifle
gametext: While in combat, each of your Bajoran Resistance personnel present is Strength +1. While your Bajoran Resistance personnel present is facing a dilemma, you may add that personnel's Strength to his or her Cunning or Integrity until the end of that dilemma. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Bajoran Resistance Cell
Name: Bajoran Resistance Cell
