gametext: To play this event, you must command three Bajoran Resistance personnel. Choose one: download an Assault event; download a Hand Weapon; or download a Bajoran Resistance personnel and place him or her in your discard pile. Destroy this event.

name: Ferengi Tradition
Name: Ferengi Tradition
gametext: To play this event, you must command six [Fer] personnel. Lose 10 points to score 20 points. Remove this event from the game.

name: Isabella
Name: Isabella
gametext: Plays in your core. While a personnel is facing a Persistent dilemma, that personnel cannot use his or her abilities.

name: Peak Performance
Name: Peak Performance
gametext: Plays in your core. When you play this event, name a unique personnel. While you have 30 or more points, your personnel with that title is attributes +1. While you have 60 or more points, your personnel with that title cannot be stopped by dilemmas.

name: Promenade School
Name: Promenade School
gametext: Stop four of your [Fed][DS9] personnel of four different species to score 5 points. Remove this event from the game.

name: Recruitment Tactics
Name: Recruitment Tactics
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin combat involving your Bajoran Resistance personnel. If you win, randomly select an opponent's personnel involved to be killed and you may take a Bajoran Resistance personnel from your discard pile and place him or her on your {Bajor}.

name: Event Horizon
Name: Event Horizon
gametext: When an opponent's personnel complete a mission, if you command a completed mission, lose 5 points to return each Persistent dilemma beneath that opponent's mission to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Flaw in the Plan
Name: Flaw in the Plan
gametext: When an opponent plays a personnel or places a personnel from hand on a headquarters mission, discard three unique personnel from hand to kill that personnel. Order - Kill four personnel you own.

name: Hate
Name: Hate
gametext: When an opponent's personnel gains a skill as a result of paying a cost, if you command a completed mission, lose 5 points to remove that personnel from the game.

name: My Patience Has Limits
Name: My Patience Has Limits
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must command three [Rom] personnel. Order - Lose 5 points to name a dilemma. Choose an opponent to reveal all copies of that dilemma from his or her dilemma pile. You may remove a copy of that dilemma from the game (or lose 5 points to remove each copy of that dilemma from the game). That opponent shuffles and replaces his or her dilemma pile.

name: Surprise Audit
Name: Surprise Audit
gametext: When your personnel aboard a ship is facing a dilemma, lose 5 points to take a [Fer] personnel from beneath your {Ferenginar} and place him or her aboard that ship. That personnel joins the mission attempt.

name: Kaitaama Precious Cargo
Name: Kaitaama Precious Cargo
gametext: When this personnel is about to be placed in a brig, return her to her owner's hand. When this personnel is killed by a dilemma, score 5 points. When this personnel is stopped by a dilemma, draw a card.

name: Kaitaama Precious Cargo *VP
Name: Kaitaama Precious Cargo *VP
gametext: When this personnel is about to be placed in a brig, return her to her owner's hand. When this personnel is killed by a dilemma, score 5 points. When this personnel is stopped by a dilemma, draw a card.

name: Assess Contamination
Name: Assess Contamination
Affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.
gametext: Prevent and overcome the first dilemma your personnel face here each turn that has a cost of 1 or more and does not require a skill.

name: Falsify Distress Signal
Name: Falsify Distress Signal
gametext: When you complete this mission, if you have six or more cards beneath your {Ferenginar}, you may lose 5 points to take an additional turn after this one.

name: Mine Vendarite
Name: Mine Vendarite
gametext: When you complete this mission, if you command another completed Region: Ligos System mission or have a personnel in your brig, score 5 points and restore the Range of each ship you command.

name: Off-World Raid
Name: Off-World Raid
Skills: Geology, Leadership, Security, and (Integrity>38 or Strength>40)
gametext: When your personnel complete this mission, each player may shuffle each Assault event and each Hand Weapon in his or her discard pile into its owner's deck.

name: Furel Resistance Scout
Name: Furel Resistance Scout
gametext: Order - Lose 5 points to unstop up to two stopped Bajoran Resistance personnel present. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Halb Daier Resistance Contact
Name: Halb Daier Resistance Contact
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may download {No Love For the Spoon Heads}.

name: Kira Nerys Ih'valla
Name: Kira Nerys Ih'valla
gametext: When you begin a mission attempt involving this personnel, you may lose 5 points to take up to two [Baj] cards from your discard pile into hand.

name: Opaka Collaborator
Name: Opaka Collaborator
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you command {Bajor} and no other headquarters mission, you may score 5 points. Order - Lose 5 points to take a Bajoran Resistance personnel from your discard pile and place him or her on your Bajor. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Orta Resistance Leader
Name: Orta Resistance Leader
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may lose 5 points to make each Bajoran Resistance personnel present attributes +1 until the end of this turn. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Surmak Ren Resistance Doctor
Name: Surmak Ren Resistance Doctor
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, if he is present with two Bajoran Resistance personnel, you may lose 5 points to download an interrupt. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Broca "Leader" of the Cardassian Union
Name: Broca "Leader" of the Cardassian Union
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you command three [Car] personnel, you may discard the top six cards of your deck to score 5 points.

name: Eris Harbinger of the Dominion
Name: Eris Harbinger of the Dominion
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you command a Founder and a Vorta, you may score 5 points. When you begin combat involving this personnel, randomly select an opponent's personnel present to be excluded from that combat.

name: Charles Whatley Professional Admiral
Name: Charles Whatley Professional Admiral
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may lose 5 points to download up to two [E] personnel, then place them on your [HQ] {Mouth of the Wormhole}.

name: Jaresh-Inyo Federation President
Name: Jaresh-Inyo Federation President
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may lose 5 points to download up to three [DS9] personnel, then place them on your [HQ] {Earth} where each personnel could be played.

name: Luther Sloan Man of Action
Name: Luther Sloan Man of Action
gametext: Order - Remove your event from the game and return this personnel to his owner's hand to destroy an opponent's event.

name: Croden Dissembler
Name: Croden Dissembler
gametext: When you play this personnel, choose an opponent to choose one: the next card you play this turn is cost -4 or you score 5 points.

name: Emck Export Controller
Name: Emck Export Controller
Skills: Acquisition Biology Leadership Medical Navigation Physics Treachery
gametext: When you are about to play this personnel, you may lose 5 points to do any or all of the following: play him at cost -3, play him aboard your [NA] ship, download a [NA] personnel.

name: Donatra Honorable Commander
Name: Donatra Honorable Commander
Skills: Diplomacy Honor Leadership Navigation Officer Physics
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma that has a cost of 1 or more and does not require a skill, you may remove this personnel from the game to prevent and overcome that dilemma.

name: Te'nari Resistance Flagship
Name: Te'nari Resistance Flagship
gametext: While you command three Bajoran Resistance personnel aboard this ship, it is attributes +2. You may pay the cost of losing 5 points to use an ability on one of your Bajoran Resistance personnel at this mission by destroying your Hand Weapon he or she is equipped with or your Assault event that has a cost of 1 or more.

name: U.S.S. Enterprise-D Diplomatic Envoy
Name: U.S.S. Enterprise-D Diplomatic Envoy
gametext: When you complete this mission, if this ship is staffed, score 5 points. When you complete this mission, if this ship's Commander is aboard, each player scores 5 points.

name: Eleventh Gradient Export Vessel
Name: Eleventh Gradient Export Vessel
gametext: When you are about to play this ship, you may lose 5 points to play this ship at cost -7. At the start of each of your turns, you may return your event on this mission to its owner's hand.

name: U.S.S. Enterprise-J *VP
Name: U.S.S. Enterprise-J *VP
gametext: Plays in your core. Each of your personnel at a mission that is worth 40 or more points is attributes +1.

name: Surprise Party
Name: Surprise Party
gametext: Plays in your core. You may spend an additional counter each turn.

name: Phoenix Risen From the Ashes *VP
Name: Phoenix Risen From the Ashes *VP
gametext: While this ship is at a non-headquarters mission and does not have a Damage marker on it, each of your opponents needs an additional 10 points to win the game.

name: Gomtuu Shock Wave *VP
Name: Gomtuu Shock Wave *VP
gametext: Unless you have 2 Diplomacy and Integrity>32 or Telepathy and Integrity>35, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma is placed on your ship. Damage - This ship is attributes -2.

name: Where No One Has Gone Before *VP
Name: Where No One Has Gone Before *VP
gametext: Unless you have Astrometrics, Navigation, Physics, and Cunning>34 or Exobiology, Leadership, Medical, and Integrity>32, place this dilemma in your core and place your ship on this dilemma. At the end of your next turn, remove this dilemma from the game and place the ship at your headquarters mission.

name: Exceed Engine Output *VP
Name: Exceed Engine Output *VP
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Move your ship with your Engineer aboard to a space mission, then place this event on that ship. Damage - This ship is Weapons -2 and Shields -2.

name: Talnot *VP
Name: Talnot *VP
gametext: While you command an event in your core and have a copy of that same event in your discard pile, your opponent cannot destroy that event.

name: U.S.S. Valiant Red Squad Training Ship *VP
Name: U.S.S. Valiant Red Squad Training Ship *VP
gametext: This ship is attributes +1 for each of your Cadets aboard (limit +4).

name: I.K.S. Ning'tao *VP
Name: I.K.S. Ning'tao *VP
gametext: When you win an engagement involving this ship, you may lose 5 points to download a Damage card and place it on an opponent's ship at this mission.

name: Defiant Mirror Warship *VP
Name: Defiant Mirror Warship *VP
gametext: To play this ship, you must command three [AU] personnel. When you play this ship, you may discard any number of cards from hand. This ship is cost -1 for each card discarded this way.

name: Columbia The Second Warp Five Ship *VP
Name: Columbia The Second Warp Five Ship *VP
gametext: While the first mission you completed this game was a space mission, this ship is attributes +1. While a personnel aboard this ship is facing a dilemma, you may discard a card from hand to have that personnel gain Astrometrics or Science until the end of the mission attempt.

name: Locutus' Borg Cube *VP
Name: Locutus' Borg Cube *VP
gametext: Order - If this ship is staffed, return your {Drone} aboard it to his or her owner's hand to download a Maneuver card. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Arrogance
Name: Arrogance
gametext: Reveal the top card of your deck. Unless it has a cost of 4 or more, randomly select a personnel to be stopped.

name: Breached
Name: Breached
gametext: Unless you have Navigation, Security, Transporters, and Strength>30 or 2 Physics, Treachery, and Cunning>30, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma is placed on your ship. Damage - Opponents' personnel may beam between this ship and his or her ship at this mission.

name: Duty Schedule
Name: Duty Schedule
gametext: Your opponent chooses a number of personnel equal to the number of staffing requirement icons on this ship. Choose one of those personnel to be stopped.

name: Galileo Grounded
Name: Galileo Grounded
gametext: Unless you have Medical, Security, and Transporters or a staffed ship at this mission, all your personnel are stopped.

name: Greater Needs
Name: Greater Needs
gametext: Unless you have Anthropology, Diplomacy, Exobiology, and Integrity>30 or Leadership, Transporters, Treachery, and Strength>30, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma is placed on your ship at this mission. Damage - Your personnel cannot begin a mission attempt at this mission.

name: Insurrection
Name: Insurrection
gametext: This dilemma is cost +1. Place this dilemma on this mission (limit one per mission). If this mission is worth 30 or more points, add 10 to each printed attribute requirement<32 needed to complete this mission. When this mission is completed, place this dilemma beneath your incomplete non-headquarters mission.

name: Programmed Compulsion
Name: Programmed Compulsion
gametext: Unless you have 2 Navigation and Programming or Engineer and Cunning>40, your opponent may place this dilemma on one of your missions. All your personnel are attributes -1. At the end of each of your turns, if you have a staffed ship at this mission, you may remove this dilemma from the game.

name: Rude Awakening
Name: Rude Awakening
gametext: Choose the corresponding Commander of this ship or a personnel who has [Cmd] and Officer to be stopped. If you cannot, all your personnel are stopped.

name: Rush Job
Name: Rush Job
gametext: Choose a personnel to be stopped. Unless this ship has four or more staffing requirement icons, choose a personnel to be stopped. Unless this ship has a [Cmd] icon in its staffing requirements, your opponent chooses a personnel to be stopped.

name: Sudden Stealth
Name: Sudden Stealth
gametext: Unless you have Engineer, Officer, and Programming or a Cloaking Device ship at this mission, all your personnel are stopped.

name: The Oracle's Punishment
Name: The Oracle's Punishment
gametext: Your opponent chooses two personnel to be stopped. When this dilemma is overcome, if it was prevented, your opponent may choose one of your personnel involved in the mission attempt to be killed.

name: Stolen Cloaking Device
Name: Stolen Cloaking Device
gametext: To play this equipment, you must command an Engineer personnel. When you play this equipment, you may download {Engage Cloak}. While this equipment is aboard your staffed ship, this ship gains Cloaking Device.

name: Christening
Name: Christening
gametext: Reveal your hand. If you do not command a ship and you do not reveal a ship from hand, this event is cost -3. Download a ship. Destroy this event.

name: Executive Commission
Name: Executive Commission
gametext: To play this event, you must command a ship at a non-headquarters mission with its corresponding Commander aboard. Take up to four cards that are personnel or ships from your discard pile and place them on the bottom of your deck. Remove this event from the game.

name: Extreme Measures
Name: Extreme Measures
gametext: Destroy a non-[Voy] ship you own to spend a number of additional counters equal to the cost of that ship. Remove this event from the game.

name: Rule of Acquisition #34
Name: Rule of Acquisition #34
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Fer] personnel. Plays in your core. When an engagement begins, you may place a card from hand beneath your {Ferenginar}. When you win an engagement, you may place this card beneath your Ferenginar.

name: Special Modifications
Name: Special Modifications
gametext: Plays in your core. Add [Cmd] to the staffing requirements of each of your ships. Each of your staffed ships is attributes +1.

name: The Hand of Apollo
Name: The Hand of Apollo
gametext: Plays in your core. When personnel that the player on your right commands begin a mission attempt, unless he or she has a ship at that mission with four or more staffing requirement icons, you may destroy this event to draw three extra dilemmas and spend three extra in total cost on dilemmas.

name: Cloak and Dagger
Name: Cloak and Dagger
gametext: When an opponent's personnel begins a mission attempt, take your staffed Cloaking Device ship from an opponent's mission and place it at that mission. Remove this interrupt from the game.

name: Assimilate Starship
Name: Assimilate Starship
Skills: Engineer, Programming, and Cunning>42 or Security, Transporters, and Strength>40
gametext: When you complete this mission, you may choose an opponent, place a ship you do not command from his or her discard pile at this mission, and take command of that ship. (It becomes [Bor].)

name: Evaluate Soliton Wave
Name: Evaluate Soliton Wave
Affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
gametext: While your personnel are attempting this mission aboard a ship with a printed attribute>8, this mission is worth 10 more points.

name: Repair Null Space Catapult
Name: Repair Null Space Catapult
Skills: Astrometrics, Engineer, Physics, Cunning>34, and (Diplomacy or Treachery)
gametext: When your personnel complete this mission, you may take an event from your discard pile into hand and/or place your staffed ship here at a different mission.

name: Kasidy Yates Freighter Captain
Name: Kasidy Yates Freighter Captain
gametext: While this personnel is attempting a mission, if your staffed ship is at this mission, she is attributes +2 and gains Honor and Navigation.

name: Dukat Ambitious Commander
Name: Dukat Ambitious Commander
Skills: Acquisition Leadership Navigation Officer Programming Treachery
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may discard a ship from hand to make him gain a skill from your personnel present until the end of that mission attempt.

name: Gelnon Accurate Estimator
Name: Gelnon Accurate Estimator
gametext: When you play a unique [Dom] personnel, if you have played no other personnel this turn, each player may discard a card from hand to download an Infiltrator or an Infiltration card.

name: Duras Devious Challenger
Name: Duras Devious Challenger
Keywords: Commander: I.K.S. Vorn. High Council Member.
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, if your staffed ship is at this mission, you may meet Diplomacy and Honor requirements of that dilemma using Treachery instead.

name: Neelix Valued Guide
Name: Neelix Valued Guide
Skills: Acquisition Anthropology Diplomacy Exobiology Honor Navigation
gametext: This personnel is attributes +1 for each of your completed space missions.

name: Xhosa Sponsored Transport
Name: Xhosa Sponsored Transport
gametext: While this ship is about to move between a Region: Bajor System mission and a non-Region: Bajor System mission, subtract 1 from the Range required. At the start of each of your turns, if this ship is staffed at a non-headquarters mission, you may place an equipment or a personnel from your discard pile on top of your deck.

name: Groumall Inauspicious Command
Name: Groumall Inauspicious Command
gametext: While you have a ship in your discard pile, this ship is attributes +2. Order - Discard up to three cards from hand to take an equal number of [Car] ships from your discard pile into hand. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Ammut'alar Unexpected Threat
Name: Ammut'alar Unexpected Threat
gametext: When a card your opponent owns is about to destroy your Infiltration event, if this ship is staffed at a non-headquarters mission, you may discard an Infiltration card or an Infiltrator from hand to prevent that.

name: I.K.S. Vorn Ship of Traitors
Name: I.K.S. Vorn Ship of Traitors
gametext: While your three [Kli] Treachery personnel are aboard, this ship is attributes +2. While your three [Kli] Treachery personnel are aboard, each of your Treachery personnel at this mission is attributes +1.

name: Kira Nerys Ambitious Ally
Name: Kira Nerys Ambitious Ally
Skills: Diplomacy Honor Law Programming Security Transporters
gametext: You may play this personnel aboard your [Car] ship. When you play this personnel, you may download a ship.

name: Damar Ambitious Glinn
Name: Damar Ambitious Glinn
gametext: Order - Discard a [Car] ship from hand to draw three cards. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Tora Ziyal Ambitious Daughter
Name: Tora Ziyal Ambitious Daughter
gametext: When this personnel is about to be stopped by a dilemma, you may discard a ship from hand to prevent that.

name: Tugat
Name: Tugat
gametext: While this personnel is attempting a mission, if you discard a ship from hand, you may reveal him to make him attributes +1 until the end of the turn (limit +4).

name: Benjamin Maxwell Misguided Maverick
Name: Benjamin Maxwell Misguided Maverick
gametext: While your staffed [Fed] ship is at this mission, you may exclude this personnel from random selections.

name: John Harriman Captain of the Enterprise
Name: John Harriman Captain of the Enterprise
gametext: When this personnel is facing a dilemma, if your staffed ship is at this mission, you may discard a random card from hand to make this personnel gain a skill from a [TOS] personnel aboard that ship until the end of that mission attempt.

name: Ro Laren Apologetic Defector
Name: Ro Laren Apologetic Defector
gametext: When you complete a Region: Demilitarized Zone mission involving this personnel, each player may take up to two events with different card titles from his or her discard pile into his or her hand.

name: Ronald Tracey Delusional Captain
Name: Ronald Tracey Delusional Captain
gametext: You may play this personnel at cost +1 to download a non-Artifact equipment.

name: Tom Paris Competitive Pilot
Name: Tom Paris Competitive Pilot
Skills: Astrometrics Biology Engineer Medical 2 Navigation Officer
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you command four space missions, he is cost -3.

name: Bractor Suspicious Leader
Name: Bractor Suspicious Leader
gametext: While this personnel is aboard a [Fer] ship, if you command three Rule events, that ship is attributes +2.

name: Sybok Fanatical Missionary
Name: Sybok Fanatical Missionary
Skills: Anthropology Astrometrics Diplomacy Engineer Leadership Treachery
gametext: When a dilemma that this personnel is facing is about to be returned to its owner's dilemma pile, you may remove that dilemma from the game. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Sela Supervising Operative
Name: Sela Supervising Operative
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may download up to two cards. Those cards must be {Capture cards}, {Punishment cards}, or {The Perfect Tool}.

name: Jonathan Archer Defiant Commander
Name: Jonathan Archer Defiant Commander
gametext: While you have no cards in hand, each [AU][SF] personnel present is Cunning +1 (and Integrity +1 if they are aboard an [AU][SF] ship).

name: Kaza'kime Effective Demonstration
Name: Kaza'kime Effective Demonstration
gametext: To staff this ship, you must have a [Dom] personnel who costs 3 or more aboard. When this ship is destroyed, you may download a card. Order - If this ship is staffed, destroy it to download a Damage card, then place it on an opponent's ship at this mission.

name: Cosette Reliable Raider
Name: Cosette Reliable Raider
gametext: This ship is attributes +1 for each of your Region: Demilitarized Zone missions (limit +3). Order - Reveal the top card of an opponent's deck. If it is a personnel, name an event. Cards that opponent owns may not prevent or destroy that event you own until the start of your next Execute Orders segment. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Delta Flyer Rebuilt "Hot Rod"
Name: Delta Flyer Rebuilt "Hot Rod"
gametext: To play this ship, you must command four space missions. While you do not command a headquarters mission, you may play this ship at the same mission as your {U.S.S. Voyager}.

name: U.S.S. Enterprise-B Ill-Prepared Successor
Name: U.S.S. Enterprise-B Ill-Prepared Successor
gametext: When your personnel complete a mission, if this ship and your three [TOS] personnel aboard are at that mission, you may stop this ship to score 10 points. You may do this only once each turn.

name: U.S.S. Exeter Fleet's Finest
Name: U.S.S. Exeter Fleet's Finest
gametext: To play this ship, you must command four [TOS] personnel. You may play this ship at cost +2 to take up to two equipment cards from your discard pile into hand.

name: U.S.S. Phoenix Wayward Starship
Name: U.S.S. Phoenix Wayward Starship
gametext: When your personnel fail a mission attempt at a space mission, if this ship is at that mission, you may discard the top three cards of your deck to take a [TNG] card in your discard pile into hand. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Kreechta Prepared for War
Name: Kreechta Prepared for War
gametext: When an engagement involving this ship ends, you may unstop each of your personnel and ships involved and restore all Range those ships have used this turn. You cannot begin any other engagements this turn.

name: U.S.S. Enterprise-A Chariot of "God"
Name: U.S.S. Enterprise-A Chariot of "God"
gametext: When your personnel complete a mission, if this ship is staffed and at that mission, score 5 points. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Goraxus Lying in Wait
Name: Goraxus Lying in Wait
gametext: When you win an engagement involving this ship, randomly select an opponent's personnel involved to place in your brig. Order - Discard a Capture card from hand to begin an engagement involving this ship.

name: Starship Defiant Ripe for the Taking
Name: Starship Defiant Ripe for the Taking
gametext: To play this ship, you must command four [AU][SF] personnel. You may play this ship at cost +3 to destroy an event (or destroy two Maneuver events). Order - Place a card from hand on the bottom of your deck.

name: U.S.S. Enterprise-A Chariot of "God" *VP
Name: U.S.S. Enterprise-A Chariot of "God" *VP
gametext: When your personnel complete a mission, if this ship is staffed and at that mission, score 5 points. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Ezri Tigan Soldier of Fortune *VP
Name: Ezri Tigan Soldier of Fortune *VP
Skills: Anthropology Geology Medical Navigation Security Transporters
gametext: When this personnel is stopped by a dilemma, choose an opponent and place this personnel at his or her headquarters mission. That opponent now commands this personnel.

name: The Pendari Champion Electrifying Favorite
Name: The Pendari Champion Electrifying Favorite
gametext: Order - Examine the bottom card of any player's deck.

name: The Pendari Champion Electrifying Favorite *VAP
Name: The Pendari Champion Electrifying Favorite *VAP
gametext: Order - Examine the bottom card of any player's deck.

name: Infatuation
Name: Infatuation
gametext: Randomly select a Security personnel to be stopped. If you still have nine personnel remaining, randomly select a Medical personnel to be stopped. If you still have ten personnel remaining, randomly select an Officer personnel to be stopped.

name: Last Stand
Name: Last Stand
gametext: This dilemma is cost +3 for each headquarters mission your opponent commands. Your opponent may discard a Nucleogenic card from hand to make the next dilemma revealed during this mission attempt cost -3.

name: Optical Delusion
Name: Optical Delusion
gametext: Unless you have Programming, 2 Security, and Transporters or a Hologram and Cunning>30, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma is placed in your core. At the start of each of your opponent's Play and Draw Cards segments, he or she may download {Under Siege} and play it at cost -2.

name: The Big Goodbye
Name: The Big Goodbye
gametext: Randomly select a personnel to be stopped. Unless you have Diplomacy, Engineer, and Medical or Anthropology, Leadership, and Strength>30, that personnel is killed and all your personnel are stopped.

name: The Next Phase
Name: The Next Phase
gametext: Your opponent chooses one of his or her personnel that has been removed from the game. Unless you have the skills on that personnel or one of your personnel has total attributes>that personnel's total attributes, all your personnel are stopped.

name: 1962 Roger Maris
Name: 1962 Roger Maris
gametext: Order - Give command of this event to an opponent to take command of an event with no cards on it in that opponent's core and place it in your core.

name: Base Commerce
Name: Base Commerce
gametext: To play this event, you must command two Acquisition personnel. Plays in your core. Order - Download a Commodity. You may do this only once each turn. Order - Destroy this event to take command of up to three non-Artifact Commodity events you own in opponent's cores.

name: Felicium
Name: Felicium
gametext: While you command but do not own this event, each player's Acquisition personnel are Strength +1.

name: Habak
Name: Habak
gametext: To play this event, you must command a [Fed][Maq] Anthropology personnel. Plays on your Region: Demilitarized Zone mission (limit one per mission). This mission is worth 5 more points.

name: Holodeck Arch
Name: Holodeck Arch
Keywords: Replicate - Discard two cards from hand.
gametext: Download a Hologram or a Holoprogram event. Destroy this event.

name: Hunters' Training Program
Name: Hunters' Training Program
gametext: Plays in your core. While there are three or more cards on this event, each of your Holograms is attributes +1.

name: Not Easily Taken
Name: Not Easily Taken
gametext: To play this event, you must command a [Fed][Maq] Anthropology personnel. Plays in your core. While your [Maq] personnel is attempting a mission with an event on it, he or she is attributes +1. While an opponent's personnel is attempting a mission with an event on it, he or she is attributes -1.

name: Oo-mox
Name: Oo-mox
gametext: To play this event, you must command {Ferenginar}. Plays in your core. Each of your [Fer] personnel is attributes +1. At the end of your turn, place this event beneath your Ferenginar.

name: Outmaneuvered
Name: Outmaneuvered
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Fed][Maq] personnel. Plays on an opponent's mission. Personnel may not gain skills here.

name: Photons Be Free
Name: Photons Be Free
gametext: Plays in your core. While there are three or more cards on this event, the first Hologram personnel you play each turn is cost -2.

name: Tacking Into the Wind
Name: Tacking Into the Wind
gametext: This event is cost -2 for each completed mission the opponent on your left commands. Choose one: download a ship; destroy an event; or shuffle up to ten cards that are personnel or ships from your discard pile into your deck. Remove this event from the game.

name: Tulaberry Wine
Name: Tulaberry Wine
gametext: While you command but do not own this event, each player's Acquisition personnel are Cunning +1.

name: Evade Samaritan Snare
Name: Evade Samaritan Snare
Affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
Skills: 2 Engineer, Transporters, and (Honor and Integrity>30 or Treachery and Cunning>30)
gametext: When a player downloads an event or an interrupt, he or she must discard a card from hand for each headquarters mission he or she commands.

name: Fulfill Temporal Paradox
Name: Fulfill Temporal Paradox
gametext: Each of your non-Human personnel at this mission is attributes +1.

name: Liberate Photonic Servants
Name: Liberate Photonic Servants
Skills: Anthropology, Officer, Security, Treachery, and (Cunning>35 or Strength>35)
gametext: When your Hologram uses a skill to complete this mission, you may download a Hologram or a Holoprogram.

name: Resolve Trade Dispute
Name: Resolve Trade Dispute
Skills: Acquisition, Diplomacy, Security, and (Honor and Cunning>34 or Treachery and Strength>34)
gametext: When you play a Commodity event, if you have completed this mission, that event is cost -1.

name: Settle Holographic Colony
Name: Settle Holographic Colony
Skills: Engineer, Leadership, Programming, 3 Holograms, and Cunning>33
gametext: At the start of each of your turns, if you do not command a non-Hologram personnel, you may draw a card, then place a card from hand on your Holoprogram.

name: Paenol Resistance Soldier
Name: Paenol Resistance Soldier
gametext: When an opponent plays an interrupt, if you command {Bajor} and no other headquarters missions, you may lose 5 points to prevent that interrupt and place it in its owner's discard pile.

name: B'Elanna Torres Mostly Assimilated
Name: B'Elanna Torres Mostly Assimilated
gametext: While you command a [Bor] non-Dissident personnel, this personnel loses all of her skills and her next ability. When an event in your core is about to be destroyed by a card an opponent owns, you may stop this personnel to prevent that.

name: Eight of Eleven Laura
Name: Eight of Eleven Laura
gametext: While you command a [Bor] non-Dissident personnel, this personnel loses all of her skills and her next ability. When your Dissident present is about to be killed by a dilemma at a [DQ] mission, you may discard a card from hand and stop that personnel to prevent that.

name: Five of Twelve Axum
Name: Five of Twelve Axum
Skills: Anthropology Biology Engineer Leadership Navigation Programming
gametext: While you command a [Bor] non-Dissident personnel, this personnel loses all of his skills and his next ability. When you play this personnel, you may download a Dissident.

name: Kathryn Janeway Mostly Assimilated
Name: Kathryn Janeway Mostly Assimilated
gametext: While you command a [Bor] non-Dissident personnel, this personnel loses all of her skills and her next ability. When this personnel begins a mission attempt at a [DQ] mission, you may discard a card from hand to make her gain a skill of your choice until the end of the mission attempt.

name: Seven of Nine Annika
Name: Seven of Nine Annika
gametext: While you command a [Bor] non-Dissident personnel, this personnel loses all of her skills and her next ability. While this personnel is attempting a [DQ] mission, she and each Dissident personnel present are attributes +1.

name: Six of Ten Korok
Name: Six of Ten Korok
Skills: Astrometrics Honor 2 Leadership Navigation Officer Security
gametext: While you command a [Bor] non-Dissident personnel, this personnel loses all of his skills and his next ability. While this personnel is facing a dilemma that does not require a skill at a [DQ] mission, he cannot be killed.

name: Tuvok Mostly Assimilated
Name: Tuvok Mostly Assimilated
gametext: While you command a [Bor] non-Dissident personnel, this personnel loses all of his skills and his next ability. While this personnel is facing a dilemma at a [DQ] mission, he gains Law, Leadership, Officer and Security.

name: Hanok Trade Minister
Name: Hanok Trade Minister
Skills: Acquisition Engineer Honor Leadership Physics Security
gametext: When this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may give command of your Commodity event to an opponent to make up to two of your personnel present lose all their skills (except Acquisition) until the end of that dilemma.

name: Inglatu Tulaberry Merchant
Name: Inglatu Tulaberry Merchant
gametext: When this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may give command of your Commodity event to an opponent to make him gain a skill required by that dilemma until the end of that mission attempt.

name: Ornithar First Minister
Name: Ornithar First Minister
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may give command of your Commodity event to an opponent. This personnel is attributes +1 for each different Commodity you own but an opponent commands (limit +3).

name: Zyree
Name: Zyree
gametext: When you play this personnel, for each Commodity event you own but an opponent commands, she is cost -1.

name: Anthwara Leader of the Tribal Council
Name: Anthwara Leader of the Tribal Council
gametext: When you are about to play an event on a mission, if you command {For the Cause}, you may play that event at cost -1 (or cost -2 if it is being played on a Region: Demilitarized Zone mission).

name: Boq'ta
Name: Boq'ta
gametext: While an opponent commands an Assault event, this personnel gains Diplomacy and Medical.

name: Guinan Battleship Bartender
Name: Guinan Battleship Bartender
gametext: When you play an [AU][TNG] card at this mission, you may stop this personnel to make that card cost -2.

name: Jones
Name: Jones
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may lose 5 points to destroy an event in an opponent's core.

name: Kituhwa Tribal Historian
Name: Kituhwa Tribal Historian
gametext: When you are about to lose command of an event on your mission, you may stop this personnel and discard a [Maq] card from hand to return that event to its owner's hand.

name: Uhura Experienced Technician
Name: Uhura Experienced Technician
gametext: You may play this personnel at cost -2 to ignore her next ability. When you play this personnel, you may download an interrupt and/or a [TOS] Commander.

name: Wakasa Tribal Councilor
Name: Wakasa Tribal Councilor
Skills: Anthropology Diplomacy Engineer Geology Honor Programming
gametext: When this personnel is an eligible target for a random selection at a mission with an event on it, you may discard a random card from hand to exclude him and another [Maq] personnel present from that selection.

name: Worf Clandestine Staffer
Name: Worf Clandestine Staffer
gametext: You may play this personnel aboard your [TOS] ship. When an opponent plays an event that costs 2 or less, if this personnel is present with three [Pa] personnel, you may return this personnel to his owner's hand to prevent that event and place it in its owner's discard pile.

name: Jadzia Dax Tongo Player
Name: Jadzia Dax Tongo Player
gametext: While you command a [Fer][DS9] personnel, you may play this personnel at {Mouth of the Wormhole}. When you play this personnel, you may download {Tongo: Confront}.

name: Iden Lustrous Demagogue
Name: Iden Lustrous Demagogue
Skills: Anthropology Biology Exobiology Leadership Science Treachery
gametext: At the start of each of your turns, you may place a Hologram from hand on each Holoprogram event in your core, then draw an equal number of cards.

name: Kejal Radiant Mender
Name: Kejal Radiant Mender
Skills: Astrometrics Engineer Honor Programming Science Transporters
gametext: When a card an opponent owns is about to destroy your Holoprogram event, you may discard a Hologram from that event to prevent that.

name: The Doctor Brilliant Template
Name: The Doctor Brilliant Template
gametext: You may play Holograms from your Holoprogram events as if they were in your hand.

name: Weiss Glaring Tactician
Name: Weiss Glaring Tactician
gametext: When your Hologram present is about to be killed by a dilemma, you may place him or her on your Holoprogram event to prevent that. (You no longer command that Hologram.)

name: Markus Forbes Extraction Specialist
Name: Markus Forbes Extraction Specialist
gametext: Order - If this personnel is at a non-headquarters mission, discard three [SF] cards (or two MACO personnel) from hand to place a captive you command present with this personnel.

name: Sara Fisher
Name: Sara Fisher
gametext: This personnel is attributes +1 for each non-Human [SF] personnel you own that has been removed from the game (limit +4).

name: Sphere 117 Renegade Borg Sphere
Name: Sphere 117 Renegade Borg Sphere
gametext: While each of your missions is a [DQ] mission, each {Drone} you own gains Dissident and loses Drone.

name: Karemma Freighter
Name: Karemma Freighter
gametext: This ship is attributes +1 for each of these species you have aboard it: Dosi, Ferengi, Karemma. When your Acquisition personnel aboard is about to be killed by a dilemma, you may give command of your Commodity event to an opponent and stop that personnel to prevent that.

name: Subek'somac Alpha Attack Ship
Name: Subek'somac Alpha Attack Ship
gametext: When you play this ship, for each Alpha Jem'Hadar you command, this ship is cost -1. While your Alpha Jem'Hadar aboard this ship is facing a dilemma, you may meet that dilemma's Cunning or Integrity requirements using Strength instead.

name: Olarra Chariot of Light
Name: Olarra Chariot of Light
gametext: While your [NA] Hologram with no staffing icons is aboard this ship, he or she gains [Stf]. When you are about to play a Hologram at your headquarters mission, you may play him or her aboard this ship instead.

name: Seven of Nine Annika *VP
Name: Seven of Nine Annika *VP
gametext: While you command a [Bor] non-Dissident personnel, this personnel loses all of her skills and her next ability. While this personnel is attempting a [DQ] mission, she and each Dissident personnel present are attributes +1.

name: Back to Basics *VP
Name: Back to Basics *VP
gametext: Your opponent counts each personnel and ship card in his or her discard pile and shuffles each of those cards into his or her deck. If fourteen or more cards were shuffled into his or her deck this way, all your personnel are stopped.

name: Swashbuckler at Heart *VP
Name: Swashbuckler at Heart *VP
gametext: Reveal your hand and place each interrupt revealed this way on top of your deck in any order. Your opponent draws up to two cards.

name: The Dreamer and the Dream *VP
Name: The Dreamer and the Dream *VP
gametext: Place this dilemma on this mission. At the end of this turn, this dilemma is overcome. If at that time this mission has not been completed, its owner discards his or her hand.

name: All-Out War *VP
Name: All-Out War *VP
gametext: Lose 5 points to play in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin combat or an engagement involving your [Kli] personnel. If you win, randomly kill three opponent's personnel involved.

name: Anything or Anyone *VP
Name: Anything or Anyone *VP
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Dom] personnel. Plays in your core. You may only execute one order using this event each turn. Order - Place an Infiltrator from hand on this event. (You now command that personnel.) Order - Place an Infiltrator from this event aboard an opponent's ship or on an opponent's planet mission.

name: Ohhhh! Nothing Happened! *VP
Name: Ohhhh! Nothing Happened! *VP
gametext: Plays in your core. When you play another Temporal card, you may destroy this event to name a dilemma. Choose an opponent to take a copy of that dilemma from his or her dilemma pile and remove it from the game. That opponent shuffles and replaces his or her dilemma pile face down.

name: Security Drills *VP
Name: Security Drills *VP
gametext: Plays in your core. While your personnel is facing a dilemma, you may place a [Fed] card from hand on this event to make that personnel gain a skill he or she already has until the end of that dilemma.

name: The Long Journey Home *VP
Name: The Long Journey Home *VP
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Voy] personnel. Plays on your {Caretaker's Array}. When you command four completed [DQ] space missions and have 100 or more points, you win the game.

name: Knowledge and Experience *VP
Name: Knowledge and Experience *VP
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must command three [Bor] personnel. When a personnel you command but do not own is facing a dilemma, lose 5 points to prevent and overcome that dilemma. Remove this interrupt from the game.

name: Luther Sloan Man of Action *VP
Name: Luther Sloan Man of Action *VP
gametext: Order - Remove your event from the game and return this personnel to his owner's hand to destroy an opponent's event.

name: An Issue of Trust *VP
Name: An Issue of Trust *VP
gametext: Unless you have Honor or Treachery, all your personnel are stopped. If you have two or more personnel who have Honor or Treachery, randomly select all but one of those personnel to be stopped.

name: Brothers
Name: Brothers
gametext: When your opponent reveals this dilemma, he or she may discard a personnel from hand to add 5 to each of this dilemma's attributes requirements (or add 10 if that personnel was an Android). Unless you have Engineer and Integrity>30 or Transporters and Cunning>30, all your personnel are stopped.

name: Conflict of Interests
Name: Conflict of Interests
gametext: Unless you have 3 Archaeology or Integrity>36, all your personnel are stopped. If four or more personnel of the same species are stopped by this dilemma, this dilemma's owner may discard a random card from hand to return this dilemma to his or her dilemma pile.

name: Eugenic Transformation
Name: Eugenic Transformation
gametext: Unless you have 3 Exobiology or Cunning>36, all your personnel are stopped. If four or more personnel of the same species are stopped by this dilemma, this dilemma's owner may discard a random card from hand to return this dilemma to his or her dilemma pile.

name: Intimidation
Name: Intimidation
gametext: Randomly select a personnel. Repeat this until you select a personnel of a different species than the first personnel that you selected. Stop each selected personnel.

name: Malfunctioning Door
Name: Malfunctioning Door
gametext: Unless you have 3 Transporters or Strength>36, all your personnel are stopped. If four or more personnel of the same species are stopped by this dilemma, this dilemma's owner may discard a random card from hand to return this dilemma to his or her dilemma pile.

name: Manufactured Triumph
Name: Manufactured Triumph
gametext: Your opponent discards any number of personnel of different species from hand. Unless you have that number of personnel of different species, all your personnel are stopped.

name: Oh No!
Name: Oh No!
gametext: If you have Cunning>55, lose 5 points. Also, unless you have 2 Astrometrics or Integrity>30 or Strength>30, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Ominous Presence
Name: Ominous Presence
gametext: If you have five or more personnel of the same species attempting this mission, this dilemma is cost -2. Randomly select a personnel with Diplomacy or Security. Then choose a different personnel of the same species. Those personnel are stopped.

name: Shadowplay
Name: Shadowplay
gametext: When your opponent reveals this dilemma, he or she may discard a personnel from hand to add 5 to each of this dilemma's attributes requirements (or add 10 if that personnel was an Hologram). Unless you have Programming and Cunning>30 or Treachery and Strength>30, all your personnel are stopped.

name: Audacious Assault
Name: Audacious Assault
gametext: Plays in your core. When you are about to play a [Dom] personnel, if you do not command a personnel of that species, he or she is cost -1. Order - Destroy this event to begin combat involving your Breen. If you win, you may place a [Dom] personnel from hand that costs 4 or more aboard your [Dom] ship.

name: Katric Ark
Name: Katric Ark
gametext: Plays in your core. When your personnel begin a mission attempt, you may discard a Vulcan from hand to make each of your Vulcans Cunning +1 until the end of that missions attempt.

name: Rule of Acquisition #194
Name: Rule of Acquisition #194
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Fer] personnel. Plays in your core. Order - Give command of your Commodity event to an opponent to take a card from beneath your {Ferenginar} into hand. You may do this only once each turn.

name: The Great Material Continuum
Name: The Great Material Continuum
gametext: To play this event, you must command {Ferenginar}. Draw three cards, then reveal your hand. Choose an opponent to choose one of the revealed non-ship cards to be discarded, then place two cards from hand beneath your Ferenginar. Destroy this event.

name: Unity
Name: Unity
gametext: Plays in your core. While you command personnel of three different species, cards opponents own may not destroy this event. When a player downloads a non-[NA] personnel, if he or she already commands a personnel of the same species, that player must discard a card from hand.

name: Infinite Combinations
Name: Infinite Combinations
gametext: While your personnel is facing a dilemma, discard a personnel of a different species from hand to make him or her attributes +2 and gain one level of every skill he or she already has until the end of that dilemma.

name: Rule of Acquisition #239
Name: Rule of Acquisition #239
gametext: Order - Discard a card from hand and place a card from beneath your {Ferenginar} on top of your deck to download a card and place it beneath your Ferenginar.

name: Sense of Obligation
Name: Sense of Obligation
gametext: Order - Choose an opponent. That opponent scores 5 points and you may destroy one of his or her events.

name: Acquire Captives
Name: Acquire Captives
Skills: Navigation, Transporters, Treachery, Strength>34 and (2 Acquisition or an Orion)
gametext: When you complete this mission, you may choose an opponent and place a personnel from his or her discard pile that he or she does not command in your brig. (That opponent now commands him or her.)

name: Conceal Unlikely Society
Name: Conceal Unlikely Society
Skills: Anthropology, Exobiology, Security, Strength>38 and (2 Treachery or a Klingon)
gametext: When your personnel complete this mission, you may destroy an opponent's event that costs no more than the number of Klingons involved.

name: Defend Evolutionary Link
Name: Defend Evolutionary Link
Skills: Anthropology, Archaeology, Diplomacy, Exobiology, and Integrity>36
gametext: When your personnel complete this mission, you may place an Alien from hand at your headquarters mission where he or she could be played.

name: Discard By-Product
Name: Discard By-Product
Affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
Skills: Engineer, Medical, Navigation, Cunning>34 and (2 Treachery or a Malon)
gametext: When your personnel complete this mission, you may destroy an event on a non-headquarters mission.

name: Exploit "Drought"
Name: Exploit "Drought"
Affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
Skills: Anthropology, Astrometrics, 2 Treachery, Integrity<25 and (6 Acquisition or Cunning>32)
gametext: You may not attempt this mission with less than six personnel. Your personnel may not gain skills at this mission.

name: Gather Information
Name: Gather Information
Skills: Acquisition, Exobiology, Treachery, Cunning>34 and (2 Anthropology or a Yridian)
gametext: You may attempt and complete this mission using your [Fed] personnel with these requirements: Medical, Officer, Security, Transporters, and Integrity>34.

name: Contested Defense Perimeter Penetrate Enemy Lines
Name: Contested Defense Perimeter Penetrate Enemy Lines
Skills: Astrometrics, Leadership, Navigation, Strength>34, and (2 Engineer or a Jem'Hadar)
gametext: When you complete this mission, if at least three different species are involved, you may draw up to seven cards.

name: Recruit Ally
Name: Recruit Ally
Skills: Leadership, Navigation, Security, Strength>36 and (2 Diplomacy or a Breen)
gametext: When your personnel complete this mission, you may download a personnel.

name: Stage Covert Fleet
Name: Stage Covert Fleet
Skills: 2 Leadership, Navigation, 2 Security, and (Cunning>38 or Strength>38)
gametext: When you are about to play a [Dom] personnel at your {Founders' Homeworld}, if this mission is complete, you may discard the top card of your deck to play that personnel on your [Dom] ship.

name: Azeni Meressa Resistance Spy
Name: Azeni Meressa Resistance Spy
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma that requires two or more levels of a skill, you may lose 5 points to subtract one level of that skill from that dilemma's requirements.

name: Crom Open-minded
Name: Crom Open-minded
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you command four missions that require Strength, you may download up to three [Dom] personnel of different species.

name: Draz Overeager
Name: Draz Overeager
gametext: When an Assault, Commodity, Infiltration, or Maneuver event you own is destroyed, you may stop your personnel present with a cost of 4 or more to download an Assault, Commodity, Infiltration, or Maneuver event.

name: Fel Hands-on
Name: Fel Hands-on
gametext: When you fail a mission attempt involving this personnel, you may remove him from the game to unstop up to two stopped Breen and an equal number of stopped [Dom] personnel at that mission.

name: Founder Instigator Unmasked
Name: Founder Instigator Unmasked
gametext: When an opponent's personnel is about to complete a mission, if this personnel is at that mission, you may remove him from the game to add his skills to that mission's requirements until the end of that opponent's turn.

name: Kilana Unctuous Negotiator
Name: Kilana Unctuous Negotiator
Skills: Diplomacy Exobiology Geology Medical Transporters Treachery
gametext: When you play a Changeling at this mission, you may reveal the top four cards of your deck. Take each [Dom] ship revealed into your hand. Replace the remaining cards in any order.

name: Enrique Muniz Dependable Troubleshooter
Name: Enrique Muniz Dependable Troubleshooter
gametext: When you play a [DS9] personnel of a species you do not command, you may draw a card. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Haadok
Name: Haadok
gametext: While you command an [AU] personnel, you may play this personnel at cost +1 to name a unique personnel. That personnel cannot be killed by dilemmas until the end of this turn.

name: Robin Lefler Pragmatic Specialist
Name: Robin Lefler Pragmatic Specialist
gametext: When any number of your [TNG] personnel present are about to be stopped by a dilemma that does not require a skill, if a copy of that dilemma is overcome beneath your mission, you may stop this personnel to prevent that.

name: Solok Calculating Rival
Name: Solok Calculating Rival
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you command two Vulcans, you may draw three cards.

name: William Patrick Samuels Well-Placed Agent
Name: William Patrick Samuels Well-Placed Agent
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may draw a card for each [Maq] Leadership personnel present (limit 3).

name: Gint Avaricious Author
Name: Gint Avaricious Author
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may download three different Commodity events and/or Rule cards.

name: Stol Wealthy Cousin
Name: Stol Wealthy Cousin
Skills: Acquisition Astrometrics Engineer Geology Physics Programming
gametext: While this personnel is attempting a mission, he is attributes +1 for each non-Ferengi personnel present (limit +3).

name: Zek Devolved Benefactor
Name: Zek Devolved Benefactor
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma that requires Acquisition or Honor, he and each Acquisition personnel present cannot be randomly selected by that dilemma.

name: Dath
Name: Dath
gametext: To play this personnel, you must command a personnel with a cost of 4 or more.

name: Feqma
Name: Feqma
gametext: While this personnel is attempting a mission with an event on it, he is attributes +2.

name: John Doe Emergent Herald
Name: John Doe Emergent Herald
gametext: When you gain command of this personnel, you may shuffle up to four personnel from your discard pile into their owner's deck.

name: Juliana Tainer Unknowing Automaton
Name: Juliana Tainer Unknowing Automaton
gametext: When this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may reveal three Androids from hand to make this personnel become a species of your choice until the end of that dilemma.

name: Obrist Temporal Tactician
Name: Obrist Temporal Tactician
gametext: At the start of your first turn, you may discard this card from hand to shuffle your hand into your deck, then draw six cards.

name: Yranac
Name: Yranac
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you have not revealed your hand this turn, you may reveal your hand to draw two cards.

name: Ba'el Clutching Two Worlds
Name: Ba'el Clutching Two Worlds
gametext: While this personnel is attempting a mission, she is attributes +1 for each unique Klingon present (limit +4).

name: Gi'ral Reproachful Matriarch
Name: Gi'ral Reproachful Matriarch
gametext: When your personnel present is facing a dilemma, you may discard the top card of your deck to choose one: that personnel becomes Klingon; or that personnel becomes [Rom]. These effects last until the end of that dilemma.

name: L'Kor Ranking Elder
Name: L'Kor Ranking Elder
gametext: When this personnel is an eligible target for a random selection, you may discard a Klingon from hand to exclude a [Rom] personnel (or two Klingons) present from that selection.

name: Tokath Keeping the Peace
Name: Tokath Keeping the Peace
gametext: When this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may place a Klingon in your discard pile on the bottom of his or her owner's deck to make your [Rom] personnel present lose all of his or her skills until the end of that dilemma.

name: Toq
Name: Toq
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you command a unique [Rom] Klingon, you may discard a card from hand to draw two cards.

name: Vakis Misinformed Operative
Name: Vakis Misinformed Operative
gametext: When you play an Assassin, you may discard a card from hand to place that personnel on any headquarters mission or on any planet.

name: U.S.S. T'Kumbra Behind the Lines
Name: U.S.S. T'Kumbra Behind the Lines
gametext: When your personnel begin a mission attempt involving this ship, you may discard three cards from hand to allow each Vulcan aboard to meet Integrity and Strength requirements of this mission and each dilemma your personnel face at this mission using Cunning. These effects last until the end of the mission attempt.

name: D'Kora Transport
Name: D'Kora Transport
gametext: This ship is attributes +1 for each different Commodity event or Rule event in play (limit +5).

name: Manufactured Triumph *VP
Name: Manufactured Triumph *VP
gametext: Your opponent discards any number of personnel of different species from hand. Unless you have that number of personnel of different species, all your personnel are stopped.

name: Zefram Cochrane Ready to Make History *VP
Name: Zefram Cochrane Ready to Make History *VP
Skills: 2 Astrometrics Engineer 2 Navigation Physics Programming Science
gametext: When you play a ship at this mission, you may stop this personnel to make that ship cost -2.

name: A Sight for Sore Eyes *VP
Name: A Sight for Sore Eyes *VP
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [SF] personnel. Plays in your core. At the start of each of your turns, score 5 points. At the end of each of your turns, if you have at least 5 points, lose 5 points.

name: Dignitaries and Witnesses *VP
Name: Dignitaries and Witnesses *VP
gametext: Unless you have an Admiral or a General or 3 Leadership, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Necessary Execution *VP
Name: Necessary Execution *VP
gametext: Your opponent chooses a personnel to be killed. If you do not command a completed space mission, he or she chooses an additional personnel to be killed.

name: Distant Exploration *VP
Name: Distant Exploration *VP
gametext: Plays on your headquarters mission. When you complete a mission that has a different quadrant icon than this mission, score 5 points.

name: Organized Terrorist Activities *VP
Name: Organized Terrorist Activities *VP
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Fed][Maq] personnel. Lose 5 points to make an opponent place his or her hand on top of his or her deck. Then you may examine that deck and choose a non-ship card to remove from the game. He or she shuffles and replaces his or her deck. Remove this event from the game.

name: These Are The Voyages *VP
Name: These Are The Voyages *VP
gametext: Draw a number of cards equal to the cost of one of your personnel, then place three cards from hand on the bottom of your deck in any order. Destroy this event.

name: Unyielding *VP
Name: Unyielding *VP
gametext: Plays in your core. When your [Bor] personnel is about to be stopped by a dilemma, you may place a [Bor] personnel from hand on this event to prevent that.

name: Dukat Anjohl Tennan *VP
Name: Dukat Anjohl Tennan *VP
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may remove an Anthropology or Leadership personnel in your discard pile from the game to make this personnel attributes +1 until the end of this mission attempt.

name: Odo Founder Adept Imposter *VP
Name: Odo Founder Adept Imposter *VP
gametext: When you are about to place an Infiltration card in your discard pile, if this personnel is present with an opponent's personnel, you may place that Infiltration card on top of your deck instead.

name: Shran In Archer's Debt *VP
Name: Shran In Archer's Debt *VP
gametext: When this personnel is stopped by a dilemma, you may discard a card from hand to take your overcome dilemma and place it on the bottom of your dilemma pile.

name: Ardent Predator
Name: Ardent Predator
gametext: Randomly select two personnel. Unless those personnel have Exobiology and Cunning>11 or Strength>13, those personnel are killed.

name: Satarran Gambit
Name: Satarran Gambit
gametext: Unless you have Intelligence and Cunning > 32 or 2 Biology and Programming, your opponent may place an Infiltrator from hand aboard a ship at this mission (your opponent now commands that personnel) and all your personnel are stopped.

name: Shared Hallucination
Name: Shared Hallucination
gametext: When this dilemma is revealed, you may discard any number of cards from your hand. Choose a personnel to be stopped for each card in your hand.

name: Provocative Ploy
Name: Provocative Ploy
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Rom] personnel. Plays on an opponent's incomplete non-headquarters mission. When that opponent's personnel begin a mission attempt at a different mission, he or she must discard a card from hand. When that opponent completes a mission, destroy this event.

name: Voluntary Withdrawal
Name: Voluntary Withdrawal
gametext: Plays in your core. When you have drawn dilemmas, you may destroy this event to set one of those dilemmas aside, then return the others to your dilemma pile and draw one less dilemma than the number you returned. Add the dilemma you set aside to those drawn.

name: Aid Refugee Colony
Name: Aid Refugee Colony
Skills: Engineer, Honor, Medical, Officer, and Integrity>34
gametext: When you complete this mission, you may take up to three Bajorans from your discard pile and place them on the bottom of your deck.

name: Locutus Almost Human
Name: Locutus Almost Human
gametext: While you command a [Bor] non-Dissident personnel, this personnel loses all of his skills and his next ability. When an opponent's dilemma is revealed, you may stop your [Bor] Dissident present.

name: Beverly Crusher Encouraging Commander
Name: Beverly Crusher Encouraging Commander
gametext: While this personnel is aboard your {U.S.S. Enterprise-D}, each of your non-unique [TNG] personnel present is attributes +1.

name: Data Proud Father
Name: Data Proud Father
Skills: Anthropology Engineer Exobiology Physics 2 Programming Science
gametext: When you play this personnel, the next Android you play this turn is cost -2.

name: Miles O'Brien Conn Officer
Name: Miles O'Brien Conn Officer
gametext: While this personnel is attempting a mission, add the span of that mission to this personnel's attributes.

name: Tasha Yar Weapons Specialist
Name: Tasha Yar Weapons Specialist
gametext: When you play this personnel, each player may download a Hand Weapon. While this personnel is equipped with a Hand Weapon, she gains Honor and Security and cannot be stopped by dilemmas.

name: William T. Riker William Odan
Name: William T. Riker William Odan
gametext: When your [TNG] personnel present is killed by a dilemma, you may discard a card from hand to make this personnel gain a skill from the killed personnel until the end of this mission attempt.

name: Toral Arrogant Child
Name: Toral Arrogant Child
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may download a Treachery Klingon.

name: Thadiun Okona Outrageous Rogue
Name: Thadiun Okona Outrageous Rogue
gametext: When this personnel is randomly selected by a dilemma, the owner of that dilemma must destroy an event in his or her core.

name: Wesley Crusher Apprentice Traveler
Name: Wesley Crusher Apprentice Traveler
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may stop each personnel present and remove him from the game to end your mission attempt. That dilemma and all remaining dilemmas in the dilemma stack are returned to their owner's dilemma pile.

name: Zorn Prevaricating Groppler
Name: Zorn Prevaricating Groppler
gametext: When you play this personnel, if any player commands a Commodity, you may play him at cost -1. While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may stop him to take a Commodity from your discard pile into hand.

name: Geordi La Forge Sleeper Agent
Name: Geordi La Forge Sleeper Agent
gametext: Order - Return this personnel to his owner's hand to kill an opponent's Diplomacy personnel present.

name: U.S.S. Enterprise-D Loaded for Bear
Name: U.S.S. Enterprise-D Loaded for Bear
gametext: Order - If you have a lower score than each of your opponents, stop three of your [TNG] personnel aboard this ship to score 5 points. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Hajur Veteran Fighter
Name: Hajur Veteran Fighter
gametext: When this personnel is killed by a dilemma, you may place him on the bottom of his owner's deck.

name: Back Room Dealings *VP
Name: Back Room Dealings *VP
gametext: Choose a personnel who has Treachery or Integrity<4 to be stopped. If you cannot, randomly select a personnel to be killed.

name: The Play's the Thing *VP
Name: The Play's the Thing *VP
gametext: Plays in your core. When you play this event, chose [AU], [Fut], or [Pa]. Each personnel you own who costs 3 or more gains that icon. At the start of each of your turns, place a card from hand on this event.

name: Adversarial Trial
Name: Adversarial Trial
gametext: Randomly select a personnel who has Anthropology or Programming to be stopped. If you have more points than each of your opponents, randomly select a personnel to be returned to his or her owner's hand.

name: Ingenious Jury-rig
Name: Ingenious Jury-rig
gametext: Choose a personnel who has Transporters to be stopped, then place this dilemma in your core. Non-Persistent dilemmas may not be returned to your dilemma pile from beneath your opponent's incomplete missions.

name: Overburdened
Name: Overburdened
gametext: Reveal the top three cards of your dilemma pile. For each dilemma you reveal that costs 1 or more and does not require a skill, randomly select a personnel to be killed. Then place the revealed cards on the bottom of your dilemma pile in any order.

name: Pivotal Destiny
Name: Pivotal Destiny
gametext: Place this dilemma in your core. You need an additional 10 points to win the game. When you command three completed missions, remove this dilemma from the game.

name: Standing Trial
Name: Standing Trial
gametext: Randomly select a personnel who has Honor or Transporters to be stopped. If you have more points than each of your opponents, randomly select a personnel to be returned to his or her owner's hand.

name: Workforce
Name: Workforce
gametext: Unless you have Physics, all your personnel are stopped. Otherwise, place this dilemma on this mission. While you command a stopped personnel at this mission, your personnel cannot begin a mission attempt here. At the end of this turn, this dilemma is overcome.

name: Boon of the Celestial Temple
Name: Boon of the Celestial Temple
gametext: To play this event, you must command {Bajor} and no other headquarters mission. Plays in your core. Cards an opponent owns cannot remove personnel in your discard pile from the game.

name: Emanations
Name: Emanations
gametext: Plays in your core. When any player is about to take an event or interrupt from his or her discard pile into hand, prevent that and place it on the bottom of its owner's deck.

name: Lineage
Name: Lineage
gametext: Place any number of cards from your hand on the bottom of your deck in any order and draw an equal number of cards. Then, if you command three [AU] personnel, you may draw up to two additional cards. Destroy this event.

name: Mouthpiece
Name: Mouthpiece
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Dom] personnel. Plays in your core. Your Vorta gain Acquisition and are Integrity +1.

name: Reliving the Past
Name: Reliving the Past
gametext: Return two dilemmas beneath your incomplete non-headquarters mission to their owner's dilemma pile to score 5 points. Destroy this event.

name: Temporal Transporters
Name: Temporal Transporters
Keywords: Replicate - Discard two cards from hand. Temporal.
gametext: Place a non-[Fut][Fed] personnel from your discard pile aboard your unique Temporal ship. Destroy this event.

name: Curious Companion
Name: Curious Companion
gametext: When a card an opponent owns returns any number of dilemmas to that opponent's dilemma pile from beneath your incomplete mission, score 5 points. Order - Place a Temporal card from your discard pile on the bottom of its owner's deck.

name: Disconcerting Displacement
Name: Disconcerting Displacement
gametext: When an opponent's personnel begins a mission attempt, discard two cards from hand to name a unique personnel. If the opponent's named personnel is not attempting the mission, place him or her present with the opponent's personnel that are attempting the mission. (He or she joins the mission attempt.) Remove this interrupt from the game.

name: Preposterous Plan
Name: Preposterous Plan
gametext: When an opponent scores 5 or more points from cards they own, if they have not completed a mission, score 5 points. Order - Destroy an opponent's Temporal event.

name: Identify Temporal Disturbance
Name: Identify Temporal Disturbance
gametext: Your [AU] personnel may attempt and complete this mission with these requirements: Leadership, 2 Security, and Strength>32.

name: Icheb Second Officer
Name: Icheb Second Officer
gametext: When you play this personnel, the next Temporal event you play this turn is cost -2.

name: Seven of Nine Undercover Operative
Name: Seven of Nine Undercover Operative
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you command a Temporal ship, you may download {Temporal Transporters}.

name: Historical Monitor
Name: Historical Monitor
gametext: Order - Draw a card for each different Temporal event you command (limit 4). Then, reveal the top card of an opponent's deck. If it is not a personnel, shuffle this interrupt into your deck. Otherwise, remove this interrupt from the game.

name: Devidia II Access Temporal Conduit
Name: Devidia II Access Temporal Conduit
Affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
Skills: 2 Anthropology, Programming, Transporters, and Integrity>35 or 2 Exobiology, 2 Treachery, and Strength>35
gametext: When you play a Temporal event, if you have completed this mission, that event is cost -1.

name: Agricultural Assessment
Name: Agricultural Assessment
Skills: Archaeology, Biology, Geology, Cunning>36 and (Honor or Treachery)
gametext: At the start of each player's turn, that player may draw a card for each staffed ship he or she commands at this mission.

name: Contact Mysterious Benefactor
Name: Contact Mysterious Benefactor
Affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
gametext: When your personnel complete this mission, if you command three or more different Temporal cards, score 5 points.

name: Enforce Quarantine
Name: Enforce Quarantine
Affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.
gametext: Non-Persistent dilemmas cannot be returned to your opponent's dilemma pile from beneath this mission by cards your opponents own.

name: Prevent Historical Disruption
Name: Prevent Historical Disruption
gametext: At the start of each of your turns, you may discard 4 cards from hand to download a Temporal ship. While you do not command a headquarters mission, you may play Temporal ships at this mission.

name: Provoke Interstellar Incident
Name: Provoke Interstellar Incident
Affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
gametext: At the end of your first turn, if your opponent commands two or more headquarters missions, you may take an additional turn after this one.

name: Kaas Dromand Devoted Fanatic
Name: Kaas Dromand Devoted Fanatic
gametext: When you play {Cultist Attack}, you may choose an opponent's personnel present to be killed. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Yaltar Draft Supervisor
Name: Yaltar Draft Supervisor
gametext: Order - Stop this personnel to reveal the top three cards of your deck. You may place up to two Glinns revealed this way at your headquarters mission where each could be played, then stop those personnel. Discard the remaining cards.

name: Anthony Braxton Forward-thinking Recruiter
Name: Anthony Braxton Forward-thinking Recruiter
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may download a [Fed] personnel.

name: Fredericks
Name: Fredericks
gametext: While this personnel is aboard your [Pa][TNG] ship, that ship is Range +1.

name: Jocelyn LoPresti Coming to Grips
Name: Jocelyn LoPresti Coming to Grips
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, if she gains a skill from {Mission Briefing}, she may gain any skill of your choice until the end of that dilemma.

name: Juel Ducane Above Reproach
Name: Juel Ducane Above Reproach
Skills: Anthropology Diplomacy Law Leadership Navigation Officer Transporters
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may take a [Fed] personnel from your discard pile and place him or her aboard your Temporal ship.

name: Marris
Name: Marris
gametext: When you play this personnel, discard a card from hand.

name: Nog Defiant Captain
Name: Nog Defiant Captain
Skills: Acquisition Diplomacy Engineer Honor Officer Physics
gametext: While this personnel is aboard your [DS9] ship, it is attributes +1 for each [Fut] personnel aboard (limit +4).

name: Rachel Garrett Restoring the Past
Name: Rachel Garrett Restoring the Past
gametext: When an engagement involving this personnel aboard your [Pa][TNG] ship begins, you may kill this personnel to prevent that engagement and stop each personnel and ship involved.

name: Rhys Parker Fulfilling Destiny
Name: Rhys Parker Fulfilling Destiny
gametext: When you play {Reconfiguration}, if this personnel is aboard your [Pa][TNG] ship, you may draw two cards.

name: Richard Castillo Assuming Command
Name: Richard Castillo Assuming Command
gametext: When your corresponding Commander present aboard his or her ship is killed by a dilemma, you may make this personnel attributes +5 and gain two skills of your choice until the end of that mission attempt.

name: Simmons
Name: Simmons
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may draw three cards and discard two cards from hand.

name: Tasha Yar Requesting a Transfer
Name: Tasha Yar Requesting a Transfer
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you command a [Pa] card, she is cost -1. When this personnel is about to be killed, you may stop her to prevent that.

name: Gral Eager Opportunist
Name: Gral Eager Opportunist
gametext: Cards an opponent owns cannot prevent copies of {Veiled Threat} you own.

name: B'Elanna Torres Mother of the Kuvah'magh
Name: B'Elanna Torres Mother of the Kuvah'magh
gametext: Order - If this personnel is aboard your staffed [Kli] ship, discard an event from hand to place that ship at your [DQ] mission. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Toral Son of Duras
Name: Toral Son of Duras
gametext: When your {No Peace in Our Time} is about to be destroyed by a card an opponent owns, you may kill your [Kli] Treachery personnel present to prevent that.

name: Brota Son of Mogh
Name: Brota Son of Mogh
gametext: When an opponent plays an event that costs 2 or less, if he or she commands two or more headquarters missions, prevent that event and place it in its owner's discard pile. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Harcourt Fenton Mudd Honest Businessman
Name: Harcourt Fenton Mudd Honest Businessman
gametext: When a dilemma this personnel is facing is about to make a random selection, you may give command of your Commodity event to an opponent to choose an additional personnel present to include in that selection.

name: Martus Mazur Listener
Name: Martus Mazur Listener
gametext: When you play {Alien Gambling Device}, it is cost -4.

name: Miranda O'Brien Proud Descendant
Name: Miranda O'Brien Proud Descendant
gametext: When an opponent plays an interrupt, if he or she commands two or more headquarters missions, prevent that interrupt and place it in its owner's discard pile. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Odo Timeless
Name: Odo Timeless
Skills: Law Leadership Navigation 2 Programming Science Security
gametext: During each of your Play and Draw Cards segments, if an opponent commands two or more headquarters missions, you may spend 2 additional counters.

name: Yedrin Dax Heir Apostate
Name: Yedrin Dax Heir Apostate
Skills: Anthropology Astrometrics Diplomacy Physics Science Treachery
gametext: When an opponent downloads a card, if he or she commands two or more headquarters missions, place that card on the top of its owner's deck. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Telek R'Mor Anachronistic Visitor
Name: Telek R'Mor Anachronistic Visitor
gametext: You may play this personnel aboard your non-[Bor][Voy] ship. When this personnel uses a skill to complete a [DQ] mission, you may place him in his owner s discard pile to score 5 points.

name: Daniels Timeline Protector
Name: Daniels Timeline Protector
gametext: While this personnel is in your discard pile, you may play him from your discard pile at cost +2.

name: Taluno Guardian
Name: Taluno Guardian
gametext: While you command {Line of Defense}, this ship and each of your {Generals} are attributes +2. When your Line of Defense is destroyed, you may take Line of Defense or a [Baj] card from your discard pile into hand.

name: Starship Enterprise Imperial Flagship
Name: Starship Enterprise Imperial Flagship
gametext: To play this ship, you must command four [AU][TOS] personnel. You may play this ship at cost +1 to name a unique [TOS] personnel you own. That personnel gains Commander: Starship Enterprise.

name: U.S.S. Enterprise-C Temporal Linchpin
Name: U.S.S. Enterprise-C Temporal Linchpin
gametext: While this ship is at a space mission, you may play [Pa][TNG] or [AU][TNG] personnel aboard this ship. You may do this only once each turn.

name: U.S.S. Relativity Federation Timeship
Name: U.S.S. Relativity Federation Timeship
gametext: At the start of each of your turns, place each non-[Fut] personnel you command in his or her owner's discard pile. You may play [Fut][Fed] personnel and equipment aboard this ship. When a card instructs you to place this ship at your headquarters mission, you may place it at your [Fed] space mission.

name: U.S.S. Wells
Name: U.S.S. Wells
gametext: When a card instructs you to place this ship at your headquarters mission, you may place it at your [Fed] space mission.

name: Khan Noonien Singh Genetically-Engineered Nemesis *VP
Name: Khan Noonien Singh Genetically-Engineered Nemesis *VP
gametext: While present with an opponent's personnel, each of that opponent's personnel is attributes -1.

name: The Clown: Guillotine *VP
Name: The Clown: Guillotine *VP
