gametext: Your opponent names a skill. Randomly select a personnel with that skill. Unless that personnel has an attribute>6, randomly select a second personnel with that skill. Each selected personnel is killed and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Tsiolkovsky Infection *VP
Name: Tsiolkovsky Infection *VP
gametext: For each event your opponent commands in his or her core, this dilemma is cost -1. Unless you have 2 Anthropology, 2 Programming, and Cunning>38 or 2 Biology, Exobiology, and 2 Medical, randomly select three personnel to be killed.

name: Whisper in the Dark *VP
Name: Whisper in the Dark *VP
gametext: For each event your opponent commands in his or her core, this dilemma is cost -1. Unless you have 2 Geology, 2 Physics, and Cunning>38 or 2 Honor, 2 Officer, and Transporters, randomly select three personnel to be killed.

name: Field Studies *VP
Name: Field Studies *VP
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Fed] personnel at your space mission. Lose 5 points to revel the top two cards of an opponent's dilemma pile. Place face up beneath that mission any dilemmas that could be faced there. Replace the remaining cards in any order. Destroy this event.

name: Power Shift *VP
Name: Power Shift *VP
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Rom] personnel. Plays in your core. While your [Rom] personnel is attempting a mission, you may lose 5 points to make each of your [Rom] personnel attributes +1 until the end of this mission attempt.

name: Unimatrix Zero *VP
Name: Unimatrix Zero *VP
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Bor] personnel. When you play this event, for each unique Borg personnel you command, this event is cost -1. Plays in your core. You may spend an additional counter each turn. Each unique personnel you command gains [AU].

name: Covenant *VP
Name: Covenant *VP
gametext: When your [Baj] Treachery personnel is facing a dilemma, remove a [Baj] personnel in your discard pile from the game to make that Treachery personnel gain all skills and attributes on that [Baj] personnel removed from the game until the end of this mission attempt.

name: Fitting In *VP
Name: Fitting In *VP
gametext: When your personnel is facing a dilemma, choose one for him or her to gain until the end of that dilemma: an attribute from a [Fut] personnel present; or a skill from a [Pa] personnel present.

name: Arik Soong Father of Many *VP
Name: Arik Soong Father of Many *VP
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, if you are about to lose command of one of your Genetically Enhanced personnel present, you may stop this personnel instead.

name: Elim Garak Agent of the Obsidian Order *VP
Name: Elim Garak Agent of the Obsidian Order *VP
gametext: While this personnel is attempting a mission, you may discard a personnel from hand to give him one of the discarded personnel's skills until the end of that mission attempt.

name: Adopted Authority
Name: Adopted Authority
gametext: Randomly select a personnel. Unless that personnel has an attribute<5, he or she and a second randomly selected personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile. Otherwise, he or she is stopped.

name: Artificial Ability
Name: Artificial Ability
gametext: Your opponent names an attribute (Integrity, Cunning, or Strength). Each personnel with that attribute>7 is stopped.

name: Cadet Review
Name: Cadet Review
gametext: Each personnel may use no more than one skill while facing this dilemma. Unless you have Engineer, Medical, Science, and Security or Diplomacy, Officer, Programming, and Transporters, your opponent chooses two [Stf] personnel to be stopped.

name: Challenging Revision
Name: Challenging Revision
gametext: Your opponent names a card type. Each player reveals his or her hand, places all revealed cards of that type under his or her deck, and draws an equal number of cards. When this dilemma is overcome, if it was prevented, your opponent may choose one of your personnel involved in the mission attempt to be killed.

name: Identity Theft
Name: Identity Theft
gametext: Your opponent names a card. If you have one copy of that card in your discard pile, choose a personnel to be stopped. If you have a second copy of that card in your discard pile, randomly select a personnel to be killed. If you have a third copy of that card in your discard pile, all your personnel are stopped.

name: Incorporeal Parasite
Name: Incorporeal Parasite
gametext: Your opponent names a number. If you have 4 or more personnel who have a cost equal to that number, choose one: randomly select two of those personnel to be killed; or all of those personnel are stopped. Otherwise, randomly select a personnel with a cost equal to that number to be stopped.

name: Inquest
Name: Inquest
gametext: Randomly select personnel until their total number of [SD] icons is 8 or more. Those personnel are stopped.

name: Soul Searching
Name: Soul Searching
gametext: Place this dilemma in your core. Randomly select a personnel and place him or her on this dilemma. At the start of your turn, you may place the personnel on this dilemma at your headquarters mission and place this dilemma under your non-headquarters mission. If you do, the dilemma's owner scores 5 points.

name: Staffing Shortage
Name: Staffing Shortage
gametext: Randomly select a personnel. Unless that personnel has 2 levels of a skill, that personnel is killed. Otherwise, he or she is stopped.

name: Stone-cold Bluff
Name: Stone-cold Bluff
gametext: Choose up to two personnel to be stopped. If no personnel were stopped by this dilemma, this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile. If two personnel were stopped by this dilemma, return the next dilemma in the dilemma stack to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Terminal Resignation
Name: Terminal Resignation
gametext: Choose a Commander that corresponds with your ship that is at this mission to be killed. If no personnel were killed by this dilemma, your opponent chooses two personnel to be stopped.

name: The Needs of the Few
Name: The Needs of the Few
gametext: Your opponent chooses an Engineer or Security personnel to be stopped. If you command a completed planet mission, that personnel is killed.

name: The Needs of the Many
Name: The Needs of the Many
gametext: Randomly select a personnel who has [Cmd] or Science to be killed. Then, reveal your hand and choose a personnel to be stopped for each interrupt revealed.

name: Tormented Dreams
Name: Tormented Dreams
gametext: For each of your other missions where you command unstopped personnel, your opponent chooses a personnel to be stopped. If no personnel were stopped by this dilemma, return it to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Upstaged
Name: Upstaged
gametext: Choose two personnel. While facing the next dilemma revealed during this mission attempt, those personnel cannot be selected and cannot use their abilities, attributes, or skills.

name: War Games
Name: War Games
gametext: Your opponent chooses one of his or her completed missions. Unless you have the skills needed to complete that mission, all your personnel are stopped.

name: Augmentation
Name: Augmentation
gametext: To play this event, you must command a Genetically Enhanced personnel. Plays in your core. Name a personnel (except an Android or a Hologram). Each personnel you own with that card title gains Genetically Enhanced.

name: Coordinated Larceny
Name: Coordinated Larceny
Keywords: Replicate - Discard a Thief personnel from hand.
gametext: Stop your two Thief personnel present together to take a card from your {Display of Wealth} and place it on top of its owner's deck. Destroy this event.

name: Display of Wealth
Name: Display of Wealth
gametext: To play this event, you must command six Thief personnel. Plays in your core. At the start of your turn, if there are six cards on this event, score 5 points. When you are about to lose command of this event, you may place a card from this event in its owner's discard pile to prevent that. Order - Place a card you command but do not own on this event. (You no longer command that card.)

name: Ill-gotten Gains
Name: Ill-gotten Gains
gametext: To play this event, you must command a Thief personnel. Plays in your core. When you take command of a card you do not own, you may draw a card.

name: Indelicate Repairs
Name: Indelicate Repairs
gametext: Reveal your hand. If you revealed four or more cards, choose an opponent to choose two of those cards. You may discard the chosen cards to draw cards until you have seven cards in hand. Destroy this event.

name: Organized Crime
Name: Organized Crime
gametext: To play this event, you must command six Thief personnel. Take command of an event that has no cards on it in an opponent's core. (Move that event to your core.) If that events costs 3 or more, that opponent scores 5 points. Destroy this event.

name: Portent
Name: Portent
gametext: Plays in your core. When personnel that the player on your right commands begin a mission attempt, you may examine the top card of your dilemma pile, then place it on the top or bottom of your dilemma pile.

name: Security Precautions
Name: Security Precautions
gametext: Plays in your core. Players may only score points from non-headquarters missions. When a player scores points from a mission, he or she cannot score more than the printed value of that mission. At the start of your turn, place the top card of your deck on this event. When this event is destroyed, remove it from the game.

name: Tactical Advantage
Name: Tactical Advantage
gametext: Plays in your core. When you win an engagement involving your [Rom] ship, choose one (or choose two if the losing ship was [Fed]): return an event in an opponent's core to its owner's hand; examine an opponent's hand and choose a non-ship card to be discarded; or remove a card in an opponent's discard pile from the game.

name: To Rule in Hell
Name: To Rule in Hell
gametext: To play this event, you cannot command a headquarters mission. Plays on your {Ceti Alpha V}. When a card instructs you to place a personnel on your headquarters mission, that personnel may be placed at this mission. When you command four completed [AQ] planet missions and have 100 or more points, you win the game. You may play [NA] Genetically Enhanced personnel and equipment at this mission.

name: Waken Superior Sleeper
Name: Waken Superior Sleeper
gametext: Choose one: download a [Pa] Genetically Enhanced personnel, or take a [Pa] Genetically Enhanced personnel from your discard pile and place him or her on the bottom of his or her owner's deck. Then, if you command {Khan Noonien Singh}, you may shuffle this event into your deck. Otherwise, destroy this event.

name: Ambitious Intellect
Name: Ambitious Intellect
gametext: To play this interrupt, discard a Genetically Enhanced personnel from hand. When an opponent's dilemma is about to be returned to its owner's dilemma pile during your mission attempt, remove that dilemma from the game. Order - Place a captive you command on your headquarters mission.

name: Deleted Subroutines
Name: Deleted Subroutines
gametext: When your Hologram is facing a dilemma, discard a card from hand to choose one: you may meet Integrity requirements of that dilemma with Cunning; or name a skill that Hologram has to make that Hologram and each Hologram present lose that skill until the end of the dilemma.

name: Left with No Choice
Name: Left with No Choice
gametext: To play this interrupt, kill your non-[Voy] personnel aboard your {U.S.S. Equinox}. While your [Voy] Treachery personnel is facing a dilemma, take a Nucleogenic card from your discard pile into hand. Order - Take a [Voy] Treachery personnel from your discard pile and place him or her on top of his or her owner's deck.

name: Pooling Resources
Name: Pooling Resources
gametext: Order - Download {Display of Wealth}. Order - Discard a Crime card from hand to randomly select a non-ship card from an opponent's hand and place it on your Display of Wealth.

name: Signs of Sentience
Name: Signs of Sentience
gametext: To play this interrupt, stop your Android and your non-Android present together. Order - Take an Android from your discard pile and place it on the bottom of its owner's deck. Order - Reveal your hand to destroy an event that costs less than the number of Androids revealed.

name: Ariannus Passage Loot Adrift Vessel
Name: Ariannus Passage Loot Adrift Vessel
Affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Fed]) may attempt this mission.
Skills: 2 Acquisition, Biology, Engineer, 2 Treachery, and Cunning>38
gametext: When your personnel complete this mission, you may randomly select three non-ship cards from an opponent's hand and place them on your {Display of Wealth}.

name: B'omar Sovereignty Traverse Restricted Space
Name: B'omar Sovereignty Traverse Restricted Space
Affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
Skills: Astrometrics, 2 Diplomacy, Honor, Navigation, and Integrity>34
gametext: Players may not play more than one copy of the same event or interrupt each turn.

name: Ceti Alpha V Forge Settlement
Name: Ceti Alpha V Forge Settlement
Skills: Biology, Geology, Leadership, Medical, and Cunning>34
gametext: Cards an opponent owns cannot prevent or make you lose command of copies of {To Rule in Hell} you own. At the start of your turn, you may discard a card from hand to download To Rule in Hell. When you complete this mission, flip it over. - Cards an opponent owns cannot prevent or make you lose command of copies of {To Rule in Hell} you own. Order - If you do not command a ship you own, you may take a ship from your discard pile and place it at this mission. You now command that ship (it becomes [NA]). You may do this only once each turn.

name: Rigel X Locate Mysterious Contact
Name: Rigel X Locate Mysterious Contact
Affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
Skills: Anthropology, Diplomacy, Leadership, Security, and Cunning>34
gametext: When six or more personnel begin a mission attempt here, you may draw two cards. If you do, your opponent may draw one extra dilemma and spend one extra in total cost on dilemmas.

name: Torga IV Strained Negotiations
Name: Torga IV Strained Negotiations
Skills: Anthropology, Diplomacy, Officer, and (Honor and Integrity>34 or Strength>34 and a Vorta)
gametext: When your personnel complete this mission, choose one: each player scores 5 points; or each player loses 5 points.

name: Brian Evethers
Name: Brian Evethers
gametext: When you play this personnel, each player may look through his or her deck for an equipment, event, or interrupt. Reveal all such cards at the same time. Discard any cards whose card type was also revealed by another player. All remaining cards are placed in their owner's hand, then each player shuffles his or her deck.

name: Dala Con Artist
Name: Dala Con Artist
gametext: When this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may take a personnel on your {Display of Wealth} and place him or her in his or her owner's discard pile to make this personnel gain each skill that personnel has until the end of the dilemma.

name: Icheb Genetic Weapon
Name: Icheb Genetic Weapon
gametext: While you command but do not own this personnel, place all [Bor] personnel at this mission in their owner's discard pile.

name: Joaquin Superhuman Lieutenant
Name: Joaquin Superhuman Lieutenant
gametext: Order - If you do not command a ship you own and have completed {Ceti Alpha V}, you may take a ship from your discard pile and place it at this mission. You now command that ship (it becomes [NA]). You may do this only once each turn.

name: Kati
Name: Kati
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you command {Khan Noonien Singh}, she is cost -2.

name: Marla McGivers Superior Woman
Name: Marla McGivers Superior Woman
gametext: While you command {Khan Noonien Singh}, you may play this personnel at cost -1 to {Ceti Alpha V}. Order - Stop this personnel and your [Pa] Genetically Enhanced personnel present to draw a card.

name: McPherson
Name: McPherson
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you command {Khan Noonien Singh}, he is cost -2.

name: Mobar
Name: Mobar
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may randomly select a non-ship card from an opponent's hand and place it on your {Display of Wealth}.

name: One One Efficiency Expert
Name: One One Efficiency Expert
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may discard a random card from hand to download {Zero Zero}. When you spend 1 counter to draw a card, if this personnel is aboard your ship, you may stop this personnel and remove that card from the game to draw a card.

name: Otto
Name: Otto
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you command {Khan Noonien Singh}, he is cost -2.

name: Sobi Felicium Dealer
Name: Sobi Felicium Dealer
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may examine the top four cards of your deck. You may take one card into hand for each different Commodity in your core, then place the remaining cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: T'Jon Felicium Addict
Name: T'Jon Felicium Addict
gametext: While you command {Felicium}, this personnel is Cunning +2 and Strength +2 and gains [Cmd], Acquisition, Leadership, and Navigation. While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may stop him to take command of a {Felicium} you own in an opponent's core.

name: Udar "Smike"
Name: Udar "Smike"
gametext: While this personnel is on a planet or aboard a ship, you may play {Arik Soong} on that planet or ship. When this personnel is facing a dilemma, if your [NA] Genetically Enhanced personnel present is selected, you may replace him or her with this personnel.

name: Yuta Last of Her Line
Name: Yuta Last of Her Line
gametext: Order - Name a number and place this personnel in her owner's discard pile to kill an opponent's personnel present with total printed attributes equal to that number.

name: Zero Zero Efficiency Expert
Name: Zero Zero Efficiency Expert
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may discard a random card from hand to download {One One}. When you have drawn dilemmas, if this personnel is aboard your ship, you may stop this personnel and remove a dilemma you have drawn from the game to draw an additional dilemma.

name: Combat Vessel Heavily Armed
Name: Combat Vessel Heavily Armed
gametext: To staff this ship, you must have three {Thief} personnel aboard. Order - If this ship is staffed and at an opponent's mission, discard a Crime card from hand to take an equipment, event, or interrupt from that opponent's discard pile and place it on your {Display of Wealth}.

name: Translocation Raider
Name: Translocation Raider
gametext: When an engagement involving your ship with your {Thief} aboard begins at this mission, you may discard a Crime card from hand to have this ship join that engagement. When you win an engagement involving this ship, you may randomly select a non-ship card from the loser's hand and place it on your {Display of Wealth}.

name: Khan Noonien Singh Bold Man *VP
Name: Khan Noonien Singh Bold Man *VP
gametext: This personnel is the corresponding Commander of your unique ship that he is aboard.

name: Artificial Ability *VP
Name: Artificial Ability *VP
gametext: Your opponent names an attribute (Integrity, Cunning, or Strength). Each personnel with that attribute>7 is stopped.

name: Julian Bashir Rebel Captain *VP
Name: Julian Bashir Rebel Captain *VP
Skills: Biology Exobiology Leadership Medical Officer Science
gametext: When you play this personnel, choose an opponent. For each headquarters mission he or she commands, this personnel is cost -3.

name: Sylvia *VP
Name: Sylvia *VP
gametext: For each event your opponent commands in his or her core, this dilemma is cost -1 (-2 for each Decay event). Unless you have 2 Leadership, Officer, Security, and Cunning>38 or 2 Engineer, Programming, and 2 Science, randomly select two personnel to be placed in your opponent's brig.

name: Unbelievable Emergency *VP
Name: Unbelievable Emergency *VP
gametext: Your opponent names a skill. For each headquarters mission you command, randomly select two personnel to be stopped. If either of those personnel that is selected has the named skill, kill that personnel instead.

name: Mission Accomplished *VP
Name: Mission Accomplished *VP
gametext: Plays in your core. When you complete a mission, if you command a staffed ship at that mission with its Commander aboard, score 5 points.

name: The New Resistance *VP
Name: The New Resistance *VP
gametext: To play this event, your opponent must command a ship at a non-headquarters mission. Plays in your core. When you play a Dissident personnel, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a Dissident, you may play him or her at cost -3.

name: The Central Command *VP
Name: The Central Command *VP
gametext: When any number of your [Car] Officer and/or [Car] Treachery personnel are about to be stopped by a dilemma, discard the top three cards of your deck to prevent that.

name: Bareil Antos Esteemed Vedek *VP
Name: Bareil Antos Esteemed Vedek *VP
Skills: Anthropology Biology 2 Diplomacy 2 Honor Leadership Science
gametext: Each of your other [Baj] personnel present is Integrity +1 (or +2 while facing a dilemma).

name: Data Lucasian Chair *VP
Name: Data Lucasian Chair *VP
Skills: 2 Astrometrics Engineer Exobiology Physics Programming 2 Science
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you have completed a mission requiring Diplomacy or Leadership, he is cost -4.

name: Jean-Luc Picard Galen *VP
Name: Jean-Luc Picard Galen *VP
gametext: While an artifact is in your discard pile, each of your {Smuggler} personnel and {Thief} personnel is attributes +1.

name: Silik Chameleon *VP
Name: Silik Chameleon *VP
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may discard a random card from hand to make him gain a skill that is required by that dilemma until the end of this turn. You may do this only once each turn.

name: The Dal'Rok *VP
Name: The Dal'Rok *VP
gametext: Unless your personnel have a total cost>17, for each headquarters mission you command, randomly select a personnel to be killed and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Opaka Healer *VP
Name: Opaka Healer *VP
gametext: While this personnel is attempting a [GQ] mission, each Kai, Prylar, and Vedek at that mission may meet Cunning and Strength requirements of that mission using Integrity.

name: Chained Environment
Name: Chained Environment
gametext: Unless you have 2 Diplomacy and 2 Geology or Cunning>36, all your personnel are stopped and, if there are no other dilemmas on this mission, place this dilemma on this mission. Add Science to each of this mission's requirements.

name: Chula: The Game
Name: Chula: The Game
gametext: Place this dilemma on this mission. When your personnel are about to face a dilemma whose title begins with "Chula" here, randomly select one of your personnel attempting this mission to be stopped. When your personnel complete this mission, this dilemma is overcome.

name: Chula: Trickery
Name: Chula: Trickery
gametext: Randomly select three personnel. Unless those personnel have 2 Officer or twelve different skills, all three are stopped.

name: Discommendation
Name: Discommendation
gametext: Randomly select three personnel. If any of those personnel is a [Kli] personnel, they are all stopped. Otherwise, choose one of those personnel to be stopped.

name: Legal Inflexibility
Name: Legal Inflexibility
gametext: Unless you have 2 Transporters and Strength>32 or Law and Cunning>32, all your personnel are stopped. When this dilemma is overcome, if it was prevented, your opponent may choose one of your personnel involved in the mission attempt to be placed in your opponent's brig.

name: Nonlinear Existence
Name: Nonlinear Existence
gametext: Your opponent chooses a card in his or her discard pile. Unless you discard a card from hand of the same card type, randomly select a personnel to be stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Pawn Against Pawn
Name: Pawn Against Pawn
gametext: Your opponent returns a random personnel in his or her discard pile to his or her owner's hand. Unless you have the skills on that personnel, all your personnel are stopped.

name: "Rapid Progress"
Name: "Rapid Progress"
gametext: Your opponent removes any number of cards from his or her discard pile from the game and names a different skill (except Acquisition, Intelligence, Law, or Telepathy) for each different card type removed. Unless you have those skills, all your personnel are stopped.

name: Rejecting the Past
Name: Rejecting the Past
gametext: This dilemma is cost +1 for each card in your opponent's discard pile (limit 6). Randomly select two personnel to be stopped.

name: The Nth Degree
Name: The Nth Degree
gametext: Unless you have 2 Engineer and 2 Leadership or Cunning>36, all your personnel are stopped and, if there are no other dilemmas on this mission, place this dilemma on this mission. Add Science to each of this mission's requirements.

name: Orb of Contemplation
Name: Orb of Contemplation
gametext: When your personnel present is about to be stopped or killed by a dilemma, if you have a copy of him or her in your discard pile, you may return this equipment to its owner's hand to prevent that.

name: Orb of Prophecy and Change
Name: Orb of Prophecy and Change
gametext: When your personnel present begin a mission attempt, you may exchange a personnel present with a personnel of the same affiliation in your discard pile if both of them could be played at the same headquarters mission you command. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Orb of Time
Name: Orb of Time
gametext: When your personnel present is facing a dilemma with a cost of 3 or more that does not require a skill, you may destroy this equipment to place the top card of the opponent on your left's dilemma pile beneath this mission.

name: Clandestine Kidnapping
Name: Clandestine Kidnapping
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Dom] personnel. Choose a personnel in an opponent's discard pile that he or she does not command. Place that personnel in your brig. (That personnel's owner now commands him or her.) Remove this event from the game.

name: Cutting the Strings
Name: Cutting the Strings
gametext: To play this event, you must command {Bajor}. Choose one: destroy an event on your mission; or return a dilemma on your mission to its owner's dilemma pile. Destroy this event.

name: Planned Provocation
Name: Planned Provocation
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Rom] personnel. Choose an opponent to discard the top card of his or her deck. If that card was an event or an interrupt, you may draw a card. Destroy this event.

name: Self-Replicating Roadblock
Name: Self-Replicating Roadblock
gametext: Plays on your non-headquarters mission (limit one per mission). When you play this event, name a dilemma or an event. The named event cannot be played on this mission. When the named dilemma is revealed here, return it to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Spiritual Exploration
Name: Spiritual Exploration
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Baj] personnel. Plays in your core. When you place a [Baj] personnel from your discard pile at your {Bajor}, you may destroy this event to place an additional [Baj] personnel from your discard pile at your Bajor.

name: Swift Justice
Name: Swift Justice
gametext: To play this event, you must command {Cardassia Prime} and no other headquarters missions. Plays in your core. When you play a Capture card, you may draw two cards, then discard a card from hand. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Trap Is Sprung
Name: Trap Is Sprung
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Car] personnel. Plays on an opponent's mission with no dilemmas beneath it. When an opponent's personnel begin a mission attempt here, you may destroy this event to randomly select one of those personnel to be placed in your brig.

name: Accession
Name: Accession
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must command six [Baj] personnel. When your Anthropology personnel begins a mission attempt, take a [Baj] personnel you do not command from your discard pile and place him or her present with that Anthropology personnel. (You now command him or her.) That personnel joins the mission attempt. Remove this interrupt from the game.

name: Leap of Faith
Name: Leap of Faith
gametext: When your Kai, Prylar, or Vedek is randomly selected by a dilemma, if the cost of that dilemma is less than the cost of that personnel, he or she cannot be stopped by dilemmas until the end of this turn.

name: The Warrior's Anthem
Name: The Warrior's Anthem
gametext: When you win combat, if you have two or more Assault cards in your discard pile, score 5 points.

name: Bajor Blessed of the Prophets
Name: Bajor Blessed of the Prophets
Skills: You may play [Baj] cards and equipment at this mission.
gametext: While you do not command another headquarters missions, you may play Artifact equipment as if you commanded a completed mission requiring Anthropology.

name: Cardassia IV Hold Secret Prisoners
Name: Cardassia IV Hold Secret Prisoners
gametext: When your personnel begin a mission attempt here, reduce the attribute requirements of this mission by 2 (limit 10) for each captive in your brig until the end of that mission attempt.

name: Dyson Sphere Explore Mysterious Structure
Name: Dyson Sphere Explore Mysterious Structure
Affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
gametext: This mission is worth 5 more points for each different card type in your discard pile.

name: Kreetassa Perform Intricate Ritual
Name: Kreetassa Perform Intricate Ritual
Affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
Skills: Honor, Law, Officer, and Integrity>36 or Intelligence, Security, Treachery, and Strength>36
gametext: At the start of your first turn, you may download up to two Rituals. Place one in your core and discard the other.

name: Metron Arena Resolve Standing Conflict
Name: Metron Arena Resolve Standing Conflict
Affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
Skills: Leadership, 2 Science, and Cunning>32 or Officer, 2 Treachery, and Strength>32
gametext: When a card an opponent owns removes any number of non-[Bor] personnel you do not command in your discard pile from the game, place them on this mission. (You now command those personnel.)

name: Parada II Expose Security Threat
Name: Parada II Expose Security Threat
Skills: Anthropology, Diplomacy, Leadership, Security, and Integrity>30
gametext: When your personnel complete this mission, if you have copies of two or more different personnel that each used a skill to complete this mission in your discard pile, score 10 points.

name: Sha Ka Ree Quest for Infinite Knowledge
Name: Sha Ka Ree Quest for Infinite Knowledge
Skills: Anthropology, 2 Leadership, and (Honor and Integrity>44 or Treachery and Cunning>44)
gametext: When your personnel complete this mission, it is worth 10 less points unless you remove a ship in your discard pile from the game.

name: Starbase 718 Investigate Cryosatellite
Name: Starbase 718 Investigate Cryosatellite
Affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
Skills: Engineer and (Leadership, Security, and Strength>32 or Medical, Science, and Cunning>32)
gametext: When your personnel complete this mission, you may place any number of unique personnel with a total cost of 6 or less from your discard pile at your headquarters mission where they could be played.

name: Alenis Grem Occupation Historian
Name: Alenis Grem Occupation Historian
gametext: When you play a [Baj] personnel at this mission, you may discard cards from the top of your deck equal to that personnel's cost.

name: Deela Weary Caretaker
Name: Deela Weary Caretaker
gametext: When you lose 5 points during your Execute Orders segment, you may place this personnel in her owner's discard pile to score 5 points.

name: Mond
Name: Mond
gametext: This personnel is attributes +2 for each copy of him in your discard pile.

name: Winn Adami Renegade Priest
Name: Winn Adami Renegade Priest
gametext: When a card in your discard pile is removed from the game, this personnel is attributes +1 until the end of this turn (limit +6). Order - Remove an Orb or Prophet card in your discard pile from the game to draw a card.

name: Opaka Healer
Name: Opaka Healer
gametext: While this personnel is attempting a [GQ] mission, each Kai, Prylar, and Vedek at that mission may meet Cunning and Strength requirements of that mission using Integrity.

name: Corbin Entek Inquisitor
Name: Corbin Entek Inquisitor
gametext: This personnel is attributes +2 for each captive in your brig (limit +6).

name: Dakol Lecherous Overseer
Name: Dakol Lecherous Overseer
gametext: When you play this personnel, the next Punishment event you play this turn is cost -2.

name: Gollek
Name: Gollek
gametext: When you play this personnel, she is cost -1 for each opponent that has an event in his or her discard pile.

name: Tajor
Name: Tajor
gametext: When you discard this personnel from the top of your deck, you may place him on your {Cardassia Prime}.

name: Vengar
Name: Vengar
gametext: When you play this personnel, he is cost -1 for each opponent that has an interrupt in his or her discard pile.

name: Yteppa Obsidian Order Asset
Name: Yteppa Obsidian Order Asset
gametext: When an opponent's personnel present is killed, you may discard a Capture card from hand to place that personnel in your brig.

name: Brian Sofin
Name: Brian Sofin
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may lose 5 points to draw two cards, then place your hand in your discard pile and draw an equal number of cards.

name: Julian Bashir Nostalgic Doctor
Name: Julian Bashir Nostalgic Doctor
gametext: When your [Fut] personnel present is about to be killed by a dilemma, you may stop that personnel and discard a non-[Fut] personnel from hand to prevent that.

name: Nilz Baris Agricultural Undersecretary
Name: Nilz Baris Agricultural Undersecretary
gametext: You may play this personnel at cost +3 to remove an event (or dilemma) on your non-headquarters mission from the game.

name: Paxton Reese Stellar Cartographer
Name: Paxton Reese Stellar Cartographer
gametext: When this personnel uses a skill to complete a [GQ] mission, each player may download a personnel and place him or her in his or her owner's discard pile.

name: Russell Toddman Security Conscious
Name: Russell Toddman Security Conscious
gametext: When you lose command of one of your events, you may take a [DS9] personnel you own that was on that event and place him or her at your headquarters mission where he or she could be played. (You now command that personnel.)

name: Prak
Name: Prak
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may place a non-Artifact equipment from any player's discard pile on your {Ferenginar}. (You now command that equipment.)

name: Leskit Embittered Warrior
Name: Leskit Embittered Warrior
gametext: This personnel is Cunning +1 for each Maneuver event in your discard pile (limit +5). This personnel is Strength +1 for each Assault event in your discard pile (limit +5).

name: Orb Transport Vessel
Name: Orb Transport Vessel
gametext: This ship is attributes +1 for each of the following keywords in your discard pile: Assault, Orb, and Prophet.

name: Type III Galor
Name: Type III Galor
gametext: When you play this ship, you may discard the top three cards of your deck to make this ship cost -2.

name: Lore The One *VP
Name: Lore The One *VP
Skills: Diplomacy Engineer Leadership Programming Security 2 Treachery
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, he cannot be stopped.

name: Tuvok Chief of Security *VP
Name: Tuvok Chief of Security *VP
Skills: Anthropology Biology Honor Law Leadership Officer Security
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma that requires Officer or Security at a [DQ] mission, he is attributes +2 and gains Security.

name: Counterinsurgency Program *VP
Name: Counterinsurgency Program *VP
gametext: Your opponent discards any number of event or equipment cards from hand and names a skill (except Acquisition, Intelligence, Law or Telepathy) for each one. Unless you have those skills, all your personnel are stopped.

name: Harsh Conditions *VP
Name: Harsh Conditions *VP
gametext: For each headquarters mission you command, your opponent names a skill. Place this dilemma on this mission. While your personnel is facing a dilemma, he or she cannot use those skills. At the end of this mission attempt, this dilemma is overcome.

name: Biogenic Weapon *VP
Name: Biogenic Weapon *VP
gametext: To play this event, you must command two [Fed][Maq] personnel. Plays on a mission. This mission cannot be attempted unless its owner has completed each other non-headquarters mission he or she commands.

name: Holding Cell *VP
Name: Holding Cell *VP
gametext: To play this event, you must command six [DS9] personnel. Plays in your core. When you play this event, name a personnel, then each player places each copy of that personnel they command on this event (those personnel cannot use abilities). When an opponent is about to play an interrupt, prevent that interrupt and place it on this event.

name: Rule of Acquisition #33 *VP
Name: Rule of Acquisition #33 *VP
gametext: When your [Fer] personnel is facing a dilemma, say "It never hurts to suck up to the boss" to choose one - make that personnel attributes +2 until the end of the turn; or replace all levels of any one skill in that dilemma's requirements with 3 Acquisition.

name: Benjamin Sisko Command Staffer *VP
Name: Benjamin Sisko Command Staffer *VP
gametext: You may play this personnel aboard your [TOS] ship. When an opponent plays an interrupt, if this personnel is present with three [Pa] personnel, you may return this personnel to his owner's hand to prevent that interrupt and place it in its owner's discard pile.

name: William T. Riker Exchange Officer *VP
Name: William T. Riker Exchange Officer *VP
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may discard a card from hand to make him gain a skill from your Klingon present until the end of that mission attempt.

name: Miles O'Brien "Smiley" *VP
Name: Miles O'Brien "Smiley" *VP
gametext: When you play a ship at this mission, if you have played no other ships this turn, it is cost -1 for each of your Engineer personnel at this mission.

name: U.S.S. Relativity Federation Timeship *VP
Name: U.S.S. Relativity Federation Timeship *VP
gametext: At the start of each of your turns, place each non-[Fut] personnel you command in his or her owner's discard pile. You may play [Fut][Fed] personnel and equipment aboard this ship. When a card instructs you to place this ship at your headquarters mission, you may place it at your [Fed] space mission.

name: Spock Man of Integrity *VP
Name: Spock Man of Integrity *VP
gametext: While you command an [AU] personnel, you may play this personnel at cost +2 to make each player place a personnel from hand on a headquarters mission where that personnel could be played.

name: The Weak Will Perish *VP
Name: The Weak Will Perish *VP
gametext: Randomly select a personnel. Unless that personnel has Telepathy or Strength>6, place this dilemma in your core. That personnel is killed.

name: Charismatic Mimic
Name: Charismatic Mimic
gametext: Choose a personnel with 2 Acquisition or a personnel with 2 Diplomacy to be stopped. If you cannot, place this dilemma in your core.

name: Artistic License
Name: Artistic License
gametext: Choose a number of personnel to be stopped equal to the number of different dilemmas beneath this mission.

name: Commanding Presence
Name: Commanding Presence
gametext: Unless you have 3 Security or 2 Navigation and Cunning>30 or a personnel with 2 Honor, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma is placed in your core.

name: Dubious Decoy
Name: Dubious Decoy
gametext: Choose a personnel with 2 Transporters or a personnel with 2 Treachery to be stopped. If you cannot, place this dilemma in your core.

name: Flare of Rage
Name: Flare of Rage
gametext: For each Persistent dilemma beneath this mission, this dilemma is cost -1. Unless you have Anthropology, Medical, 2 Security, and Strength>35 or 2 Archaeology, Transporters, and 2 Treachery, randomly select two personnel to be removed from the game.

name: Frozen by Fear
Name: Frozen by Fear
gametext: For each Persistent dilemma beneath this mission, this dilemma is cost -1. Unless you have 2 Honor, Law, Medical, and Cunning>35 or Officer, 2 Science, and 2 Treachery, randomly select two personnel to be removed from the game.

name: Generous Offer
Name: Generous Offer
gametext: When your opponent reveals this dilemma, he or she may give you command of his or her Commodity to add 10 to each of this dilemma's attribute requirements. Unless you have Archaeology and Cunning>30 or Diplomacy and Strength>30, all your personnel are stopped.

name: On Guard
Name: On Guard
gametext: Choose a personnel with 2 Honor or a personnel with 2 Security to be stopped. If you cannot, place this dilemma in your core.

name: Peremptory Plea
Name: Peremptory Plea
gametext: Choose a personnel who has Biology to be stopped. The next dilemma revealed during this mission attempt is cost -1 for each Genetically Enhanced personnel the opponent on your left commands.

name: Pest Control
Name: Pest Control
gametext: Unless you have 2 Engineer and 2 Exobiology or Transporters, 2 Treachery, and Cunning>34, randomly select two personnel to be stopped and place this dilemma in your core. At the start of each of your turns, discard the top card of your deck.

name: Unconventional Consideration
Name: Unconventional Consideration
gametext: Choose a personnel who has Acquisition or Intelligence or Law or Telepathy to be stopped. If you cannot, all your personnel are stopped.

name: The Weak Will Perish
Name: The Weak Will Perish
gametext: Randomly select a personnel. Unless that personnel has Telepathy or Strength>6, place this dilemma in your core. That personnel is killed.

name: Unusual Simulacrum
Name: Unusual Simulacrum
gametext: Place this dilemma on this mission. Each personnel facing a Species 8472 dilemma here cannot gain skills. At the end of this turn, if this mission is not complete, place this dilemma in your core. Otherwise, it is overcome.

name: Combined Attack
Name: Combined Attack
gametext: Search your dilemma pile for a Species 8472 dilemma and place it in the opponent on your right's core, then shuffle and replace your dilemma pile. Remove this event from the game.

name: Hollow Hospitality
Name: Hollow Hospitality
gametext: Plays in your core. Your non-Treachery personnel cannot gain skills (except Treachery). Each of your [DS9] personnel and [E] personnel are Strength +1.

name: Launch Orders
Name: Launch Orders
gametext: To play this event, you must command two Admirals. Reveal the top five cards of your deck. Separate them into two face-up piles. The opponent on your left chooses one pile for you to take into your hand; discard the other pile. Destroy this event.

name: Martial Law
Name: Martial Law
gametext: Plays in your core. Your ships may not move to or from {Earth}. Order - Stop your [Fed][DS9] personnel at your Earth to draw a card (limit three per turn).

name: Peaceful Coexistence
Name: Peaceful Coexistence
gametext: Plays in your core. Each unique non-Bluegill [TNG] personnel you own (except Androids and Holograms) gains Bluegill. Each of your Bluegill personnel are Integrity -1 and Strength +1.

name: Power Loss
Name: Power Loss
gametext: Plays in your core. You may only begin one mission attempt each turn. Order - Stop your [E] Treachery personnel to unstop each of your stopped [DS9] personnel. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Strength in Numbers
Name: Strength in Numbers
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Bor] personnel. Plays in your core. When you return a Persistent dilemma to your dilemma pile from beneath an opponent's completed mission, stop each of that opponent's personnel at that mission.

name: Undermined Defenses
Name: Undermined Defenses
gametext: Plays in your core. While your [TN] personnel is facing a dilemma, if an opponent owns ten or more dilemmas that have been removed from the game, you may discard the top card of your deck to exclude that personnel from random selections until the end of that dilemma.

name: Vacuum-Desiccated Remains
Name: Vacuum-Desiccated Remains
gametext: While you command but do not own this event, each player's Ferengi gain [Pa].

name: War of Attrition
Name: War of Attrition
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Dom][TN] personnel. Plays in your core. At the start of each player's turn, he or she removes the top card of his or her dilemma pile from the game.

name: Frantic Probe
Name: Frantic Probe
gametext: When you have drawn dilemmas, you may remove one or more of those dilemmas from the game to draw an additional dilemma. Order - If the opponent on your left commands a completed mission, search your dilemma pile for up to three copies of a dilemma and remove them from the game. Shuffle and replace your dilemma pile.

name: Paralyzing Procedure
Name: Paralyzing Procedure
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must command three [TN] Dissident personnel. When your opponent downloads any number of non-ship cards, shuffle them into his or her deck.

name: Untapped Influence
Name: Untapped Influence
gametext: While your [TN] personnel is facing a dilemma, choose a dilemma an opponent owns that has been removed from the game. That personnel may gain a skill required by that dilemma or add that dilemma's cost to his or her attributes until the end of the mission attempt.

name: Northwest Passage Contact Extradimensional Species
Name: Northwest Passage Contact Extradimensional Species
Affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
gametext: At the end of your turn, if this mission is complete, you may search your dilemma pile for a Species 8472 dilemma and place it in the opponent on your right's core, then shuffle and replace your dilemma pile.

name: Terrasphere 8 Starfleet Command Re-creation
Name: Terrasphere 8 Starfleet Command Re-creation
Affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
gametext: At the start of your turn, if this mission is complete and the opponent on your right has eight or more {Species 8472} dilemmas in his or her core, you win the game.

name: Kira Nerys Grudging Ally
Name: Kira Nerys Grudging Ally
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may remove a [TN] card in your discard pile from the game to remove the top card of an opponent's dilemma pile from the game. You may spend additional counters this turn equal to the cost of that dilemma.

name: Nasin Following Orders
Name: Nasin Following Orders
gametext: When your non-Jem'Hadar present is randomly selected by a dilemma, you may remove a [TN] card in your discard pile from the game to replace him or her with your Jem'Hadar present.

name: Revok Eager Ally
Name: Revok Eager Ally
gametext: When this personnel uses a skill to complete a mission, discard the top three cards of your deck to remove the top two cards of an opponent's dilemma pile from the game. You may do this only once each mission attempt.

name: Edan'Atal
Name: Edan'Atal
gametext: The highest cost dilemma an opponent owns that has been removed from the game has that dilemma's cost added to this personnel's attributes.

name: Founder Leader Intergalactic Warlord
Name: Founder Leader Intergalactic Warlord
gametext: When you play this personnel, she is cost -1 for each dilemma an opponent owns that has been removed from the game.

name: Rayva Bureaucratic Ally
Name: Rayva Bureaucratic Ally
gametext: When this personnel uses a skill to complete a mission, each player removes the top two cards of his or her dilemma pile from the game. You may do this only once each mission attempt.

name: Benjamin Sisko Acting Head of Starfleet Security
Name: Benjamin Sisko Acting Head of Starfleet Security
Skills: Diplomacy Engineer Honor Leadership Officer 2 Security
gametext: While you command a Paranoia event, each of your [Fed] Security personnel present is attributes +1.

name: Dexter Remmick Alien Thrall
Name: Dexter Remmick Alien Thrall
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, if he is present with three or more Bluegill personnel, he cannot be placed in an opponent's brig or stopped.

name: Gregory Quinn Alien Courier
Name: Gregory Quinn Alien Courier
gametext: When your Bluegill personnel present is about to be killed, you may stop that personnel and discard a Bluegill personnel from hand to prevent that.

name: Harry Kim Diligent Ensign
Name: Harry Kim Diligent Ensign
gametext: Order - If you command four [DQ] space missions and this personnel is aboard your [Voy] ship, return him to his owner's hand to place that ship at one of those missions.

name: Karen Loews Patient Chaperone
Name: Karen Loews Patient Chaperone
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may place a [Fed] Genetically Enhanced personnel from hand at this mission.

name: Leyton Suspicious Executive
Name: Leyton Suspicious Executive
gametext: When this personnel is about to be stopped by a dilemma, you may discard a Paranoia card from hand to prevent that.

name: Oq'nab Academy Commandant
Name: Oq'nab Academy Commandant
gametext: While this personnel is an eligible target for a random selection, you may discard a Paranoia card from hand to exclude him and an [E] personnel present from that selection.

name: Sparber
Name: Sparber
gametext: When you play this personnel, choose an event with no cards on it in a player's core. That event loses all of its game text (except keywords) until the end of this turn.

name: Anij Eupneic Explorer
Name: Anij Eupneic Explorer
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may download {Heightened Perception}.

name: Kivas Fajo Hoarder
Name: Kivas Fajo Hoarder
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may download {Greed}. This personnel is Cunning +1 and Strength +1 for each dilemma you own in an opponent's core (limit +5).

name: Morn Silent Partner
Name: Morn Silent Partner
gametext: At the start of your turn, if this personnel and your other Dissident are at {Mouth of the Wormhole}, each opponent discards the top card of his or her deck.

name: Friendly Fire
Name: Friendly Fire
gametext: For each of your headquarters missions, randomly select a personnel to be killed. You may discard two events from hand to prevent this.

name: Historical Curiosity
Name: Historical Curiosity
gametext: Unless you have Anthropology, Law, and Transporters or Shields>8, randomly select two personnel to be stopped and your opponent draws up to two cards.

name: Varon-T Disruptor
Name: Varon-T Disruptor
gametext: When combat begins involving your personnel present, the opponent's personnel involved who has the highest Integrity is killed.

name: Dedication Plaque
Name: Dedication Plaque
gametext: Plays on your ship (limit one per ship). While you have this ship's Commander aboard, it is Weapons +2 and Shields +2.

name: Second Edition
Name: Second Edition
gametext: Download a copy of a personnel you command. If that personnel is an [AU] personnel, draw a card. Destroy this event.

name: Split Second
Name: Split Second
gametext: Plays in your core. Dilemmas cannot be prevented (and cannot be overcome by "prevent and overcome" effects). When any player completes a mission, destroy this event.

name: Shrouded in Light
Name: Shrouded in Light
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must command {Founders' Homeworld}. While your Jem'Hadar is facing a dilemma, you may exclude him from random selections until the end of that dilemma.

name: Wolf 359 Last Stand
Name: Wolf 359 Last Stand
Skills: Engineer, Honor, Officer, Cunning>32, and total Weapons at this mission>10
gametext: This mission is worth 15 fewer points for each other mission you have completed. When your personnel complete this mission, destroy each of your ships at this mission.

name: Odo Surreptitious Ally
Name: Odo Surreptitious Ally
gametext: Order - Discard a Paranoia card from hand to take a [E] card from your discard pile into hand. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Ayala Patriot
Name: Ayala Patriot
gametext: When an opponent places a card on top of his or her deck, you may stop this personnel to place that card on the bottom of his or her deck.

name: Declan Keogh Veteran Captain
Name: Declan Keogh Veteran Captain
gametext: While this personnel is aboard your ship at a [GQ] mission, each of your non-unique [DS9] personnel present is attributes +1.

name: Lon Suder Casual Killer
Name: Lon Suder Casual Killer
gametext: Order - Kill a [Voy] personnel present aboard your ship to draw cards equal to the cost of that personnel. Place this personnel in his owner's discard pile.

name: Sito Jaxa Undercover "Terrorist"
Name: Sito Jaxa Undercover "Terrorist"
gametext: When this personnel is about to be captured or killed, you may take a [TNG] card from your discard pile into hand.

name: Neelix Grand Proxy
Name: Neelix Grand Proxy
gametext: When your [Fer] Leadership personnel present is randomly selected by a dilemma, you may replace him or her with this personnel.

name: Falow Gamemaster
Name: Falow Gamemaster
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may search your dilemma pile for a dilemma whose title begins with "Chula" and set it aside. Shuffle and replace your dilemma pile and place that dilemma on top of your dilemma pile.

name: Sarin Charmer
Name: Sarin Charmer
gametext: When you play a Replicate event, you may kill this personnel to put that event in your hand instead of destroying it.

name: Henry Archer Trailblazing Engineer
Name: Henry Archer Trailblazing Engineer
gametext: Order - Discard a [SF] ship from hand to draw up to two cards. You may do this only once each turn.

name: U.S.S. Odyssey Gamma Quadrant Vanguard
Name: U.S.S. Odyssey Gamma Quadrant Vanguard
gametext: While this ship is at a [GQ] mission, your {Danube-class ships} are attributes +1 and you may play them at cost -1.

name: Seven of Nine Notorious Scapegoat
Name: Seven of Nine Notorious Scapegoat
gametext: At the start of your turn, you may place a [NA] card from hand on the bottom of your deck.

name: Moral Choice *VP
Name: Moral Choice *VP
gametext: Randomly select three personnel. If any of those personnel is a [Fed] personnel, they are all stopped. Otherwise, choose one of those personnel to be stopped.

name: Temptation *VP
Name: Temptation *VP
gametext: Randomly select three personnel. Each of those personnel that does not have Honor or Treachery is stopped.

name: Endangered *VP
Name: Endangered *VP
gametext: Plays in your core. When the player on your right begins a mission attempt, you may lose 5 points and destroy this event to draw three extra dilemmas and spend three extra in total cost on dilemmas.

name: Rescue Captives *VP
Name: Rescue Captives *VP
gametext: Discard any number of cards from hand to take an equal number of your personnel from your opponents' brigs and place them on your headquarters mission. Destroy this event.

name: Jadzia Dax Elder *VP
Name: Jadzia Dax Elder *VP
gametext: When you play this personnel, for each Vedek you command, she is cost -1.

name: Borg Queen Bringer of Order *VP
Name: Borg Queen Bringer of Order *VP
gametext: Order - Discard the top card of your deck to name a skill. Each of your Borg gains that skill. This effect lasts until the end of this turn. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Remata'Klan Unit Leader *VP
Name: Remata'Klan Unit Leader *VP
gametext: When this personnel is an eligible target for a random selection, you may exclude another [Dom] personnel present from that selection.

name: Beverly Crusher Captain Picard *VP
Name: Beverly Crusher Captain Picard *VP
gametext: While this personnel is attempting a mission worth 40 or more points, she is attributes +1 and gains Medical.

name: Leonard H. McCoy Remarkable Man *VP
Name: Leonard H. McCoy Remarkable Man *VP
gametext: While this personnel is attempting a mission, if you have completed no missions, each of your personnel present is attributes +2.

name: Chula: The Chandra *VP
Name: Chula: The Chandra *VP
gametext: Randomly select a personnel. Repeat this until you select a personnel with a cost equal to or greater than the first personnel that you selected. Stop each selected personnel.

name: Common Purpose *VP
Name: Common Purpose *VP
gametext: Stop any number of your personnel, then count the number of different affiliation among those personnel. Spend that many additional counters this turn. Remove this event from the game.

name: Abrasive Allies
Name: Abrasive Allies
gametext: Unless you command personnel with more different affiliations than the owner of this dilemma, your opponent chooses a personnel to be stopped.

name: Dramatis Personae
Name: Dramatis Personae
gametext: Unless you have 2 Medical and 2 Science or 2 Archaeology and Transporters, your opponent chooses one: kill the personnel with the fewest [SD]; or, kill the personnel with the lowest total attributes.

name: Indecent Proposal
Name: Indecent Proposal
gametext: Randomly select a personnel who costs 5 or more to be stopped. If you cannot, your opponent chooses a personnel to be stopped. If a personnel who costs 5 or more was stopped by this dilemma, return this dilemma to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Mutinous Guests
Name: Mutinous Guests
gametext: Unless you have 3 Security or 2 Vulcans, all your personnel are stopped and your opponent may place a ship at this mission at your planet mission.

name: Precarious Position
Name: Precarious Position
gametext: Unless you have 2 Engineer and Officer or Science and Cunning>40, randomly select a personnel to be killed and your opponent may destroy up to two events in your core.

name: Coil Spanner
Name: Coil Spanner
gametext: While at a [GQ] space mission, each of your Officer personnel present gain Astrometrics and Navigation.

name: Hyperspanner
Name: Hyperspanner
gametext: While at a [GQ] planet mission, each of your Engineer personnel present gain Anthropology and Geology.

name: Kar'takin
Name: Kar'takin
gametext: When you win combat in which all your personnel involved are Jem'Hadar, if this equipment is present, you may place this equipment on the bottom of its owner's deck to randomly kill an opponent's personnel involved.

name: Common Cause
Name: Common Cause
gametext: Count the number of different affiliations among your personnel, then draw that many cards. Destroy this event.

name: Common Purpose
Name: Common Purpose
gametext: Stop any number of your personnel, then count the number of different affiliations among those personnel. Spend that many additional counters this turn. Remove this event from the game.

name: Expedient Opportunity
Name: Expedient Opportunity
gametext: Plays in your core. When a ship is about to move between missions in different quadrants, do not add 2 to the span total of those missions.

name: Field Report
Name: Field Report
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [DS9] personnel. Plays on your [GQ] mission. When a dilemma at this mission is about to return to its owner's dilemma pile, you may destroy this event to prevent that and place that dilemma beneath this mission.

name: Karemman Fleece
Name: Karemman Fleece
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Dom] personnel. While you command but do not own this event, you have one fewer counter to spend during each of your Play and Draw Cards segments.

name: Mobilization Points
Name: Mobilization Points
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Dom] personnel. Plays in your core. The first unique Jem'Hadar played each turn is cost -1.

name: Profound Discovery
Name: Profound Discovery
gametext: To play this event, you must command three non-[Bor] Archaeology personnel. Place a non-[Bor] Archaeology personnel from hand who costs 3 or less on your headquarters mission. Destroy this event.

name: Rule of Acquisition #75
Name: Rule of Acquisition #75
gametext: Plays in your core. When your [Fer] personnel begins a mission attempt at a [GQ] mission, you may give command of your Commodity event to an opponent.

name: Spiteful Strategy
Name: Spiteful Strategy
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Dom] personnel. Plays in your core. When an event is played, it is cost +1.

name: The Die Is Cast
Name: The Die Is Cast
gametext: Plays in your core. When your [Car] personnel or [Rom] personnel is about to be stopped by a dilemma at a [GQ] mission, you may discard the top two cards of your deck (or an event from hand) to prevent that. You may do this only once each dilemma.

name: Unproven Suspicions
Name: Unproven Suspicions
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [E] personnel. Plays in your core. When an event is played, you may destroy this event to prevent that event and place it in its owner's discard pile. That event's owner may spend 2 counters to prevent this.

name: A Day Long Remembered
Name: A Day Long Remembered
gametext: When your [Kli] personnel is attempting a non-[AQ] mission, he or she is attributes +1 for each Assault or Maneuver event in your core until the end of that mission attempt (limit +5).

name: Ancient Grudge
Name: Ancient Grudge
gametext: When an opponent plays an event, that opponent chooses a [Baj] personnel in your discard pile. (If that event costs 3 or more, he or she chooses an additional [Baj] personnel.) Remove the chosen personnel in your discard pile from the game to prevent that event.

name: Common Enemy
Name: Common Enemy
gametext: While your personnel is facing a dilemma, count the number of different affiliations among your personnel present. He or she is attributes +1 for each affiliation counted until the end of this mission attempt (limit +8).

name: Crippling Strike
Name: Crippling Strike
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must command three [Dom] personnel. When your opponent's ship is about to move, it is Range -5 until the end of the turn. That opponent may discard five cards from hand to prevent this.

name: Inevitable Triumph
Name: Inevitable Triumph
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must command three [TN] personnel. When an opponent plays an event he or she must choose: prevent that event, or remove the top two dilemmas of his or her dilemma pile from the game.

name: Invasive Transporters
Name: Invasive Transporters
gametext: Order - Place any number of your Jem'Hadar and equipment at a mission aboard a ship at the same mission. Place this interrupt on the bottom of its owner's deck.

name: Founders' Homeworld Contingent Refuge
Name: Founders' Homeworld Contingent Refuge
Skills: You may play [Dom] cards and equipment at this mission.
gametext: When you complete a [GQ] mission, if you do not command another headquarters mission, each opponent loses 5 points.

name: Kar-telos Asteroid Belt Salvage Wreckage
Name: Kar-telos Asteroid Belt Salvage Wreckage
gametext: When your personnel complete this mission, you may download a non-unique Jem'Hadar, then place him on your ship at this mission.

name: Loren III Combined Discovery
Name: Loren III Combined Discovery
Skills: Archaeology, Astrometrics, Diplomacy, Officer, and Cunning>34
gametext: While you command an Archaeology Commander aboard his or her corresponding ship, you may play an Archaeology Commander of an affiliation you do not command aboard.

name: Stakoron II Mine Miszinite
Name: Stakoron II Mine Miszinite
Affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
Skills: Anthropology, 2 Engineer, Geology, and (Cunning>38 or Strength>42)
gametext: The first dual dilemma revealed here each turn is cost +1.

name: Stakoron Strait Patrol Shipping Lane
Name: Stakoron Strait Patrol Shipping Lane
Affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
Skills: Astrometrics, Navigation, 2 Officer, and (Cunning>38 or Strength>42)
gametext: The first dual dilemma revealed here each turn is cost +1.

name: Keiko O'Brien Pah-Wraith Hostage
Name: Keiko O'Brien Pah-Wraith Hostage
gametext: When this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may discard a card from hand to make a [Fed][DS9] personnel present gain Anthropology, Exobiology, and Treachery until the end of that dilemma. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Rase Norvan
Name: Rase Norvan
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may take a [Fed] card from your discard pile into hand.

name: Sarish Rez Ministerial Adjutant
Name: Sarish Rez Ministerial Adjutant
gametext: When you play this personnel, the next [Fed][DS9] personnel you play this turn is cost -2.

name: Kira Founder Curious
Name: Kira Founder Curious
gametext: When an opponent's personnel begins a mission attempt, if this personnel is in your hand and you command {Founders' Homeworld}, you may place her present with that opponent's personnel. (You now command this personnel.)

name: Liam Bilby Unwitting Accomplice
Name: Liam Bilby Unwitting Accomplice
gametext: Order - Kill this personnel to kill an opponent's non-[Dom] personnel present.

name: Toman'torax Obstinate Second
Name: Toman'torax Obstinate Second
gametext: When you win combat involving this personnel, if he is equipped with a Hand Weapon, randomly select an opponent's personnel involved in that combat to be killed.

name: Virak'kara
Name: Virak'kara
gametext: This personnel is attributes +2 for each Hand Weapon present (limit +6).

name: Benjamin Sisko Enlightened Supervisor
Name: Benjamin Sisko Enlightened Supervisor
gametext: While this personnel is present with your [Baj] personnel, each of your [Fed] personnel present is attributes +1.

name: Elizabeth Lense Valedictorian
Name: Elizabeth Lense Valedictorian
gametext: When you play this personnel, the next [Baj][DS9] personnel you play this turn is cost -2.

name: Lojal Investigative Ambassador
Name: Lojal Investigative Ambassador
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may lose 5 points to take up to two [Baj] personnel from your discard pile and place them on your headquarters mission where they could be played.

name: Lwaxana Troi Extraordinary Ambassador
Name: Lwaxana Troi Extraordinary Ambassador
gametext: When you play this personnel, she is cost -1 for each non-[Fed] personnel you command.

name: Quark Opportunistic Envoy
Name: Quark Opportunistic Envoy
gametext: You may play this personnel aboard your [Dom] ship. When you play this personnel, you may download {Tulaberry Wine} and give command of that event to an opponent.

name: Martok Welcome Presence
Name: Martok Welcome Presence
gametext: When this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may discard an interrupt from hand to make him gain all skills and attributes on a [DS9] personnel in your discard pile until the end of that dilemma. You may do this only once each turn.

name: T'Rul Guarded Attache
Name: T'Rul Guarded Attache
gametext: When this personnel is about to be stopped or killed by a dilemma, you may discard a [DS9] personnel from hand to prevent that. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Quark True Ferengi *VP
Name: Quark True Ferengi *VP
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may download a card and place that card beneath your {Ferenginar}. This personnel is Cunning +1 for each Rule you command that has a different card title.

name: Kathryn Janeway Mindful Keeper *VP
Name: Kathryn Janeway Mindful Keeper *VP
gametext: When any number of your [Voy] personnel present with a cost of 1 or less are about to be stopped by a dilemma, you may stop this personnel to prevent that.

name: A Taste of Armageddon
Name: A Taste of Armageddon
gametext: Randomly select a personnel with a skill required by this mission to be killed. The opponent on your left may discard an interrupt from hand to randomly select an additional personnel to be killed.

name: Compromised Tactics
Name: Compromised Tactics
gametext: Your opponent chooses a personnel they command but do not own. Your copies of that personnel are stopped. Unless you have the skills on that personnel, all your personnel are stopped.

name: Dead Ringer
Name: Dead Ringer
gametext: Your opponent chooses a personnel. You may replace him or her with a personnel in your discard pile that has at least one of the same skills. If you do, place the personnel your opponent chose in your discard pile. Otherwise, all your personnel are stopped.

name: Divide and Conquer
Name: Divide and Conquer
gametext: When your opponent reveals this dilemma, add 5 to each of this dilemma's attribute requirements for each interrupt in that opponent's discard pile. Unless you have 2 Diplomacy and Cunning>20 or 2 Security and Strength>20, all your personnel are stopped.

name: Intelligent Design
Name: Intelligent Design
gametext: Choose a personnel with Cunning>7 to be stopped. If you cannot, place this dilemma in your core. While this dilemmas is in your core, your opponent's Holograms are each attributes +1.

name: Put to the Screws
Name: Put to the Screws
gametext: Your opponent names two different skills. Choose one of the named skills. If you have two or more personnel who have that skill, randomly select all but one of those personnel to be stopped.

name: Qualification
Name: Qualification
gametext: When your opponent reveals this dilemma, add 5 to each of this dilemma's attribute requirements for each interrupt in that opponent's discard pile. Unless you have 2 Transporters and Integrity>20 or 2 Treachery and Strength>20, all your personnel are stopped.

name: Simulated Prey
Name: Simulated Prey
gametext: Randomly select a personnel with a skill required by this mission to be killed. The opponent on your left may discard an interrupt from hand to randomly select an additional personnel to be killed.

name: Blue Match
Name: Blue Match
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [NA] personnel. Plays in your core. At the start of your turn, you may make each player reveal the bottom card of his or her deck. If you reveal personnel with higher total Strength than each opponent, the first card you play this turn is cost -2.

name: Overrun
Name: Overrun
gametext: Plays in your core. While ten or more of your [Bor] personnel are facing a dilemma, you may make each random selection made by that dilemma your choice. This effect lasts until the end of the mission attempt.

name: Red Match
Name: Red Match
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [NA] personnel. Plays in your core. At the start of your turn, you may destroy this event to make each player reveal the bottom card of his or her deck. The player that reveals the personnel with the highest total Strength scores 5 points. (In case of a tie, no player scores points.)

name: Thirst for Knowledge
Name: Thirst for Knowledge
gametext: When you play this event, it is cost -1 for each space mission you command. Plays in your core. While your personnel are attempting a space mission worth 35 or fewer points, if you command a completed space mission, they are attributes +1.

name: Cold Calculations
Name: Cold Calculations
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must command three [Voy] Treachery personnel. When an opponent has chosen dilemmas, you may examine each of the unchosen dilemmas.

name: For Cardassia!
Name: For Cardassia!
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must command three [Car] personnel. You may play only one copy of this interrupt each turn. When you complete a mission worth 30 or less points, if you have three or more personnel who cost 1 or less involved, score 10 points. Remove this interrupt from the game.

name: Homeward Bound
Name: Homeward Bound
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must command a completed [DQ] space mission and three [Voy] personnel. You may only play one copy of this interrupt each turn. When you play this interrupt, if you command a planet mission, lose 5 points. Order - Unstop each of your stopped personnel at a [DQ] space mission. Remove this interrupt from the game.

name: Rise to the Occasion
Name: Rise to the Occasion
gametext: When your personnel is facing a dilemma, discard a card from hand to make him or her gain all skills on one of your personnel present that costs 1 or less. This effect lasts until the end of that dilemma.

name: Target of Opportunity
Name: Target of Opportunity
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must command three [NA] personnel. When your opponent reveals a personnel from the top or bottom of his or her deck, you may lose 5 points to place that personnel aboard your ship. (You now command him or her.)

name: Alsuran Sector Utilize Abandoned Relay Station
Name: Alsuran Sector Utilize Abandoned Relay Station
Affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.
Skills: Engineer, Honor, Programming, Cunning>32, and three [Voy] personnel
gametext: While you command four completed [DQ] space mission, have 100 or more points, and do not command a planet mission, you win the game.

name: Briori Sector Investigate Corrosion
Name: Briori Sector Investigate Corrosion
Affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.
Skills: Archaeology, Geology, Science, Security, and Cunning>36
gametext: At the start of your first turn, you may reveal your hand. If you do not reveal an interrupt, you may shuffle your hand into your deck, then draw seven cards.

name: Grid 532 Assimilate Species 10026
Name: Grid 532 Assimilate Species 10026
gametext: When you complete this mission, you may place up to three personnel that you command but do not own in their owners' discard piles. Score 5 points for each.

name: Kelsid II Establish Settlement
Name: Kelsid II Establish Settlement
gametext: While this mission is complete, the first personnel you play at a [DQ] mission each turn is cost -1.

name: Orlitus Cluster Astronomical Survey
Name: Orlitus Cluster Astronomical Survey
Affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.
gametext: Each of your personnel here with a cost of 1 or less is attributes +1.

name: System J-25 Premature Encounter
Name: System J-25 Premature Encounter
Affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.
gametext: When you begin a mission attempt here involving ten or more personnel, this mission is worth 5 more points (or worth 10 more points if you have twelve or more personnel involved) until the end of that mission attempt.

name: Tarakis Repair Memorial
Name: Tarakis Repair Memorial
Skills: Anthropology, Archaeology, Security, Telepathy, and Integrity>32
gametext: Order - Reveal cards from the top of an opponent's deck equal to the number of personnel on this planet (limit 4). You may do this only once each turn.

name: Terikof Belt Navigate Plasma Storms
Name: Terikof Belt Navigate Plasma Storms
Skills: 5 Navigation, Cunning>37, and an undamaged ship
gametext: When your [Maq] or [Car] ship moves from a non-headquarters Region: Badlands mission to another mission, you may begin an engagement at that mission. If you win, draw two cards.

name: Eleven of Eighteen Augmentation Drone
Name: Eleven of Eighteen Augmentation Drone
gametext: When you play an interrupt, if this personnel is attempting a mission and there are nine or more of your [Bor] personnel present, you may place that interrupt on the bottom of your deck.

name: Isotope Drone
Name: Isotope Drone
gametext: While this personnel is attempting a mission worth 50 or more points, he is attributes +2.

name: Quantum Drone
Name: Quantum Drone
gametext: When you begin a mission attempt involving this personnel and nine or more of your [Bor] personnel present, subtract one from the number of dilemmas your opponent may draw and one from the total cost he or she may spend on dilemmas.

name: Chakotay Steadfast Commander
Name: Chakotay Steadfast Commander
Skills: 2 Anthropology Archaeology Diplomacy Honor Leadership Officer
gametext: When you begin a mission attempt involving this personnel, if you do not command a planet mission, reduce all attribute requirements of that mission by 2 for each of your completed space missions until the end of that mission attempt.

name: Harry Kim Remorseful Survivor
Name: Harry Kim Remorseful Survivor
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may examine the top four cards of your deck. You may reveal an interrupt or a Temporal card and take it into hand. Place the remaining cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Mitchell
Name: Mitchell
gametext: When you play this personnel, he is cost +2 for each planet mission you command.

name: Kathryn Janeway Mindful Keeper
Name: Kathryn Janeway Mindful Keeper
gametext: When any number of your [Voy] personnel present with a cost of 1 or less are about to be stopped by a dilemma, you may stop this personnel to prevent that.

name: Mortimer Harren Reclusive Genius
Name: Mortimer Harren Reclusive Genius
gametext: When you play this personnel, he is cost +2 for each planet mission you command. While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may exclude each corresponding Commander present aboard his or her ship from random selections.

name: Tal Celes Imprecise Analyst
Name: Tal Celes Imprecise Analyst
gametext: When you play this personnel, she is cost +2 for each planet mission you command. While this personnel is facing a dilemma, if your corresponding Commander is present and aboard his or her ship, this personnel is attributes +2.

name: William Telfer Misguided Hypochondriac
Name: William Telfer Misguided Hypochondriac
gametext: When you play this personnel, he is cost +2 for each planet mission you command. While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may lose 5 points to download an interrupt. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Kamok
Name: Kamok
gametext: You may play this personnel aboard your [Kli] ship at a non-[AQ] mission at cost -1.

name: Kar'meth
Name: Kar'meth
gametext: You may play this personnel aboard your [Kli] ship at a non-[AQ] mission at cost -1.

name: Nirok
Name: Nirok
gametext: You may play this personnel aboard your [Kli] ship at a non-[AQ] mission at cost -1.

name: Feykaab
Name: Feykaab
gametext: When you reveal cards from the bottom of your deck for a Tsukatse event, you may reveal an additional card.

name: Nimira
Name: Nimira
Skills: Anthropology Exobiology Law Medical Security Telepathy
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may reveal an interrupt from hand. If you do not, she is stopped.

name: Penk Unscrupulous Promoter
Name: Penk Unscrupulous Promoter
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may download a Tsunkatse card.

name: Nammoch Travelling Carnival
Name: Nammoch Travelling Carnival
gametext: While this ship is staffed and does not have a Damage marker on it, cards your opponents own may not cause your Tsunkatse events to leave play.

name: Worf Son of Mogh *VP
Name: Worf Son of Mogh *VP
gametext: When you play this personnel, each opponent draws a card.

name: Historical Curiosity *VP
Name: Historical Curiosity *VP
gametext: Unless you have Anthropology, Law, and Transporters or Shields>8, randomly select two personnel to be stopped and your opponent draws up to two cards.

name: Stefan DeSeve Disillusioned Expatriate *VP
Name: Stefan DeSeve Disillusioned Expatriate *VP
gametext: While this personnel is present with a {Dissident} or a [Fed][Cmd] personnel, he is attributes +1.

name: Anachronistic Deviation
Name: Anachronistic Deviation
