gametext: If you command a [Pa] ship at this mission, randomly select a non-[Pa] personnel to be killed. If you command a non-[Pa] ship at this mission, randomly select a [Pa] personnel to be killed. This dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Dumb Waiter
Name: Dumb Waiter
gametext: Your opponent reveals one of his or her personnel at this mission. Unless you have the skills on that personnel, your opponent chooses three personnel to be stopped.

name: Strength of Arms
Name: Strength of Arms
gametext: Your opponent places a ship you command at this mission. Unless you have Diplomacy and a unique ship at this mission or Treachery and a ship with Weapons>7 at this mission, your opponent chooses a personnel to be stopped.

name: Unsound Logic
Name: Unsound Logic
gametext: If your opponent commands an {Assassin} at this mission, he or she chooses a personnel to be killed. If he or she returns that Assassin to his or her hand, he or she chooses an additional personnel to be killed.

name: Emergency Evacuation
Name: Emergency Evacuation
gametext: Plays in your core. While you command more than one ship, destroy this event. Order - Take your personnel aboard your ship and place him or her on this event. Order - Take your personnel from this event and place him or her on your ship.

name: Miracle Working
Name: Miracle Working
gametext: To play this event, you must command a ship with four or more staffing icons. Draw four cards, then place three cards from hand on the bottom of your deck. Destroy this event.

name: New Life
Name: New Life
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [TNG] personnel. Plays in your core. When a player attempts a mission with six or more personnel, he or she draws a card. Then, you draw a card.

name: Pulling Rank
Name: Pulling Rank
gametext: Plays on your ship with four or more staffing icons. Your {Admiral} and {General} personnel aboard are the corresponding Commanders of this ship.

name: Relief Efforts
Name: Relief Efforts
gametext: Plays in your core. When your personnel on a planet is killed by an opponent's dilemma, you may beam one of your personnel aboard your ship with four or more staffing icons there to the planet (he or she joins the mission attempt). You may do this only once each dilemma.

name: Resilience
Name: Resilience
gametext: Plays in your core. While you command exactly one ship, it requires an additional damage card to destroy it.

name: Suppressed Evidence
Name: Suppressed Evidence
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [TNG] personnel. Each player who does not command a completed mission must choose all but two of his or her events to return to their owner's hand. Destroy this event.

name: War Without End
Name: War Without End
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin an engagement involving your [AU] ship. If each personnel aboard that ship is [AU], it is Weapons +4. If you win, score 10 points.

name: Zalkonian Storage Capsule
Name: Zalkonian Storage Capsule
gametext: Plays in your core. When a card you own causes your opponent to draw a card or reduce a cost, you may examine the top card of your deck. Then you may place the top card of your deck on this event. You may play [TNG] cards on this event as if they were in your hand.

name: Imperial Entanglements
Name: Imperial Entanglements
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must command {Romulus} and no other headquarters missions. When your opponent begins a mission attempt, discard a [Rom] card from hand to download a {D'deridex-class ship} and up to four [Rom] personnel. Place the downloaded ship at that mission and the personnel aboard it. At the end of the mission attempt, shuffle each card you downloaded this way into your deck.

name: Relative Dimensions
Name: Relative Dimensions
gametext: While your [SF] Engineer aboard your ship is facing a dilemma at a space mission, discard a card from hand to add that ship's Shields to his or her attributes until the end of the mission attempt.

name: Kaleb Sector Covert Rendezvous
Name: Kaleb Sector Covert Rendezvous
Affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
Skills: Engineer, Leadership, Navigation, Cunning>34, and a staffed Cloaking Device ship
gametext: When your mission attempt ends here, you may place your {Cloaking Device} ship here on your {Engage Cloak}.

name: Nelvana III Compelling Threat
Name: Nelvana III Compelling Threat
Skills: Diplomacy, Intelligence, Security, Treachery, and Cunning>34
gametext: While this mission is complete, increase the attribute requirements of each opponent's mission by the highest Weapons among your staffed ships at that mission.

name: Romulus Patient Stronghold
Name: Romulus Patient Stronghold
Skills: You may play [Rom] cards and equipment at this mission.
gametext: You cannot command another headquarters mission. When you play a {D'deridex-class ship}, it is cost -1. When you are about to move your D'deridex-class ship to an opponent's mission, subtract 3 from the span total required.

name: Turo
Name: Turo
gametext: While this personnel is aboard your {Keldon-class ship}, the first {Capture} or {Punishment} event you play each turn is cost -1.

name: Branson
Name: Branson
gametext: While this personnel is aboard your {Sovereign-class ship}, it is attributes +1.

name: Erik Pressman Stern Authoritarian
Name: Erik Pressman Stern Authoritarian
gametext: While this personnel is aboard your [TNG] ship, it gains Cloaking Device.

name: Garvey
Name: Garvey
gametext: While each player has four or more cards in hand, this personnel is attributes +1 and gains Intelligence and Officer.

name: Homn Lurching Valet
Name: Homn Lurching Valet
gametext: When you play this personnel, choose an opponent to draw three cards, then you may draw cards until you have an equal number of cards in hand as that opponent.

name: Kurn Exchange Officer
Name: Kurn Exchange Officer
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may discard a random card from hand to have him gain a skill on a [TNG] personnel in your discard pile until the end of the mission attempt.

name: Lwaxana Troi Psychic Tutor
Name: Lwaxana Troi Psychic Tutor
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may download up to two cards. Those cards must be {Common Ground}, {Disadvantage Into Advantage}, or {New Life}.

name: Martinez
Name: Martinez
gametext: While each player has 40 or more points, this personnel is attributes +1 and gains Diplomacy and Security.

name: Nog Communications Relay
Name: Nog Communications Relay
gametext: While this personnel is aboard your {Defiant-class ship}, each of your [Stf] personnel present loses [Stf] and gains [Cmd].

name: Richardson
Name: Richardson
gametext: While each player commands a completed mission, this personnel is attributes +1 and gains Science.

name: Spock Maverick Diplomat
Name: Spock Maverick Diplomat
gametext: When you play this personnel, each player may choose one: download a Diplomacy personnel; remove the bottom card of his or her dilemma pile from the game; or place a personnel from his or her headquarters mission at another mission.

name: St. John Talbot Embittered Consul
Name: St. John Talbot Embittered Consul

name: Korrd Obsolete Consul

gametext: Add the cost of the highest cost ship at this mission to this personnel's attributes.

gametext: Add the cost of the highest cost ship at this mission to this personnel's attributes.

Name: Navok

name: Rasul
Name: Rasul
gametext: While this personnel is aboard your {D'deridex-class ship}, it is Range +1.

name: Retaya Chemical Agent
Name: Retaya Chemical Agent
gametext: When your opponent is about to fail a mission attempt here, you may discard an event from hand to randomly kill a personnel involved.

name: Stefan DeSeve Disillusioned Expatriate
Name: Stefan DeSeve Disillusioned Expatriate
gametext: While this personnel is present with a {Dissident} or a [Fed][Cmd] personnel, he is attributes +1.

name: Tagus
Name: Tagus
gametext: When your opponent's personnel at this mission is about to gain a skill as a result of paying a cost, prevent that unless he or she discards a card from hand.

name: Thei Candid Analyst
Name: Thei Candid Analyst
gametext: When your opponent is about to choose one or more personnel here for a dilemma you own, randomly select from all eligible personnel instead.

name: Varel
Name: Varel
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may download {Escaping Detection}.

name: U.S.S. Enterprise-E Royal Refuge
Name: U.S.S. Enterprise-E Royal Refuge
gametext: Order - While you command a personnel you do not own aboard this ship and it is staffed, name another non-[Voy] ship. Each player ignores that ship's game text. This effect lasts until this order is executed again.

name: U.S.S. Defiant Enduring Defender
Name: U.S.S. Defiant Enduring Defender
gametext: This ship requires an additional damage card to destroy it. While this ship is damaged, it is attributes +2.

name: I.K.S. Negh'Var Imperial Flagship
Name: I.K.S. Negh'Var Imperial Flagship
gametext: To staff this ship, you must have a {Chancellor} or a {General} aboard. You may use your card which begins combat to begin one at this mission even if it is at a headquarters mission.

name: T'Met Timely Reinforcement
Name: T'Met Timely Reinforcement
gametext: When the opponent on your right begins a mission attempt at this mission, if this ship is staffed, you may discard two cards (or an event) from hand to draw three extra dilemmas and spend three extra in total cost on dilemmas.

name: Entanglement *VP
Name: Entanglement *VP
gametext: Your opponent may spend three extra in total cost on dilemmas during this mission attempt.

name: Occupational Hazards *VP
Name: Occupational Hazards *VP
gametext: Unless you have 2 Acquisition or 2 Treachery, randomly select a personnel to be killed and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Alien Gambling Device *VP
Name: Alien Gambling Device *VP
gametext: When a random selection is made at this mission, you may ignore its result and select again. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Stir Crazy *VP
Name: Stir Crazy *VP
gametext: Plays in your core. When the player on your right begins a mission attempt, if he or she has already completed a mission of the same type, you may destroy this event to draw three extra dilemmas and spend three extra in total cost on dilemmas.

name: Reborn *VP
Name: Reborn *VP
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must command three [Bor] personnel present together at a non-headquarters mission. Order - Lose 5 points to randomly select an opponent's personnel present with those [Bor] personnel and take command of him or her.

name: Terrasphere 8 Starfleet Command Re-creation *VP
Name: Terrasphere 8 Starfleet Command Re-creation *VP
Affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
gametext: At the start of your turn, if this mission is complete and the opponent on your right has eight or more {Species 8472} dilemmas in his or her core, you win the game.

name: Seven of Nine Efficient Analyst *VP
Name: Seven of Nine Efficient Analyst *VP
gametext: Order - Examine the top two cards of your deck. Replace those cards in any order. Order - Exchange a card in hand with the top card of your deck.

name: Worf Defiant Commander *VP
Name: Worf Defiant Commander *VP
gametext: Each of your personnel present who has a cost of 4 or more is attributes +1.

name: Tenak'talar Vanguard of the Occupation *VP
Name: Tenak'talar Vanguard of the Occupation *VP
gametext: This ship is Range +1 for each unique [Car] personnel aboard (limit +3). When your unique Cardassian aboard uses a skill to complete a [Car] mission, if this ship is staffed, score 10 points. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Haakona *VP
Name: Haakona *VP
gametext: When you play this ship, you may download {Engage Cloak} or a {Pursuit} card.

name: Taris Deceitful Subcommander *VP
Name: Taris Deceitful Subcommander *VP
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may examine an opponent's hand.

name: Alternatives to Fighting
Name: Alternatives to Fighting
gametext: Unless you have Navigation and Weapons>7 or this mission is a {Nebula} mission, place your ship at a Nebula mission. If you cannot, all your personnel are stopped and place this dilemma on your ship. Damage - This ship is attributes -2.

name: Becalmed
Name: Becalmed
gametext: Add the span of this mission to this dilemma's cost. Randomly select three personnel. Each of those personnel with an attribute>6 is stopped.

name: Brave Words
Name: Brave Words
gametext: Unless the missions you command have greater total span than the mission your opponent commands, your opponent chooses a personnel to be stopped.

name: Cornered
Name: Cornered
gametext: Unless you have 2 Astrometrics and 2 Navigation or command a completed mission with span 4 or more, randomly select two personnel to be killed.

name: Dead Weight
Name: Dead Weight
gametext: Each of your personnel who does not have a skill required by this mission is stopped.

name: Accumulated Knowledge
Name: Accumulated Knowledge
gametext: When you play this event, it is cost -1 for each dilemma beneath your [SF] missions. Plays in your core. When any number of your [SF] personnel are about to be stopped by a dilemma, you may destroy this event to prevent that.

name: Chimeric Diversion
Name: Chimeric Diversion
gametext: Plays in your core. When the opponent on your right begins a mission attempt, if the number of dilemmas beneath that mission is greater than its span, you may draw one extra dilemma and spend one extra in total cost on dilemmas.

name: Defiant Reprisal
Name: Defiant Reprisal
gametext: Plays in your core. When your [Maq] personnel is killed by a dilemma, in combat, or in an engagement, you may place that personnel on this event. (You no longer command that personnel.) When your [Maq] personnel is about to be stopped or killed by a dilemma, you may discard a card on this event to prevent that.

name: Ignored Jurisdiction
Name: Ignored Jurisdiction
gametext: Plays on a non-headquarters Region: Demilitarized Zone mission. All players ignore the mission's game text (except keywords and requirements). When a card an opponent owns causes you to lose command of this event, return it to its owner's hand.

name: Respect in Diversity
Name: Respect in Diversity
gametext: Plays in your core. When you complete a mission, you may unstop any number of your stopped [SF] personnel at that mission. They must each be a different species.

name: Ripple Effect
Name: Ripple Effect
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [SF] personnel. Plays on your completed mission. You are considered to command another completed mission of this mission's type.

name: Subspace Rift
Name: Subspace Rift
gametext: Plays on a non-headquarters mission. This mission is span 4.

name: Emergency Repairs
Name: Emergency Repairs
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must command a ship at a mission with span 4 or more. Order - Place your personnel on a dilemma aboard that ship. (Remove that dilemma from the game.) Order - Remove a Damage card on that ship from the game. Order - Make that ship Range +4 until the end of this turn.

name: Perilous Proposal
Name: Perilous Proposal
gametext: While your [Fed] personnel is facing a dilemma at a mission with span 4 or more, replace all levels of any one skill in that dilemma's requirements with 2 Astrometrics.

name: B'hava'el Prevent Systemic Annihilation
Name: B'hava'el Prevent Systemic Annihilation
gametext: When you play a Paranoia event, if this mission is complete, that event is cost -1.

name: Betazed Occupy Homeworld
Name: Betazed Occupy Homeworld

name: Deep Space Station K-7 Monitor Federation Commerce
Name: Deep Space Station K-7 Monitor Federation Commerce
Affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Fed]) may attempt this mission.
Skills: Engineer, Intelligence, Programming, Treachery, and Cunning>34
gametext: When you play an Infiltrator, if this mission is complete, that personnel is cost -1 and you may place him or her on an opponent's planet mission or aboard an opponent's ship.

name: Farius Prime Approach Criminal Organization

Name: Subspace Rift *VP
gametext: Plays on a non-headquarters mission. This mission is span 4.

Name: A Private Little War (IDR)

Name: Dark Page (IDR)

name: In Development (IDR)

name: Inhumane Interrogation (IDR)
Name: Inhumane Interrogation (IDR)
gametext: Randomly select a personnel to be killed. You may destroy an event in your core to prevent this.

name: Pillage and Plunder (IDR)

gametext: Choose a personnel who has Archaeology or Treachery to be stopped. If you cannot, randomly select a personnel to be killed.

Name: Setting the Stage (IDR)
gametext: Randomly select nine personnel. All your other personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: The Clown: Go Away (IDR)
Name: The Clown: Go Away (IDR)
gametext: Place this dilemma on this mission. At the start of each of your turns, if you command no personnel or ships that you own at this mission, remove this dilemma from the game. When personnel begin a mission attempt at this mission, randomly select a personnel to be returned to their owner's hand.

name: The First Duty (IDR)
Name: The First Duty (IDR)
gametext: Choose a personnel who has Honor or Law to be stopped. If you cannot, randomly select a personnel to be killed.

name: Hypospray (IDR)
Name: Hypospray (IDR)
gametext: When your personnel present is about to be killed by a dilemma, you may stop that personnel and your Medical personnel present to prevent that. You may do this only once each turn.

name: At What Cost? (IDR)
Name: At What Cost? (IDR)
gametext: Lose 5 points to spend 7 additional counters this turn. Destroy this event.

name: Persistent Strike (IDR)
Name: Persistent Strike (IDR)
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Begin an engagement involving your Officer personnel. If you win, place this event on an opponent's ship involved. Otherwise, destroy this event. Damage - If this is a non-[Voy] ship, ignore its game text.

name: Product Placement (IDR)
Name: Product Placement (IDR)
gametext: Discard an equipment, event, or interrupt from hand to spend two additional counters this turn. Destroy this event.

name: Raise the Stakes (IDR)
Name: Raise the Stakes (IDR)
gametext: Plays in your core. Each of your opponent's personnel are attributes +1. Each of your missions are worth 5 more points. When you are about to lose command of this event, remove it from the game instead.

name: Slightly Awkward (IDR)
Name: Slightly Awkward (IDR)
gametext: Plays in your core. When a personnel that the player on your right commands begins a mission attempt, you may discard an equipment, event, or interrupt from hand to choose one: draw an extra dilemma; or, spend one extra in total cost on dilemmas.

name: Alpha 5 Approach Transport Crash Survivor (IDR)
Name: Alpha 5 Approach Transport Crash Survivor (IDR)
Affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.
gametext: When a player's personnel begin a mission attempt with five or less personnel, the player to the left of that player may draw six extra dilemmas and spend six extra on dilemmas.

name: Automated Server (IDR)
Name: Automated Server (IDR)
gametext: While you command three [Fer] personnel, this personnel is attributes +1, gains Acquisition, and becomes [Fer].

name: Doran (IDR)
Name: Doran (IDR)
gametext: While you command three [Car] personnel, this personnel is attributes +1, gains Archaeology, and becomes [Car].

name: Garren (IDR)
Name: Garren (IDR)
gametext: While you command three [Rom] personnel, this personnel is attributes +1, gains Engineer, and becomes [Rom].

name: K'wov (IDR)
Name: K'wov (IDR)
gametext: While you command three [Kli] personnel, this personnel is attributes +1, gains Leadership, and becomes [Kli].

name: Sumek (IDR)
Name: Sumek (IDR)
gametext: While you command three [Fed] personnel, this personnel gains Biology and Officer, and becomes [Fed].

name: Olarra (IDR)
Name: Olarra (IDR)
gametext: While your [NA] Hologram with no staffing icons is aboard this ship, he or she gains [Stf]. While you have a lower score than each of your opponents and a Hologram personnel is aboard this ship, you may spend an additional counter this turn.

name: Unicomplex Root of the Hive Mind *VP
Name: Unicomplex Root of the Hive Mind *VP
Skills: You may play [Bor] cards and equipment at this mission.
gametext: You cannot command another Headquarters mission.

name: Jean-Luc Picard Starship Captain *VP
Name: Jean-Luc Picard Starship Captain *VP
Skills: Diplomacy Honor Law Leadership Navigation Officer
gametext: Order - This personnel loses Diplomacy, Law, and Navigation and gains Anthropology, Archaeology, and Science until the end of this turn. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Guess Who's Coming to Dinner? *VP
Name: Guess Who's Coming to Dinner? *VP
gametext: Choose a personnel who has Diplomacy or Integrity>6 to be stopped. If you cannot, randomly select a personnel to be killed.

name: Picking Up the Pieces *VP
Name: Picking Up the Pieces *VP
gametext: Unless you have Geology or Programming, all your personnel are stopped. If you have two or more personnel who have Geology or Programming, randomly select all but one of those personnel to be stopped.

name: Just Like Old Times *VP
Name: Just Like Old Times *VP
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin combat involving your Bajoran Resistance personnel. If you win, score 15 points.

name: Tragic Turn *VP
Name: Tragic Turn *VP
gametext: Place this dilemma on this mission (limit one per mission). When a dilemma is overcome here, if that dilemma killed any of your personnel, randomly select a personnel attempting the mission to be killed. Otherwise, if that dilemma stopped any of your personnel, randomly select a personnel attempting the mission to be stopped.

name: Disadvantage Into Advantage *VP
Name: Disadvantage Into Advantage *VP
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [TNG] personnel. Plays in your core. The first unique personnel played each turn costs -2.

name: Christening *VP
Name: Christening *VP
gametext: Reveal your hand. If you do not command a ship and you do not reveal a ship from hand, this event is cost -3. Download a ship. Destroy this event.

name: Odo Bajoran Representative *VP
Name: Odo Bajoran Representative *VP
gametext: To play this personnel, you must command three non-Dissident [TN] personnel. You may play this personnel at your [HQ] {Mouth of the Wormhole} at cost +5 to do any or all of the following: score 5 points, download an equipment, download {Ruling Council}, download a [TN] card.

name: Gateway Historical Research *VP
Name: Gateway Historical Research *VP
Affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.
gametext: At the start of your turn, if this is your first turn and any opponent has had a turn, you may download a personnel.

name: Mila Trusted Confidante *VP
Name: Mila Trusted Confidante *VP
gametext: When an interrupt is played, you may kill this personnel to prevent that interrupt and place it in its owner's discard pile.

name: Pitching In *VP
Name: Pitching In *VP
gametext: If you have four or more personnel who have a cost of 2 or less attempting this mission, this dilemma is cost -3. Choose a Leadership or Security personnel to be stopped. Then choose an Engineer or Programming personnel to be stopped.

name: After Action Report
Name: After Action Report
gametext: Randomly select a personnel to be stopped for each completed mission you command.

name: Any Methods Necessary
Name: Any Methods Necessary
gametext: Unless you have a Medical personnel who has Integrity<5 or Intelligence, randomly select a personnel to be placed in your opponent's brig, then all your other personnel are stopped.

name: Covert Extraction
Name: Covert Extraction
gametext: Choose a personnel who has Intelligence or Transporters to be stopped. If you cannot, randomly select a personnel to be killed.

name: Disaster
Name: Disaster
gametext: Place this dilemma on this mission. When your personnel uses a skill while facing a Damage dilemma here, that personnel is stopped. At the end of this turn, this dilemma is overcome.

name: Hard of Heart
Name: Hard of Heart
gametext: Randomly select two personnel. Unless those personnel have Geology and Cunning>11 or Strength>13, those personnel are killed.

name: Historical Pursuit
Name: Historical Pursuit
gametext: Unless you have Archaeology, Honor, and Transporters or an Artifact equipment, all your personnel are stopped.

name: Journey to the Past
Name: Journey to the Past
gametext: Unless you have Anthropology, Geology, Science, and Cunning>34 or Diplomacy, Programming, Security, and Strength>32, randomly select three personnel. Place this dilemma in your core, then place those personnel on this dilemma. At the end of your next turn, remove this dilemma from the game and place all personnel here on a planet or headquarters mission.

name: Know Thy Enemy
Name: Know Thy Enemy
gametext: Reveal your hand and the hand of your opponent on your left. If your opponent reveals personnel with more total Strength than the total Strength of personnel that you have revealed in this way, randomly select one of your personnel to be killed and all your personnel are stopped.

name: Pattern Loss
Name: Pattern Loss
gametext: Place this dilemma on this mission (limit one per mission). When a dilemma requiring Transporters is revealed at this mission, add one level of each skill that is in that dilemma's requirements to those requirements until the end of that dilemma.

name: Silent Witness
Name: Silent Witness
gametext: Randomly select two personnel. Each of those personnel who does not have Leadership is killed.

name: Surface Defense
Name: Surface Defense
gametext: Unless you have Archaeology, Exobiology, and Programming or 2 Engineer and 2 Physics, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma is placed on your ship at this mission. Damage - To move this ship, you must stop one of your Navigation personnel aboard.

name: Underlying Influence
Name: Underlying Influence
gametext: Place this dilemma on this mission (limit one per mission). When a dilemma requiring Archaeology is revealed at this mission, add one level of each skill that is in that dilemma's requirements to those requirements until the end of that dilemma.

name: Unorthodox Recruitment
Name: Unorthodox Recruitment
gametext: Unless you have Intelligence, randomly select a personnel who has Cunning>6 to be placed in his or her owner's discard pile. If you cannot, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Vanishing Act
Name: Vanishing Act
gametext: Unless you have 2 Astrometrics or 2 Transporters, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Denevan Crystals
Name: Denevan Crystals

name: Brin

name: Damar Resourceful Supervisor

name: Nidet

name: Guna'shan

name: Pimoo
Name: Pimoo

name: Jean-Luc Picard Unraveled
Name: Jean-Luc Picard Unraveled
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may download {Engineering PADD} and/or {Science PADD}.

name: Kodos the Executioner "Anton Karidian"
Name: Kodos the Executioner "Anton Karidian"
gametext: You may play this personnel at cost +3 to search your dilemma pile for up to three copies of {The Conscience of the King} and place them on your opponent's missions. Then, shuffle and replace your dilemma pile.

name: Tuvok Stolid Ensign
Name: Tuvok Stolid Ensign
gametext: You may play this personnel aboard your [TOS] ship.

name: Prosar
Name: Prosar
gametext: When you give command of a Commodity event you own to an opponent, if this personnel is in your hand or beneath your {Ferenginar}, you may place him on your headquarters mission where he could be played.

name: Kurn Son of Mogh
Name: Kurn Son of Mogh
gametext: When you play this personnel, each opponent draws a card.

name: Ah-Kel
Name: Ah-Kel
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may download {Smuggling Run}.

name: Allamill
Name: Allamill
gametext: When you play this personnel, the next Commodity event you play this turn is cost -2.

name: Brathaw First Mate
Name: Brathaw First Mate
gametext: At the start of your turn, you may discard a card from hand to make this personnel gain a skill required by this mission until the end of this turn.

name: Dar
Name: Dar
gametext: While you command three [Dom] personnel, this personnel is Cunning +2, Strength +2, and becomes [Dom].

name: Hippocrates Noah Visionary Mastermind
Name: Hippocrates Noah Visionary Mastermind
Skills: Acquisition Archaeology Geology Law Leadership 2 Treachery
gametext: When this personnel is killed by a dilemma, each player kills each copy of {Benjamin Sisko} that he or she commands.

name: Rax'Na
Name: Rax'Na
gametext: When an opponent's ship moves to this mission, if this personnel is aboard your staffed ship and you command {Smuggling Run}, you may place the ship he is aboard at an opponent's mission.

name: Ro-Kel
Name: Ro-Kel
gametext: While you command {Smuggling Run}, this personnel gains Leadership and Physics.

name: Verad Rejected Candidate
Name: Verad Rejected Candidate
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may search your dilemma pile for up to three copies of {Skeleton Crew} and place them on your opponent's missions. Then, shuffle and replace your dilemma pile.

name: Zef'No Professional Courier
Name: Zef'No Professional Courier
Skills: Astrometrics Leadership Navigation Programming Security Treachery
gametext: When you score points from {Smuggling Run}, if this personnel used any of his skills, score 5 points.

name: Vreenak Scornful Senator
Name: Vreenak Scornful Senator
gametext: When you play this personnel, the next event you play this turn is cost -2.

name: Disaster *VP
Name: Disaster *VP
gametext: Place this dilemma on this mission. When your personnel uses a skill while facing a Damage dilemma here, that personnel is stopped. At the end of this turn, this dilemma is overcome.

name: Calondon Gunrunner
Name: Calondon Gunrunner
gametext: When your {Smuggling Run} is about to be destroyed by a card an opponent owns, if this ship is staffed and at a non-headquarters mission, prevent that. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Logical Solution
Name: Logical Solution
gametext: Choose one: your opponent chooses your personnel with the most [SD] icons to be placed in your discard pile; or if you have at least one card in hand, discard your hand; or all your personnel are stopped.

name: Paradise Found
Name: Paradise Found
gametext: This dilemma is cost +1 for each interrupt in your opponent's discard pile. Unless you have Anthropology, 2 Honor, and 2 Leadership or 2 Astrometrics, 2 Engineer, and Cunning>38, randomly select three personnel to be stopped.

name: V'Ger
Name: V'Ger
gametext: Unless you have Diplomacy, Exobiology, and Cunning>35 or Archaeology, Programming, and Strength>35, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma is placed on your ship. Damage - You may not play interrupts.

name: Lingering Grief
Name: Lingering Grief
gametext: Plays in your core. While your personnel is facing a dilemma, you may discard an interrupt (or an Honor personnel) from hand to make that personnel lose all of his or her skills until the end of that dilemma.

name: Practical Evidence
Name: Practical Evidence
gametext: Plays on a non-headquarters mission. While a player is attempting this mission, his or her personnel must use Integrity or Cunning to meet Strength requirements.

name: Essential Regrets
Name: Essential Regrets
gametext: When your personnel with Integrity>6 is facing a dilemma that is about to return to its owner's dilemma pile, stop that personnel to overcome that dilemma.

name: Ba'ku Planet Safeguard Civilization
Name: Ba'ku Planet Safeguard Civilization
gametext: When you complete this mission, if none of your personnel completing it have Treachery, each player scores 5 points.

name: Seska Pragmatic Agent
Name: Seska Pragmatic Agent
gametext: When you play this personnel, she is cost -1 for each Treachery personnel you command.

name: Dukat Dominion Puppet
Name: Dukat Dominion Puppet
gametext: When you begin a mission attempt involving this personnel, choose a dilemma an opponent owns that has been removed from the game. This personnel gains a skill required by that dilemma until the end of the mission attempt.

name: Christopher Pike Bold Commander
Name: Christopher Pike Bold Commander
gametext: You may play this personnel at cost +1 to draw two cards.

name: Worf Noble Warrior
Name: Worf Noble Warrior
gametext: When the ship this personnel is aboard is destroyed, you may place any number of Damage cards your opponents own that were on that ship on an opponent's ship at this mission.

name: Quark Cordial Host
Name: Quark Cordial Host
gametext: When this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may exchange him with a non-Artifact equipment from your deck that has a cost of 2 or less. Then shuffle your deck.

name: Kamarag Passionate Orator
Name: Kamarag Passionate Orator
gametext: When you play this personnel, name a personnel. When you play an Assault or Maneuver event, if an opponent commands a unique personnel with that title, that event is cost -1.

name: James Moriarty Awakened Nemesis
Name: James Moriarty Awakened Nemesis
gametext: Order - This personnel gains one skill from your captive or a personnel on your Holoprogram. This effect lasts until this order is executed again.

name: Ru'afo Reluctant "Partner"
Name: Ru'afo Reluctant "Partner"
gametext: To play this personnel, you must command three Treachery personnel.

name: Shinzon Devious Tactician
Name: Shinzon Devious Tactician
gametext: While this personnel is at an opponent's mission, each planet or space dilemma revealed here is cost -1.

name: Shran Exchange Officer
Name: Shran Exchange Officer
gametext: While this personnel is attempting a mission, your [SF] Human personnel present are Integrity +1.

name: U.S.S. Enterprise-A Olive Branch
Name: U.S.S. Enterprise-A Olive Branch
gametext: When you play this ship, it is cost -1 for each of your [Kli] missions. While this ship is at your [Kli] mission, you may attempt and complete it using your [TOS] personnel.

name: Martok Soldier of the Empire *VP
Name: Martok Soldier of the Empire *VP
Keywords: Commander: I.K.S. Rotarran. General. High Council Member.
gametext: Each of your [Kli] ships at this mission is Weapons +1.

name: I.K.S. Rotarran Ship of Tears *VP
Name: I.K.S. Rotarran Ship of Tears *VP
gametext: For each Honor Klingon aboard this ship, it is Weapons +1 (limit +3).

name: Miramanee Loyal Priestess
Name: Miramanee Loyal Priestess
gametext: Order - Kill this personnel to destroy an event on this mission.

name: Miramanee Loyal Priestess *VAP
Name: Miramanee Loyal Priestess *VAP
gametext: Order - Kill this personnel to destroy an event on this mission.

name: Tacking Into the Wind *VP
Name: Tacking Into the Wind *VP
gametext: This event is cost -2 for each completed mission the opponent on your left commands. Choose one: download a ship; destroy an event; or shuffle up to ten cards that are personnel or ships from your discard pile into your deck. Remove this event from the game.

name: Risa Shore Leave *VP
Name: Risa Shore Leave *VP
Skills: Anthropology, and (Archaeology, Science, Treachery, and Cunning>36 or Diplomacy, Exobiology, Officer, and Integrity>32)
gametext: When you complete this mission, score 5 points for each different species of personnel who uses his or her skills to complete this mission.

name: S'rrel *VP
Name: S'rrel *VP
gametext: While this personnel is present with your Treachery personnel, he is Strength +2. While this personnel is present with your Honor personnel, he is Integrity +2.

name: S'rrel
Name: S'rrel
gametext: While this personnel is present with your Treachery personnel, he is Strength +2. While this personnel is present with your Honor personnel, he is Integrity +2.

name: Okala Ahnlo Unsung Hero
Name: Okala Ahnlo Unsung Hero
gametext: When you win combat involving this personnel, you may take a personnel from your discard pile into hand.

name: Ceres Ecliptic Intercept Perceived Threat
Name: Ceres Ecliptic Intercept Perceived Threat
Skills: Intelligence, Navigation, Officer, Security, and Strength>34
gametext: When you complete this mission, you may destroy any number of your events.

name: Dragon's Teeth
Name: Dragon's Teeth
gametext: Randomly select two personnel. Unless their total cost is greater than the number of cards in your hand, they are killed.

name: Rota Sevrin Deranged Doctor
Name: Rota Sevrin Deranged Doctor
gametext: Order - If this personnel is at a non-headquarters mission, you may discard two [NA] cards from hand to randomly select an opponent's non-unique personnel present. You now command that personnel.

name: Kadis-kot
Name: Kadis-kot
gametext: Your opponent names a number. Choose one: stop each of your personnel that has a cost higher than that number, or stop each of your personnel that has a cost lower than that number.

name: Harried and Harassed
Name: Harried and Harassed
gametext: Your opponent chooses his or her staffed ship at another mission and places it at this mission. If he or she commands a Pursuit event, this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Makbar State Jurist
Name: Makbar State Jurist
gametext: When this personnel begins a mission attempt, you may remove a personnel in an opponent's discard pile from the game to make this personnel gain one of the removed personnel's skills until the end of this mission attempt.

name: Orchestrated Attack
Name: Orchestrated Attack
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Begin an engagement involving your Cloaking Device ship. If you win, place this event and any number of Assassins you command on an opponent's ship involved. Otherwise, destroy this event. Damage - This ship is attributes -1.

name: Nine of Seventeen Multiplexor Drone
Name: Nine of Seventeen Multiplexor Drone
gametext: When you win an engagement involving this personnel, the opponent on your left must place the top card of his or her dilemma pile beneath your mission worth 50 or more points.

name: Zefram Cochrane Breaking History
Name: Zefram Cochrane Breaking History
gametext: Order - Discard an [AU] card from hand to begin combat involving this personnel. If you win, randomly select an opponent's non-Human personnel involved to be killed.

name: Bread and Circuses
Name: Bread and Circuses
gametext: Each of your personnel with a cost of 1 or less cannot use their skills while facing this dilemma. Unless you have Archaeology, Diplomacy, and Honor or Exobiology, Transporters, and Treachery, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Brink of War
Name: Brink of War
gametext: Unless you have 3 Diplomacy or Cunning>40, randomly select a personnel to be stopped, then this dilemma is placed in your core. When an opponent begins an engagement involving one of your ships, each opponent's ship involved is Weapons +2.

name: Flashpoint
Name: Flashpoint
gametext: Your opponent chooses [AU], [Fut], or [Pa]. Randomly select two personnel. Unless neither of those personnel have that icon or both of those personnel have that icon, they are killed.

name: Shaken Confidence
Name: Shaken Confidence
gametext: When this dilemma is revealed, it is cost -1 for each Paranoia event your opponent commands. Unless you have 2 Intelligence, randomly select three personnel to be stopped.

name: Unfamiliar Etiquette
Name: Unfamiliar Etiquette
gametext: Your opponent chooses an event you command (if he or she cannot, this dilemma is overcome). Unless you choose to destroy that event, stop each personnel with a cost greater than the cost of that event.

name: Weight of Command
Name: Weight of Command
gametext: Randomly select three personnel. Each Officer personnel selected is stopped. Then place each unstopped [Rom] selected at your headquarters mission.

name: Catastrophic Quip
Name: Catastrophic Quip
gametext: Plays in your core. When an opponent's personnel fails a mission attempt, you may destroy this event to stop all personnel at that mission.

name: Desperate Counter
Name: Desperate Counter
gametext: Plays in your core. Your [E] ships are attributes +1. While an opponent's personnel is at your mission, your personnel at that mission are attributes -1.

name: Effective Deterrent
Name: Effective Deterrent
gametext: Plays in your core. When an opponent's mission attempt fails, if your [Rom] ship is at that mission, you may place that ship at your mission.

name: Hidden Strings
Name: Hidden Strings
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Rom] personnel. Plays in your core. Personnel you command but do not own gain Assassin.Order - Stop your [Rom] personnel aboard your {D'deridex-class ship} to place a personnel in your brig aboard that ship. You now command that personnel.

name: Hostilities Unleashed
Name: Hostilities Unleashed
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Discard an event from hand to begin an engagement involving your ship with its corresponding Commander aboard. If you win, randomly select an opponent's personnel involved to be killed. Otherwise, destroy this event. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Particle 010
Name: Particle 010
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Bor] personnel. Plays in your core. When you reveal a Persistent dilemma from your dilemma stack, it is cost -1 for each of your mission worth 50 or more points.

name: Pressing On
Name: Pressing On
gametext: Plays in your core. At the start of each of your turns, place the top card of your deck on this event. Your [Voy] Treachery personnel cannot be killed by planet dilemmas. When your personnel complete a [DQ] planet mission, you may place each [Voy] or Nucleogenic card on this event in its owner's hand.

name: Vendetta
Name: Vendetta
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Stop your Genetically Enhanced personnel to examine the top card of your deck, then place it on the top or bottom of your deck or in your discard pile.

name: Well Wishes
Name: Well Wishes
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [TNG] personnel. Plays in your core. When your Honor personnel is about to be stopped by a dilemma, you may give command of this event to an opponent to prevent that (move this event to his or her core).

name: The Big Picture
Name: The Big Picture
gametext: When your Admiral is facing a dilemma that requires a skill, destroy your Paranoia event to replace all levels of that skill in that dilemma's requirements with 2 Treachery.

name: Andoria Contact Reclusive Civilization
Name: Andoria Contact Reclusive Civilization
Skills: Diplomacy, Exobiology, Geology, Integrity>34, and (Anthropology or an Andorian)
gametext: When you complete this mission, you may download a [NA] Telepathy personnel.

name: Delta Pavonis Secure Expansion
Name: Delta Pavonis Secure Expansion
Skills: Leadership, Officer, Programming, Security, and Cunning>40
gametext: When you win an engagement, the player to your left places the top card of his or her dilemma pile face up beneath this mission.

name: Soltok IV Transport "Medical Supplies"
Name: Soltok IV Transport "Medical Supplies"
Skills: Medical, Navigation, Transporters, Treachery, and Cunning>34
gametext: At the start of each of your turns, if your staffed [Maq] ship is at this mission, you may draw a card.

name: Heler
Name: Heler
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may draw a card for each mission you command that requires Strength.

name: Dolak Offended Neighbor
Name: Dolak Offended Neighbor
gametext: When you win an engagement involving this personnel, the loser discards the top three cards of his or her deck.

name: Weyoun Shrewd Strategist
Name: Weyoun Shrewd Strategist
gametext: When you win an engagement involving this personnel, you may remove the top card of the loser's dilemma pile from the game.

name: James Morrow Survivor
Name: James Morrow Survivor
gametext: While this personnel is attempting a mission or is involved in an engagement, you may discard a Nucleogenic card from hand to make the ship he is aboard Weapons +2 and Shields +2 until the end of this turn (limit +6).

name: Pavel A. Chekov Experienced Adept
Name: Pavel A. Chekov Experienced Adept
gametext: You may play this personnel at cost -2 to ignore his next ability. When you play this personnel, choose one of your [TOS] ships to be attributes +3 until the end of this turn.

name: Ralami
Name: Ralami
gametext: While you command a [Fed][Maq] ship, you may play this personnel on a planet mission with an event on it.

name: Valeris Faithless Protegee
Name: Valeris Faithless Protegee
gametext: When you play an Admiral at this mission, you may place a Paranoia card from your discard pile on the bottom of its owner's deck.

name: William T. Riker Facing Apotheosis
Name: William T. Riker Facing Apotheosis
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may discard a Q card from hand to make him lose Honor and gain a skill required by this mission until the end of this mission attempt. You may do this only once each turn.

name: K'Ehleyr Uncertain Emissary
Name: K'Ehleyr Uncertain Emissary
gametext: When this personnel is randomly selected by a dilemma each player may draw a card.

name: Worf Desirous Disciple
Name: Worf Desirous Disciple
gametext: Each [Kli] personnel present who does not have a staffing icon is Strength +2.

name: Malcolm Reed Protocol Pioneer
Name: Malcolm Reed Protocol Pioneer
gametext: When an opponent begins an engagement involving this personnel, choose a dilemma beneath this mission. Add the cost of that dilemma to the Shields of the ship this personnel is aboard until the end of this engagement.

name: Scimitar Reman Warbird
Name: Scimitar Reman Warbird
gametext: When you play this ship, it is cost -1 for each Reman at this mission. Each of your [Stf] Reman personnel aboard this ship loses [Stf] and gains [Cmd].

name: Michael Jonas Crafty Mechanic
Name: Michael Jonas Crafty Mechanic
gametext: When combat or an engagement begins involving this personnel, you may return him to his owner's hand to make each of your [Maq] cards attributes +1 until the end of this turn.

name: Jim Shimoda Under the Influence
Name: Jim Shimoda Under the Influence
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, reduce each of his attributes by the cost of that dilemma.

name: Polywater Intoxication *VP
Name: Polywater Intoxication *VP
gametext: If you have six or more personnel attempting this mission, this dilemma is cost +3. Choose a personnel to be stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Lwaxana Troi Extraordinary Ambassador *VP
Name: Lwaxana Troi Extraordinary Ambassador *VP
gametext: When you play this personnel, she is cost -1 for each non-[Fed] personnel you command.

name: Neelix Valued Guide *VP
Name: Neelix Valued Guide *VP
Skills: Acquisition Anthropology Diplomacy Exobiology Honor Navigation
gametext: This personnel is attributes +1 for each of your completed space missions.

name: Greater Needs *VP
Name: Greater Needs *VP
gametext: Unless you have Anthropology, Diplomacy, Exobiology, and Integrity>30 or Leadership, Transporters, Treachery, and Strength>30, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma is placed on your ship at this mission. Damage - Your personnel cannot begin a mission attempt at this mission.

name: Indecent Proposal *VP
Name: Indecent Proposal *VP
gametext: Randomly select a personnel who costs 5 or more to be stopped. If you cannot, your opponent chooses a personnel to be stopped. If a personnel who costs 5 or more was stopped by this dilemma, return this dilemma to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: No Peace in Our Time *VP
Name: No Peace in Our Time *VP
gametext: Plays in your core. Each of your [Kli] Treachery personnel is Cunning +2. Order - Destroy this event to begin an engagement involving your [Kli] Treachery personnel. If you win, randomly kill an opponent's personnel involved.

name: Standing Your Ground *VP
Name: Standing Your Ground *VP
gametext: Plays in your core. When you are about to destroy an event to begin an engagement involving your ship with its Commander aboard, you may destroy this card instead to pay that cost.

name: Ja'chuq *VP
Name: Ja'chuq *VP
gametext: When you win combat or an engagement involving your [Kli] Leadership personnel, choose one of your missions. The player to your left places the top card of his or her dilemma pile face up beneath that mission (that dilemma is overcome). Remove this interrupt from the game.

name: Kavis Alpha Research Binary Star *VP
Name: Kavis Alpha Research Binary Star *VP
Affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.
Skills: Anthropology, Biology, Medical, and any attribute>32
gametext: When an opponent's personnel is stopped by your {Infestation}, he or she chooses another personnel facing that dilemma to be stopped.

name: Fifth Neonatal Drone *VP
Name: Fifth Neonatal Drone *VP
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may return a non-dilemma card on your Decay event to its owner's hand.

name: Jean-Luc Picard Argo Pilot *VP
Name: Jean-Luc Picard Argo Pilot *VP
Skills: Archaeology Diplomacy Honor Leadership Navigation Officer
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may discard a card from hand to download {Escape}.

name: Kerla Military Advisor *VP
Name: Kerla Military Advisor *VP
gametext: When you win an engagement involving this personnel, you may place him on the bottom of his owner's deck to choose one of your non-headquarters missions. The player on your left places the top card of his or her dilemma pile beneath that mission.

name: Assimilator Rogue Borg Vessel
Name: Assimilator Rogue Borg Vessel
gametext: When you play this ship, it is cost -1 for each Borg you command (limit 5). You may play {[NA] Borg} and {Treachery Androids} aboard this ship.

name: Aceton Assimilators
Name: Aceton Assimilators
gametext: Your opponent names a dilemma. Search your dilemma pile for a copy of that dilemma and place it beneath your opponent's non-headquarters mission, then choose a personnel to be stopped for each copy of that dilemma beneath your opponent's missions. Shuffle and replace your dilemma pile.

name: Dereliction of Duty
Name: Dereliction of Duty
gametext: Place this dilemma on this mission. Your personnel at this mission cannot use their abilities. At the end of this mission attempt, this dilemma is overcome.

name: Space Seed
Name: Space Seed
gametext: This dilemma is cost -1 for each Genetically Enhanced personnel this dilemma's owner commands. Unless you have 3 Security and Strength>40 or 2 Telepathy and Cunning>40, randomly select two personnel. If this dilemma's owner commands {To Rule in Hell}, he or she may place those personnel on {Ceti Alpha V} to take command of them (they become [NA]).

name: Agonizer
Name: Agonizer
gametext: When your [AU][Pa] personnel is about to be stopped by a dilemma, you may stop another [AU][Pa] personnel present to prevent that. You may do this only once each dilemma.

name: Breen CRM 114
Name: Breen CRM 114
gametext: While in combat, each of your Breen personnel present is Strength +3. When any number of your personnel present are about to be stopped by a dilemma, you may stop your Smuggler present and remove this equipment from the game to prevent that.

name: Keevan
Name: Keevan
gametext: This equipment is cost -1 if you command a Ferengi Engineer personnel. When any number of your personnel present are about to be killed, you may place this card in your opponent's hand to prevent that.

name: Mobile Emitter
Name: Mobile Emitter
gametext: While your Hologram present is facing a dilemma, you may discard a card from hand to make that personnel gain a skill from a personnel on your Holoprogram. This effect lasts until the end of the mission attempt. You may do this only once each turn.

name: TR-116 Rifle
Name: TR-116 Rifle
gametext: While in combat, each of your [Fed] Treachery personnel present is Strength +1. Order - If this equipment is present with your Assassin, name a skill. Choose an opponent's personnel present with that skill. Return this equipment to its owner's hand to kill that personnel.

name: Universal Translator
Name: Universal Translator
gametext: Each of your Officer personnel present gains Diplomacy.

name: Devastating Melee
Name: Devastating Melee
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Dom] personnel. Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin combat involving your personnel. If you win, randomly select a number of opposing personnel to be killed equal to the number of your Hand Weapons equipped by your personnel involved (limit 3).

name: New Power Rising
Name: New Power Rising
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [TN] personnel. Spend an additional counter this turn for each opponent's dilemma that has been removed from the game (limit 5). Remove this event from the game.

name: Repurposed Transmission
Name: Repurposed Transmission
gametext: This event is cost -1 for each Dissident you command. Plays in your core. When an opponent plays an interrupt, if that opponent has a copy of that interrupt in his or her discard pile, you may destroy this event to prevent that interrupt and place it in its owner's discard pile.

name: Hyralan Sector Raid Flagship
Name: Hyralan Sector Raid Flagship
Affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.
Skills: Archaeology, Security, Treachery, Strength>32, and 3 Thief personnel
gametext: Order - If this mission is complete, place an Artifact equipment from your discard pile aboard your [NA] ship at this mission. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Torman V Conduct "Legitimate" Commerce
Name: Torman V Conduct "Legitimate" Commerce
gametext: When you complete this mission, you may place up to three of your non-Hand Weapon equipment on this planet in their owners' discard piles. Score 5 points for each.

name: Vandros IV Restore Iconian Gateway
Name: Vandros IV Restore Iconian Gateway
Skills: Officer, Security, Strength>35, a Hand Weapon, and (Archaeology or Leadership)
gametext: Order - If this mission is complete, place any number of your Jem'Hadar and/or Hand Weapons from this planet on any player's ship or planet mission.

name: Miles O'Brien Ill-Equipped Storyteller
Name: Miles O'Brien Ill-Equipped Storyteller
gametext: While this personnel is equipped with an Orb, he is Integrity +2 and gains Anthropology.

name: One Peerless
Name: One Peerless
Skills: Astrometrics 2 Engineer Exobiology 2 Honor Navigation Physics 2 Programming Security Transporters
gametext: While you command a [Bor] non-Dissident personnel, this personnel loses all of his skills.

name: Ekoor
Name: Ekoor
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may download {Arrest Order}.

name: Chu'lak Calculating Killer
Name: Chu'lak Calculating Killer
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may download a Hand Weapon. While this personnel is equipped with a Hand Weapon, he gains 2 Treachery.

name: Ro Laren Proven Expert
Name: Ro Laren Proven Expert
gametext: Order - Name a card. This personnel is attributes +1 for each copy of that card in an opponent's discard pile. This effect lasts until this order is executed again.

name: Jean-Luc Picard "Hero of Maxia"
Name: Jean-Luc Picard "Hero of Maxia"
gametext: While this personnel is aboard your ship at an opponent's mission, add the number of cards beneath your {Ferenginar} to each of that mission's attribute requirements.

name: Nog Drill Instructor
Name: Nog Drill Instructor
gametext: Order - Discard an equipment from beneath your {Ferenginar} to place a captive you command at your headquarters mission. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Fek'lhr Diabolical Warden
Name: Fek'lhr Diabolical Warden
gametext: To play this personnel, you must remove three Klingon personnel in your discard pile from the game.

name: Molly O'Brien Time's Orphan
Name: Molly O'Brien Time's Orphan
gametext: When your opponent plays an interrupt without paying a cost, you may remove this personnel from the game to prevent that interrupt and place it in its owner's discard pile.

name: Seven of Nine Immersed in Chaos
Name: Seven of Nine Immersed in Chaos
Keywords: Admiral. Assassin. Cadet. Dabo Girl. Dissident. Gatherer. General. High Council Member. Infiltrator. Senator. Smuggler. Thief. Waiter.

name: U.S.S. Stargazer Dangerous Gift
Name: U.S.S. Stargazer Dangerous Gift
gametext: When the opponent on your right begins a mission attempt at this mission, name a personnel. Each opponent's personnel with that card title is stopped.

name: Frame of Mind
Name: Frame of Mind
gametext: Unless you have 3 Security or 2 Telepathy or {William T. Riker}, randomly select all but one of your personnel. Place them on the bottom of your deck, then reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal the same number of personnel cards. You now command those personnel, they join the mission attempt (discard any duplicate unique personnel). Place the other revealed cards on the bottom of your deck.

name: Hazardous Materials
Name: Hazardous Materials
gametext: For each {Trellium-D} the opponent on your left commands, randomly select a personnel to be killed. Unless you have Engineer, Medical, and Security or Anthropology, Navigation, and Officer, place this dilemma on your ship. Damage - When your opponent plays an equipment that costs 1 or more, randomly select a personnel aboard this ship to be killed.

name: Macrovirus
Name: Macrovirus
gametext: Randomly select a personnel to be stopped. Unless you have 2 Exobiology and 2 Science or Medical, Security, and a Hand Weapon, that personnel is killed and this dilemma is placed on your ship at this mission. Damage - When your opponent plays an interrupt on his or her turn, randomly select a personnel aboard this ship to be killed.

name: Subspace Fracture
Name: Subspace Fracture
gametext: Randomly select a personnel to be stopped. Unless you have 2 Geology and 2 Transporters or Honor, Officer, and a non-Hand Weapon equipment, that personnel is killed and this dilemma is placed on your ship at this mission. Damage - When your opponent plays an event that costs 2 or more, randomly select a personnel aboard this ship to be killed.

name: Empok Nor Deadly Salvage
Name: Empok Nor Deadly Salvage
Affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
gametext: When your personnel are about to face a dilemma here, randomly select one of those personnel to be killed.

name: Data Masquerading Monarch
Name: Data Masquerading Monarch
gametext: This personnel is Cunning +1 and Strength +1 for each different non-unique personnel present (limit +4).

name: Jadzia Dax Conversant Veteran
Name: Jadzia Dax Conversant Veteran
gametext: When this personnel is about to be captured or killed, you may stop her to prevent that.

name: James T. Kirk Organizing Crime
Name: James T. Kirk Organizing Crime
gametext: You may play this personnel at cost +1 to have him gain [Cmd] and Commander: {U.S.S. Enterprise} until the end of this turn. When an opponent scores any number of points, draw a card for every 5 points scored.

name: Charles Tucker III Horse Trader
Name: Charles Tucker III Horse Trader
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may download a non-Artifact equipment. Order - Place your equipment present on the bottom of its owner's deck to draw two cards. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Fortune *VP
Name: Fortune *VP
gametext: When you play this ship, you may download a [NA] Archaeology personnel.

name: Arctus Baran Mercenary Captain *VP
Name: Arctus Baran Mercenary Captain *VP
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may discard a card from hand to download {Shady Resources}.

name: Excalbian Drama *VP
Name: Excalbian Drama *VP
gametext: When your opponent reveals this dilemma, he or she may discard any number of cards from hand. For each card discarded this way, add 5 Integrity to this dilemma's requirements. Unless you have Integrity>30, all your personnel are stopped.

name: Inferiority *VP
Name: Inferiority *VP
gametext: Place this dilemma in your core. When your personnel begin a mission attempt, your opponent may remove this dilemma from the game to draw three extra dilemmas and spend three extra in total cost on dilemmas.

name: Temporal Misalignment *VP
Name: Temporal Misalignment *VP
gametext: Randomly select X personnel to be stopped.

name: Rule of Acquisition #6 *VP
Name: Rule of Acquisition #6 *VP
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Fer] personnel. Plays in your core. You cannot spend counters to draw cards. (You do not need to spend all your counters during each of your turns.) Order - Stop one of your [Fer] personnel to draw a card.

name: Explicit Orders *VP
Name: Explicit Orders *VP
gametext: When your [Dom] personnel is attempting a mission, discard a [Dom] personnel of a different species from hand to make him or her gain the discarded personnel's skills until the end of that mission attempt.

name: Archaic Snare
Name: Archaic Snare
gametext: Unless you have Archaeology, 2 Security, and Cunning>32 or 3 Engineer, Navigation, and Physics, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma is placed on this mission. When a ship is about to move from this mission, randomly select a personnel aboard to be killed.

name: Sphere 41 Eliminate Sphere Network *VP
Name: Sphere 41 Eliminate Sphere Network *VP
Affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.
Skills: Astrometrics, Leadership, Navigation, Security, and Cunning>40 or Engineer, 2 Leadership, and Strength>46

name: Santos Squad Leader *VP
Name: Santos Squad Leader *VP
gametext: While this personnel is attempting a mission, you may destroy your event to add that event's cost to this personnel's attributes until the end of that mission attempt.

name: B-4 Dangerous Simpleton *VP
Name: B-4 Dangerous Simpleton *VP
gametext: While this personnel is attempting a mission, you may reveal three Androids from hand to make him Cunning +7 and gain Intelligence and Treachery. These effects last until the end of the mission attempt. You may only do this once each turn.

name: U.S.S. Enterprise Where She Belongs *VP
Name: U.S.S. Enterprise Where She Belongs *VP
gametext: You may play this ship at cost -4 to ignore its next ability. When you play this ship, you may download a [TOS] personnel who has a cost of 4 or more and play him or her at cost -4 aboard this ship.

name: Divergent Goals
Name: Divergent Goals
gametext: Randomly select three personnel. Unless those personnel have Anthropology, Geology, and Integrity>17 or your unselected personnel have Biology, Officer, and 2 Transporters, all your personnel are stopped.

name: Environmental Contaminants
Name: Environmental Contaminants
gametext: While you have a higher score than each of your opponents, this dilemma is cost -3. Unless you have Biology, 2 Diplomacy, and 2 Science or 2 Engineer, 2 Exobiology, and Cunning>38, randomly select two personnel to be killed.

name: Interstellar Exigence
Name: Interstellar Exigence
gametext: Choose a Law personnel to be stopped, then randomly select an additional personnel to be stopped for each headquarters mission the opponent on your left commands.

name: Isolated Detachment
Name: Isolated Detachment
gametext: Randomly select three personnel. Unless those personnel have Diplomacy, Programming, and Cunning>17 or your unselected personnel have Engineer, Physics, and 2 Security, all your personnel are stopped.

name: Casualties of the Occupation
Name: Casualties of the Occupation
gametext: To play this event, you must command [HQ] {Bajor} and [HQ] {Cardassia Prime}. Plays in your core. Order - Remove a [Baj] card in your discard pile from the game to make each of your [Car] personnel attributes +1 until the end of your turn (limit +3).

name: Covert Collusion
Name: Covert Collusion
gametext: To play this event, you must command two [Car] personnel and two [Rom] personnel. Plays in your core. At the start of your turn, discard the top two cards of your deck. If you discarded a [Car] Intelligence personnel or a [Rom] Intelligence personnel in this way, the first personnel you play this turn is cost -2. Order - Destroy this event to download {D'deridex Advanced} or {Keldon Advanced}.

name: Death's Shadow
Name: Death's Shadow
gametext: Plays in your core. When your [Car] personnel is killed by a dilemma or in combat, you may place him or her on this event. (You no longer command him or her.) When an opponent plays an event, you may place a personnel from this event in his or her owner's discard pile to prevent that event and place it in its owner's discard pile.

name: Soft Sell
Name: Soft Sell
gametext: Plays on an opponent's incomplete non-headquarters mission. While this mission is complete, each of your Smuggler personnel and Thief personnel are Cunning +1 and Strength +1.

name: The Stars Are Made of Latinum
Name: The Stars Are Made of Latinum
gametext: To play this event, you must command {Ferenginar} and {Founders' Homeworld}. Plays on your headquarters mission (limit one per mission). When your ship here moves to a mission in a different quadrant, you may download a Commodity. While your opponent commands a Commodity, your ships are Range +2.

name: Deneb Approach Exploratory Quandary
Name: Deneb Approach Exploratory Quandary
Affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.
Skills: Archaeology, Diplomacy, Honor, Law, and (Cunning>32 or Strength>32)
gametext: Your maximum deck size is 40 cards.

name: Q's Planet Enticing Diversion
Name: Q's Planet Enticing Diversion
Affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.
Skills: Anthropology, Leadership, Officer, Science, and (Cunning>34 or Strength>34)
gametext: When you begin a mission attempt here with six or more personnel, if you have completed {Deneb Approach}, you may take a personnel from your discard pile into your hand.

name: Sector 39-J Investigate Annihilation
Name: Sector 39-J Investigate Annihilation
Affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.
Skills: Astrometrics, Navigation, Physics, Science, and Cunning>34
gametext: This mission is span -1 for each completed mission an opponent commands (limit -2).

name: Purification Drone
Name: Purification Drone
gametext: At the start of your first turn, if you command {Unicomplex}, you may discard this card from hand to draw a card for each of your missions worth 50 or more points.

name: Surjak
Name: Surjak
gametext: To play this personnel, kill one of your Bajoran personnel.

name: Ishka Opportunistic Hostage
Name: Ishka Opportunistic Hostage
gametext: While this personnel is on a planet or aboard a ship, if you command {Ferenginar}, you may play [Fer] personnel on that planet or ship.

name: Keevan Pragmatic Captor
Name: Keevan Pragmatic Captor
gametext: Cards you own cannot make this personnel leave an opponent's brig. Order - If you have no captives and command six [TN] personnel, place this personnel in your opponent's brig to name a personnel. That opponent places each copy of that personnel he or she commands in your brig.

name: Remata'Klan Steadfast Sentinel
Name: Remata'Klan Steadfast Sentinel
gametext: When an opponent plays an event or interrupt, you may place your captive he or she owns on his or her ship or headquarters mission to prevent that event or interrupt and place it in its owner's discard pile.

name: Gant
Name: Gant
gametext: When an opponent plays an interrupt, if you do not command a completed mission, you may place this personnel beneath your {Ferenginar} to prevent that interrupt and shuffle it into its owner's deck.

name: Levin
Name: Levin
gametext: At the start of your first turn, if you command {Ferenginar}, you may discard this card from hand to download a non-Artifact Commodity event.

name: Ortakin
Name: Ortakin
gametext: At the start of your first turn, if you command {Qo'noS}, you may discard this card from hand to draw a card for each non-headquarters mission you command that requires Treachery.

name: Olamu
Name: Olamu
gametext: While you command three [Baj] personnel, this personnel is attributes +1, gains Diplomacy, and becomes [Baj].

name: Qatai Determined Hunter
Name: Qatai Determined Hunter
Skills: Exobiology Leadership Navigation Physics Security Transporters
gametext: While an opponent commands a completed mission, this personnel cannot be killed by dilemmas. While an opponent commands two completed missions, this personnel cannot be stopped by dilemmas.

name: Rodriguez
Name: Rodriguez
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you command {Khan Noonien Singh}, he is cost -2.

name: Sfreett Deadly Flower
Name: Sfreett Deadly Flower
gametext: While this personnel is present with a [Fed] personnel, a [Kli] personnel, and a [Rom] personnel, she gains Diplomacy, Security, and Treachery and cannot be stopped by dilemmas.

name: Zon Fated Challenger
Name: Zon Fated Challenger
gametext: This personnel is Strength +2 for each completed mission your opponents command (limit +6).

name: U.S.S. Oberth
Name: U.S.S. Oberth
gametext: You may play this ship at your {Earth}. At the start of your first turn, if you command Earth, you may reveal this card from hand to make each player draw a card.

name: Shining So Bright
Name: Shining So Bright
gametext: Plays in your core. When you play a [Cmd] Leadership personnel, you may examine the top card of your deck, then place it on the top or bottom of your deck.

name: The Enemy of My Enemy
Name: The Enemy of My Enemy
gametext: When your [Car] personnel is facing a dilemma, discard the top three cards of your deck to make that personnel gain all skills, attributes, and keywords on a [Car] personnel in your discard pile until the end of the dilemma.

name: Odo Vigilant Staffer
Name: Odo Vigilant Staffer
gametext: You may play this personnel aboard your [TOS] ship. When your [Pa] personnel present is about to be killed by a dilemma, you may return this personnel to his owner's hand to prevent that.

name: Damar Martyred Outlaw
Name: Damar Martyred Outlaw
gametext: When you play this personnel, discard a card from hand. When this personnel is killed by a dilemma or in combat, you may place up to three [Car] Dissidents from your hand at your headquarters mission where they could be played.

name: Dukat Erstwhile Ally
Name: Dukat Erstwhile Ally
gametext: Order - Discard a card from hand to begin an engagement involving your [Dom] personnel or your [DS9] personnel. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Elim Garak Imposing Patriot
Name: Elim Garak Imposing Patriot
gametext: When you play this personnel, discard a card from hand. When you play this personnel, you may download {For Cardassia!} or a Hand Weapon equipment.

name: Martok Founder False Flag Officer
Name: Martok Founder False Flag Officer
Keywords: Commander: I.K.S. Negh'Var. Founder. General. Infiltrator. Shape-shifter.
gametext: You may play this personnel at your {Qo'noS}. While this personnel is attempting a mission, you may meet Integrity requirements with Strength instead.

name: Benjamin Sisko Resourceful Captain
Name: Benjamin Sisko Resourceful Captain
gametext: While this personnel is at a [Dom] mission, he is attributes +1. Order - This personnel gains a skill required by your [Dom] mission. This effect lasts until this order is executed again.

name: Cal Hudson Nostalgic Rebel
Name: Cal Hudson Nostalgic Rebel
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may discard a card from hand to make him lose a skill until the end of that dilemma. You may do this only once each dilemma.

name: Jean-Luc Picard Compassionate Advocate
Name: Jean-Luc Picard Compassionate Advocate
Skills: Anthropology Archaeology 2 Diplomacy Honor Law Officer
gametext: To play this personnel, you must command three [Baj] personnel.

name: Quark Practical Apologist
Name: Quark Practical Apologist
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may download a Jem'Hadar personnel and place it beneath your {Ferenginar}. While attempting a mission, your [TN] personnel present may use Strength to meet Cunning requirements.

name: Arne Darvin "Hero of the Empire"
Name: Arne Darvin "Hero of the Empire"
gametext: When your {Infestation} stops a personnel, you may stop this personnel to kill that stopped personnel.

name: Enabran Tain Prideful Director
Name: Enabran Tain Prideful Director
gametext: When your opponent is about to fail a mission attempt at this mission, randomly select a personnel involved to be placed in your brig.

name: Naprem Renegade Vessel
Name: Naprem Renegade Vessel
gametext: When you win an engagement involving your [Dom] personnel or your [DS9] personnel, choose one: remove the top two cards of the loser's dilemma pile from the game; or randomly kill an opponent's Leadership personnel involved. You may do this only once per turn.

name: Niala Intelligence Asset
Name: Niala Intelligence Asset
gametext: To play this ship, you must command three [Car] Dissident personnel. When you play this ship, discard two cards from hand. While you have a [Car] Dissident aboard, this ship is attributes +1.

name: I.K.S. Negh'Var Infiltrated Flagship
Name: I.K.S. Negh'Var Infiltrated Flagship
gametext: You may play this ship at {Qo'noS} (it becomes [Kli]). To staff this ship, you must have a {Chancellor}, {Founder}, or {General} aboard. While attempting a mission, your Chancellors, Founders, and Generals at this mission are each attributes +1.

name: Salvaged Attack Ship Sheep in Wolf's Clothing
Name: Salvaged Attack Ship Sheep in Wolf's Clothing
gametext: While this ship is at a [Dom] mission, this ship and each of your [DS9] personnel at this mission are attributes +1.

name: U.S.S. Enterprise-D Humanitarian Envoy
Name: U.S.S. Enterprise-D Humanitarian Envoy
gametext: When you play this ship, if you command three [Baj] personnel, each player may place a personnel from hand on a headquarters mission where he or she could be played. (Yours must be a [Fed][DS9] personnel.)

name: Serrola Tip of the Spear
Name: Serrola Tip of the Spear
gametext: While your [Rom] Intelligence personnel is aboard this ship, this ship is attributes +2. When your dilemma stops an opponent's personnel here, if no personnel have been stopped by a dilemma during that attempt, that opponent discards two cards from hand.

name: Navaar Experienced Gift *VP
Name: Navaar Experienced Gift *VP
gametext: When a Thief present is facing a dilemma, you may destroy your event to have that Thief gain a skill of your choice until the end of that mission attempt.

name: Black Operation
Name: Black Operation
gametext: To play this event, you must command six Cadet personnel. Plays in your core. When an event or interrupt is played, you may place a Paranoia card from hand on this event to prevent that event or interrupt and place it in its owner's discard pile.

name: Intoxicating Spirits
Name: Intoxicating Spirits
gametext: When an interrupt is played, if you command a Waiter personnel, you may give command of this event to an opponent to prevent that interrupt and place it in its owner's discard pile. While you command but do not own this event, each player's Waiter personnel is attributes +1.

name: Bait and Switch
Name: Bait and Switch
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must command three Crime events. When an opponent plays an event in his or her core, prevent that event and place it in your core. (You now command that event.)

name: Moment of Triumph
Name: Moment of Triumph
gametext: When an event is played, if the number of Genetically Enhanced personnel you command is greater than the cost of that event, prevent that event and place it in its owner's discard pile. Order - Stop your Genetically Enhanced personnel to destroy an event with a cost less than that personnel's.

name: Paradise Lost
Name: Paradise Lost
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must command two Paranoia events. When an event or interrupt is played, randomly destroy one of your Paranoia events to prevent that event or interrupt and place it in its owner's discard pile. Then, if you command three or more Admiral personnel, shuffle this card into your deck.

name: Recessive Mutation
Name: Recessive Mutation
gametext: When an event or interrupt is played, place two of your non-unique [Bor] Dissident personnel on the bottom of their owner's deck to prevent that event or interrupt and place it in its owner's discard pile. Order - Stop your [Bor] Dissident personnel to destroy an opponent's event with a cost less than that personnel's.

name: Reprimand
Name: Reprimand
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must command two missions worth 50 or more points each. When an event or interrupt is played, prevent that event or interrupt and place it in its owner's discard pile.

name: Chell Incessant Chatterbox
Name: Chell Incessant Chatterbox
gametext: When your opponent plays an interrupt, you may place this personnel from hand aboard your [Fed][Voy] ship and lose 5 points to prevent that interrupt and place it in its owner's discard pile.

name: The Devil Fearsome Illusion
Name: The Devil Fearsome Illusion
gametext: When an interrupt is played, you may place this personnel on your Holoprogram to prevent that interrupt and place it in its owner's discard pile. (You no longer command this personnel.)

name: Lapideas System Geological Survey *VP
Name: Lapideas System Geological Survey *VP
gametext: When you complete this mission, if your personnel completing it have 2 Acquisition or 2 Geology, score 5 points.

name: Arresting Display
Name: Arresting Display
gametext: Unless you have Anthropology, Security, and Telepathy or 2 Exobiology, Medical, and Cunning>38, all your personnel are stopped. If you played an interrupt while facing this dilemma, place this dilemma in your core. To play an interrupt, you must discard an interrupt from hand.

name: Compromised Experiment
Name: Compromised Experiment
gametext: The opponent on your left chooses an event you command. Randomly select a number of personnel to be stopped equal to that event's Decay number.

name: Elemental Instability
Name: Elemental Instability
gametext: The opponent on your left chooses a personnel to be killed for each {Trellium-D} you command. Unless you have 2 Engineer and 2 Science or 2 Acquisition and 2 Biology, choose two [Cmd] personnel to be stopped.

name: Overindulgence
Name: Overindulgence
gametext: The opponent on your left names a skill. If you have five or more of that skill, all your personnel are stopped.

name: Threading the Needle
Name: Threading the Needle
gametext: Unless you have 2 Navigation, 2 Officer, and Transporters or 2 Engineer, 2 Programming, and Strength>38, all your personnel are stopped. Otherwise, place this dilemma on this mission. Ships cannot move from this mission. At the end of this turn, this dilemma is overcome.

name: Xenophobic Outburst
Name: Xenophobic Outburst
gametext: Randomly select three personnel. If each personnel is a different affiliation, they are killed. Otherwise, choose one of those personnel to be stopped.

name: The Shroud of the Sword
Name: The Shroud of the Sword
gametext: Each of your Klingon personnel present are Cunning +1. Order - Destroy this equipment to download {The Sword of Kahless}.

name: A History of Collusion
Name: A History of Collusion
gametext: Plays in your core. When you play a [Kli] Smuggler personnel, choose an event in an opponent's core. That opponent may destroy that event. If he or she does not, the next [Kli] card you play this turn is cost -2.

name: Lethal Wound
Name: Lethal Wound
