gametext: Plays in your core. When a personnel is about to be stopped by a dilemma, if that stop is prevented, kill that personnel.

name: Psychotic Impulse
Name: Psychotic Impulse
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [AU][Baj] personnel. Kill any number of captives in your brig and/or your Human personnel. If the total cost of personnel killed in this way was 7 or more, score 5 points. Remove this event from the game.

name: Racial Disdain
Name: Racial Disdain
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [AU][Kli] personnel. Plays in your core. When your [AU][Kli] personnel is about to be stopped by a dilemma, you may remove an [AU] Human personnel in your discard pile (or a captive in your brig) from the game to prevent that.

name: Shocking Revelation
Name: Shocking Revelation
gametext: Plays on an opponent's incomplete non-headquarters mission. When your opponent completes this mission, if you command an Infiltrator, choose a personnel involved, place them on your headquarters mission, and name an affiliation. They become the named affiliation. (You now command that personnel.)

name: Axiana Secure Colony
Name: Axiana Secure Colony
Skills: Navigation, Science, 2 Security, and Strength>33 or 2 Diplomacy, 2 Honor, and Integrity>33

name: Bajor Terok Nor
Name: Bajor Terok Nor
Skills: You may play [AU][Baj] cards, [AU][Car] cards, [AU][Fer] cards, [AU][Kli] cards, [AU][Non] cards, and equipment at this mission.
gametext: You cannot command another headquarters mission. Each non-unique [Car] personnel and non-unique [Kli] personnel you own gains [AU].

name: Boreth Place of Questions
Name: Boreth Place of Questions
gametext: At the start of your first turn, if you command {Qo'noS}, you may download {Kahless}.

name: Denorios Belt Silence Prophets
Name: Denorios Belt Silence Prophets
Skills: Archaeology, Officer, Transporters, 2 Treachery, and Cunning>35
gametext: When you complete this mission, destroy all events.

name: Nimbus III Hostage Crisis
Name: Nimbus III Hostage Crisis
Affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
Skills: Diplomacy, Medical, Navigation, Security, and (Cunning>36 or Strength>36)
gametext: At the start of each player's turn, if this mission is complete, that player chooses one of their missions and places the top card of their opponent's dilemma pile beneath that mission.

name: Ezri Tigan Cynical Mercenary
Name: Ezri Tigan Cynical Mercenary
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may shuffle any number of [AU][NA] personnel from your discard pile into your deck.

name: Romara Cal Personal Physician
Name: Romara Cal Personal Physician
gametext: When an opponent completes a mission, you may take a card in your discard pile into your hand.

name: Julian Bashir Visiting Colleague
Name: Julian Bashir Visiting Colleague
gametext: While this personnel is present with an Android, he gains Engineer and Programming.

name: Broik
Name: Broik
gametext: When an opponent completes a mission, you may place the top card of your deck beneath your {Ferenginar} and/or give command of your Commodity to that opponent.

name: Ba'el Reconciling Differences
Name: Ba'el Reconciling Differences
gametext: When you play this personnel, reveal the top four cards of your deck. You may take each personnel without a staffing icon revealed this way into your hand. Discard the remaining cards.

name: Duras the Elder Son of Toral
Name: Duras the Elder Son of Toral
gametext: When your Treachery Klingon present is about to be stopped or killed by a dilemma, you may discard a card from hand to make this personnel gain one of his or her attributes until the end of that mission attempt. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Gorvil
Name: Gorvil
gametext: When you play this personnel, each player removes all events and interrupts in his or her discard pile from the game.

name: K'rad
Name: K'rad
gametext: When you play an interrupt, if this personnel is attempting a mission, draw a card.

name: Klaa Dauntless Hunter
Name: Klaa Dauntless Hunter
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you command a Maneuver event, score 5 points.

name: Kortar Slayer of Gods
Name: Kortar Slayer of Gods
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may play up to two Klingon personnel from your discard pile as if they were in your hand.

name: Valkris Loyalty Unshaken
Name: Valkris Loyalty Unshaken
gametext: When an opponent downloads a card, that opponent must choose one: place it on the top of his or her deck instead of in their hand; or you may draw two cards.

name: Vekma Impartial Appraiser
Name: Vekma Impartial Appraiser
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may download a Human personnel.

name: 0413-Theta
Name: 0413-Theta
gametext: At the start of your turn, you may kill this personnel to spend two additional counters that turn.

name: Errol
Name: Errol
gametext: While this personnel is in your discard pile, you may play him from your discard pile at cost +1.

name: Jennifer Sisko Sympathetic Professor
Name: Jennifer Sisko Sympathetic Professor
Skills: Astrometrics Engineer Physics Science Transporters Treachery
gametext: When personnel that the player on your right commands begin a mission attempt, you may take a Persistent dilemma from beneath a different mission that opponent commands and place it aside. After you have chosen dilemmas for your dilemma stack, place that dilemma on top of your dilemma stack.

name: Alliance Galor
Name: Alliance Galor
gametext: When you play this ship, discard the top three cards of your deck. This ship is cost -1 for each Human personnel discarded in this way.

name: Alliance Vor'cha
Name: Alliance Vor'cha
gametext: This ship is attributes +1 for each different affiliation among your [AU] personnel aboard (limit +3).

name: Klaa Dauntless Hunter *VP
Name: Klaa Dauntless Hunter *VP
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you command a Maneuver event, score 5 points.

name: Full Security Alert *VP
Name: Full Security Alert *VP
gametext: Randomly select a Security personnel to be stopped. If that personnel costs 2 or less, randomly select two other Security personnel to be stopped.

name: Unorthodox Recruitment *VP
Name: Unorthodox Recruitment *VP
gametext: Unless you have Intelligence, randomly select a personnel who has Cunning>6 to be placed in his or her owner's discard pile. If you cannot, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Hugora Nebula Border Crossing *VP
Name: Hugora Nebula Border Crossing *VP
Skills: Astrometrics, Navigation, Security, Treachery, and Cunning>34
gametext: This mission is worth 5 more points (limit 20) for each event on it.

name: Two of Nine Transtator Drone *VP
Name: Two of Nine Transtator Drone *VP
gametext: Order - Place this personnel on the bottom of his owner's deck to choose one: destroy an event; download a card that has a cost of 5 or more; or draw three cards.

name: Odo The Great Link's Savior *VP
Name: Odo The Great Link's Savior *VP
Skills: Anthropology Exobiology Honor Law Leadership Programming 2 Security
gametext: When this personnel is about to be killed or stopped by a dilemma, you may have each opponent score 5 points to prevent that.

name: Jadzia Dax Science Officer *VP
Name: Jadzia Dax Science Officer *VP
Skills: Anthropology Archaeology Astrometrics Exobiology 2 Navigation Science
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, she gains Geology and Physics.

name: Matthew Dougherty Misguided Admiral *VP
Name: Matthew Dougherty Misguided Admiral *VP
gametext: Order - Destroy your staffed [E] ship or your staffed [TNG] ship with two or more staffing icons to make all your personnel attributes +3 until the end of this turn. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Revised Paris Female Ensign Chaser *VP
Name: Revised Paris Female Ensign Chaser *VP
gametext: Order - Discard a card titled {Tom Paris} or Revised Paris from hand to make each of your [Fut][Voy] Holograms gain [Cmd] until the end of this turn. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Data Loyal Brother *VP
Name: Data Loyal Brother *VP
gametext: At the start of each of your turns, you must discard an event from hand or stop this personnel.

name: Queen's Borg Cube *VP
Name: Queen's Borg Cube *VP
gametext: You may use a card which begins an engagement to begin one involving this ship even if it is at a headquarters mission.

name: Borg Queen Perfectionist *VP
Name: Borg Queen Perfectionist *VP
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, each personnel you command but do not own cannot be stopped.

name: A Bad Case of par'Mach
Name: A Bad Case of par'Mach
gametext: Choose two personnel to be stopped. If a Klingon personnel or {Jadzia Dax} or {Quark} was stopped by this dilemma, you may draw two cards.

name: Hostile Takeover
Name: Hostile Takeover
gametext: Unless you have a lower score than each of your opponents or choose to lose 5 points, place this dilemma on this mission. When you complete this mission, stop each personnel that used a skill to complete that mission.

name: Nothing to Lose
Name: Nothing to Lose
gametext: Unless you have an Acquisition personnel who has Integrity<4 or choose a Hologram personnel to be placed in your discard pile, all your personnel are stopped.

name: Survival of the Fittest
Name: Survival of the Fittest
gametext: Plays on your {Ceti Alpha V}. Cards an opponent owns cannot remove [NA] cards in your discard pile from the game. While a [NA] card is in your discard pile, your [NA] Genetically Enhanced personnel at this mission cannot be captured or killed by non-dilemma cards.

name: Transcendent Farewell
Name: Transcendent Farewell
gametext: Plays in your core. When you complete a space mission, you may remove a Telepathy personnel aboard your ship at that mission from the game to place that ship at a different mission. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Strictly Business
Name: Strictly Business
gametext: When an opponent begins a mission attempt, randomly select a personnel to be stopped for each of your Orion personnel, Risan personnel, and Dabo Girl personnel at that mission.

name: Christine Chapel Clandestine Vessel
Name: Christine Chapel Clandestine Vessel
gametext: You may play this personnel at cost +2 to make her gain all skills on a [TOS] personnel at this mission until the end of this turn.

name: Jean-Luc Picard Reluctant Swashbuckler
Name: Jean-Luc Picard Reluctant Swashbuckler
gametext: When you play this personnel, each player may download {Vash}. When this personnel is about to be stopped by a dilemma, if Vash is present, score 5 points. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Vash Duplicitous Damsel
Name: Vash Duplicitous Damsel
gametext: When you play this personnel, each player may download {Jean-Luc Picard}. When this personnel is about to be captured or killed, if Jean-Luc Picard is present, you may lose 5 points to prevent that.

name: U.S.S. Enterprise-D Diplomatic Envoy (BP)
Name: U.S.S. Enterprise-D Diplomatic Envoy (BP)
gametext: When you complete this mission, if this ship is staffed, score 5 points. When you complete this mission, if this ship's Commander is aboard, each player scores 5 points.

name: Star-crossed
Name: Star-crossed
gametext: Choose a personnel who has Engineer or a non-Human personnel to be stopped. If the opponent on your left commands three [SF] Dissident personnel, place this dilemma in your core. While you do not command a staffed ship at a Region: Sector 001 mission, subtract one from each Consume on each dilemma the opponent on your left owns.

name: Unsavory Customers
Name: Unsavory Customers
gametext: Choose a Biology personnel to be stopped. If the opponent on your left commands {Earth} and [HQ] {Luna} (or {Mars}), place this dilemma in your core. While you do not command a non-Human personnel on Earth, you have 1 fewer counter to spend during each of your Play and Draw Cards segments.

name: Zefram Cochrane's Shotgun
Name: Zefram Cochrane's Shotgun
gametext: When combat begins involving your [AU] personnel present, if each of your personnel involved is Human, randomly select two opponent's personnel involved to be killed.

name: Humanity's Worst Enemy
Name: Humanity's Worst Enemy
gametext: Plays in your core. While no opponent commands a ship at a Region: Sector 001 mission, each of your [SF] Dissident personnel is Cunning +1 and Strength +1. At the start of your turn, place the top card of your deck on this event.

name: Terra Prime Forever
Name: Terra Prime Forever
gametext: Plays on your {Mars}. While your [SF] Dissident personnel is facing a dilemma, if there are no non-Human personnel at a Region: Sector 001 mission, he or she is excluded from random selections.

name: Homicidal Expedient
Name: Homicidal Expedient
gametext: When an opponent plays an event or interrupt, kill your Dissident personnel at {Luna} to prevent that event or interrupt and place it in its owner's discard pile.

name: Earth Reject the Impure
Name: Earth Reject the Impure
gametext: Order - If this mission is complete, stop your [SF] Dissident personnel here to choose an opponent's non-Human at a Region: Sector 001 mission. Place that personnel in your brig. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Kuiper Belt Expand Power
Name: Kuiper Belt Expand Power
Skills: Engineer, Geology, Navigation, Physics, and Cunning>36
gametext: When you complete this mission, if you command three [SF] Dissident personnel, score 5 points.

name: Luna Orpheus Mining Facility
Name: Luna Orpheus Mining Facility
Skills: You may play [SF] ships, [SF] Dissident personnel, [Non] Human personnel, and equipment at this mission.
gametext: You cannot command another headquarters mission. Order - If you command a completed mission, flip this mission. - At the start of your turn, you may download two Damage cards and place them on an opponent's ship at a Region: Sector 001 mission.

name: Edward Jellico Brusque Martinet
Name: Edward Jellico Brusque Martinet
gametext: Order - Stop your personnel present with a skill required by this mission to make each player reveal the top three cards of their deck. Discard all interrupts revealed this way. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Miral Paris Daughter of B'Elanna
Name: Miral Paris Daughter of B'Elanna
gametext: When this personnel enters play, you may take a non-Artifact equipment that costs 2 or less from your discard pile and place it present with this personnel.

name: Vorik Unflappable
Name: Vorik Unflappable
gametext: While this personnel is attempting a mission, you may destroy your Decay event to make him attributes +1 for each card that was on that event until the end of the mission attempt (limit +4).

name: Sirella Forbidding Matriarch
Name: Sirella Forbidding Matriarch
gametext: When your Host or Honor Klingon personnel present is stopped by a dilemma, you may make this personnel attributes +1 (limit +3) until the end of this turn.

name: Cyrano Jones Troublesome Peddler
Name: Cyrano Jones Troublesome Peddler
gametext: When a Commodity or Crime event you own is destroyed by a card an opponent owns, you may stop this personnel to take that event into your hand instead.

name: Leonardo da Vinci Renaissance Man
Name: Leonardo da Vinci Renaissance Man
gametext: When you play this personnel aboard your ship, you may choose one: remove a Damage card from that ship; or download a non-Hand Weapon equipment.

name: Lily Sloane Voice of Reason
Name: Lily Sloane Voice of Reason
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may place a Damage card from hand on your ship at this mission to make a personnel present attributes +4 (limit +12) until the end of that dilemma.

name: V'Las Treacherous Administrator
Name: V'Las Treacherous Administrator
Skills: Diplomacy Intelligence Law Leadership Security 2 Treachery
gametext: While present with two [Rom] personnel or two Vulcans, this personnel cannot be stopped or killed by dilemmas that cost 3 or less.

name: Daniel Greaves Strongman
Name: Daniel Greaves Strongman
gametext: Order - If this personnel is present with six [SF] Dissident personnel, return him to his owner's hand to destroy an opponent's event.

name: Emanuel Stevens
Name: Emanuel Stevens
gametext: While this personnel is present with a stopped [SF] Dissident personnel, he is attributes +1 and gains Geology.

name: John Frederick Paxton Man of His Word
Name: John Frederick Paxton Man of His Word
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma that requires a skill, if you do not command a [SF] Officer personnel, you may kill your [SF] Dissident personnel present to replace all levels of that skill with 2 Geology.

name: Mercer
Name: Mercer
gametext: When your Paranoia event is about to be destroyed, you may kill this personnel to return that event to its owner's hand.

name: Paul Mayweather Burdened with Command
Name: Paul Mayweather Burdened with Command
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you command three [SF] Dissident personnel, he is cost -3. When this personnel uses a skill to complete a space mission, score 5 points. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Susan Khouri Humane Caregiver
Name: Susan Khouri Humane Caregiver
gametext: Order - Stop this personnel to retun a non-dilemma card on your {Humanity's Worst Enemy} to its owner's hand.

name: Modular Transport
Name: Modular Transport
gametext: When your non-unique Human aboard this ship is killed by a dilemma, if you do not command a [SF] Officer personnel, you may place a non-unique Human from hand aboard this ship. That personnel joins the mission attempt.

name: Zon Fated Challenger *VP
Name: Zon Fated Challenger *VP
gametext: This personnel is Strength +2 for each completed mission your opponents command (limit +6).

name: A Sight for Sore Eyes **VP
Name: A Sight for Sore Eyes **VP
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [SF] personnel. Plays in your core. At the start of each of your turns, score 5 points. At the end of each of your turns, if you have at least 5 points, lose 5 points.

name: Changed History *VP
Name: Changed History *VP
gametext: Plays in your core. When you win an engagement involving your [Bor] ship, you may reveal the top card of the loser's deck. If it is a personnel you do not command, you may place him or her on that ship. (You now command that personnel).

name: Accelerated Aging *VP
Name: Accelerated Aging *VP
gametext: Place this dilemma on this mission. Each personnel at this mission cannot use their first-listed skill. At the end of this mission attempt, this dilemma is overcome.

name: Maglock *VP
Name: Maglock *VP
gametext: Unless you have 3 Officer or 3 Programming, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: Orb of Prophecy and Change *VP
Name: Orb of Prophecy and Change *VP
gametext: When your personnel present begin a mission attempt, you may exchange a personnel present with a personnel of the same affiliation in your discard pile if both of them could be played at the same headquarters mission you command. You may do this only once each turn.

name: A Chance for Glory *VP
Name: A Chance for Glory *VP
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin combat or an engagement involving your [Kli] personnel. If you win, score 10 points.

name: Delirium *VP
Name: Delirium *VP
gametext: Plays in your core. When the opponent on your right's personnel begin a mission attempt at a mission worth 35 or less points, you may draw one extra dilemma and spend one extra in total cost on dilemmas.

name: Data Tempted by Flesh *VP
Name: Data Tempted by Flesh *VP
Skills: Astrometrics 2 Engineer Exobiology 2 Programming Science Treachery
gametext: At the start of each of your turns, you may return this personnel to your hand. If you do not, remove this personnel from the game.

name: Revised Chakotay Imposturous First Officer *VP
Name: Revised Chakotay Imposturous First Officer *VP
gametext: When one of your personnel present is about to be stopped or killed by a dilemma, you may discard a card titled {Chakotay} or Revised Chakotay from hand to prevent that.

name: Koval Chairman of the Tal Shiar *VP
Name: Koval Chairman of the Tal Shiar *VP
Skills: Biology Exobiology Intelligence Leadership Security Treachery
gametext: While an opponent commands more headquarters missions than you, this personnel cannot be stopped by dilemmas.

name: Groumall Inauspicious Command *VP
Name: Groumall Inauspicious Command *VP
gametext: While you have a ship in your discard pile, this ship is attributes +2. Order - Discard up to three cards from hand to take an equal number of [Car] ships from your discard pile into hand. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Locutus Implacable Scourge *VP
Name: Locutus Implacable Scourge *VP
gametext: While each of your non-headquarters missions is a [Bor] mission, the first Maneuver event you play each turn is cost -2. While you command a Maneuver event, this personnel is Cunning +2.

name: Cutting Remark
Name: Cutting Remark
gametext: Randomly select a personnel to be stopped. If you command four or more events that cost 2 or less, destroy two of your events.

name: Rascals
Name: Rascals
gametext: Unless your personnel have a total cost<17, for each headquarters mission you command, randomly select a personnel to be killed.

name: Royale Casino: Craps
Name: Royale Casino: Craps
gametext: Unless you reveal a personnel from hand with Cunning 7 or Cunning 11, all your personnel are stopped. When this dilemma is overcome, if it was prevented, each opponent may reveal a personnel from hand with Cunning 7 or Cunning 11 to score 10 points.

name: The Doomsday Machine
Name: The Doomsday Machine
gametext: Unless you command two staffed ships at this mission, the opponent on your left may download a Damage card and place it on one of your ships at this mission.

name: The Phase
Name: The Phase
gametext: Choose a personnel who has [Cmd] and Officer or an Android or a Hologram to be stopped. If you cannot, randomly select personnel until their total cost is 4 or more. Place those personnel on the bottom of their owner's deck.

name: Truculent Statecraft
Name: Truculent Statecraft
gametext: Choose a Law personnel to be stopped. If you cannot, place this dilemma in your core. While your opponent commands an Assault or Maneuver event, dilemmas cannot be prevented.

name: Guinan's Rifle
Name: Guinan's Rifle
gametext: While in combat, each of your {El-Aurian personnel} present is Strength +3. When combat begins involving your personnel with Integrity>7 present, you may remove this equipment from the game to prevent that and stop each personnel involved.

name: Mantle of the Empire
Name: Mantle of the Empire
gametext: Order - Name a unique Klingon. While that personnel is present, he or she gains Intelligence and Chancellor, and cannot be killed by dilemmas. This effect lasts until this order is executed again.

name: Omnipotent Armament
Name: Omnipotent Armament
gametext: Order - Destroy your {Q event that costs 3 or more} and remove this equipment from the game to begin combat involving your personnel. If you win, choose a non-headquarters mission you command. The opponent on your left places the top three dilemmas of their dilemma pile beneath that mission. Otherwise, you lose the game.

name: Tommy Gun
Name: Tommy Gun
gametext: When you win combat involving your Thief, [Cmd][TOS] personnel, or [Cmd][TNG] personnel present, randomly select an opponent's personnel involved to be killed. If that personnel is [Bor] or a Hologram, randomly select a second opponent's personnel involved to be killed.

name: All Available Personnel
Name: All Available Personnel
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Place an Assault or Maneuver interrupt from your hand on the bottom of its owner's deck to place a {non-unique Officer} personnel from hand on your headquarters mission where that personnel could be played. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Change of Venue
Name: Change of Venue
gametext: When you play this event, if you have a lower score than each of your opponents, it is cost -4. Choose a dilemma or opponent's event on one of your non-headquarters missions. Place that card on one of your opponent's non-headquarters missions. Destroy this event.

name: Code of the Ushaan
Name: Code of the Ushaan
gametext: Plays in your core. Each player cannot spend more than seven counters during their Play and Draw Cards segments.

name: Cripple Engines
Name: Cripple Engines
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin an engagement involving your Officer personnel. If you win, choose an opponent's ship involved and draw cards up to its printed Range. Otherwise, randomly select an opponent's Engineer or Programming personnel involved to be returned to their owner's hand.

name: Dark Dissension
Name: Dark Dissension
gametext: Plays in your core. Your [TN] ships are each Weapons +1 and Shields -1. Your [TN] personnel are each Integrity -1 and Cunning +1.

name: Disable Shields
Name: Disable Shields
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin an engagement involving your Officer personnel. If you win, choose an opponent's ship involved and draw cards up to its printed Shields. Otherwise, place this event on that ship. Damage - This ship is Shields -4. This ship requires an additional Damage card to destroy it.

name: Imperial Occupation
Name: Imperial Occupation
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Begin combat or an engagement involving your Officer personnel. If you win, place this event on the mission where that personnel was involved. Each planet dilemma and space dilemma revealed at this mission is cost -1. Otherwise, destroy this event.

name: Invasion Plans
Name: Invasion Plans
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Begin combat or an engagement involving your Officer personnel. If you win, place this event on the mission where that personnel was involved. Each dual dilemma revealed at this mission is cost -1. Otherwise, destroy this event.

name: Life-Changing Encounter
Name: Life-Changing Encounter
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Kill your non-unique personnel to begin combat or an engagement involving your other personnel present. If you win, place this event on the mission where that personnel was involved (limit one per mission). Each personnel at this mission is attributes -1. Otherwise, destroy this event.

name: Logistical Lifeline
Name: Logistical Lifeline
gametext: To play this event, you must command a Smuggler personnel. Plays in your core. During each of your Discard Excess Cards segments, you may keep one additional card in your hand for each different Maneuver event and each different Pursuit event you command.

name: Orbital Weapon Platform
Name: Orbital Weapon Platform
gametext: To play this event, you must command six [Dom] personnel. Plays on an opponent's planet mission. While a player commands a completed space mission, that player must have total Shields>12 at this mission to attempt it. Each Damage dilemma revealed at this mission is cost -1.

name: Provocative Levity
Name: Provocative Levity
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to place an opponent's staffed non-[Voy] ship at your Nebula mission where you command a staffed ship, then begin an engagement involving your [Cmd][TOS] personnel at that mission. If you win, randomly kill two opponent's personnel involved.

name: Ruthless Efficiency
Name: Ruthless Efficiency
gametext: Plays in your core. When you win an engagement involving your Intelligence personnel, you may discard a Maneuver interrupt from hand to unstop each of your personnel and ships involved and restore all Range those ships have used this turn. You cannot begin any other engagements this turn.

name: Scum and Villainy
Name: Scum and Villainy
gametext: To play this event, you must command three Thief personnel. Plays in your core. Name a personnel. Each personnel you own with that card title gains Thief. Order - Stop your Thief to take command of a Hand Weapon equipment present with that Thief. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Search and Destroy
Name: Search and Destroy
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin combat or an engagement involving your Admiral, General, or Legate personnel. If you win, name an event. All copies of that event are destroyed.

name: Shock Troops
Name: Shock Troops
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin combat involving your Reman personnel. Your non-Reman personnel present are not involved in that combat. If you win, kill any number of your Reman personnel involved. The loser randomly selects an equal number of their personnel involved to be killed.

name: Strategic Tug-of-War
Name: Strategic Tug-of-War
gametext: Plays on a non-headquarters mission. When a player wins combat or an engagement at this mission, they may choose one: draw three cards; or place a personnel from hand on a headquarters mission where that personnel could be played.

name: Target the Main Generator
Name: Target the Main Generator
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin an engagement involving your Officer personnel. If you win, choose an opponent's ship involved and draw cards up to its printed Weapons. Otherwise, randomly select an opponent's Officer or Navigation personnel involved to be returned to their owner's hand.

name: Calculated Concession
Name: Calculated Concession
gametext: Order - Return a dilemma beneath one of your incomplete non-headquarters mission to its owner's dilemma pile to destroy an opponent's event.

name: Defend It and Hope
Name: Defend It and Hope
gametext: When an opponent begins combat, if they have a higher score than you or do not command a completed mission, each of your personnel involved is Strength +6. Order - Stop your Leadership personnel to draw two cards.

name: Full Throttle
Name: Full Throttle
gametext: Order - Choose your ship with its corresponding Commander aboard. That ship is Range +5 until the end of this turn.

name: Stunning Reversal
Name: Stunning Reversal
gametext: When you win combat or an engagement you did not begin, you may choose one: the loser loses 10 points; the loser randomly selects three of their personnel involved to be killed; or score 20 points. Order - Stop your Leadership personnel to draw two cards.

name: Earth Outpost 4 Border Incursion
Name: Earth Outpost 4 Border Incursion
Skills: Navigation, 2 Officer, Cunning>36, and (Honor or Treachery)
gametext: When you begin a mission attempt here, if you won combat or an engagement this turn, reduce this mission's attribute requirements by 10 until the end of the mission attempt.

name: Gorlan Sector Crush the Rebellion
Name: Gorlan Sector Crush the Rebellion
Skills: Leadership, Navigation, Officer, Security, 2 Treachery, and Strength>36
gametext: When a card an opponent owns is about to prevent or destroy your Assault or Maneuver card, you may discard an [AU] card from hand to prevent that.

name: Winn Adami Uneasy Shepherd
Name: Winn Adami Uneasy Shepherd
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may remove two cards in your discard pile from the game to download two cards. Those cards must be [TN] cards or Maneuver cards.

name: Locutus Implacable Scourge
Name: Locutus Implacable Scourge
gametext: While each of your non-headquarters missions is a [Bor] mission, the first Maneuver event you play each turn is cost -2. While you command a Maneuver event, this personnel is Cunning +2.

name: Elim Garak Cold-Blooded Mastermind
Name: Elim Garak Cold-Blooded Mastermind
gametext: When you win an engagement involving your [Cmd] personnel, kill two of your non-[Car] personnel present and shuffle this personnel into his owner's deck to place the top two dilemmas of the loser's dilemma pile beneath your non-headquarters mission.

name: Drai First Hunter
Name: Drai First Hunter
gametext: When you win combat involving this personnel, randomly select an opponent's personnel involved to be placed in your brig. If that personnel is {Tosk}, each player loses 5 points.

name: Tosk Noble Prey
Name: Tosk Noble Prey
gametext: You may play this personnel at cost +1 aboard an opponent's ship. If you do this, that opponent now commands him. At the end of your turn, if you command this personnel and he is at a headquarters mission, lose 5 points.

name: Geordi La Forge Resolute Presence
Name: Geordi La Forge Resolute Presence
gametext: While this personnel is aboard your {Galaxy-class ship}, it is Weapons +2 and Shields +2.

name: Hikaru Sulu Cunning Tactician
Name: Hikaru Sulu Cunning Tactician
gametext: At the start of your turn, if an opponent's ship is at this mission, you may place your ship this personnel is aboard at a different mission to download a Damage card and place it on that opponent's ship.

name: Klim Dokachin Officious Quartermaster
Name: Klim Dokachin Officious Quartermaster
gametext: When you play this personnel, each player may choose one: search their discard pile for a ship and place that ship at a headquarters mission where it could be played; or download a ship.

name: Kyle Riker Hard as Nails
Name: Kyle Riker Hard as Nails
gametext: Order - Discard a Maneuver card from hand to download a Maneuver card. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Savar Alien Pawn
Name: Savar Alien Pawn
Skills: Diplomacy Law Officer Science Transporters Treachery
gametext: When you fail a mission attempt involving this personnel, if there are one or less dilemmas overcome at this mission, you may kill him to unstop each of your stopped Bluegill personnel present.

name: Bok Spiteful Salvager
Name: Bok Spiteful Salvager
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may download {Thought Maker}, {Jean-Luc Picard}, or {U.S.S. Stargazer}. You may play Thought Maker and U.S.S. Stargazer as if you commanded a completed mission requiring Acquisition.

name: Gowron Without Honor
Name: Gowron Without Honor
gametext: When this personnel begins a mission attempt, you may discard an Assault or Maneuver event from hand to add the cost of that event to his attributes until the end of the mission attempt.

name: Kavok Challenging Captain
Name: Kavok Challenging Captain
gametext: When you play this personnel at your headquarters mission, you may discard an event or interrupt from hand to place him aboard an opponent's staffed ship. If you do, you may place that ship at a different mission in the same quadrant.

name: Devinoni Ral Hired Gun
Name: Devinoni Ral Hired Gun
gametext: Order - Place a Telepathy personnel present on the bottom of their owner's deck to make this personnel Cunning +3 and gain Diplomacy until the end of this turn. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Repurposed E.M.H.
Name: Repurposed E.M.H.
gametext: While you command a Holoprogram, this personnel is Cunning +2 and gains Biology, Exobiology, Medical, and Dissident.

name: Letant Sneering Liaison
Name: Letant Sneering Liaison
gametext: When you play this personnel, reveal an opponent's hand. Choose an Assault or Maneuver event revealed and place it in your core. You now command that event.

name: Kraxon Watchful Warship
Name: Kraxon Watchful Warship
gametext: When an engagement begins involving this ship, each opponent discards a number of cards from the top of their deck equal to the total cost of their ships at this mission.

name: I.K.S. Chontay On the Hunt
Name: I.K.S. Chontay On the Hunt
gametext: While you command a Maneuver event, this ship is attributes +1. While this ship is in an engagement, it is Weapons +1.

name: Regency 1 Alliance Flagship
Name: Regency 1 Alliance Flagship
gametext: When you play this ship, you may discard an [AU] card from hand to download a Maneuver event for each Mirror mission you command.

name: Vedek Assembly Transport (BP)
Name: Vedek Assembly Transport (BP)
gametext: This ship is attributes +1 for each of these keywords you have aboard: Kai, Prylar and Vedek.

name: U.S.S. Enterprise Beautiful Lady (BP)
Name: U.S.S. Enterprise Beautiful Lady (BP)
gametext: To play this ship, you must command four [TOS] personnel. You may play this ship at cost +4 to score 5 points.

name: U.S.S. Voyager Home Away From Home (BP)
Name: U.S.S. Voyager Home Away From Home (BP)
gametext: While you do not command a headquarters mission, you may play this ship at {Caretaker's Array}. While this ship is at a [DQ] mission, you may play [Voy] personnel, [NA] personnel, and equipment aboard this ship. When you play this ship, you may place up to two [Voy] personnel from your hand aboard this ship.

name: Kurdon (BP)
Name: Kurdon (BP)
gametext: While your personnel are attempting a space mission that requires Acquisition or Treachery, each [Fer] personnel aboard this ship is Cunning +1.

name: Dominion Battleship (BP)
Name: Dominion Battleship (BP)
gametext: This ship is attributes +1 for each of these species you have aboard it: Changeling, Jem'Hadar, Vorta.

name: Groumall Inauspicious Command (BP)
Name: Groumall Inauspicious Command (BP)
gametext: While you have a ship in your discard pile, this ship is attributes +2. Order - Discard up to three cards from hand to take an equal number of [Car] ships from your discard pile into hand. You may do this only once each turn.

name: U.S.S. Defiant Stolen Warship (BP)
Name: U.S.S. Defiant Stolen Warship (BP)
gametext: Order - If this ship is staffed and at a non-headquarters mission, this mission's owner places a card from hand on top of his or her deck. You may do this only once each turn.

name: U.S.S. Enterprise-E Flagship of the Federation (BP)
Name: U.S.S. Enterprise-E Flagship of the Federation (BP)
gametext: When you play this ship, for each [TNG] Leadership personnel at this mission, this ship is cost -1. Order - Stop your [Fed] Diplomacy personnel aboard this ship and return your event with no cards on it to its owner's hand to have each opponent return one of his or her events with no cards on it to its owner's hand.

name: U.S.S. Ganges One of the First (BP)
Name: U.S.S. Ganges One of the First (BP)
gametext: While you command more than seven personnel aboard this ship, it is Range -3. This ship is attributes +1 for each [DS9] personnel aboard (limit +5).

name: U.S.S. Oberth (BP)
Name: U.S.S. Oberth (BP)
gametext: You may play this ship at your {Earth}. At the start of your first turn, if you command Earth, you may reveal this card from hand to make each player draw a card.

name: U.S.S. Relativity Federation Timeship (BP)
Name: U.S.S. Relativity Federation Timeship (BP)
gametext: At the start of each of your turns, place each non-[Fut] personnel you command in his or her owner's discard pile. You may play [Fut][Fed] personnel and equipment aboard this ship. When a card instructs you to place this ship at your headquarters mission, you may place it at your [Fed] space mission.

name: Future Enterprise Displaced Starship (BP)
Name: Future Enterprise Displaced Starship (BP)
gametext: When your non-Human [SF] personnel at this mission is about to be killed or stopped by a dilemma, you may remove that personnel from the game instead.

name: Shining So Bright *VP
Name: Shining So Bright *VP
gametext: Plays in your core. When you play a [Cmd] Leadership personnel, you may examine the top card of your deck, then place it on the top or bottom of your deck.

name: Edo Probe
Name: Edo Probe
gametext: Unless you have a personnel with Diplomacy and Law, place this dilemma on this mission (limit one per mission). When you complete this mission, if this dilemma was faced this turn, score 5 points. Otherwise, your opponent scores 5 points.

name: Hippocratic Oath
Name: Hippocratic Oath
gametext: Your opponent chooses a planet mission in play. Unless you place a personnel with Exobiology or Medical on that planet, all your personnel are stopped.

name: Rules of Obedience
Name: Rules of Obedience
gametext: If your opponent commands a Mirror mission, this dilemma is cost -2. Your opponent chooses one: kill the personnel with the fewest [SD] icons; or kill the personnel with the highest Integrity. Unless you have Geology and 2 Honor or 2 Security and 2 Treachery or {Miles O'Brien}, all your personnel are stopped.

name: Spot
Name: Spot
gametext: This dilemma is cost -3 for each space dilemma beneath this mission. Your opponent chooses two personnel with Engineer or Security to be stopped.

name: Borg Nanoprobes
Name: Borg Nanoprobes
gametext: When you play this equipment, if you command a Borg personnel, it is cost -2. When you are about to lose command of a personnel present, you may destroy this equipment and stop that personnel to prevent that. Order - Destroy this equipment to choose a dilemma with no cards on it in your core or on your mission and remove it from the game.

name: Population 9 Billion - All Borg
Name: Population 9 Billion - All Borg
gametext: Plays on your {Unicomplex}. When you are about to lose command of your {Borg Queen} or {Locutus} at an [AQ] mission worth 40 or more points, you may stop two [Bor] personnel present with them to prevent that. When a player plays a non-unique non-[Bor] personnel, if your {Earth} is complete, he or she is cost +2.

name: I'm a Doctor, Not a Bricklayer
Name: I'm a Doctor, Not a Bricklayer
gametext: While your [TOS] Medical personnel is facing a dilemma, he or she gains 2 Geology until the end of that dilemma. Order - Download a [TOS] Geology personnel. Unless you choose to stop your Medical personnel and Officer personnel, remove this interrupt from the game.

name: Devidia II Investigate Time Continuum
Name: Devidia II Investigate Time Continuum
Affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.
Skills: Anthropology, Exobiology, 2 Physics, Integrity>42, and (2 Science or an Android or an El-Aurian)
gametext: When you complete this mission, you may discard two Temporal cards from hand to score 5 points.

name: Fontaine Enigmatic Rebel
Name: Fontaine Enigmatic Rebel
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may download up to two non-Artifact Hand Weapons.

name: Rinnak Pire
Name: Rinnak Pire
gametext: This personnel is the corresponding Commander of your non-unique [Baj] ship that he is aboard.

name: Ilon Tandro Special Envoy
Name: Ilon Tandro Special Envoy
gametext: Order - If you have no captives and this personnel is at a non-headquarters mission, return him to his owner's hand to place an opponent's personnel present in your brig.

name: Meso'Clan Self-Sacrificing Fourth
Name: Meso'Clan Self-Sacrificing Fourth
gametext: When your Founder personnel present is about to be killed by a dilemma, you may kill this personnel to prevent that.

name: Donald Varley Discoverer of Iconia
Name: Donald Varley Discoverer of Iconia
Skills: 2 Archaeology Astrometrics Leadership Officer Programming Science
gametext: While this personnel is aboard your {U.S.S. Yamato}, that ship is attributes +1 for each of your Region: Neutral Zone missions.

name: Dulmer Temporal Investigator
Name: Dulmer Temporal Investigator
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may download {Lucsly}. When you play this personnel, if an opponent commands a [Fut] card, you may draw two cards.

name: Jack Crusher Beloved Father
Name: Jack Crusher Beloved Father
gametext: When your [Fed] personnel present is randomly selected by a dilemma, you may replace him or her with this personnel.

name: Lucsly Temporal Investigator
Name: Lucsly Temporal Investigator
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may download {Dulmer}. When you play this personnel, if an opponent commands a [Pa] card, you may draw two cards.

name: Naomi Wildman Obliging Assistant
Name: Naomi Wildman Obliging Assistant
gametext: While your [Voy] personnel present is facing a dilemma, you may discard a [Voy] card from hand to have that personnel gain one level of every skill he or she already has until the end of that dilemma. You may do this only once each dilemma.

name: The Traveler Lakanta
Name: The Traveler Lakanta
gametext: While this personnel is attempting a mission with an event on it, you may return him or his owner's hand to make a personnel present attributes +4 and gain a skill of your choice until the end of the mission attempt.

name: Gegis Exploitative Profiteer
Name: Gegis Exploitative Profiteer
gametext: Order - Stop this personnel aboard your ship at a space mission to randomly select an opponent's Hologram personnel at this mission and place that personnel aboard your ship. You now command that personnel.

name: Ch'Pok Vexing Advocate
Name: Ch'Pok Vexing Advocate
gametext: Order - Return this personnel to his owner's hand to place an opponent's Honor personnel or Klingon personnel present on the bottom of his or her owner's deck.

name: Amarie Information Broker
Name: Amarie Information Broker
gametext: Order - Reveal the top card of an opponent's deck. If it is a personnel, this personnel gains a skill from that personnel until the end of this turn. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Timicin Irresolute Scientist
Name: Timicin Irresolute Scientist
gametext: When a mission attempt involving this personnel ends, if you have more than 60 points, remove him from the game.

name: William T. Riker Treasonous Thieving Pirate
Name: William T. Riker Treasonous Thieving Pirate
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may have him lose Officer to gain Treachery and Thief until the end of the mission attempt.

name: U.S.S. Yamato Contagious Explorer
Name: U.S.S. Yamato Contagious Explorer
gametext: When your personnel complete a Region: Neutral Zone mission, if this ship is at that mission and no opponent commands a ship at a Region: Neutral Zone mission, score 10 points.

name: Pi Off Course
Name: Pi Off Course
gametext: While an opponent does not command a ship at a Region: Neutral Zone mission, for each Region: Neutral Zone mission you command, this ship is Range +1 (limit +3).

name: Hippocratic Oath *
Name: Hippocratic Oath *
gametext: Your opponent chooses a planet mission in play. Unless you place a personnel with Exobiology or Medical on that planet, all your personnel are stopped.

name: Population 9 Billion - All Borg *
Name: Population 9 Billion - All Borg *
gametext: Plays on your {Unicomplex}. When you are about to lose command of your {Borg Queen} or {Locutus} at an [AQ] mission worth 40 or more points, you may stop two [Bor] personnel present with them to prevent that. When a player plays a non-unique non-[Bor] personnel, if your {Earth} is complete, he or she is cost +2.

name: Evek Agent of Cardassian Justice *VP
Name: Evek Agent of Cardassian Justice *VP
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you command six [Car] personnel, you may reveal the top three cards of an opponent's deck. Each revealed card that is a personnel that opponent does not command is placed in your brig. (That opponent now commands them.)

name: Vetar *VP
Name: Vetar *VP
gametext: When you play this ship, you may download a Pursuit card.

name: Reclaim Terok Nor *VP
Name: Reclaim Terok Nor *VP
gametext: Plays in your core. Each [Car] personnel and [Dom] personnel you own gains [TN]. At the start of each of your turns, place a card from hand on this event.

name: Old Differences *VP
Name: Old Differences *VP
gametext: When you reveal this dilemma from the dilemma stack, if this mission is worth 35 or less points, it is cost -1. Randomly select two personnel to be stopped.

name: Rogue Borg Ambush *VP
Name: Rogue Borg Ambush *VP
gametext: Unless you have Intelligence and Cunning>35 or a Hand Weapon and Strength>35, randomly select a personnel to be killed, then all your other personnel are stopped.

name: Cardassia Prime Hardscrabble World *VP
Name: Cardassia Prime Hardscrabble World *VP
Skills: You may play [Car] cards, [NA] cards, and equipment at this mission.

name: Earth Humanity's Home *VP
Name: Earth Humanity's Home *VP
Skills: You may play [SF] cards, [NA] cards, and equipment at this mission.
gametext: When you complete a space mission, if no other space mission has been completed, score 10 points.

name: Earth Lush and Beautiful Home *VP
Name: Earth Lush and Beautiful Home *VP
Skills: You may play [TOS] cards, [NA] cards, and equipment at this mission.
gametext: When you play a [TOS] card here, you may spend a counter to draw two cards. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Mouth of the Wormhole Deep Space 9 *VP
Name: Mouth of the Wormhole Deep Space 9 *VP
Skills: You may play [DS9] cards, [NA] cards, and equipment at this mission.
gametext: When any player is about to move a ship between this mission and a [GQ] mission, do not add 2 to the span total of those missions.

name: Qo'noS Heart of the Empire *VP
Name: Qo'noS Heart of the Empire *VP
Skills: You may play [Kli] cards, [NA] cards, and equipment at this mission.

name: Crensen Gap Protect the Escapees *VP
Name: Crensen Gap Protect the Escapees *VP
gametext: You may attempt and complete this mission using your [Kli] personnel with these requirements: Leadership, Officer, Treachery, and Strength>30.

name: Shelley
Name: Shelley
Skills: Biology Engineer Exobiology Geology Medical Security
gametext: When you play this personnel, the next [AU][TNG] or [Pa][TNG] personnel you play this turn is cost -3.

name: Garak Has Some Issues
Name: Garak Has Some Issues
gametext: Your opponent names a skill (except Acquisition, Intelligence, Law, or Telepathy). Randomly select three personnel. Each selected personnel who has that skill is stopped. Then kill each selected unstopped [Car] personnel.

name: Bajoran Sector Engage Enemy Forces
Name: Bajoran Sector Engage Enemy Forces
Skills: Engineer, Honor, Leadership, Navigation, Officer, 2 Security, and Strength>46
gametext: While each of your non-headquarters missions is a [Dom] mission, each of your [Fed] personnel here is attributes +1.

name: Bassen Rift Interdict Genocidal Praetor
Name: Bassen Rift Interdict Genocidal Praetor
Skills: Officer, Security, Transporters, and (2 Honor and Integrity>44 or 2 Intelligence and Cunning>44)
gametext: When you complete this mission, each ship here is destroyed unless you place a personnel involved who costs 4 or more in their owner's discard pile.

name: Cardassia Prime Secure Homeworld
Name: Cardassia Prime Secure Homeworld
Skills: 2 Leadership, 2 Officer, 2 Security, and (Cunning>36 or Strength>36)
gametext: While there are three or more dilemmas beneath this mission, players cannot play interrupts during mission attempts.

name: Earth Conduct Espionage
Name: Earth Conduct Espionage
Skills: 2 Anthropology, 2 Intelligence, 3 Treachery, and (Cunning>44 or Strength>48)
gametext: When six or more of your personnel begin a mission attempt here, if one of them is an Infiltrator, each opponent discards a non-ship card from hand. Then, you draw a card.

name: Northwest Passage Resist Extradimensional Invasion
Name: Northwest Passage Resist Extradimensional Invasion
Skills: Astrometrics, 2 Exobiology, Navigation, Security, Transporters, and (Cunning>42 or Strength>42)
gametext: When ten or more of your [Bor] personnel attempt this mission, you may draw a card for each dilemma in your core (limit 3).

name: Parliament Attend Diplomatic Conference
Name: Parliament Attend Diplomatic Conference
gametext: While there are three personnel of different affiliations on this planet, the first Diplomacy personnel played each turn is cost -2.

name: Tyree Follow Cryptic Vision
Name: Tyree Follow Cryptic Vision
Skills: Archaeology, Geology, Leadership, and (3 Honor and Integrity>46 or 3 Treachery and Cunning>44)
gametext: When you begin a mission attempt here, choose a unique personnel involved. They are attributes +1 for each Pah-Wraith and Prophet card in your discard pile until the end of the mission attempt (limit +5).

name: Vintaak System Seize Tactical Advantage
Name: Vintaak System Seize Tactical Advantage
Skills: 2 Leadership, Navigation, Security, 3 Treachery, and (Cunning>44 or Strength>44)
gametext: When you complete this mission, if each of your personnel here is an [AU] personnel, take up to three of your overcome dilemmas and return them to your dilemma pile.

name: Reese Grizzled Survivor
Name: Reese Grizzled Survivor
gametext: When this personnel is an eligible target for a random selection at a [Dom] mission, you may exclude him and a [DS9] personnel present from that selection.

name: Badar N'D'D Parliamentary Predator
Name: Badar N'D'D Parliamentary Predator
gametext: When an opponent's personnel is about to be placed in their owner's discard pile, you may return this personnel to his owner's hand to remove that personnel from the game instead.

name: Bevvox Ancient Intellect
Name: Bevvox Ancient Intellect
gametext: While this personnel is attempting a mission worth 50 or more points, he is Cunning +1 and gains 2 Anthropology.

name: Fennim Incisive Physician
Name: Fennim Incisive Physician
gametext: When this personnel attempts a mission worth 50 or more points, you may exclude a personnel present from random selections until the end of the mission attempt.

name: Kurros Brilliant Tactician
Name: Kurros Brilliant Tactician
Keywords: Commander: Think Tank Ship. Think Tank.
gametext: While this personnel is attempting a mission worth 50 or more points, he is Cunning +1 and gains 2 Leadership.

name: Ssestar Parliamentary Prey
Name: Ssestar Parliamentary Prey
gametext: Order - Shuffle this personnel into his owner's deck to choose an opponent's Assassin, Drone, or Infiltrator at this mission to be shuffled into their owner's deck.

name: Sullin Gifted Researcher
Name: Sullin Gifted Researcher
gametext: While this personnel is attempting a mission worth 50 or more points, she is Cunning +1 and gains 2 Transporters.

name: The Artificial Intelligence Soul of an Artist
Name: The Artificial Intelligence Soul of an Artist
gametext: While this personnel is facing a non-Consume dilemma at a mission worth 50 or more points, he cannot be stopped.

name: Think Tank Ship Ivory Tower
Name: Think Tank Ship Ivory Tower
gametext: While you do not command {Unicomplex}, you may play this ship at a mission worth 50 or more points. You may play Think Tank personnel aboard this ship. Each Think Tank personnel aboard this ship gains Telepathy.

name: Lemec Posturing Negotiator *VP
Name: Lemec Posturing Negotiator *VP
Skills: Diplomacy Geology Medical Officer Transporters Treachery
gametext: While you have a higher score than each of your opponents, this personnel is Cunning +2 and Strength +2.

name: Sarek Vulcan Delegate *VP
Name: Sarek Vulcan Delegate *VP
gametext: You may play this personnel at cost +1 to draw a card for each mission you command that is worth 40 or more points.

name: Spock Transtemporal Truth-Teller *VP
Name: Spock Transtemporal Truth-Teller *VP
Skills: Astrometrics Biology Exobiology Physics Programming Science
gametext: While this personnel is attempting a Temporal mission, he cannot be stopped by dilemmas.

name: Deneb IV Encounter at Farpoint *VP
Name: Deneb IV Encounter at Farpoint *VP
Affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
Skills: Exobiology, Honor, Telepathy, and Integrity>25 or Acquisition, Diplomacy, Treachery, and Cunning>30

name: Cardassian Outskirts Kressari Rendezvous *VP
Name: Cardassian Outskirts Kressari Rendezvous *VP
gametext: When you complete this mission, you may place up to three of your Hand Weapons aboard the completing ship in their owners' discard piles. Score 5 points for each.

name: Adopted Authority *VP
Name: Adopted Authority *VP
gametext: Randomly select a personnel. Unless that personnel has an attribute<5, he or she and a second randomly selected personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile. Otherwise, he or she is stopped.

name: Trellium-D *VP
Name: Trellium-D *VP
gametext: When you play this equipment, it is cost -1 for each Region: Delphic Expanse mission you command. Plays aboard your ship. When you play this equipment, discard a non-personnel card from hand to draw two cards.

name: Misdirection *VP
Name: Misdirection *VP
gametext: Plays in your core. While an opponent's personnel is present with your Infiltrator, he or she is attributes -1.

name: Jean Hajar Nova Squadron Navigator *VP
Name: Jean Hajar Nova Squadron Navigator *VP
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, she is attributes +1 and gains Astrometrics, Navigation, Physics, Security and Transporters.

name: Revised Doctor Mass Murderer *VP
Name: Revised Doctor Mass Murderer *VP
gametext: Order - Discard a card titled {The Doctor} or Revised Doctor from hand to download an interrupt.

name: Tuvok Undercover *VP
Name: Tuvok Undercover *VP
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma and you have a [Maq] personnel present, this personnel is attributes +1 and gains Intelligence.

name: Uhura Experienced Technician *VP
Name: Uhura Experienced Technician *VP
gametext: You may play this personnel at cost -2 to ignore her next ability. When you play this personnel, you may download an interrupt and/or a [TOS] Commander.

name: Gint The First Grand Nagus *VP
Name: Gint The First Grand Nagus *VP
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you command an Acquisition personnel, he is cost -3. While you command four cards that have a cost of four or more, you may spend an additional counter each turn.

name: D'Vela *VP
Name: D'Vela *VP
gametext: While a personnel present is facing a dilemma, if you have no cards in your hand, you may destroy your event to have that personnel gain a skill of your choice until the end of that dilemma.

name: Anachronistic Meddlers
Name: Anachronistic Meddlers
gametext: When you begin a mission attempt at this mission, the opponent on your left may draw two extra dilemmas and spend two extra in total cost on dilemmas.

name: Divisive Patron
Name: Divisive Patron
gametext: Each dual dilemma revealed at this mission is cost +1. While your personnel is attempting a different mission, each dual dilemma revealed at that mission is cost -1.

name: Forewarned
Name: Forewarned
gametext: When this dilemma is overcome, if you do not command a ship at this mission, this dilemma's owner scores 5 points.

name: Proclamation of Doom
Name: Proclamation of Doom
gametext: When this dilemma is overcome, if an opponent commands a staffed ship at this mission, they draw cards equal to this mission's span.

name: Spoiler Warning
Name: Spoiler Warning
gametext: Your opponent names a personnel. When the named personnel begins a mission attempt at this mission, return that personnel to their owner's hand.

name: Bar Brawl
Name: Bar Brawl
gametext: Order - Begin combat involving your three [Pa] Klingon personnel, comparing total cost instead of Strength. When you are about to win, your opponent may prevent this combat and return each personnel involved to their owners' hands. If you win, score 10 points.

name: Gateway Flee in Terror
Name: Gateway Flee in Terror
Affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.
Skills: Honor, Medical, Physics, Transporters, and Strength>32
gametext: When you complete this mission, flip it over. - At the start of each opponent's turn, if their personnel on this planet have this mission's printed requirements, flip this mission. Otherwise, you may place a personnel who costs 2 or less from your discard pile where he or she could be played.

name: Na'kuhl Prime Fight for Dominance
Name: Na'kuhl Prime Fight for Dominance
Skills: Anthropology, Engineer, Exobiology, Physics, and Cunning>35
gametext: When you complete this mission, flip it over. - At the start of each opponent's turn, if their personnel on this planet have this mission's printed requirements, flip this mission. Otherwise, you may take a dilemma from beneath this mission and place it beneath your non-headquarters mission.

name: Igrilan Kor
Name: Igrilan Kor
gametext: This personnel is attributes +1 for each Temporal mission in play (limit +3).

name: John Christopher Bluejay 4
Name: John Christopher Bluejay 4
Skills: Engineer Honor Navigation Officer Science Security
gametext: You may play this personnel at cost +1 to make the player on your left place the top card of their dilemma pile face up beneath your Temporal mission. When this personnel is killed, each player discards the top three cards of their deck.

name: Spock Transtemporal Truth-Teller
Name: Spock Transtemporal Truth-Teller
Skills: Astrometrics Biology Exobiology Physics Programming Science
gametext: While this personnel is attempting a Temporal mission, he cannot be stopped by dilemmas.

name: Gonik
Name: Gonik
Skills: Acquisition Archaeology Engineer Navigation Officer Science Treachery
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may choose an opponent to draw a card to make him cost -1.

name: Kered Bemused Executioner
Name: Kered Bemused Executioner
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you command two [Pa] Klingons, each opponent may place one of their personnel at their headquarters mission aboard one of their ships. Then, you may choose one of their personnel at each opponent's headquarters mission to be killed.

name: Komal
Name: Komal
Skills: Anthropology Archaeology Engineer Medical Officer Programming
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may place the top card of your dilemma pile face up beneath the opponent on your left's incomplete non-headquarters mission to make him cost -2. They may place the top card of their dilemma pile beneath your incomplete non-headquarters mission to prevent this.

name: Krase Bellicose Commander
Name: Krase Bellicose Commander
Skills: Exobiology Leadership Navigation Officer Physics Science
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may return any number of your events with no cards on them to their owners' hands to make him cost -2. The opponent on your left may return a number of their events that have an equal or greater total cost with no cards on them to their owners' hands to prevent this.

name: Woteln
Name: Woteln
Skills: Astrometrics Diplomacy Geology Intelligence Law Transporters
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may choose a personnel in an opponent's discard pile they do not command to make this personnel cost -2. That opponent may place that personnel in your brig to prevent this. (They now command that personnel.)

name: D'Jamat
Name: D'Jamat
Skills: Acquisition Biology Geology Physics Security Treachery
gametext: This personnel is attributes +1 for each Harbinger dilemma on your opponents' missions (limit +4).

name: Edith Keeler Must Die
Name: Edith Keeler Must Die
gametext: When you play a card, you may reduce its cost using the game text of your missions as if they were complete. If you do, at the end of that turn, the opponent on your left may discard three cards from hand to remove this personnel from the game.

name: Shras Passionate Plenipotentiary
Name: Shras Passionate Plenipotentiary
gametext: When this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may make him gain a skill required by an opponents' mission worth 40 or more points until the end of that dilemma.

name: Thelev "Andorian" Terrorist
Name: Thelev "Andorian" Terrorist
gametext: When an opponent begins a mission attempt at this mission, you may destroy an event in your core to draw one extra dilemma and spend one extra in total cost on dilemmas.

name: Jane Taylor
Name: Jane Taylor
gametext: Order - Kill this personnel to remove a Harbinger dilemma on a mission from the game.

name: Jhamel Strong Sister
Name: Jhamel Strong Sister
gametext: When this personnel begins a mission attempt at a mission that requires Integrity, your opponent's non-mission cards cannot add to or subtract from the number of dilemmas drawn or the total cost spent on dilemmas this mission attempt.

name: I.K.S. Amar Pugnacious Responder
Name: I.K.S. Amar Pugnacious Responder
gametext: To play this ship, you must command two [Pa][Kli] personnel. Order - Destroy any number of Hand Weapons aboard this ship to make it attributes +2 until the end of this turn. The opponent on your left may destroy an equal number of their equipment cards to prevent this.

name: Memenda Charvanek's Flagship
Name: Memenda Charvanek's Flagship
gametext: To play this ship, you must command two [Pa][Rom] personnel. When you play this ship, reveal an opponent's hand. For each equipment and ship revealed, this ship is cost -1.

name: Cardassia Prime Subjugated Planet
Name: Cardassia Prime Subjugated Planet
Skills: You may play [Dom] cards and equipment at this mission.
gametext: You cannot command another headquarters mission. When you play a [Dom] personnel, if you do not command a personnel of that species, you may have each player draw a card.

name: Founder Leader Desperate Dictator
Name: Founder Leader Desperate Dictator
gametext: When you play this personnel, the next Breen or Son'a you play this turn is cost -2. Order - Stop this personnel and kill your Cardassian or Vorta present to destroy an event.

name: Benjamin Sisko "Jodmos, Son of Kobor"
Name: Benjamin Sisko "Jodmos, Son of Kobor"
gametext: You may play this personnel aboard your [DS9] ship. While this personnel is at a [Kli] mission, he and each of your [DS9] Infiltrators present are attributes +1.

name: Kellin Losing Faith
Name: Kellin Losing Faith
gametext: While this personnel is at a [Dom] mission, if no opponent commands personnel at this mission, he is attributes +1 and gains Honor and Physics.

name: Nadia Larkin Dutiful Soldier
Name: Nadia Larkin Dutiful Soldier
gametext: Order - Begin combat or an engagement involving this personnel at a [Dom] mission. If you win, randomly kill an opponent's personnel involved.

name: Dominion Galor
Name: Dominion Galor
gametext: When you play this ship, discard a card from hand. If you command a [Dom] Cardassian, you may then draw a card.

name: Lemec Prefect of Betazed
Name: Lemec Prefect of Betazed
gametext: While three or more dilemmas that any opponent owns have been removed from the game, this personnel is Cunning +2, Strength +2, and excluded from random selections.

name: Izir'isel Lemec's Warship
Name: Izir'isel Lemec's Warship
gametext: While this ship is staffed, if an opponent owns three or more dilemmas that have been removed from the game, each of their ships at this mission is Weapons -1 and Shields -1.

name: These Things Happen
Name: These Things Happen
gametext: Randomly select a personnel to be stopped. Each opponent draws a card for each personnel they command at this mission (limit three).

name: Military Recon Program
Name: Military Recon Program
gametext: Plays in your core. When you play this event, name a unique personnel. When an opponent plays a personnel who costs 3 or less with that title, if three or more cards are on this event, you may place each card on this event in its owner's discard pile to kill that personnel.

name: Playing by the Rules
Name: Playing by the Rules
gametext: Plays in your core. When a dilemma is about to be returned to a dilemma pile during a mission attempt in which it was faced (or from beneath an incomplete mission), that mission's owner may discard a non-[Bor] personnel from hand to place that dilemma beneath their non-headquarters mission instead.

name: Valuable Real Estate
Name: Valuable Real Estate
gametext: Plays on a [Dom] planet mission. At the start of your turn, if you command three [E] personnel on this planet and no opponent commands personnel on this planet, destroy this event to score 5 points.

name: I Won't Miss Him
Name: I Won't Miss Him
gametext: When the opponent on your right begins a mission attempt, you may discard two cards from hand (or destroy your Paranoia event) to draw one extra dilemma and spend one extra in total cost on dilemmas for each of your missions with a dilemma beneath it. Remove this interrupt from the game.

name: Empok Nor Negotiate Prisoner Exchange
Name: Empok Nor Negotiate Prisoner Exchange
Skills: Acquisition, Diplomacy, Engineer, and Cunning>33 or Biology, Leadership, Security, and Strength>33
gametext: When you complete this mission, you may give command of your Commodity event to an opponent to take one of your personnel from that opponent's brig and place that personnel here.

name: Klingon Borderland Maintain Operational Secrecy
Name: Klingon Borderland Maintain Operational Secrecy
Skills: Intelligence, Leadership, Navigation, Security, and Strength>34
gametext: When you complete this mission, each player who has an Infiltrator at this mission may place the top card of the opponent on their left's dilemma pile face up beneath one of that player's incomplete non-headquarters missions.

name: Kira Nerys Fifth Columnist
Name: Kira Nerys Fifth Columnist
gametext: Order - Kill a [Baj] Treachery personnel present to make this personnel gain "Each of your Bajoran Resistance personnel present is attributes +1" until the end of this turn. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Odo "Kodrak the Unenthused"
Name: Odo "Kodrak the Unenthused"
gametext: You may play this personnel aboard your [DS9] ship. While this personnel is at a [Kli] mission, an opponent's Infiltrator or Treachery personnel at this mission cannot use their abilities.

name: Broca Useful Idiot

Skills: Archaeology Diplomacy Engineer Officer Physics Treachery

Skills: Engineer Honor Intelligence Officer Physics Security Transporters
gametext: When this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may discard the top card of your deck to make him either attributes +1 or attributes -1 for each dilemma beneath this mission (limit +3/-3). This effect lasts until the end of the dilemma.

name: Pralek
Name: Pralek
gametext: At the start of your turn, you may discard the top card of your deck to make this personnel attributes +1 for each dilemma beneath one of your missions (limit +3) until the end of the turn.

Name: Miles O'Brien "Pahash the Grumpy"
