name: Kell Perim Unjoined Advocate
Name: Kell Perim Unjoined Advocate
gametext: While this personnel is attempting a Region: Briar Patch Mission, she gains Astrometrics and Science.

name: Matthew Dougherty "Partner" in Crime
Name: Matthew Dougherty "Partner" in Crime
gametext: You may play this personnel aboard your [Dom] ship (he becomes [Dom]). Each of your [E] Treachery personnel and Son'a present is Cunning +1.

name: William T. Riker Smooth Advocate
Name: William T. Riker Smooth Advocate
gametext: When you play a {Sovereign-class ship} at this mission, it is cost -1 for each of your Region: Briar Patch missions.

name: Worf Principled Warrior
Name: Worf Principled Warrior
gametext: When you play this personnel, examine a number of cards from the top of an opponent's dilemma pile equal to the number of [NA] Honor personnel you command (limit three). Then replace them in the same order.

name: Berik Now Boarding
Name: Berik Now Boarding
gametext: When you win combat or an engagement involving this personnel, you may place the top two cards of your deck beneath your {Ferenginar}.

name: Morta
Name: Morta
gametext: When you begin combat involving this personnel, you may compare total Cunning instead of Strength.

name: Nibor Competitive Pawn
Name: Nibor Competitive Pawn
gametext: While you have a captive, this personnel gains Acquisition and Security.

name: Anij Guiding Light
Name: Anij Guiding Light
gametext: This personnel may (and must) play to {Ba'ku Planet}. At the start of your turn, if this personnel is not on Ba'ku Planet, remove her from the game. Order - Stop one of your personnel present to draw a card.

name: Cousteau Captain's Yacht
Name: Cousteau Captain's Yacht
gametext: You may play this ship at your Region: Briar Patch mission where you command {U.S.S. Enterprise-E}. When you play this ship, you may download a [TNG] Dissident.

name: Omag "Fat Ferengi"
Name: Omag "Fat Ferengi"
gametext: At the start of your turn, if you command {Ferenginar} and no other headquarters mission, you may place a non-[Voy] ship from beneath your {Ferenginar} at an opponent's mission where they do not command a ship and give command of that ship to that opponent to score 5 points.

name: B'Etor Cutthroat Accomplice
Name: B'Etor Cutthroat Accomplice
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may stop your [Kli] Smuggler at this mission to draw two cards.

name: Lursa Cutthroat Accomplice
Name: Lursa Cutthroat Accomplice
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may stop your [Kli] Smuggler at this mission to download a Maneuver event.

name: Sela Daughter of Tasha
Name: Sela Daughter of Tasha
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may download two cards. Those cards must be Crime cards, Hand Weapons, or {A History of Collusion}.

name: Tolian Soran Mad Scientist
Name: Tolian Soran Mad Scientist
gametext: When you win combat or an engagement involving this personnel, you may lose 5 points to place the top card of the loser's dilemma pile beneath your planet mission.

name: Artim Inspirational Child
Name: Artim Inspirational Child
gametext: This personnel may (and must) play to {Ba'ku Planet}. At the start of your turn, if this personnel is not on Ba'ku Planet, remove him from the game. Each unique personnel present is attributes +1.

name: Sojef Pacifistic Luddite
Name: Sojef Pacifistic Luddite
gametext: This personnel may (and must) play to {Ba'ku Planet}. At the start of your turn, if this personnel is not on Ba'ku Planet, remove him from the game. When you play this personnel, you may download a Dissident or a Son'a.

name: Duras Romulan Conspirator
Name: Duras Romulan Conspirator
gametext: Order - Return this personnel to his owner's hand to kill an opponent's Honor personnel present.

name: Tallus Blustering Pursuer
Name: Tallus Blustering Pursuer
Skills: Astrometrics Leadership Navigation Officer Science Security
gametext: When the {D'deridex-class ship} that this personnel is aboard moves to the same mission as an opponent's ship, you may begin an engagement involving this personnel.

name: Tomalak Smug Antagonist
Name: Tomalak Smug Antagonist
Skills: Diplomacy Leadership Navigation Officer Security Treachery
gametext: This personnel is attributes +1 for each Region: Neutral Zone mission where an opponent does not command a ship.

name: Li'seria Son'a Flagship
Name: Li'seria Son'a Flagship
gametext: When an opponent's personnel at this mission is killed in combat or an engagement, you may place a [Dom] Son'a from hand aboard this ship.

name: Son'a Battleship
Name: Son'a Battleship
gametext: To staff this ship, you must have a Son'a aboard. This ship is Range +1 for each personnel in an opponent's discard pile (limit +3).

name: I.K.S. Cha'Joh Sisters' Bird-of-Prey
Name: I.K.S. Cha'Joh Sisters' Bird-of-Prey
gametext: This ship is Weapons +2 for each Smuggler aboard (limit +4).

name: Ehrehin Avenger
Name: Ehrehin Avenger
gametext: When you win an engagement involving this ship, you may lose 5 points to search your dilemma pile for a Damage dilemma and place it on an opponent's undamaged ship at this mission. Shuffle and replace your dilemma pile.

name: Sector 441 Analyze Radiation *VP
Name: Sector 441 Analyze Radiation *VP
Skills: Astrometrics, Navigation, Officer, Science, and Cunning>32
gametext: While this mission is complete, each Region: Briar Patch mission is span -1.

name: Bio-ship Attack
Name: Bio-ship Attack
gametext: Unless you have Navigation, Physics, and Shields>8 or 2 Exobiology, 2 Programming and Cunning>32, all your personnel are stopped, and this dilemma is placed on your ship. Damage - When this dilemma is removed from your ship, place it in your core.

name: Equinox Conspiracy
Name: Equinox Conspiracy
gametext: Unless you have Diplomacy, Exobiology, Navigation, and Treachery or Intelligence, Programming, Security, and Cunning>32, randomly select two personnel to be stopped. If this dilemma's owner commands {U.S.S. Equinox}, they may discard a Nucleogenic card from hand to kill those personnel instead.

name: Photonic Turncoat
Name: Photonic Turncoat
gametext: Unless you have Diplomacy, Science, and Integrity>34 or Engineer, Security, Transporters, and Strength>32, if the opponent on your left commands {Grid 296}, randomly select a personnel. Your opponent places that personnel on their Holoprogram event. (You no longer command that personnel.)

name: Plans Within Plans
Name: Plans Within Plans
gametext: Choose one: randomly select three personnel to be stopped; your opponent destroys an event you command; or discard an interrupt from hand.

name: Race Relations
Name: Race Relations
gametext: Unless you have Anthropology and Cunning>32 or a personnel with 2 Exobiology, randomly select a personnel to be stopped. If four or more personnel of the same species are remaining, place this dilemma in your core.

name: Suspicion
Name: Suspicion
gametext: Your opponent chooses a personnel to be stopped. You may stop two personnel who each share a skill with the chosen personnel to prevent this.

name: Tak Tak Negotiations
Name: Tak Tak Negotiations
gametext: Your opponent downloads a Diplomacy personnel. Unless you have the skills on that personnel (except Acquisition, Intelligence, Law, or Telepathy), all your personnel are stopped. Otherwise, your opponent may place the downloaded personnel where he or she could be played.

name: The Clown: Celebration
Name: The Clown: Celebration
gametext: Place this dilemma on this mission. When you fail a mission attempt at this mission, begin your Discard Excess Cards segment. At the end of this turn, this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

name: The Clown: Cloaking Device
Name: The Clown: Cloaking Device
gametext: Place this dilemma on this mission. Add 3 to each attribute requirement needed to complete this mission for each different equipment the opponent on your left commands. At the end of this turn, this dilemma is overcome.

name: The Clown: Fear Incarnate
Name: The Clown: Fear Incarnate
gametext: Place this dilemma on this mission (limit one per mission). When the first dilemma whose title begins with "{The Clown}" (except a copy of this dilemma) is about to be faced during a mission attempt at this mission, randomly select a personnel to be stopped. When that mission attempt ends, if this mission is incomplete, kill that personnel.

name: The Clown: Ultimatum
Name: The Clown: Ultimatum
gametext: Your opponent examines your hand and chooses two cards. Unless you choose to discard those cards, randomly select a personnel to be killed.

name: The Killing Game
Name: The Killing Game
gametext: For each event your opponent commands in their core, this dilemma is cost -1 (-2 for each Decay event). Unless you have 2 Engineer, 2 Medical, and Cunning>38 or 2 Diplomacy, Leadership, and 2 Physics, randomly select two personnel to be placed in your opponent's brig.

name: Your Galaxy Is Impure
Name: Your Galaxy Is Impure
gametext: Choose one: place this dilemma in your core; randomly select three personnel to be stopped; or randomly select two personnel to be killed.

name: Ha'Dara Simulation
Name: Ha'Dara Simulation
gametext: To play this event, you must command {Grid 296} and no other headquarters mission. Plays in your core. While three or more cards are on this event, each non-Hologram personnel is attributes -1.

name: Implant Neural Interface
Name: Implant Neural Interface
gametext: To play this event, you must command four Holograms. Plays on an opponent's mission. When your opponent is about to fail a mission attempt at this mission, you may destroy this event to randomly select a personnel involved to be placed on your Holoprogram event. (Your opponent no longer commands that personnel.)

name: Nyrian Translocation
Name: Nyrian Translocation
gametext: Place your Infiltrator aboard an opponent's ship at a non-headquarters mission, then randomly select an opponent's personnel present with that Infiltrator to be placed in your brig. Remove this event from the game.

name: Sainte Claire Wargame
Name: Sainte Claire Wargame
gametext: Plays in your core. At the start of your turn, if three or more cards are on this event and one or more of those is a personnel you do not own, score 5 points.

name: Holodeck Safety Protocols
Name: Holodeck Safety Protocols
gametext: When a card an opponent owns is about to make you lose command of your Holoprogram event, you may discard a Hologram from hand to prevent that. You may play this interrupt from your Holoprogram event as if it were in your hand.

name: Reconfigure
Name: Reconfigure
gametext: When your [Bor] personnel is facing a dilemma, discard a non-personnel card from hand to name a skill or keyword. That [Bor] personnel and each [Bor] personnel present loses the named skill or keyword until the end of the dilemma.

name: Triquadric Algorithms
Name: Triquadric Algorithms
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must command {U.S.S. Equinox}. While your personnel present with three [Voy] Treachery personnel is facing a dilemma, you may discard a card from hand to examine the bottom dilemma in your opponent's dilemma stack.

name: We Require Your Expertise
Name: We Require Your Expertise
gametext: When your Android or Hologram is attempting a mission, he or she gains all skills from your captive or a personnel you do not own on your Holoprogram event until the end of the mission attempt.

name: Akritirian Detention Facility Prison Break
Name: Akritirian Detention Facility Prison Break
Affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
Skills: Navigation, Programming, and (Diplomacy and Cunning>32 or Security and Strength>32)
gametext: When you complete this mission, for each personnel that used a skill to complete this mission, take one of your personnel from your opponent's brig and place him or her aboard your ship here.

name: Bahrat's Space Station Negotiate for Supplies
Name: Bahrat's Space Station Negotiate for Supplies
Affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
Skills: Diplomacy, Officer, Programming, Cunning>34, and (Acquisition or Treachery)
gametext: At the start of the opponent on your left's first turn, they may place two dilemmas from the top of their dilemma pile beneath this mission to score 5 points.

name: Former Briori Colony Investigate SOS
Name: Former Briori Colony Investigate SOS
Affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
Skills: Medical, Programming, Cunning>30, and (Diplomacy or Security)
gametext: When you complete this mission, the opponent on your right may download up to three personnel they do not command and place them on this planet. Score 5 points for each.

name: Kohl Settlement Thaw Hibernating Survivors
Name: Kohl Settlement Thaw Hibernating Survivors
Skills: Anthropology, Diplomacy, Programming, Cunning>32, and a non-Hologram personnel
gametext: When your non-Hologram personnel is about to be killed here, you may stop your Hologram present to prevent that.

name: New Earth Quarantine Infected Crew
Name: New Earth Quarantine Infected Crew
Skills: 2 Exobiology, Cunning>32, and (2 Biology or 2 Medical or 3 Science)
gametext: While this mission is incomplete, your personnel cannot beam from this planet. While this mission is complete, each of your Medical personnel is attributes +1.

name: Ocampa System Salvage Debris
Name: Ocampa System Salvage Debris
Affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.
gametext: When you complete this mission, if your personnel completing it have Acquisition, Archaeology, or 2 Engineer, score 5 points.

name: Plasma Storm Depths Search for Missing Vessel
Name: Plasma Storm Depths Search for Missing Vessel
Skills: Astrometrics, Leadership, Navigation, Officer, and Cunning>34
gametext: At the start of your first turn, if each of your other missions is a non-headquarters [DQ] mission, you may discard three cards (or two personnel) from hand to download a [Voy] ship.

name: Rakosa System Intercept "Dreadnought"
Name: Rakosa System Intercept "Dreadnought"
Skills: 2 Engineer, 2 Programming, Transporters, and (Cunning>34 or Strength>37)
gametext: When you complete this mission, you may take a dilemma from beneath this mission and place it face up beneath your incomplete [DQ] planet mission.

name: Subspace "Sandbar" Contact Photonic Lifeforms
Name: Subspace "Sandbar" Contact Photonic Lifeforms
Skills: Anthropology, Engineer, Exobiology, Security, a Diplomacy Hologram, and Cunning>38
gametext: While this mission is complete, you may play Holograms from your Holoprogram events as if they were in your hand.

name: Seska Complicated Loyalties
Name: Seska Complicated Loyalties
gametext: When this personnel uses a skill to complete a mission, each of your opponents may draw a card.

name: Chronology Drone
Name: Chronology Drone
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may discard a card from hand to download a Temporal card.

name: Countermeasure Drone
Name: Countermeasure Drone
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may download {Adapt}, {Ascertain}, {Neural Transceiver}, or {Reconfigure}.

name: Third of Five Altruistic Individual
Name: Third of Five Altruistic Individual
gametext: While you command a [Bor] non-Dissident personnel, this personnel loses all of his skills and his next ability. When your [Bor] Dissident personnel present is randomly selected by a dilemma, you may replace him or her with this personnel.

name: Alex Porter Campaign Veteran
Name: Alex Porter Campaign Veteran
gametext: When this personnel begins a mission attempt at a mission with an event on it, choose an opponent; they may draw a card. If they do, you may exclude this personnel from random selections during this mission attempt.

name: Chakotay The Galaxy's Most Wanted
Name: Chakotay The Galaxy's Most Wanted
Skills: Anthropology Archaeology Leadership Navigation Security Treachery
gametext: When you play this personnel, the opponent on your left may place the top card of their dilemma pile face up beneath your incomplete non-headquarters mission. If they do not, he is cost -5.

name: Dr. Crell Moset Medical Consultant Program
Name: Dr. Crell Moset Medical Consultant Program
gametext: When your [Voy] personnel present is about to be killed by a dilemma, you may discard a [Voy] personnel of a different species from hand to stop that personnel instead.

name: Dr. Lewis Zimmerman Diagnostic Program Alpha One One
Name: Dr. Lewis Zimmerman Diagnostic Program Alpha One One
gametext: You may play this personnel aboard your {U.S.S. Voyager}. When you are about to lose command of your Hologram present, you may remove this personnel from the game to prevent that.

name: E.M.H. Mark II Newborn but Filled with Courage
Name: E.M.H. Mark II Newborn but Filled with Courage
gametext: You may play this personnel aboard your {U.S.S. Prometheus}. When your personnel present is about to be killed by a dilemma, you may make your opponent take a card from their discard pile into hand to prevent that.

name: Geordi La Forge Temporal Enforcer
Name: Geordi La Forge Temporal Enforcer
gametext: While this personnel is attempting a mission, if an opponent commands a Temporal event, he is attributes +1 and gains Law and Security.

name: Pemberton
Name: Pemberton
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may lose 5 points to score 5 points. When you lose command of this personnel, remove him from the game.

name: Revised Kizar
Name: Revised Kizar
gametext: When you use the ability of a [Fut][Voy] Hologram to discard a card from hand, if this personnel is in your hand, you may place him where he could be played.

name: Rollins Trusted Subordinate
Name: Rollins Trusted Subordinate
Skills: Archaeology Geology Law Leadership Officer Security Transporters
gametext: When you play this personnel, your opponent may draw up to three cards. This personnel is cost -1 for each card drawn this way.

name: Sidney Albert Hardhearted
Name: Sidney Albert Hardhearted
Skills: Biology Diplomacy Engineer Geology Officer Treachery
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, if three or more Nucleogenic cards are in your discard pile, you may lose 5 points to meet Integrity requirements of that dilemma using Cunning instead.

name: Tessa Omond Temporal Conspirator
Name: Tessa Omond Temporal Conspirator
Skills: Archaeology Exobiology Navigation Programming Transporters Treachery
gametext: When you play this personnel, she is cost -1 for each different Temporal event you command.

name: Tricia Jenkins Relaxed Pilot
Name: Tricia Jenkins Relaxed Pilot
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may spend an additional 5 counters this turn. If you do, each of your opponents may score 5 points.

name: William T. Riker Surprised Witness
Name: William T. Riker Surprised Witness
gametext: You may play this personnel aboard your {U.S.S. Voyager} at cost -2 to choose an opponent; they may download a Q card. When this personnel uses a skill at a [DQ] mission, shuffle him into his owner's deck.

name: Reg Inside Man
Name: Reg Inside Man
Skills: Acquisition Biology Diplomacy Engineer Programming 2 Treachery
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may place him aboard an opponent's ship to name one of his skills. When an opponent's personnel present uses the named skill, you may exchange a card in hand with a card beneath your {Ferenginar}.

name: M'tokra
Name: M'tokra
Skills: Anthropology Diplomacy Engineer Honor Law Programming
gametext: You may play this personnel aboard your [Kli] ship at a non-[AQ] mission at cost -1.

name: Neelix "Fearless Warrior"
Name: Neelix "Fearless Warrior"
Skills: Acquisition Anthropology Diplomacy Exobiology Honor Security
gametext: When any number of your [Kli] personnel present at a [DQ] mission are about to be stopped by a dilemma that does not require a skill, you may stop this personnel to prevent that.

name: Tom Paris Father of the Kuvah'magh
Name: Tom Paris Father of the Kuvah'magh
gametext: While this personnel is attempting a [DQ] mission aboard your [Kli] ship, he cannot be stopped by dilemmas.

name: Doctor Chaotica Ruler of the Cosmos
Name: Doctor Chaotica Ruler of the Cosmos
gametext: When this personnel is about to be killed, you may place a card from one of your Holoprogram events in its owner's discard pile to stop him instead.

name: Henry Starling CEO of Chronowerx Industries
Name: Henry Starling CEO of Chronowerx Industries
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may discard a ship from hand to download up to three non-Artifact equipment cards.

name: Lonzak Loyal Henchman
Name: Lonzak Loyal Henchman
gametext: Order - Place a card on one of your Holoprogram events in its owner's discard pile to begin combat involving this personnel. If you win, randomly select an opponent's personnel involved to be placed on your Holoprogram event. (They no longer command that personnel.)

name: Q'ret Adoptive Father
Name: Q'ret Adoptive Father
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may place a unique personnel from an opponent's discard pile on your headquarters mission. You now command that personnel, and their species becomes Kobali.

name: Satan's Robot Dangerous Minion
Name: Satan's Robot Dangerous Minion
gametext: While in combat, each of your Holograms present is Strength +1. If this personnel is present with three or more Holograms, it gains Hand Weapon.

name: Taleen Sanctimonious Turnkey
Name: Taleen Sanctimonious Turnkey
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may draw a card for each captive in your brig and each ship you command but do not own.

name: Neelix "Fearless Warrior" *VP
Name: Neelix "Fearless Warrior" *VP
Skills: Acquisition Anthropology Diplomacy Exobiology Honor Security
gametext: When any number of your [Kli] personnel present at a [DQ] mission are about to be stopped by a dilemma that does not require a skill, you may stop this personnel to prevent that.

name: Borg Cutting Beam *VP
Name: Borg Cutting Beam *VP
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - Begin an engagement involving your [Bor] ship. If you win, randomly select an opponent's personnel involved, take command of that personnel, place him or her on that [Bor] ship, then place this event on an opponent's ship involved. Otherwise, destroy this event. Damage - This ship is attributes -2.

name: Morphogenic Virus
Name: Morphogenic Virus
gametext: If six or more non- [Dom] personnel are attempting this mission, this dilemma is cost +4. Randomly select two personnel to be stopped (personnel cannot be excluded from this random selection).

name: Occasional Emergency
Name: Occasional Emergency
gametext: Unless you have Medical, all your personnel are stopped. Choose a personnel to be stopped for each of your Medical personnel attempting this mission.

name: Only a Temporary Setback
Name: Only a Temporary Setback
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Car] personnel. Plays in your core. Order - Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is a [Car] ship or non-[Car] personnel, draw it. Otherwise, discard it. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Pillar of the Community
Name: Pillar of the Community
gametext: Plays on your {Mouth of the Wormhole}. When you play a Chef, Dabo Girl, Smuggler, Thief, or Waiter, you may draw a card then place a card from hand on the top or bottom of your deck. You may do this only once each turn.

name: To Serve the Empire
Name: To Serve the Empire
gametext: Plays in your core. While you command Kahless, each of your [Kli] personnel who does not have a staffing icon may meet staffing requirements as though they had [Stf].

name: Are You Brain Dead?!
Name: Are You Brain Dead?!
gametext: While your personnel is facing a dilemma, stop that personnel.

name: Quick Trip
Name: Quick Trip
gametext: Order - Begin your Discard Excess Cards segment (you may keep any number of cards in hand). Order - Flip a dilemma pile. Order - Shuffle any player's deck.

name: Antarian Sector Host Trans-stellar Rally
Name: Antarian Sector Host Trans-stellar Rally
Affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
Skills: Anthropology, Biology, Diplomacy, Integrity>34, and (Acquisition or Honor)
gametext: Order - If this mission is incomplete, stop your Chef here to exchange a dilemma beneath this mission with the top card of that dilemma's owner's dilemma pile. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Tora Ziyal "Poor Judge of Character"
Name: Tora Ziyal "Poor Judge of Character"
gametext: Each of your [Car][DS9] personnel present is Integrity +2.

name: Yassim Vocal Martyr
Name: Yassim Vocal Martyr
gametext: When you play this personnel, discard a card from hand. Order - Say "Evil must be opposed" and kill this personnel.

name: Scout Drone
Name: Scout Drone
Skills: Astrometrics Biology Engineer Science Security Transporters
gametext: While this personnel is attempting an [AQ] mission, he is attributes +1.

name: Third of Five Wayward Drone
Name: Third of Five Wayward Drone
gametext: When you are about to lose command of your event on your mission, you may return this personnel to his owner's hand to prevent that.

name: Kotan Pa'Dar Prominent Politician
Name: Kotan Pa'Dar Prominent Politician
gametext: When this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may discard the top card of your deck to add its cost to this personnel's attributes until the end of the mission attempt (limit +4). You may do this only once each turn.

name: Raimus Syndicate Collaborator
Name: Raimus Syndicate Collaborator
gametext: When this personnel is an eligible target for a random selection, you may give command of your Commodity event to an opponent to exclude him and an Acquisition personnel present from that selection.

name: Ben Civilian Server
Name: Ben Civilian Server
gametext: When this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may discard a card from hand to make your [Stf][TNG] personnel gain a skill from your [Cmd][TNG] personnel present until the end of the mission attempt.

name: Manuele Atoa Something Fun to Look At
Name: Manuele Atoa Something Fun to Look At
gametext: This personnel is attributes +1 for each different affiliation among your personnel present (limit +3).

name: Samuel T. Cogley Attorney at Law
Name: Samuel T. Cogley Attorney at Law
gametext: You may play this personnel at cost +1 to download {Legal Proceedings}.

name: Seven of Nine Ideal Candidate
Name: Seven of Nine Ideal Candidate
Skills: Astrometrics 2 Engineer 2 Physics Programming Science Transporters
gametext: While this personnel is attempting a mission worth 50 or more points, she is Cunning +2 and gains Exobiology.

name: Obol
Name: Obol
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may place a card from hand beneath your Ferenginar.

name: Quark Middleman
Name: Quark Middleman
Skills: Acquisition Anthropology Diplomacy Physics Programming Treachery
gametext: While this personnel is attempting a mission, he and each of your [Maq] personnel present may use Hand Weapons as if they were in combat.

name: Elias Giger Cellular Entertainer
Name: Elias Giger Cellular Entertainer
gametext: Order - Each player places the top three cards of their deck on the bottom of their deck in the same order. You can do this only once per turn.

name: Christopher Pike Prospective Orion Trader
Name: Christopher Pike Prospective Orion Trader
gametext: When your Orion or Thief present gains a skill, this personnel may gain a skill of your choice until the end of this turn. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Zefram Cochrane Bemoaning His Day
Name: Zefram Cochrane Bemoaning His Day
gametext: When you lose command of this personnel, remove him from the game, then each player removes a non-Human personnel they command from the game.

name: Kassem Soup Imperial
Name: Kassem Soup Imperial
gametext: When an opponent is about to discard a card from their hand, you may destroy your event to randomly select that opponent's card from all eligible cards.

name: Sim Sacrificial Lamb
Name: Sim Sacrificial Lamb
gametext: You may play this personnel aboard your [SF] ship. When your [SF] personnel present is about to be killed, kill this personnel to prevent that.

name: Hard Bargain Totally Legitimate
Name: Hard Bargain Totally Legitimate
gametext: This ship is attributes +1 for each Commodity event and Crime event in play (limit +4).

name: Pillar of the Community *VP
Name: Pillar of the Community *VP
gametext: Plays on your {Mouth of the Wormhole}. When you play a Chef, Dabo Girl, Smuggler, Thief, or Waiter, you may draw a card then place a card from hand on the top or bottom of your deck. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Skeleton Crew *VP
Name: Skeleton Crew *VP
gametext: Place this dilemma on this mission. To begin a mission attempt at this mission, you must have at least six personnel involved. When you complete this mission, this dilemma is overcome.

name: Habak *VP
Name: Habak *VP
gametext: To play this event, you must command a [Fed][Maq] Anthropology personnel. Plays on your Region: Demilitarized Zone mission (limit one per mission). This mission is worth 5 more points.

name: Mobilization Points *VP
Name: Mobilization Points *VP
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Dom] personnel. Plays in your core. The first unique Jem'Hadar played each turn is cost -1.

name: Lustful Distraction *VP
Name: Lustful Distraction *VP
gametext: To play this interrupt, stop two of your [AU][SF] personnel. While you have no cards in hand, you may play this interrupt from on your {Watch Dog}. When an interrupt is played, prevent that interrupt and place it in its owner's discard pile. Order - Choose an event. The owner of that event shuffles it into his or her deck.

name: Bassen Rift Interdict Genocidal Praetor *VP
Name: Bassen Rift Interdict Genocidal Praetor *VP
Skills: Officer, Security, Transporters, and (2 Honor and Integrity>44 or 2 Intelligence and Cunning>44)
gametext: When you complete this mission, each ship here is destroyed unless you place a personnel involved who costs 4 or more in their owner's discard pile.

name: Requisitions Drone *VP
Name: Requisitions Drone *VP
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may examine the top four cards of your deck and take one into hand. Place the remaining cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Brunt FCA Liquidator *VP
Name: Brunt FCA Liquidator *VP
gametext: Order - If an opponent commands more events in his or her core than you, return this personnel to his owner's hand to destroy an event.

name: Revised Seven of Nine Shock-Trooper *VP
Name: Revised Seven of Nine Shock-Trooper *VP
gametext: Order - Discard a card titled {Seven of Nine} or Revised Seven of Nine from hand to choose one: place a personnel present on the bottom of his or her owner's deck, or take a Hologram from your discard pile into hand.

name: Sybok Fanatical Missionary *VP
Name: Sybok Fanatical Missionary *VP
Skills: Anthropology Astrometrics Diplomacy Engineer Leadership Treachery
gametext: When a dilemma that this personnel is facing is about to be returned to its owner's dilemma pile, you may remove that dilemma from the game. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Porthos
Name: Porthos
gametext: This dilemma is cost 3 for each planet dilemma beneath this mission. Your opponent chooses two personnel with Diplomacy or Leadership to be stopped.

name: Orb of the Emissary
Name: Orb of the Emissary
gametext: While your personnel present is facing a dilemma, you may download a Prophet card. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Barge of the Dead
Name: Barge of the Dead
gametext: Plays in your core. When your Klingon is killed, you may place him or her on this event. (You no longer command him or her.) When your Treachery Klingon is about to be stopped by a dilemma, you may place a personnel from this event in their owner's discard pile to prevent that.

name: Rishon Uxbridge
Name: Rishon Uxbridge
gametext: Plays in your core. When a card an opponent owns is about to prevent or destroy an event you own that costs 4 or more, you may destroy this event to prevent that.

name: Rousing Reminiscence
Name: Rousing Reminiscence
gametext: Plays in your core. When a dilemma your Dissident with 2 Leadership is facing requires an opponent to choose any number of your personnel, you may reveal three Dissidents among the eligible personnel to make the selection random instead. You may do this only once each turn.

name: They're Still Coming Through
Name: They're Still Coming Through
gametext: To play this event, you must command {To Rule in Hell}. Plays in your core. Cards you own cannot make you lose command of this event. You cannot begin a mission attempt with fewer than six personnel. Order - Lose 5 points to unstop up to four of your Genetically Enhanced personnel. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Undaunted
Name: Undaunted
gametext: Plays in your core. When your [Car] Dissident is killed by a card an opponent owns, you may place him or her on this event to download a [Car] Dissident.

name: Cryptic Revelation
Name: Cryptic Revelation
gametext: To play this interrupt, you must command three [Baj] personnel. Order - Examine the top three cards of your deck. Take one card into hand, place one card on the bottom of your deck, and remove one card from the game.

name: Stella!
Name: Stella!
gametext: When an event or interrupt is played, reveal three Androids from hand and kill your non-Android personnel to prevent that event or interrupt and place it in its owner's discard pile.

name: Cardassia Prime Bastion of Resistance
Name: Cardassia Prime Bastion of Resistance
Skills: You may play [Car] Dissidents, [NA] Dissidents, and [Car] ships, and equipment at this mission.
gametext: You cannot command another headquarters mission. Order - If you command two completed missions worth 30 points each, flip this mission. - You may play [Car] Dissidents, [NA] Dissidents at cost +1, and equipment at this mission. When you complete this mission, score 5 points for each copy of {For Cardassia!} you own that has been removed from the game.

Name: Jean-Luc Picard Starship Captain **VP
Skills: Diplomacy Honor Law Leadership Navigation Officer
gametext: Order - This personnel loses Diplomacy, Law, and Navigation and gains Anthropology, Archaeology, and Science until the end of this turn. You may do this only once each turn.

name: William T. Riker Number One *VP
Name: William T. Riker Number One *VP
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, he gains Anthropology and Security.

name: Worf Chief of Security **VP
Name: Worf Chief of Security **VP
gametext: When your [TNG] personnel present is about to be stopped by a dilemma, you may stop this personnel instead.

name: U.S.S. Enterprise-D Federation Flagship *VP
Name: U.S.S. Enterprise-D Federation Flagship *VP
gametext: When you complete a space mission, if this ship is at that mission and you have three [Cmd] aboard this ship, score 10 points.

name: Nesting Symbiote
Name: Nesting Symbiote
gametext: Unless you have Geology, Law, Medical, Navigation, and Integrity>32 or four personnel with different costs, all your personnel are stopped.

name: Captive Audience
Name: Captive Audience
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Rom] personnel. Plays in your core. When an opponent's personnel uses a skill to complete a mission, if your [Rom] personnel with that skill is at that mission, you may destroy this event to place the opponent's personnel using that skill in your brig.

name: Dreadnought
Name: Dreadnought
gametext: To play this event, you must command three [Fed][Maq] personnel. Plays on an opponent's mission. When an opponent's personnel are about to fail a mission attempt at this mission, you may remove this event from the game to randomly select one of those personnel to be killed.

name: Interlink Module
Name: Interlink Module
gametext: Plays in your core. While your three Interlink personnel are attempting a mission, you may discard the top card of your deck to make each of your Borg gain a skill required by your completed mission until the end of that mission attempt. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Klingon-Occupied Outland Enact Poetic Revenge
Name: Klingon-Occupied Outland Enact Poetic Revenge
Skills: Exobiology, Leadership, Navigation, Treachery, and Cunning>34
gametext: When you complete this mission, flip it over. - When this side is revealed, name a personnel. Each personnel with that card title loses all skills, abilities, and attributes. At the start of each opponent's turn, if their personnel here have this mission's printed requirements, flip this mission.

name: Tholia Conquer Inferior Species
Name: Tholia Conquer Inferior Species
Skills: Astrometrics, Geology, Security, Transporters, Strength>34, and 3 MACOs
gametext: While you command three [AU] personnel, each MACO you own gains [AU].

name: Els Renora Sharp-Tongued Arbiter
Name: Els Renora Sharp-Tongued Arbiter
gametext: You may play copies of {Legal Proceedings} from your discard pile as if they were in your hand.

name: Memad
Name: Memad
gametext: At the start of your first turn, if you command {[HQ] Cardassia Prime}, you may discard this card from hand to download an Assault or Maneuver event.

name: Hawk Conn Officer
Name: Hawk Conn Officer
gametext: When the [TNG] ship this personnel is aboard is about to move between your {[HQ] Earth} and a non-Region: Sector 001 mission, if all of your non-headquarters missions are in the same region, subtract 2 from the Range required.

name: Michael Eddington Here to Make Friends
Name: Michael Eddington Here to Make Friends
gametext: Order - Discard a [DS9] personnel from hand to choose an opponent's Assassin, Infiltrator, Smuggler, Thief, or non-unique personnel present to be placed on your {Holding Cell}. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Phillipa Louvois J.A.G. Officer for Sector 23
Name: Phillipa Louvois J.A.G. Officer for Sector 23
gametext: When you play this personnel, each player draws a card. Then, if you command an Android, you may draw a card.

name: Spock Statesman
Name: Spock Statesman
gametext: When you play this personnel, if each of your non-headquarters missions is a [Kli] mission, you may download {U.S.S.Enterprise-A}.

name: One Zero Efficient
Name: One Zero Efficient
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may discard a random card from hand to download {Zero One}. When you play this personnel, you may examine your deck and remove up to four non-personnel cards from the game, then shuffle your deck.

name: Professor Honey Bare Way Too Smart for You
Name: Professor Honey Bare Way Too Smart for You
gametext: When this personnel is killed by a dilemma, each player kills each copy of {Jadzia Dax} that they command.

name: Zero One Efficient
Name: Zero One Efficient
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may discard a random card from hand to download {One Zero}. When you play this personnel, you may examine your dilemma pile and remove up to four dilemmas from the game, then shuffle your dilemma pile.

name: Praxus
Name: Praxus
gametext: This personnel is attributes -1 for each card in the opponent on your left's hand (limit -3).

name: Aurulent On a Treasure Hunt
Name: Aurulent On a Treasure Hunt
gametext: At the start of your turn, if this ship is staffed at a non-headquarters mission, you may choose one: take command of a Commodity in an opponent's core; or give command of your Commodity to an opponent.

name: Distress Call *VP
Name: Distress Call *VP
gametext: This dilemma is cost -3 for each mission you have completed. All your personnel are stopped.

name: Intoxicating Spirits *VP
Name: Intoxicating Spirits *VP
gametext: When an interrupt is played, if you command a Waiter personnel, you may give command of this event to an opponent to prevent that interrupt and place it in its owner's discard pile. While you command but do not own this event, each player's Waiter personnel is attributes +1.

name: Military Assault Command Operations *VP
Name: Military Assault Command Operations *VP
gametext: Download a MACO. Destroy this event.

name: Prejudice and Politics *VP
Name: Prejudice and Politics *VP
gametext: Plays in your core. Order - If your Praetor or Senator is on {Romulus}, reveal the top card of an opponent's deck. If it is a personnel, that opponent places that card in his or her hand. Otherwise, score 5 points, and that opponent places that card on the bottom of his or her deck. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Natural Instincts *VP
Name: Natural Instincts *VP
gametext: When your Bajoran Resistance personnel is facing a dilemma, name a skill that none of your personnel facing that dilemma has. That Bajoran Resistance personnel gains that skill until the end of that dilemma.

name: Elim Garak Crafty Underling *VP
Name: Elim Garak Crafty Underling *VP
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you command a Treachery personnel, he is cost -1. While this personnel is attempting a mission, you may discard an [AU] card from hand to make him gain a skill of your choice until the end of that mission attempt.

name: Revised Janeway Cold-Blooded Killer *VP
Name: Revised Janeway Cold-Blooded Killer *VP
gametext: While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may discard a card titled {Kathryn Janeway} or Revised Janeway from hand to make her Cunning +5 and Strength +5 until the end of that dilemma.

name: B'Etor Romulan Conspirator *VP
Name: B'Etor Romulan Conspirator *VP
gametext: When this personnel is about to be stopped by a dilemma, you may unstop a stopped [Rom] personnel present. That personnel joins this mission attempt.

name: Mobile Micro-Singularity Analyse Polarized Chronitons
Name: Mobile Micro-Singularity Analyse Polarized Chronitons
Affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.
Skills: Engineer, Physics, Programming, Transporters, and Cunning>32
gametext: When you complete this mission, flip it over. - Each opponent's unique personnel cannot use their abilities during mission attempts. At the start of each opponent's turn, if their personnel here have this mission's printed requirements, flip this mission.

name: Julian Bashir Displaced Doctor
Name: Julian Bashir Displaced Doctor
gametext: While this personnel is attempting a mission, if he is present with three of your personnel who each have a cost of 2, you may examine the top card of the dilemma stack. If you do, cards you own cannot use their abilities when that dilemma is about to be revealed. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Gabriel Bell American Hero
Name: Gabriel Bell American Hero
gametext: When this personnel is about to be stopped or killed by a dilemma, you may place him in his owner's discard pile instead to make each of your personnel who costs 2 attributes +1 until the end of the turn.

name: Benjamin Sisko Preserving History
Name: Benjamin Sisko Preserving History
Skills: Anthropology Engineer Honor Leadership Officer Security
gametext: When any number of your personnel who each have a cost of 2 present are about to be stopped by a dilemma that requires a skill, you may stop this personnel to prevent up to three of those personnel from being stopped.

name: Argaya System Apprehend Escapee
Name: Argaya System Apprehend Escapee
Skills: Officer, 2 Security, Cunning>36, and (Intelligence or Physics or Treachery)
gametext: When you complete this mission, choose an opponent's ship. Randomly select an opponent's personnel aboard that ship to be placed in your brig.

name: Argratha Rehabilitate Convict
Name: Argratha Rehabilitate Convict
Affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.
Skills: Anthropology, Leadership, Programming, Security, and any attribute>34
gametext: When a player is about to draw dilemmas, if the player on their right began that mission attempt with fewer than six personnel, they may search their dilemma pile to choose those dilemmas instead, then shuffle and replace their dilemma pile.

name: Celtris III Construct Elaborate Trap
Name: Celtris III Construct Elaborate Trap
gametext: When you begin a mission attempt here with six or more personnel, you may discard the top six cards of your deck to download up to three Capture cards.

name: Derna Perimeter Run Blockade
Name: Derna Perimeter Run Blockade
Skills: Engineer, Medical, Physics, Security, and Cunning>32
gametext: While an opponent commands a staffed ship here, each of your personnel here is attributes -1.

name: Earth Orbit Sabotage Power Grid
Name: Earth Orbit Sabotage Power Grid
Skills: Intelligence, Programming, Security, Cunning>34, and a Treachery Admiral
gametext: When you complete this mission, for each Cadet involved, you may take a Paranoia card from your discard pile into hand (limit three).

name: Forcas Sector Restore Quantum Barriers
Name: Forcas Sector Restore Quantum Barriers
Skills: Astrometrics, Medical, Officer, Science, and Cunning>34
gametext: When you complete this mission, replace up to three of your [AU] personnel here with an equal number of [AU] personnel of the same affiliation from your discard pile. Place the personnel you replaced on the bottom of their owners' decks in any order.

name: Khitomer Sabotage Peace Conference
Name: Khitomer Sabotage Peace Conference
Skills: Engineer, Intelligence, Security, Treachery, Cunning>35, and a Hand Weapon
gametext: When you complete this mission, you may return your Assassin involved to their owner's hand to choose a planet mission. Randomly kill an opponent's personnel on that planet.

name: Mouth of the Wormhole Form Labor Union
Name: Mouth of the Wormhole Form Labor Union
Skills: Acquisition, Anthropology, Diplomacy, Honor, and Integrity>38
gametext: When you begin a mission attempt here involving six or more Dabo Girl and/or Waiter personnel, you may subtract one from the total cost your opponent may spend on dilemmas.

name: Nimbus III Staff Backwater Embassy
Name: Nimbus III Staff Backwater Embassy
Skills: 2 Diplomacy, Law, 2 Security, and (Integrity>36 or Cunning>37)
gametext: While you do not command {Unicomplex}, you may spend three counters to download {Caithlin Dar}, {Korrd}, or {St. John Talbot} and place him or her on this planet.

name: Norcadia Prime Shore Leave
Name: Norcadia Prime Shore Leave
Affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
Skills: Archaeology, Engineer, Geology, Science, and Cunning>34
gametext: When you check if this mission's requirements can be met, reduce its attribute requirements by 2 (limit 10) for each dual dilemma beneath this mission until the end of that mission attempt.

name: Omicron Theta Outskirts Crystalline Encounter (CM)
Name: Omicron Theta Outskirts Crystalline Encounter (CM)
Affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.

name: Rakhari Approach Extradite Political Refugee
Name: Rakhari Approach Extradite Political Refugee
Skills: Diplomacy, Officer, Security, Integrity>34, and (Anthropology or Law)

name: Remmler Array Steal Weapons-Grade Waste
Name: Remmler Array Steal Weapons-Grade Waste
Skills: Acquisition, Engineer, Transporters, Treachery, and Cunning>34
gametext: When you complete this mission, you may take command of up to three non-Artifact Commodity cards in your hand and/or discard pile.

name: Romulus Orbit Covert Insertion
Name: Romulus Orbit Covert Insertion
Skills: Leadership, Navigation, Programming, Cunning>34, and a staffed Cloaking Device ship
gametext: When you complete this mission, you may place up to three of your [Rom] personnel involved on the bottom of their owners' decks in any order. Score 5 points for each.

name: Sakari Colony Assimilate Resources
Name: Sakari Colony Assimilate Resources
Skills: Engineer, Geology, Science, Security, and (Cunning>34 or Strength>34)
gametext: When you complete this mission, you may reveal an opponent's hand and place a revealed personnel on this planet. (You now command that personnel.)

name: Sector 04-70 Divert Attention
Name: Sector 04-70 Divert Attention
gametext: When you complete this mission, the opponent on your left choses one: you score 5 points; or you take command of up to two events in their core that have no cards on them. (Move those events to your core.)

name: Sector 3641 Locate Abducted Klingon (CM)
Name: Sector 3641 Locate Abducted Klingon (CM)
Skills: Leadership, 2 Security, Strength>32, and (Exobiology or Physics)

name: Takar Exploit Populace
Name: Takar Exploit Populace
Skills: Acquisition, 2 Anthropology, Archaeology, Treachery, and Cunning>38
gametext: When you begin a mission attempt here with six or more personnel, you may place the top card of your deck beneath your {Ferenginar}. When you complete this mission, if you have three different Rule events in your core, score 5 points.

name: Trialus Stabilize Cascade Reaction
Name: Trialus Stabilize Cascade Reaction
Affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
gametext: While the mission is complete, your {Meridian} cannot flip from the front side.

name: Vanden Prime Coordinate Resistance Operations
Name: Vanden Prime Coordinate Resistance Operations
Skills: 2 Honor, Security, any attribute>30, and 3 Dissidents
gametext: When you are about to play a [Car] Dissident at your {Cardassia Prime}, you may discard the top card of your deck to play that Dissident on this planet instead. While this mission is complete, you may play [Car] ships here.

name: Varria III Locate Missing Crewman
Name: Varria III Locate Missing Crewman
Affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.
Skills: Exobiology, Programming, Cunning>38, and (2 Anthropology or 2 Diplomacy)
gametext: To attempt this mission, your {Varria Corona} must have been attempted this turn or be complete.

name: Varria Corona Defeat Rogue Borg Vessel
Name: Varria Corona Defeat Rogue Borg Vessel
Affiliation: Any affiliation may attempt this mission.
Skills: Astrometrics, Science, Cunning>38, and (2 Engineer or 2 Navigation)
gametext: To attempt this mission, your {Varria III} must have six or more of your personnel on it or be complete.

name: Wadi Homeworld Dominate Gaming Championship
Name: Wadi Homeworld Dominate Gaming Championship
Affiliation: Any affiliation (except [Bor]) may attempt this mission.
Skills: Anthropology, Programming, Cunning>32, and (Acquisition or Honor or Treachery)
gametext: Each dilemma whose title begins with "Chula" revealed here is cost -1. When you complete this mission, score 5 points (limit 15) for each dilemma whose title begins with "Chula" on or beneath this mission.

name: Dukat Egomaniac (CM)
Name: Dukat Egomaniac (CM)
gametext: This personnel is Cunning +1 for each captive in your brig (limit +3).

name: Laas Rejoining the Link (CM)
Name: Laas Rejoining the Link (CM)
gametext: This personnel is attributes +1 for each of your missions that requires Exobiology.

name: Hogan
Name: Hogan
gametext: When you play this personnel, if you command three or more Region: Demilitarized Zone missions, he is cost -1. While you command three or more Region: Badlands missions, this personnel is attributes +1 and gains Navigation and Security.

name: Hollister
Name: Hollister
gametext: When you play this personnel, you may discard any number of Paranoia cards from hand to draw an equal number of cards.

name: Patrick West Co-Conspirator
Name: Patrick West Co-Conspirator
gametext: When this personnel is returned to your hand by your {Assassination Plot} or when you complete {Khitomer}, you may choose the opponent's personnel to be selected from all eligible possibilities.

name: Ro Laren Stepping Forward
Name: Ro Laren Stepping Forward
gametext: When this personnel uses a skill to complete a Region: Badlands mission, you may take a dilemma from beneath that mission and place it face up beneath your incomplete Region: Demilitarized Zone mission. You may do this only once each turn.

name: Rom Union Organizer
Name: Rom Union Organizer
gametext: The first Chef, Dabo Girl, or Waiter played at this mission each turn is cost -1. This personnel is attributes +1 for each of these keywords on your personnel present: Chef, Dabo Girl, and Waiter.

name: Kelsey Heist Mastermind
Name: Kelsey Heist Mastermind
gametext: When this personnel uses Acquisition to complete a mission, you may destroy a Commodity event in your core to score 5 points.

name: Cretak Friendly Envoy
Name: Cretak Friendly Envoy
Skills: Diplomacy Engineer Law Leadership Medical Security
gametext: While an opponent commands a ship at this mission, each of your [Rom] personnel present is attributes +1.

name: Warren Woods
Name: Warren Woods
gametext: While you command a completed Mirror mission, this personnel is attributes +1 and gains Geology. While you command a completed Region: Sector 001 mission, this personnel is attributes +1 and gains Leadership.
